story:
All you need to do is to pick the design that fits your style the best and Stitched does the rest for you! Featuring a special material that makes it easy to remove unwanted lint on clothing and other soft surfaces, you can stay fresh and keep your fashion clean without the use of a lint roller. You can even quickly clean your Stitched case so you can use it over and over again!

 

 

 

 

  • Remove fur, dust, lint, and more off your clothing, couch, and more
  • Special antimicrobial stitching prevents bacterial growth.
  • High quality materials
  • Protects your iPhone 6, 7, or 8
  • Multiple modern designs to choose from
  • Thin, flexible, and strong

 

 

 

Just like magic, all it takes is one swipe of your Stitched iPhone case to get rid of lint, dirt,  pet hair, and more on your clothes, couch, car seat, or other surfaces. Then just wipe your phone in the opposite direction to remove the unwanted lint from your phone case. Never buy a sticky, messy lint roller again!

If you love your iPhone, Stitched is the perfect protection. Though only 2mm thick, Stitched’s smart design is strong enough to keep your iPhone safe and your ports unencumbered. Using a special beveled lip, Stitched adds an extra layer of protection to keep your screen from being shattered when dropped.

 

Not only will your clothes look clean, Stitched is made with antimicrobial stitching that actually prevents bacteria growth.

 

Made from high-quality materials, our designs will easily fit into your favorite looks. Want to mix and match to keep your style coordinated? Pick from a variety of colors and patterns so your fashion is always fresh. Stitched is thin, flexible and won’t damage your new iPhone when you swap out one style for another.

 

Stitched’s specially designed material contains bristles that help pick up lint with one swipe. To clean off your Stitched afterwards, all you have to do is reverse the direction of your swipe to get rid of the removed lint, hair, or debris. It’s just that simple. To keep your phone case from staying dirty when the debris has been swept away, we’ve included antimicrobial stitching that prevents bacterial growth, so your Stitched will keep you safe from the dirt you can see, as well as the hidden bacteria you can’t see.

Stitched started from a simple encounter at a restaurant in May 2015. Our CEO found himself dressed to the nines, however, there was a major problem. After resting the white napkin on his lap, he noticed the napkin left white residue on his black slacks. With no lint roller in sight, he found himself looking foolish. How convenient would it have been to simply wipe the lint away with something you keep in your pocket at all times? From that experience we all realized that the item everyone always has in their pocket  is a cell phone. Why not incorporate the ability to always stay clean by adding lint brush material to the back of your phone case. And that was the moment Stitched Products was born.

We’ve since evolved that basic design to also include antimicrobial stitching to eliminate the unwanted growth of bacteria on your case and teamed up with the world-renowned RKS Design to keep the design as fresh as your fashion.

 

 

 

 

Stitched is a collaboration between 3 entrepreneurs and the team at RKS Design to blend a fresh look with a functional lint roller to protect your phone and your style all in one.

 



Q: How does the Lint and pet Hair come off after you swipe it off your clothes?
A :The Lint Brush material is unique as it has bristles all moving in one direction to pick up unwanted debris. If swiped in the opposite direction the debris come off with ease.

Q: Is the Lint brush material and case water resistant?
A: Yes          

Q: Who Created it?
A: We are a group of 3 entrepreneurs who teamed up with world renown RKS Design to bring the world’s first lint removing iPhone case to the market.

Q: Where can we buy it?
A: Currently, you can only preorder your Stitched iPhone case here, on Indiegogo.        

Q: How much does it cost?
A: Please see the perks for detailed prices and shipping costs.

story:
11th HOUR DOUBLE NECK MADNESS - $1399!

Only three available at this price! Look for our new perk!

Whoa! Sean Lennon checking out the Magnetic Double Neck!

Who builds these things?

I do. My name is Scott Gorsuch, and I've been building guitars and tube amps for almost 40 years. My musician friends have always told me I ought to get into the custom guitar market, and I've always shook my head and replied, “no, too many guys doing the boutique guitar thing already”. That was, until the apple fell out of the double neck tree, and hit me on the head.

Now I've got something unique to offer: the Flux magnetic double neck.

As seen on                                 

What is it?

My Double Neck is actually two guitars that connect together in seconds (patent pending), and is the coolest thing your guitar friends, and your audience will ever see! Play the main guitar – play the mini – then hook 'em together and blow everyone's mind!

What makes Flux special?

Great guitars have to be more than cool looking, they have to play like butter and sound amazing – these do! 12 strings are my thing, it's what I play with my own band. They're like the perfect effects pedal - your super-lush secret weapon!

The Flux Double Neck isn't just some novelty (although it is fun to see a whole audience go "WTF!" at once!), it's a first class, hand-built, tour-ready machine!

If you order a guitar during this Indiegogo campaign, you'll get our low-as-we-dare introductory prices. Also, you'll notice a select few perks have a delivery date of December 25th. And with Christmas coming up, a Flux guitar would completely freak out that guitar-nut in your life!

Orders placed after this campaign or that exceed my perk limits will sell for the same price, with a 6 to 8 month delivery time (from date of order). And we love lefties - no extra charge for left-handed models!

~A word about guitar pricing:
The other day, as I waited for my son to get out of his piano lessons at a local music store, I sat there playing a new $129 big-name guitar. $129?!  Increasingly, guitar companies move their production overseas, to countries with questionable human rights and unfair wages, resulting in very low prices (and sometimes, quality). At Flux, I do every operation by hand, using as many locally-sourced materials as possible; my prices reflect that. Just something to keep in mind.


Guitar specs:

  • Bodies: chambered Cherry backs for light weight and resonance/Maple tops (figured Maple on sunburst/natural - mini bodies un-chambered)
  • Necks: bolt-on, reclaimed old-growth Port Orford Cedar from the Pacific Northwest (the stiffness of Mahogany and half the weight!)
  • Fingerboards: Indian Rosewood, 12" radius, Mother of Pearl dots, and white side-position markers
  • Scale: 24 3/4" (Gibson scale), 22 frets
  • Fretwire: medium wire for 12 strings .084" wide, .039" tall -- wide-medium wire for 6 strings .103" wide, .046" tall
  • Pickups: Ohio-made Brandon Wound Pickups P90s - old-school and gorgeous!
  • Bridges: Gotoh hardtails, 6 string bridges are through-loaded, 12 strings have through-loaded low strings, and rear-loaded octave/unison strings and are fully intonatable
  • Tuning Keys: Gotoh vintage-style, keystone knobs on the 6 strings, and alternating keystone/nickel knobs on the 12 strings, which really makes tuning a 12 easier!
  • Knobs/Switches: Switchcraft 3 way pickup and neck-select switches, CTS pots for volume (Standard models have a tone pot in place of 'neck-select' switch)
  • Cases: Hardshell case comes standard with every guitar
  • Finishes: Clear catalyzed nitrocellulose lacquer topcoat over these fun colors*:

Please specify color with the 'contact' button below our video.
*Subtle variations in wood grain, color and opacity can occur, making your handmade Flux guitar even more unique.

What your contribution means for Flux

What I've got is a great invention, and mad guitar-building skills. What I don't have so much, is money - that's where you come in.

I've set my Indiegogo goal at $30,000 - here's where it's going:
  • I've got legal "patent pending" status, but with your help, I'll be able to file for a permanent Patent, which is amazingly expensive.
  • Trademarks
  • Wood/guitar parts. I use the good stuff: American Black Cherry, Eastern Hardrock Maple, reclaimed old-growth Port Orford Cedar, Brandon Wound Pickups (fantastic, and Ohio-made!), and Gotoh tuners and bridges.

  • Flux Headquarters. While I'm presently borrowing production space, your contributions will help me transition into my own facility with better tools and equipment to further streamline production to meet the increased demand.

I've worked long and hard to get great results from my humble tools and materials. With your help, I can secure what I need to take Flux Guitars from a part-time venture, to an honest-to-God company - a new career for me and my wife, and someday perhaps, our son.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to buy or contribute, you can still help:

  • Share this campaign with every guitar enthusiast you know!

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! They're those little social media buttons at the bottom.

And so...

Be a part of guitar history! Buy a guitar from me if you can, or just make a contribution, and years from now when Flux Guitars is a big established company, you can brag to your friends, "I actually helped that guy get started" - and that would be the truth.

Thank you!

Scott Gorsuch - Founder, Flux Guitars

story:
The magnetic Lexes Connector makes connecting and disconnecting a power cord quick and easy, without the risk of breaking your power supply tip.

The Lexes Connector consists of two parts, male (the Lexes Connector) and female (the Lexes Adapter), which connect together via powerful magnets.

The Lexes Connector is connected to the device, while the Lexes Adapter is connected to the power supply.

The two parts are brought near each other they connect automatically - the magic of the magnet! Direct Current (DC) is transferred through concealed copper tips. To disconnect, the Lexes Connector remains in your device and the Lexes Adapter (and the power supply cable) can safely and simply be pulled away.

The Lexes Connector is for anyone who owns devices or appliances with coaxial power supply. Everyone will appreciate how quick and easy it is to connect and disconnect your power cord.

The Lexes Connector may be permanently left in your device in order to facilitate your daily life. You can just 'pull the plug' from your device without having to think about removing the cable of your power supply in a way that won’t damage the tip. A dream for the board room, office, and movie marathons in bed!

The Lexes Connector is available in the following sizes and fits most laptops and devices that use coaxial tip power supply.

The concept behind the design was to produce a small connector that will fit and look sharp in your device. The final design was reached after many trials and prototypes.

The magnet integration was the most challenging area of design. The desired result was achieved by the use of powerful neodymium magnets. Each connector has two (2) magnets of opposite polarity, with the Connector and the Adaptor having opposite arrangement of polarity. This ensures that they cannot be wrongly connected, protecting the device that you are connecting with the Lexes Connector.

The direct current (DC) is transferred by one (1) copper tip on the inside area and four (4) copper tips on the outside area. In this way the DC transfer capability is increased.

The Connector and Adapter fit inside each other. This makes an optimal link and ensures a solid connection, concealing the magnets and copper tips inside both parts.

*This is the M12 Connector 

While travelling several months ago, I broke my laptop’s power supply tip. As it was the second day of a 10-day trip, this was somewhat inconvenient.

As I thought of ways that I could fix my cable, instead of finding a temporary fix, I came up with an idea that would prevent this happening again by using a magnetic connector.

I produced a few rough sketches and drawings and then made what has since become the first prototype. It wasn’t perfect, but the concept worked surprisingly well.

I got in touch with my friend Nagisa Tamashiro, who is a Mechanical Engineer from Japan, and we designed a few prototypes before reaching the final design for the Lexes Connector. The actual version works superbly and I have been subjecting it to rough use for over a month with no problems to date.

  • Introduce the Lexes Connector to the maximum audience possible
  • Start manufacture of the Lexes Connector
  • Make the Lexes Connector commercially available worldwide

Follow us on Twitter

Like our Facebook Page

Emanuel H. (Creator) from Canada

Nagisa T. (Mechanical Engineer) from Japan

Feel free to contact us by email at info@lexesconnector.com by private message/comments on Indiegogo.

In a start-up company there are many risks and challenges but adequate preparation allows these to be mitigated and dealt with effectively.

The biggest challenge we face is manufacture of the Lexes Connectors on time for our first delivery date at the end of March 2017. We currently have three (3) manufacturers who have shown interest in producing the Lexes Connectors. In the upcoming weeks we will have them produce test samples in order to verify the quality of their work. Two (2) of the manufacturers are located in China and one (1) in Canada.

Also pertinent is certification time of our Lexes connectors. Once we receive all the test samples from the three manufacturers, we will send the samples for certification testing Canada, USA and England. This certification should take three to five weeks (3 to 5) depending on the country. Following this will we select a manufacturer and move forward with production.

If everything goes according to plan, the first batch of Lexes Connectors should be received by the end of February 2017. Our early bird delivery date is set for March 2017; this gives us a margin of approximately four (4) weeks. Delay and design changes could result from the certification process and the four week margin allows for this.

Finally, logistics and communication issues could arise, especially in case of a high number of backers. We have established agreements with a company experienced in Kickstarter campaigns; they will support our efforts throughout this adventure.

Our main goal is making our backers happy and sending their rewards on time; we will do our best to stay on track, reward our backers and fulfill their expectations. No matter what obstacles lie ahead we promise to be 100% transparent in our communication with you. We want the best - and we know you do too.

story:
Hello everyone!

The purpose of this presentation is to bring all your attention on a revolutionary application which will make possible carrying out the daily work on the internet in a complete safety without having to worry about the danger of being scammed.

Online scam

To be sure you completely understand online scamming and the importance of being protected every second from this online special danger, we start with an explanation of this phenomenon and the impact it has in today’s society.

Online scams and cyber crimes represent the use of internet or software services in order to defraud or benefit from it in any way, by example, personal information theft which may lead even to identity theft.

A very common form of internet fraud is the distribution of security software. Internet services can be used to present fraudulent requests to potential victims, to conduct transactions or to forward the income of institutions to other people related to this system. The researches suggest that online scamming can happen through social engineering and social influence. It can appear in chat rooms, social media, e-mail, message boards or websites.

The cost of cyber fraud

It is also important to know that during a year there are 556 million victims per day, 18 victims per second and more than this, 232,4 billionsidentities exposed to the danger of online fraud. More, the overall cost of cyber fraud recorded is about 100 billion dollars per year.

STOP SCAM application

In order to offer you protection before all these dangers, our team created STOP SCAM application. STOP SCAM is an application designed to reject any form of fraud which could reach through your internet services.

STOP SCAM application uses a driver that scans http’s traffic and using keywords, it blocks the possible fraudulent websites. Blocking this websites prevents phishing, making possible the end of most cyber attacks made in the attempt to steal bank accounts information, credit cards, debit cards, passwords of websites or social media.

Relying on the same system, the application blocks the attempts of scam/online scams, scanning the content of e-mail, blocking the most forms of fraud from the very beginning. The electronic attempts of scam/fraud are automatically blocked and reported to the competent authorities.

The application allows the user to continue on a possible fraudulent webpage only on own risk.

Each of us feels the need of protection against these fraud instances. It is ideal to benefit from this protection before being in a dangerous situation. “Later” is often “too late” and in those moments you necessarily need a “shield”.

Allow us to help you!

We thought about your needs and designed this protection shield that could offer you the security you need on the internet.

We call this “shield” - STOP SCAM application and it ensures the perfect protection you need while doing the daily basic activities on the internet.

The actual version of the application is compatible with Windows and will soon be compatible also with MACOSX, IOS and Android systems.

Thank you!

Wise Security Systems Team :)

STOP SCAM is an application designed to reject any form of fraud which could reach through your internet services.STOP SCAM application uses a driver that scans http’s traffic and using keywords, it blocks the possible fraudulent websites. Blocking this websites prevents phishing, making possible the end of most cyber attacks made in the attempt to steal bank accounts information, credit cards, debit cards, passwords of websites or social media.Relying on the same system, the application blocks the attempts of scam/online scams, scanning the content of e-mail, blocking the most forms of fraud from the very beginning. The electronic attempts of scam/fraud are automatically blocked and reported to the competent authorities.The application allows the user to continue on a possible fraudulent webpage only on own risk.Each of us feels the need of protection against these fraud instances. It is ideal to benefit from this protection before being in a dangerous situation. “Later” is often “too late” and in those moments you necessarily need a “shield”.Allow us to help you!We thought about your needs and designed this protection shield that could offer you the security you need on the internet.We call this “shield” - STOP SCAM application and it ensures the perfect protection you need while doing the daily basic activities on the internet.The actual version of the application is compatible with Windows and will soon be compatible also with MACOSX, IOS and Android systems.Thank you!Wise Security Systems Team :)

story:
The Circle can protect you in smart way anytime anywhere while you are on the go!

 

The super loud panic alarm to let you get out of troubles.

Assign three persons to get your emergency texts in every 8 seconds till you turn off the panic button

GPS location shows on the texts and open it to display on the map for the quick help

We know emergencies are always terrifying, that's why we build the 8 second emergency texts auto sending feature.  You have the total control to turn of the panic alarm when the threat is gone.

Circle tracks your locations in real-time and show on the map, so your friends will know where you are and can take the quick responses.  The texts support cross platform on iOS, Android and Windows devices, it gives you a full protection.

You are able to setup 3 people from your contacts or manually input a mobile phone number on the Circle app, the person will get the emergency message when you are in trouble. So those who get your emergency messages can come to help you out.

Circle is designed for daily use, you can hang it up on the bag for work or for jogging.  Or using as a keychain would be another good way to carrying with you all the time.

Circle is a 2-way tracker, too.  You will never worry about misplace your phone or key and etc. You will be surprised the tracking range is extremely long range, as 3x longer than any others.

Remote Selfie

Your safety is important to us, so the emergency alert must be very reliable and be prevented from mis-pressing the button to bother friends & family.  We took hundreds of time on testing the emergency button to make sure it's easy and comfortable to press down for you.  We tested the stability of Bluetooth signal, too.  All we want to do is to make sure Circle is the best for you and will save you when you need it.

We know you are care about your personal safe and your privacy, too.  So, the only moment to send out your location and information is after you press the panic button.  We will keep your information private and secure, all the informations will be used only for your emergency request to save your life.

story:
Multi-Charge All Your Devices At Once

With more and more devices in your home that needs to be powered up, we need to find a new way to charge them all at once. Therefore, we have created Globis where you easily can charge up to 6 devices. 

Each USB port can handle the unprecedented 2.8 A, with a maximum of 65 W.




 


 


Clever Cable Management

 


 

Aesthetics 

The fundamental spherical shape and the material choices are based on the ambition of creating a product that is relevant today and in many years to come. It is designed to be both a contrast piece as well as a discreet detail, thus becoming a product anyone wants to keep visible, which is critical for a charging station to maximize utility. 

 

Robust Materials

Solid gravity die-cast aluminum gives both an exclusive appearance and a tactile experience, while providing superior cooling for the power conversion. On the inside, everything is held together by a clever structure of high quality flame-resistant plastic that provides both strengthened safety and practical cable management. Globis stands firmly on a gentle non-scratching disc of silicone, preventing it to slide around.

GET GLOBIS

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

Energy

Globis can charge up to six USB-powered devices at the same time with high speed. Each port is intelligent both in regards to safety systems and in maximizing charging speed. Thanks to the solid aluminum body, heat from the voltage conversion system is optimally transferred away to enable 65 watts of power. When not in use, it automatically enters an energy conserving deep sleep state, ready to start charging again instantly when a device is connected.
 

Universal And Massive 65W Power 

Each USB port can handle the unprecedented 2.8 A, with a maximum of 65 W total. To achieve this, Globis has a two step power conversion structure: Firstly, the alternating current from the wall outlet is converted to a direct current of a lower voltage by an external powerful high quality adapter that is normally provided with computers. Secondly, a custom built highly optimized converter with exceptional efficiency provides the voltage required for USB charging at completely stable level all the way up to full current throughput.


Globis Technical Specification

Sleep Safe And Sound 

A recent key concern regarding charging is safety. All the measures possible have been taken to provide a holistic safety concept. With the external adapter, the high voltage is kept outside the charger and out of reach. The adapter, the internal converter and each individual USB port has the following independent auto-shutdown safety mechanisms: over voltage detection, short circuit detection and over temperature detection.

Quality 

Globis features only the finest materials combined with the best components. The result is a product that can without risk be given an extended product warranty. This makes Globis a sustainable product not only in terms of energy efficiency but also in terms of not adding to the waste of the fast moving consumer products industry. Estimated component lifetime for Globis exceeds normal and comparable consumer electronics by far.

Custom Accessory: Universal Stand

 

The universal Stand is born from the idea that the devices we use everyday are a vital part of our lives and should also have their own place in the home to recharge and rest. It provides a natural collection point and reinforces the habit to orderly line up devices, freeing up valuable living surface. The design is formed by simple square elements to visually blend into any interior style and provide a compact and handy format for moving it around.
 

Universal Function And Solid Build

Equipped with slots in three different sizes, it can handle all smartphones and tablets, with or without cases*. The solid aluminum core is both sturdy and heavy, preventing it to tip over or bend. The Stand has an outer skin of soft silicone, holding the devices without scratching, and can be cleaned of under running water. The height of the square support grid is optimized to allow holding tablets and phones at an ideal angle while minimizing screen blockage during video viewing or reading.

 

Custom Accessory: Shorter Cables

Regular cables are only good for one thing – charging your device when the charger is close to the floor or far away. However, in most other scenarios shorter cables are superior: excess loops don't appear, which collects less dust and has less risk of being damaged. They are also surprisingly handy when travelling, and can also lead to increased charging speed due to lower total resistance. One black 45 cm Micro-USB cable is always included with each Globis as standard. The Lightning cable is of course certified by Apple. The USB Type-C and Micro-USB cables have extra thick conductors (28/24 AWG) for less total resistance and higher charging speed.

AC/DC system

The AC/DC adapter is produced by one of the major manufacturers of power supplies in the world, and is normally supplied with laptops. That means it is designed for far heavier duties than charging of handheld devices, which means higher safety and longer operational life. AC-cables for all different regions has been prepared and will be provided based on the location of the backer.
 

Production Status And Plan 

The product is since about a month approved for mass production, and the limited first batch will be finished not long after the campaign ends. This means that backers that claim the first limited rewards will be guaranteed delivery well before Christmas. As soon as the campaign ends, production will start immediately to enable the fulfillment of remaining rewards as soon as possible. If the funding goal is reached, this will enable manufacturing orders to be placed with such a quantity that the production becomes sustainable.

About Universal Creation AB 

Universal Creation AB is a 4+ year old Swedish product engineering company based in Stockholm. We strongly believe in only providing maximum long term utility to the end consumers. The strategy employed to provide extreme value is based on: 

  • Work directly and relationship based with specialized top-class manufacturers to eliminate the cost of middle-men and formalities.
  • Limit color and model choice to minimize unnecessary SKU costs. 
  • Focus on quality and longevity to eliminate return costs. 
  • Only design products based on universal standards to increase product lifecycle length.

Meet the Team

A Note To Scandinavian Backers

A limited quantity from the first production run of Globis will be available in selected Elkjøp retail stores before Christmas. Elkjøp and their support to us has helped Globis come this far and for that we are very thankful.

A Very Special Thank You To

  • Elkøp
  • Tura Scandinavia
  • Yomura Technologies
  • Almi Företagspartner
  • Carl & Carl
  • WSI

Thank You For Filming Locations

  • Asplund Interior Store, Stockholm
  • Nyman Rudenstam Advokatbyrå

story:
A car made of passion and dreams, created to bring the world of racing closer. An inexpensive race car authorised to be used in road traffic.


Hello everyone,

Let me present you the story of a kit-car assembled entirely according to my own design.

The first idea of assembling my own car came into my mind on 9th December 2005. From the beginning it was supposed to be a kit-car with a closed body and weight not exceeding 550 kg (due to Polish regulations in force at the time allowing such cars to be driven from the age of 16) based on Fiat Seicento car parts.

Low mass, series-produced mechanical components and architecture typical for a race car were to result in an extremely effective, but at the same time rather inexpensive sports car. It would be the first modern sports car competing with the world class sport cars without any inferiority complex. Nobody expected that in a few years a prototype equipped with an engine with the lowest power possible (55 km) would beat Subaru Impreza GT on the race track…

“Adding power makes you faster on the straights. Subtracting weight makes you faster everywhere.”

                                                       – Colin Chapman, F1 driver, founder of Lotus Cars

In the prototype I used a 1100 ccm engine, but ultimately I plan to use a 1400 ccm T-Jet engine with an increased power of 200–230 hp ;-).

The concept is based on a few basic premises:

  1. Architecture typical for race cars (space frame),
  2. Inexpensive and easily accessible mechanical components from popular models of Fiat / Alfa Romeo,
  3. Equipment allowing the car to be authorised to be used in road traffic.

Currently, Kozmo’s competitors in the sports car market are:

Alfa Romeo 4C      

Lotus Elise

KOZMO

Engine

1.75T

1.6–1.8

1.4T

Power

240 PS

136–221 PS              

135–230 PS

0-100 km/h [s]

4.5

5.8–4.3

6–4

Length [mm]

3989

3785

3500

Width [mm]

1864

1719

1750

Height [mm]

1183

1143

1250

Wheelbase [mm]

2380

2300

2340

Curb weight [kg]      

895

860–910

650

Compared to its competitors, Kozmo is much more uncompromising and more prepared for the real sport competition, while still adjusted to everyday use on the road. It will be fitted with a roll cage that is a standard component of the car’s structure, so the chassis doesn’t have to be modified in order to allow safe track racing. A smaller engine and a simplified structure result in a reduced length and mass of the car, which has a positive effect on its performance and steering.

Ultimately, it will be possible to order Kozmo as a finished product constructed in line with a previously determined specification or as a kit-car to be assembled by the customer. Within the framework of series production several dozens of cars are planned to be manufactured in the first year. A more long-term forecast is harder to provide due to the unique nature of the project.


STAGE 1.

Everything started with sketches on an A4 sheet of paper.

I have always dreamed of a small, two-man sports car with a rear engine – inexpensive, with a simple structure and as effective as possible in high-speed driving, while at the same time always ready to be used at a race track or a special stage of a rally.


STAGE 2.

Designing a digital version of the framework and the body.


STAGE 3. 

Constructing the space frame.


Finally, the long-awaited day came when the engine was started for the first time.




STAGE 4.

Then the car was tested on the Rakietowa race track.

On 28th December 2008, the first drive with a prototype chassis took place.



In April, we took several test drives on a race track in Wroclaw. The main test driver was my youngest brother, who is a rally driver and who was able to adjust the suspension and test the prototype to its fullest potential.





STAGE 5.

Body model.

After successful tests of the framework, I started working on the body model.

The model has to mirror the shape of a real car body. It will be the basis for future moulds (negatives) to be used for production of the actual body components. Such models are often created from clay or Styrofoam with a plaster finish. I chose Styrofoam, because in our case the model was to be mounted on the actual prototype framework. Due to the fact that at the time when we begun works 3D CNC machines were very expensive, the project planned to use digitally cut 5 cm thick Styrofoam boards of increased density glued together.

After precisely matching and gluing together the cut and meticulously numbered puzzle pieces, the edges and uneven spots were to be smoothed out, plastered and polished. At each stage, the symmetry of both sides of the body has to be carefully watched. Keeping it requires measuring the body, marking it in the measuring grid and carefully comparing every point using a profile gauge.

After achieving the body shape in line with the design, the model has to be cut into body components (i.e. doors and flaps have to be separated etc.) and carefully finished, including technical profiles. When each part has the final shape it should be primed by spray so that the surface is prepared for creating a mould.


Windows frames use elements from Fiat Seicento and Alfa Romeo GTV.


In mid-2008 the project was transferred from Wrocław to Warsaw.


The basic tool used for symmetrical modelling the body – a profile gauge.


Before/after polishing.


Having modelled the body in line with the design, I cut it into separate parts.


Doors only required a great deal of work:


This is how the car looked at the final stage of polishing, before being primed.


Here you can see KOZMO wrapped in foil:


STAGE 6.

Priming.

Currently, the body model is primed and prepared for creating the mould that will be used for series production of the final body components.


In the meantime, first glass fibre body parts were created. These include interior elements of doors manufactured by carbonbike.pl company that specialises in production of the world’s lightest handbikes and various types of car body parts made of carbon fibre. Below you can see the photos of the moulds and the first prototype body component:


Currently, I have reached this stage. The prototype looks like this:


And that is how Kozmo is going to look after completion. These renders take into account all the stylistic changes I introduced in the course of works on the actual body model.


In order to finish the prototype I need your support!

Many thanks to those of you who managed to read up to this point ;-)

Kind regards,

Tomasz Ferdek

story:
(deutscher Text siehe unten)


Our floor stand mangroovv is as mobile as your tablet... and ready for use instantly.

With your tablet attached to mangroovv you gain a complete computer work station. You now have the option to work comfortably, efficiently and in an ergonomic position at any location. You simply use your tablet where you choose to ... without even thinking of a table or board to put it on.

mangroovv makes an ultra-mobile office or an ultra-mobile leisure park.


The first floor stand that is fun to carry around.

Every single feature helps you to enjoy using mangroovv intuitively:


1. One grip and mangroovv is ready for transport.

When you grasp mangroovv with one of your hands, its feet fold automatically and it gets very slim. Now you can cross any room or doorway.

If you can pass an obstacle or a narrow doorway by yourself, you can pass it with mangroovv. It will be at your hand, without leaving scratches on your furniture or any precious accessories, without bumping into door frames or getting stuck in lifts. And you do not have to worry about your legs – no bumping, no trouble, no damages.


2. One move and mangroovv is ready for use.

You put mangroovv down and off you go. Just one move of your hand and the feet unfold exactly where you choose to be. Mangroovv stands securely, be it on carpet, parquet, tiles, gravel, grass ... even in a puddle if necessary.

Good to know: its legs fold and unfold at any height!


3. You lift it and it feels light.

Mangroovv is ultra-light, weighing only 800 grams (1,8 pound).


These features offer the option to have mangroovv at hand and even change rooms easily. Now, the following features were created to use your tablet in a healthy and comfortable position at any location:

4. One move and the working height is right.

Only one move of your hand is necessary to adjust mangroovv to the height that is needed for you to work either in a sitting or standing position – the working height ranging from about 75 to 110 cm (30 to 43 inches).


5. One move and your working position is perfect

With another simple move of your hand you adjust your tablet to the desired  working position. No annoying locking and unlocking of the ball joint as you know it from a camera tripod. Due to our cageless ball-joint you rotate, tilt or turn your tablet around, at any chosen angle, and your tablet stays exactly in that position when you take off your hand.


The following feature makes us proud: do you want to use your tablet on its own again?

6. You grab your tablet and it is solo again

Only one move and you unfasten your tablet ... to use it on its own again – just as you are used to. To fasten it again works just as fast.


One hand only

Nearly all of mangroovv’s functions can be accomplished by only one hand:

To fold and unfold the feet, lower the working height, adjust the angle, fasten or unfasten the tablet ... You will appreciate the numerous advantages very soon, especially when you need to hold something in your other hand.


Advantages: more comfortable, more efficient and more healthy

Now you can have even more fun with your tablet, while working, gaming or doing whatever you love to do with it:

Use it at any location with both hands, or have both hands free!

-  Both hands are free for activities while you get all your information on your tablet (cooking, crafting, playing an instrument ...)

-  Change whatever you are doing spontaneously without having to think for one moment where to put your tablet down (get fresh coffee, wash your hands ...)

-  Minimize the stress on your hands, sinews and muscles as you do not have to hold your tablet in an unnatural position all the time.

-  You can be sure to have your tablet in safety, even in ‚unfavourable’ surroundings like garages, kitchens, building sites.


Design

Our intention was to give mangroovv rather a plain design with all its precious features hidden inside.

Concerning the attachment of your tablet, we created a pure look with nearly invisible clips. These tailored clips will be delivered for all full-size iPads from iPad 2 up to current iPad versions at the time of delivery. So, if there will be a bigger version (iPad pro?) you can be sure to use mangroovv with it.

We will also deliver a pair of universal clips fitting any common 10-13 inch tablet.

All types of clips will be easily interchangeable.


mangroovv comes in two versions

As you see in our video, mangroovv is available in silver. You can opt for black as well (e.g. for musicians on stage).


And who are we?

We always have been committed to developing new product categories, like our magnet sail as the first transparent magnetic pin board. Or our desk sail: it radically renewed those ever so conservative looking table banners.

Our references include numerous internationally wellknown companies, by way of example Audi, VW, Siemens, Bayer, Ergo, Airbus ...

We have received several internationally respected design awards:

-  red dot: best of the best 2002

-  iF product design award 2008

-  iF product design award 2011

-  several nominations for Germany’s Design Award

We? That’s Armin Mueller and Kai Trebesius, managing directors and owners of blue object, Hamburg.



Historical facts

The idea of mangroovv was born even before tablets started their trail of success 2010. In 2007, the ‚pre-tablet’ era, we created a floor stand to hold and present printed information. One year later we had the vision of a lightweight screen with an integrated computer allowing for numerous applications instead of a plain board presenting paper. The only thing was that there was no such computer at that time.

When finally the first iPad entered the market we realized that this was exactly the computer that we had dreamt of. What we did not like was the idea to combine a flexible and mobile tool like an iPad with rather a cumbersome floor stand.

Then the basic concept for an ultra mobile floor stand emerged at the beginning of 2012. We saw a vision of a stand that folds automatically when you snatch it, and that can be put down easily again wherever you choose. A stand that holds a tablet safely, but also offers the option to use it again on its own without much fuss.

It took us more than one year to develop all the mechanics that led to mangroovv as you can see here now: showing features that surely make it the world’s most ergonomic floor stand.

By the way, mangroovv marks a completely new era in our company as well: It  stands for the first product since we realigned our ideas concerning the future of our company. In 2012 we decided to create only those products that we would love to have and use ourselves. This being the only way to infuse our products time and time again with passion, joy and the strong commitment for continual improvement.


Timetable

As mangroovv is not our first product to be launched we are adept at planning ahead, however we are aware that unexpected things may and will happen.

Our estimated timetable:

-  May 2015: ready to go into production. Basically mangroovv is nearly ready for mass production, but still some features need to be cleared with producers, some of these aspects depending on the number of first orders. We will know the numbers more exactly after the crowdfunding will be finished. The more orders, the more potential ...

-  until November 2015: production (including quality and load tests, manufacturing of tools ...)

-  December 2015: estimated delivery


Patents pending

With so many innovations we have, of course, filed international patents for our technical solutions.




mangroovv – dein Schreibtisch für immer und überall



Der ergonomische Tablet-Ständer. Wechsel spontan den Einsatzort und nutze dein Tablet überall in perfekter Arbeitsposition.

Der Bodenständer mangroovv ist so mobil wie dein Tablet ... und sofort einsatzbereit.

Zusammen mit mangroovv wird dein Tablet zu einem vollwertigen Computerplatz. Ab jetzt kannst du an beliebigen und ständig wechselnden Orten bequem, effizient und gesund arbeiten. Du nutzt dein Tablet einfach da, wo du sein willst ... nicht da, wo zufällig ein Tisch oder eine Ablage steht.

Mit mangroovv hast du ein ultramobiles Büro, einen ultramobilen Spielraum, ein ultramobiles Freizeitcenter.


Der erste Bodenständer, den du gerne mitnimmst

Jedes Feature von mangroovv ist dazu da, dass du ihn immer nutzt – ohne nachzudenken:


1. Ein Griff und mangroovv macht sich transportbereit

mangroovv macht sich automatisch schlank, wenn du ihn mitnimmst. Du schnappst mangroovv am Griff und gehst los. Die Füße klappen automatisch ein. Jetzt kommst du überall durch.

Wo du durchkommst, kommst du auch mit mangroovv durch. Weder zerkratzt du unterwegs Möbel oder andere Kostbarkeiten noch bleibst du an Türrahmen oder in Aufzügen hängen. Und du brauchst dir keine Sorgen um deine Beine machen (nichts schlägt dagegen, kein Ärger, keine beschädigten Strümpfe ...).


2. Ein Griff und mangroovv ist einsatzbereit

mangroovv kannst du auf beliebigen Böden abstellen. Mit einem Griff klappst du die Füße in der Luft aus, da wo du jetzt arbeiten möchtest. mangroovv steht sicher auf Teppich, Parkett, Stein, Kies, Gras ... wenn es sein muss, sogar in einer Pfütze.

Gut zu wissen: Das automatische Ein- und Ausklappen funktioniert in jeder Höhe.


3. Ein Griff und alles wird leicht

mangroovv ist ganz leicht. Er wiegt rund 800 Gramm.


Die Features 1 bis 3 machen es dir leicht, mangroovv mit dir zu führen. Von der Küche ins Wohnzimmer, vom Wohnzimmer auf den Balkon, vom Balkon in die Garage, von der Garage in die Küche. Und die beiden folgenden Features machen es dir leicht, mangroovv vor Ort in bequemer Position zu nutzen:

4. Ein Griff und du hast deine Höhe

mangroovv bringst du mit einem Griff in die Höhe, die du gerade brauchst. So kannst du im Stehen arbeiten und im Sitzen. Die Arbeitshöhe reicht von ca. 75 cm bis 110 cm.


5. Ein Griff und du hast deine Arbeitsposition

Mit einem Griff stellst du dein Tablet in die Arbeitsposition, die du jetzt gerade brauchst. Lästiges Ent- und Verriegeln von Kugelgelenken, wie du das von Kamerastativen kennst, entfällt. Dank unseres käfiglosen Kugelgelenks kannst du dein Tablet mit unbegrenzter Winkelfreiheit drehen, kippen, wenden ... und dein Tablet bleibt immer in der Position, in der du es loslässt.


Und auf das letzte Feature sind wir auch stolz. Wenn du dein Tablet einmal wie bisher solo nutzen möchtest:

6. Ein Griff und dein Tablet ist wieder solo

Du kannst Dein Tablet mit einem Griff von mangroovv abnehmen ... und wie gewohnt solo nutzen. Genauso schnell bringst du es übrigens auch wieder an.


Das Ein-Hand-Prinzip

So gut wie alle Funktionen von mangroovv kannst du einhändig bedienen:

Das Einklappen des Fußes, das Ausklappen des Fußes, die Arbeitshöhe tiefer stellen, den Arbeitswinkel, das Tablet anbringen oder das Tablet abnehmen ... Den Vorteil wirst du ganz schnell zu schätzen wissen, spätestens dann, wenn du in der anderen Hand etwas halten musst.


Vorteile: bequemer, effizienter, gesünder

... so macht Arbeit, Freizeit, Spiel am Tablet Spaß:

– Du kannst dein Tablet an jedem beliebigen Ort mit beiden Händen bedienen.

– Du hast jederzeit beide Hände für andere Tätigkeiten frei, während dir dein Tablet die Infos gibt, die du dafür brauchst. (Kochen, Tischlern, Musizieren ...)

– Du kannst spontan etwas anderes machen, ohne nachzudenken, wo du dein Tablet ablegen kannst (Kaffee holen, Hände waschen gehen, ...)

– Du schonst deine Hände, weil du dein Tablet nicht ständig in unnatürlicher Position halten musst. Statt deine Sehnen und Muskeln dauernd zu strapazieren, erhältst Du deine Gesundheit.

– Du weißt dein Tablet immer in Sicherheit, auch in „tabletfeindlichen“ Umgebungen wie Werkstätten, Küchen, Baustellen ...


Design

Wir haben mangroovv bewusst schlicht gestaltet. All die besonderen Eigenschaften finden in seinem Inneren statt.

Dass du dein Tablet so pur vor dir hast, erreichen wir durch fast unsichtbare Greifer. Diese maßgeschneiderten Greifer liefern wir mit für alle full-size iPads ab 2 bis zu neuen Modellen, die zum Lieferzeitpunkt existieren werden. Falls also ein größeres iPad (iPad pro?) auf den Markt kommt, wird es auf mangroovv passen.

Für andere Tablets in der Größe von ca. 10 - 13 Zoll liefern wir Universal-Greifer mit.

Alle Greifer sind einfach austauschbar.


mangroovv liefern wir in zwei Farben

Im Film und auf den Bildern siehst du mangroovv in silber. Du kannst mangroovv aber auch komplett in schwarz bekommen, z.B. wenn du mangroovv und dein Tablet als Musiker auf der Bühne nutzt.


Und wer sind wir?

Wir hatten schon immer eine Vorliebe, neue Produktgattungen zu entwickeln. Zum Beispiel mit unserem Magnetsegel STAND BY mag. die erste transparente Magnetwand der Welt, und mit dem Tischsegel STAND BY desktop haben wir die jahrzehnte immergleichen Tischfahnen und Tischwimpel radikal erneuert.

Unsere Produkte schätzen viele Firmen mit Weltruf wie Audi, VW, Siemens, Bayer, Ergo, Airbus ...

Für unsere Produkte haben wir zahlreiche international renommierte Designpreise bekommen:

– red dot: best of the best 2002

– iF product design award 2006

– iF product design award 2008

– mehrfache Nominierungen für den Designpreis der Bundesrepublik Deutschland

Wir? Das sind Armin Müller und Kai Trebesius, Geschäftsführer und Inhaber von blue object, Hamburg.



Die Geschichte von mangroovv ...

... beginnt schon vor dem Siegeszug von Tablets. Denn – so verrückt es klingt – wir haben den Tablet-Bodenständer schon vor dem ersten iPad erfunden. Unseren Infoständer EVA haben wir entwickelt für gedruckte Informationen und 2007 auf den Markt gebracht. Ein Jahr später hatten wir die Idee, dass statt der Platte für gedruckte Informationen ein leichter Bildschirm mit integriertem Computer vielfältige Anwendungen erlauben würde. Nur: Einen solchen Computer gab es damals nicht.

Als dann das erste iPad kam (2010), war uns sofort klar, das dies genau der gesuchte Computer ist. Allerdings hat es uns nicht behagt, ein so flexibles und mobiles Gerät wie ein iPad in einen eher „trägen“ Ständer zu stecken.

Die Grundidee für mangroovv als ultramobilen Bodenständer kam uns dann Anfang 2012. In einer Vision sahen wir einen Ständer vor uns, der automatisch einklappt, wenn man ihn mitnimmt und den man einfach an einem anderen Ort ohne Umstände abstelle. An dem das Tablet so einfach befestigt ist, dass man es, wenn nötig, auch weiter solo nutzen kann.

Wir haben dann in langer harter Arbeit die Mechanismen entwickelt, die mangroovv zu dem machen, was du hier siehst. Mit Features, die – so meinen wir – mangroovv zum ergonomischsten Bodenständer weltweit machen.

Übrigens: mangroovv ist noch in einer anderen Hinsicht ein ganz besonderes Produkt für uns. Er ist das erste Produkt einer Neuausrichtung unserer Firma. Wir haben uns nämlich Anfang 2012 entschieden, nur noch Produkte zu entwickeln, die wir selbst haben und nutzen wollen. Genau dann kommt in das Produkt wieder und wieder Leidenschaft, Freude und der unbedingte Wille, es immer besser zu machen.


Zeitplan

mangroovv ist nicht das erste Produkt, das wir auf den Markt bringen. Insofern wissen wir aus Erfahrung, dass man zwar eine Menge planen kann, es aber immer Unbekannte gibt, die für Überraschungen sorgen werden.

Wir rechnen mit folgendem Zeitplan:

– Mai 2015: Erreichen der Serienreife.  mangroovv ist zwar kurz vor der Serienreife, es sind aber noch einige Fragen mit Herstellern abzugleichen. Manche davon hängen auch mit der Auflage der ersten Serie zusammen. Und die wissen wir ganz sicher erst nach Ablauf unserer Indiegogo-Aktion. Je größer die Auflage, desto vielfältiger die Möglichkeiten.

– bis November 2015: Fertigung (darin enthalten Qualitäts- und Belastungstests, Herstellung von Werkzeugen ...)

– Dezember 2015: Auslieferung von mangroovv an unsere Unterstützer


Zum Patent angemeldet

Bei so vielen Innovationen haben wir unsere technischen Lösungen selbstverständlich international zum Patent angemeldet.

Inneren statt.
Dass du dein Tablet so
pur vor dir hast, erreichen wir durch fast unsichtbare Greifer. Diese
maßgeschneiderten Greifer liefern wir mit für alle full-size iPads ab 2 bis zu neuen
Modellen, die zum Lieferzeitpunkt existieren werden. Falls also ein größeres
iPad (iPad pro?) auf den Markt kommt, wird es auf mangroovv passen. 
Für andere Tablets in der
Größe von ca. 10 - 13 Zoll liefern wir Universal-Greifer mit.
Alle Greifer sind einfach
austauschbar.


mangroovv liefern wir in
zwei Farben
Im Film und auf den
Bildern siehst du mangroovv in silber. Du kannst mangroovv aber auch komplett
in schwarz bekommen, z.B. wenn du mangroovv und dein Tablet als Musiker auf der
Bühne nutzt.


Und wer sind wir?
Wir hatten schon immer
eine Vorliebe, neue Produktgattungen zu entwickeln. Zum Beispiel mit unserem
Magnetsegel STAND BY mag. die erste transparente Magnetwand der Welt, und mit
dem Tischsegel STAND BY desktop haben wir die jahrzehnte immergleichen
Tischfahnen und Tischwimpel radikal erneuert.
Unsere Produkte schätzen
viele Firmen mit Weltruf wie Audi, VW, Siemens, Bayer, Ergo, Airbus ...
Für unsere Produkte haben
wir zahlreiche international renommierte Designpreise bekommen:


– red
dot: best of the best 2002
– iF product design award
2006
– iF product design award
2008
– mehrfache Nominierungen
für den Designpreis der Bundesrepublik Deutschland



Wir? Das sind Armin
Müller und Kai Trebesius, Geschäftsführer und Inhaber von blue object, Hamburg.




Die Geschichte von
mangroovv ...
... beginnt schon vor dem
Siegeszug von Tablets. Denn – so verrückt es klingt – wir haben den
Tablet-Bodenständer schon vor dem ersten iPad erfunden. Unseren Infoständer EVA
haben wir entwickelt für gedruckte Informationen und 2007 auf den Markt
gebracht. Ein Jahr später hatten wir die Idee, dass statt der Platte für
gedruckte Informationen ein leichter Bildschirm mit integriertem Computer vielfältige
Anwendungen erlauben würde. Nur: Einen solchen Computer gab es damals nicht.
Als dann das erste iPad
kam (2010), war uns sofort klar, das dies genau der gesuchte Computer ist.
Allerdings hat es uns nicht behagt, ein so flexibles und mobiles Gerät wie ein
iPad in einen eher „trägen“ Ständer zu stecken.
Die Grundidee für
mangroovv als ultramobilen Bodenständer kam uns dann Anfang 2012. In einer
Vision sahen wir einen Ständer vor uns, der automatisch einklappt, wenn man ihn
mitnimmt und den man einfach an einem anderen Ort ohne Umstände abstelle. An
dem das Tablet so einfach befestigt ist, dass man es, wenn nötig, auch weiter
solo nutzen kann.
Wir haben dann in langer
harter Arbeit die Mechanismen entwickelt, die mangroovv zu dem machen, was du
hier siehst. Mit Features, die – so meinen wir – mangroovv zum ergonomischsten
Bodenständer weltweit machen.
Übrigens: mangroovv ist
noch in einer anderen Hinsicht ein ganz besonderes Produkt für uns. Er ist das
erste Produkt einer Neuausrichtung unserer Firma. Wir haben uns nämlich Anfang
2012 entschieden, nur noch Produkte zu entwickeln, die wir selbst haben und
nutzen wollen. Genau dann kommt in das Produkt wieder und wieder Leidenschaft,
Freude und der unbedingte Wille, es immer besser zu machen.



Zeitplan
mangroovv ist nicht das
erste Produkt, das wir auf den Markt bringen. Insofern wissen wir aus
Erfahrung, dass man zwar eine Menge planen kann, es aber immer Unbekannte gibt,
die für Überraschungen sorgen werden.
Wir rechnen mit folgendem
Zeitplan:
– Mai 2015: Erreichen der
Serienreife.  mangroovv ist zwar kurz vor der Serienreife, es sind aber noch
einige Fragen mit Herstellern abzugleichen. Manche davon hängen auch mit der
Auflage der ersten Serie zusammen. Und die wissen wir ganz sicher erst nach
Ablauf unserer Indiegogo-Aktion. Je größer die Auflage, desto vielfältiger die
Möglichkeiten.
– bis
November 2015: Fertigung (darin enthalten Qualitäts- und Belastungstests,
Herstellung von Werkzeugen ...)
– Dezember
2015: Auslieferung von mangroovv an unsere Unterstützer

Zum Patent angemeldet
Bei so vielen
Innovationen haben wir unsere technischen Lösungen selbstverständlich
international zum Patent angemeldet.

story:
Is your battery dying? Try Leonardo and your fingerprint will be your key!

Over the last few years there has been a remarkable evolution of mobile phones, especially smartphones, with their increasing use and functionality and we have become increasingly dependent upon them.

Unfortunately, this rapid improvement in technology and performance has not been accompanied by an equal development of battery life. 

Often  we are forced to go in search of a rescuer....ie...bartender or shopkeeper who will graciously allow us to charge our phone and also then hope there is a suitable cord to do so. 

To overcome this problem we created Phone Italy srl, an italian startup whose members include Marco Raggi, Davide Clocchiatti, Diego Mestroni, Fabio Pirioni and Matteo Crispo.  We are all under the age of 35.  


Our Team:

From Left: Matteo Crispo, Davide Clocchiatti, Marco Raggi, Fabio Pirioni, Diego Mestroni


How great would it be having in our cities some places in which I could find this kind of service?

How relaxing would it be drinking a coffee, having lunch, going shopping or having a walk while my phone is comfortably charging in a safe and inaccessible place?

How comfortable would it be not having my wall charger always with me?

All around the world we can already find some kiosks trying to solve this problem, but they all have criticalities, let's check some..

• Aesthetic limitation; considerable bulk


Would you ever position them in your store?



• Antiquated and not practical technology



                                              That's why we decided to create


         a multimedia kiosk, beautifully designed, quick, user friendly and practical



Our goal is to make Leonardo available internationally and everywhere!


What is it?

Leonardo is a new device that allows you to recharge your smartphone in a secure manner. It was designed to be placed in public locations for the convenience of smartphone users such as restaurants, airports, clubs, shops, stores, libraries, etc....

Features

Constructed in Plexiglas. Each unit is totally customizable.

Basic unit contains four drawers (can be increased), each drawer holds one smartphone. Each drawer is fully equipped with a variety
of charger cables which will accommodate most smartphone models

All units can be equipped with 23” touchscreen last generation
LCD monitor which allows playback of movies, photos, real time news, etc.

Each unit has built in WiFi router that offers a free hot spot.




How it works

Leonardo simplifies everything into one touch. Nothing has to occupy your pockets or your mind, you lose keys and you can forget codes. There is only one thing you can never forget...

                                                    YOUR FINGERPRINT




The fingerprint reader then analyzes and memorizes the user’s fingerprint in less than a second, and then will automatically connect the user’s print to the first available charge box. The charge box will open automatically.

Place phone inside and connect to appropriate cord (many available inside)..close the drawer.

To reopen drawer place your finger on fingerprint reader and drawer will open.

that’s it!

Once drawer is open all fingerprint data is redacted.

Many models can be produced, in order to satisfy all customers needs, and all of them are totally customizable.


 - Two drawers model without monitor



- Four drawers model without monitor




- 8 drawers model with LCD monitor


Our story so far:


We created our company in November 2013;
Phone Italia srl is an italian limited liability company.

During 2014 we invested in our project, from software developing til ergonomic studies.

This was our first prototype in May 2014:


Step by step we started producing our Leonardos..



In January 2015 we went to CES Las Vegas:


From February 2015 we are on the market and our Leonardos are already sold and positioned in many places in Italy, Sweden, Canada and UK.


We produce everything (from software till the case; and we assembly everything by ourselves) in our factory located in Udine, 100 miles from Venice.


                               Our product is 100% MADE IN ITALY


What we need is your help, to make Leonardo available everywhere, in every city.

We have huge request for our product, and we need a lot of money to start an industrial production of our product


We need your help to make our dream come true!


                                Thank you for everything from Leonardo Team!

story:
Find out what you get if you share our campaign ↓↓↓

KaVii Adhesive (Ver.2)

Earlier this year we brought you the best adhesive gel pads in the market, and people are loving it!  We shipped more than 10,000 PCs of KaVii from January 2015 to September 2015.  Now we want to move to another crowdfunding platform to share our Version 2 of KaVii Adhesive. It's bigger, better and stickier!


KaVii Adhesive is a durable adhesive gel pad that affixes mobile technology to nearly any flat surface. It functions very much like double-sided tape, but KaVii has a thicker core, and unique texture.

It's an alternative way for you to stick your electronic gadgets, trinkets, office supplies, and more at an affordable price.

KaVii is rewashable and reusable!

Take off, Wash, Air dry, Reuse!

If KaVii loses it stickiness because of dust and dirt, you can easily wash it with water and let it air dry. KaVii will regain its stickiness significantly in no time. 

For our Ver.2, we made KaVii bigger and better for adhering larger objects to a variety of flat surfaces.  Now you can stick remote controls, small picture frames, medium size external batteries, and of course big smartphones and tablets to nearly any flat surface.

Comparison with Smartphone

When using KaVii, we always recommend to TWIST OFF rigid objects when removing.  Please do not pull with force from the surface. 

Instead of nails that leave permanent holes in your walls, or tape that can potentially damage posters and are also difficult to remove from your walls, KaVii can be a great replacement for sticking up your favorite photos and posters. 

Poster Size 55" x 35"

If you're nervous about using those foamy double-sided tapes that usually come packaged with car ornaments (such as air fresheners, or bobble head trinkets), you can use KaVii to securely attach any car accessories to your dash board without worrying about leaving a mark on any surface.  You can re-size your KaVii pad for smaller items by cutting it into smaller pieces. 


KaVii can hold in an environment between 0°F to 150°F and will not melt inside your heated car!


What is KaVii made of?

KaVii is made from AB Glue. AB glue is the nickname of two mixed hardening liquid glues. One is a base labeled as "B," and the other is additive or hardener labeled "A."  Mixing A with B will result in hardening, which does not have to rely on temperature to cure, so it is a kind of room temperature curing adhesive. 

AB glue is usually referred to as acrylic modified epoxy adhesive or epoxy adhesive. Component A is acrylic modified epoxy, component B is modified amine or other hardening agents. They will be mixed according to a certain proportion. Catalysts can control the curing time; other additives control properties (such as viscosity, rigidity, flexibility, adhesiveness, etc). 


The composition to make KaVii is so complicated since we can not freeze or heat the basic material.  Therefore, we need to make sure a balance of the flexibility and adhesivity is perfect for each pad. 

Also, the material is recyclable :)

KaVii Adhesive material passed the SGS Protection test.


KaVii can be used for so many things:
  • Sticking your tablet on the wall while you watch your favorite shows

  • Sticking your smartphone to any flat surface to take group pictures so nobody feels left out :)


  • Have video conference calls with friends and loved one, Hands free!


  • Make your own Time lapse video with your smartphone.



  • Make extra room on your working table by sticking all your important accessories on the wall, like USB cards, charging cables, external batteries and more.


  • Best dashboard car mount in the world, will not melt under high sun heat. Easy to apply and easy to remove.
  • A new tool to put up posters on the wall without needing to worry about making any holes.
  • More, more and more! Share ideas on how you use your KaVii with us on Instagram by following us @KaVii_adhesive

Through personal testing with the Ver.2, we made sure the size and thickness of each KaVii pad is perfect for securing bigger objects.  Most sticky pads out there are so thin with just 0.03", we made KaVii thicker with 0.12" thickness. 

Original KaVii Size 1.89" x 1.89" x 0.08" - KaVii Ver.2 Size is 2.96" x 2.56" x 0.12"

KaVii Ver.2 can hold up an object up to 10 oz. **Please note that KaVii is still not intended for heavy duty jobs.   

The length of time KaVii can hold up an item vertically on any given surface depends on the weight, cleanliness and material of the object + surface.  Naturally, the lighter the object, the longer it can stay attached to the surface. 

Each car has different material of dashboard and seats, so the stickiness of KaVii may differ between each surface. Make sure all items are secured tightly to KaVii and the surface before you drive your car.  **Caution: Please drive responsibly.  KaVii is meant to aid in a hands-free environment, NOT as a distraction. 

Why do we need your help? To get KaVii Ver.2 accessible to the market, our manufacturer needs to make a new mold, and we need to fulfill a large minimum order amount of this magical adhesive pad.

Why do you want to help us here on Indiegogo?  The multiply package & combo pack that we offer is a steal! This offer will not be available anywhere else after the campaign finishes.  So if you want to share with your friends and family, go with our multiply perks and compare the price. 

**Please contact us first if you want to multiply your order.  Shipping costs may vary depending on the weight of your package.

Sharing our campaign comes with perks : Take a screen cap of your share and email it to us here KaViiadhesive@gmail.com .  For every email we confirm, we will include 1 PC extra of our Original KaVii with your package for FREE! Write something interesting :)

Our first stretch goal - if we reach $50,000 we will add 1 PC extra of KaVii Ver.2 for every backer O_O!

Estimated Timeline of Production:

September 15th - October 31st  >>> Campaign Time

November 1st - November 15th >>> Indiegogo need 15 business days to process your payment

November 16th - December 15th >>> We will start the process of production for Indiegogo backers

December 16th - January 15th 2016 >>> We will start working to ship your packages

This is just a prediction of our production time. We will keep you updated through all of our social media channels down below and on this platform.

Website <-- Click here

Facebook <-- Click here

Twitter <-- Click here

Instagram <-- Click here

Youtube <-- Click here


Risk and Challenges :

This is our second crowdfunding campaign so we pretty much understand how the process goes, Your pledge = Your trust.
We will do our best to inform, manage, and deliver our products to you on time.

Looking for an adhesive manufacturer is a hassle - we screened more than 10 manufacturers to find the one that can maintain, or better yet, improve the quality of our original KaVii from our previous factory. Selecting the best one is a challenge because you need to have good communication and test all their products before making any final decisions.

What we learned from our previous campaign is: it's not easy to find an adhesive pad that is really sticky and has stable consistency for each pad when mass produced. That is why we are working so hard to make sure the composition of the mixing material is perfect.  We have been really selective in picking the best manufacture for our Ver.2 this time, and we have a stricter quality control policy. 

If we have any delays with the shipment or production of Ver.2, we will post an update to let you know and will always be open to any questions regarding the project progress.  You can always ask your questions through the comments section, private message, or email us here : KaViiadhesive@gmail.com

We will reply all messages in a timely manner.

Campaign  Launched  on 

                  9th April 2016....!!



Dear Indiegogo member, Android Smartphones with similar features are available in the market for $60 to $ 120. You are requested to support our mission to provide cheap and the BEST Android Smartphones,  not only through contributions, but also by spreading the word of Roosper revolution to your friends and peers via social media and other channels.

story:
DEE TABLET, the world´s best tablet.

 
We are all different, we have different jobs, different hobbies, but we all got one thing in common, we use computers every day. Nowadays tablets are replacing computers, but like many of you we have felt, that there isn't the perfect tablet yet. So we've challenged ourselves creatively to build the perfect tablet, we wanted it to be JUST perfect, but we all know that perfection is all about functionality. Introducing Dee Tablet. 

A revolutionary design with a dual display technology, a FHD 1920x1080 display and a Wacom screen with 1024 pressure sensors. Live battery, speed processor, connectivity, heating and storage were our main concerns in this project: Average computers have fans to dissipate heat from processors, so we have included a powerful “INTEL CORE M” processor which is a fanless technology, no fan means less battery consumption and for a better heating dissipation we have build a carbon fiber case to hold everything together.


SPECS:

-Operating System: Microsoft Windows 10 Professional Build 10240  

-UEFI Boot: YES

-CPU: Intel Core M- 5Y10

-GPU: Intel HD 5300 

- Ram: 4GB(DeeTabMini & DeeTab)/ 8GB (DeeTabPlus & DeeTabPro)

-Sotrage: SSD 64GB(DeeTabMini & DeeTab)/ SSD128GB (DeeTabPlus & DeeTabPro) .


Risks and challenges

We are not the average INDIEGOGO project, we are already up and running, selling and shipping by now, so you may be wondering why do we need the kickstarter's community support?, well we want to get global, and for that we need to create a worldwide range 24/7 customer support service, so depending on the success of this Indiegogo campaign we will be able to put this amazing piece of technology in your hands.
story_txt:
DEE TABLET, the world´s best tablet.

 We are all different, we have different jobs, different hobbies, but we all got one thing in common, we use computers every day. Nowadays tablets are replacing computers, but like many of you we have felt, that there isn't the perfect tablet yet. So we've challenged ourselves creatively to build the perfect tablet, we wanted it to be JUST perfect, but we all know that perfection is all about functionality. Introducing Dee Tablet. 

   A revolutionary design with a dual display technology, a FHD 1920x1080 display and a Wacom screen with 1024 pressure sensors. Live battery, speed processor, connectivity, heating and storage were our main concerns in this project: Average computers have fans to dissipate heat from processors, so we have included a powerful “INTEL CORE M” processor which is a fanless technology, no fan means less battery consumption and for a better heating dissipation we have build a carbon fiber case to hold everything together.



SPECS:-Operating System: Microsoft Windows 10 Professional Build 10240  -UEFI Boot: YES-CPU: Intel Core M- 5Y10-GPU: Intel HD 5300 - Ram: 4GB(DeeTabMini & DeeTab)/ 8GB (DeeTabPlus & DeeTabPro)-Sotrage: SSD 64GB(DeeTabMini & DeeTab)/ SSD128GB (DeeTabPlus & DeeTabPro) .
Risks and challenges
We are not the average INDIEGOGO project, we are already up and running, selling and shipping by now, so you may be wondering why do we need the kickstarter's community support?, well we want to get global, and for that we need to create a worldwide range 24/7 customer support service, so depending on the success of this Indiegogo campaign we will be able to put this amazing piece of technology in your hands.

story:
CID-X UCharger portable device – it’s a compact charger that would be an indispensable accessory in your home, on any trip or in any situation when you need to charge your gadget, thanks to advanced features of intelligent charging.

• UCharge technology.

It’s able to charge your battery quickly , safely and extend its lifetime.

• Emergency charging system.

The device has a built-in battery of 2600 mAh! So it is able to charge your phone battery, when you need it.

•Actual information.

The gadget is equipped with a LCD screen, which shows the connected device information: charge cycle, the capacity of "emergency" power source.

• Universal application.

Built-in electronic controller automatically detects the correct voltage and other characteristics of the amperage. Also, thanks to replaceable adapters for all modern sockets, you can use this charger in any country.

• Easy to use.

You can connect one or two devices to this charger at the same time, because there is one intelligent port microUSB ( working on UCharge technology) and one ordinary port. Amperage on the contacts 1A and 2.1A allows you to charge smartphones, music players and tablets.

• Full safety.

The gadget automatically interrupts the power supply in case of overheating, severe voltage fluctuations and short circuit, thereby it completely eliminated battery failure.

• Changing modes.

We have implemented 3 charging modes:

  1. "Smart Charging" (UCharger mode)
  2. Charging the internal battery (PowerBank mode)
  3. Ordinary charging

story:
We started a little Braille and Tactile Graphics production company in 2010, in our home, in Britain. My husband had always dreamed of working in graphic design; and he encouraged me not to disregard Braille, something I am very familiar with. I am totally blind and have been reading Braille since I was a little girl. So with two 6-year-old computers and a self-designed website, we began producing Braille and tactile graphics for British organizations.

Emmanuel's first bike tour in Wales.

Fast-forward to 2016, and a lot has changed. We moved back to Canada to purchase the tactile graphics production facilities of a well-established small company. We have been approached many times over the years to produce signage with braille and raised print. 3D printing is the logical way to do this. We have been testing 3D printers, looking at the total build size and how they stack up in terms of producing good-quality braille dots. We have come to the conclusion that the size and standard of 3D printer we are looking for does not exist. We have to build it ourselves, if we are going to expand our services to offer 3D printing with Braille labels.

Emmanuel is the visionary and graphics designer, while Rebecca is Quality Control for the Braille, and runs the back of house.
Rebecca is vision impaired. Along with lobbying for quality Braille material, she brings her expertise to the business. In her spare time, she serves on the Braille Literacy Canada board.

We believe that accurate, effective access to information should be available to all. We produce Braille and tactile graphics which are easy-to-follow, thoughtfully formatted, with Braille readers in mind.


We intend to build the first, truly Braille-friendly 3D printer ever. Help us do it!

Thanks for checking us out!

story:
the concept...

bethere team is a group of people who decided to do their own venture and turn the simplest of all ideas into a mobile app.

The idea of bethere app came out of a wondering about how useful it would be to know in advance where friends and people from our circles would go out in a few hours. It seemed to us that although checking-in had become very popular it couldn't  actually influence people's going outs.

For this reason, we aimed at creating a new social planning network for users to post their upcoming visits to places and share snapshots of their time there. 

bethere aspires to be a fresh and disruptive way of sharing location, substituting all we know about checking-in. In addition, it aims to be the next social network created by a whole community rather than a small group of people! A community of supporters sharing the same enthusiasm of building together the next big (hopefully) social network.

We might be a little too daring to give our shot in this crazy arena of start-ups when huge social networks lead the way but that's what also makes it fascinating ! We hope that you will want to be part of this !

Try it out by yourself!


See & download bethere's current releases both for iOS & Android below:

bethere. on the AppStore | bethere on Google Play

  
Visit the bethere for business Web APP

Featured in

 



Being part of
Facebook's FBSTART Bootstrap program
TNW's BOOST program on TNW Conference 2015, Amsterdam

...and why we're here


At this point bethere needs to raise an amount of money which will contribute to its further growth of network. We have already built a significant network in Athens and London but our goal is to strengthen our presence in London which is currently our main city of focus with most of our marketing activities to be placed there. More specifically, an amount of 450.000 Euros will be needed to:

  1. Implement a re-design of the app (both in iOS & Android) in order to introduce a new concept, this of the "influence meter" and add value to the user experience engaging them in a "game" of influence ranking according to the popularity of their plans.
  2.  Develop and launch a new web app interface of bethere for all users.
  3. Improve the existing web platform "bethere for business" in order to obtain the features needed to make it the basis for bethere's revenue model. 
  4. Reach new users through advertisement & marketing campaigns targeted to different locations in the world.
  5. Operational costs & fees that will keep our team & servers up and running for as long as we need to make this thing happen.

...let's make some noise


In the world of social apps which influence to such a great extent our social activities and become part of our everyday lives, we are always eager to see what will be next. Which network will pop up and make us leave others behind obtaining, thus, new social habits ? 

 It is very challenging, yet very enjoyable, to be part of what is coming next.  And aspiring to create what is coming next is all the value our effort has. 

When it comes to making a social network you have to face a basic problem: People usually join a network when it is already popular. So, how a new network will ever manage to obtain its first users when everyone waits for others to join first ?

This is the point where early adopters play their significant role of giving a try and spreading the word. So except from your funding support making some noise about our campaign would be extremely valuable while your feedback about the app  is also needed to help us improve our network. An easy start of spreading the word is using indiegogo share tools ! 

Hope to have you in our team as one of our most valuable users: 

the CrowdFounders!
