story:
Good Evening All IGG Backers!

We have been silent for a very long time focusing on getting things done. We do apologize for the long period of silence, and now I am extremely excited to announce that we've finally emerged from the BatCave ready to accomplish what we've set out to accomplish so long ago. The Live TV Hostile Takeover is officially about to begin!

As many of you obviously know, our efforts to get Nuclius into the mainstream by way of crowdfunding were thwarted due to the stonewalling efforts of our Cable/Satellite competition, the media companies they own and now even the banks they deal with. But they all doubted our resolve! We have all worked tirelessly and pursued on relentlessly to get the job done and now our final Release-to-Market (RTM) Nuclius Ursa Rhodium, is finally coming to a TV near you in the next few weeks with the Live TV portion going Live this fall! It's all in motion! Take a look at the official photos below.

Over the last few months, we began shipping several dozen Ursa Rhodium devices to the field for final testing. The results have been stunning. We have produced the best, most powerful, premium, portable 4K streaming device on the market... hands-down. A product that has impressed everyone that has experienced it. Take a look at the video below. A link to the official Nuclius page on our Corporate site is below for your review so you can see the dramatic improvements we've made between the IGG Campaign and our RTM version. Also, FYI, the Gold-printed box and Ursa device pictured above is the special Limited Edition device reserved specifically for IGG Backers, investors, etc as promised.


Since our crowdfunding efforts failed, we decided to form a relationship with several private investors/lenders who are providing us with the capital we need to get things done. Obviously, we missed our planned launch date of 2/17/2016 due to many unforeseen issues including both hardware and software related. But now, that phase is behind us and we're finally shipping devices. Nuclius Orders from all sources will resume in June following a major DRM/Security firmware update that needs to be installed by the manufacturer. This is a critical update that is designed to protect both ours and other's Live TV and exclusive content. IGG Backers will get theirs first followed by everyone else. And several IGG Backers will receive their devices prior to that time so you can begin spreading the word and your experience with Nuclius.

We've also completely removed ourselves from our former MLM roots and have converted to a new hybrid Referral-based business model fully positioned to allow all Consumers to capitalize on the Tsunami of customers that will flood into Triniti as a result of people hearing about Nuclius for the very first time. Like Nuclius, this system is a first of its kind and will change the way products/services are introduced to Consumers. The timing couldn't be better because people are ready to make the mad dash from Cable & Satellite as fast as they can. We're paying $100 for each Subscriber Household that Locks-In their Nuclius Order as we prepare for launch. Yes you read that right. $100 Cash for each Nuclius Offer Lock-In and it's paid Lightning Fast... every week. You also make money off of your Referrals' Referrals and we share a portion of the Monthly Service Charges with you as well. And we've paid out thousands in Commissions already and it's growing weekly. This is the only system in existence where regular Consumers can spread the word and actually earn enough income to get your TV, Wireless and other digital services from Triniti at no-out-of-pocket expense.

To make sure you understand, our new Lightning Referral System puts you as a Nuclius Backer in a very unique position. Since you are a Nuclius believer and have expressed such an early dedication to Nuclius by committing funds to the project, we will allow you to get signed up in the Lightning Referral System without an Order Lock-In, so you can make the $100+ on each Referred Subscriber. That means free of charge. The Limited-Time Nuclius Offer Lock-In Details, updated videos and a ton of other information can be found here: http://Triniti.IDitchedCable.TV. Read up and get involved. All you have to do is click the Lock-In link at the bottom of the page, choose Option A and enter your information using the same email address you use for IGG. For the CC/DC info, just provide any card and you will not be charged since you are signing up under the main Triniti account. You will get your own personalized links and Social Media Share Widgets as soon as you signup so you can immediately begin spreading the word. Processing will verify your information and give your account full Lock-In access to make Referral Income to your heart's desire. So feel free to spread the word on Social Media and however else you see fit.

It's time for us to work together unrestricted to let the people of this great nation know that they can finally Switch & Ditch Cable & Satellite and even make some really good money doing it. Long Live the Revolution!

Thank you for your patience, continued Support and Happy Referring!

Darin Miller
CEO

story: San Fernando Futbol 7 will be a year round operation as an Adult & Youth Soccer League facility, offering leagues from ages 5 to over 40, as well as clinics for youth ages 5 – 12. As opposed to a traditional size field, at half the size, Futbol 7 will provide cliental with the opportunity to play soccer on professional field turf, at a faster more exciting pace! I HAVE A BUSINESS PLAN IN PLACE WITH PROFIT AND LOSS STATEMENTS FOR 18 MONTHS. I WAS UNABLE TO ATTACH IT BUT WILL PROVIDE IT TO YOU UPON REQUEST.

story:
Brochure -> English, Español

Have you ever found yourself in any of the following situations?

  • You love traveling but have to spend hours organizing the transport and gathering information about how to get from one point to another
  • Your mobile carrier has no good coverage where you are or your phone is running out of battery and the Internet connection and GPS aren't helping too much
  • You ever got on the correct bus line but it went in the wrong direction
  • Surprisingly the bus route was modified (roadworks, road accident, technical failure of the traffic lights, etc) and will not arrive at the station which name you are expecting to see
  • You have a few hours between flights and want to check out the city but don't want to turn on the roaming nor purchase a local SimCard to check the public transport real-time information
  • You are on the tram and hear the next stop names being announced but it's hard to recognize them in a foreign language or bad quality audio
  • You just moved to a new city for a job, university studies or any other reason and don't know how the public transport works in the city
  • And many more examples...

Let's fix it in two simple steps:

  1. Switch on the WiFi in your smartphone
  2. Get close a auto bus, tram, train or any form of public transport
  3. That's all, you'll receive real-time information, among others about the route, bus stop, delays and accurate position, all this without Internet nor using GPS

Pricing after crowdfunding

You might be thinking "Okay, this idea is cool and useful, but come on, how much will this app cost?", the answer is simple:

                                     

The WIPIN app will be free of charge for everybody!

How is the scheme of this service?

WIPIN device collects the vehicle information and is transmitting it cryptographically signed by a wireless network that the WIPIN device
creates.
This information can be received only by the WIPIN application that you have on your phone. You have different options to set up alerts and notifications for the  information that you can receive in the application on your phone.

What does WIPIN do?

Modern public transport systems are packed with interesting information, wouldn't it be cool to be able to access all that data directly from your smartphone? With WIPIN you can get the public transport information in real time (route, stops information, real-time departures, estimated arrivals, you can see the vehicle's GPS location). All this with NO Internet connection needed! The information is transmitted to you Smartphone via WIFI over a safe network that it's in the public transport vehicle, so you're getting dynamic information, accurate and in real-time coming right from the bus/tram/train you're on or standing next to!

There are plenty of offline public transport apps...

Yes, for these (also useful) apps, you need to, previously download the information to your smartphone, then you'll be able to access to this information without Internet connection. This is one point that we want to improve, for instance, using an offline app, the information that you must previously download is collected from the public transport website which shows how the route and schedules should be, but no how the route and schedule is at the time of applying the many variables and surprises that daily traffic of a city brings to the public transport.

With WIPIN:

  • You don't depend on a Internet connection
  • You get real-time and accurate data about the public transport
  • You don't need to use the GPS in your smartphone to know your location
  • You will save a lot of battery on your phone


WANT TO LEARN MORE
Feel free to ping us with questions @Wipin_eu, or check out the site - www.wipin.eu There you can also sign up to be notified when the app launches!

How does it work?

                                                  That's it. Quite easy, right?

                                                  

Who we are?

We are a group of young people with a spirit of dreamers, we all have several years of experience working inter alia in phone application development, communication and wireless networks, development of embedded computer boards.
We see this project as an opportunity to create something really useful, that each person can use it in their daily life, that’s why it will be free, so that everyone benefits from this service at any time.This means, we are not making this project a business, all the money raised in the campaign will be destined to the project, nothing of these funds will go to our pockets.
If you have questions and want to know more about the project and about us, contact us at contact@wipin.eu, we will be more than happy to answer your questions.

Are Wipin device and Wipin app the same?

No, the Wipin device is in the autobus/Tram/train and you don't need to do anything with it, when you're using the Wipin app, this is requesting the information to the Wipin device automatically, basically, all what you'll "see" is only the Wipin app.


FAQ

Q: How much will the app cost?

Nothing! It's for free!

Q: Will this service consume a lot data transfer from my internet plan in my phone?

No, You don't need to have Internet data transfer in your phone at all. No internet connection is required.

Q: How much do I need to pay to get the information in my smartphone?

Nothing! All is for free!

Q: Keeping my WiFi active will consume more battery than keeping the 3G active?

Wi-Fi is more efficient and uses less battery in modern phones than the 3G radio while associated with an access point. - More info: http://people.cs.umass.edu/~arun/papers/TailEnder.pdf


Q: Will my smartphone be able to receive this information?

The information is transmitted to your phone using the regular WiFi connection. It means that, if your smartphone has WiFi, it's “able” to benefit from this service.

Q: Does this mean I can access Internet for free in the tram?

No. WIPIN gives you read-only access of the vehicle information. You can only receive what the tram decides to tell your phone.

Q: Is this secure?

All information is cryptographically signed and cannot be faked.

Q: How far is this service available from the autobus/tram/train?

WIPIN transmission range works just like any other WiFi device, with ranges up to 200 meters. However, we plan to limit the transmitters to ~2m range to make sure you won't be confused with info from more than one vehicle.

Q: Why do you want to make it free?

Like everyone we like free and useful stuff, WIPIN is going to be a platform made by US for US. We believe that only free services have a chance of spreading worldwide! This isn't a business for us, it's an opportunity, with your help, to create something really cool and useful for everybody, and the most important thing, free!

Q: Can I interact in the WIPIN app with other users in the autobus?

No, the point of WIPIN is to give you information (context) about the bus, not to communicate.

Q: Is WIPIN app trying to replace the others public transport applications?

We are not trying to replace those apps. We want to give you real time information about the physical bus you are standing next to. Depending on the situation and your need, you can use any public transport app that is more suitable for you.

Q: But my phone is able to find my location with GPS in 3 seconds! Why are you talking about location?!

99% of the time your phone is using WiFi scanning to triangulate your location based on data from Google or others. If you have no Internet connection (e.g. abroad) you will quickly find out how "slow" and inaccurate your GPS really is.
story_txt:
Brochure -> English, EspañolHave you ever found yourself in any of the following situations?
You love traveling but have to spend hours organizing the transport and gathering information about how to get from one point to another
Your mobile carrier has no good coverage where you are or your phone is running out of battery and the Internet connection and GPS aren't helping too much

You ever got on the correct bus line but it went in the wrong direction
Surprisingly the bus route was modified (roadworks, road 
accident, technical failure of the traffic lights, etc) and will not 
arrive at the station which name you are expecting to see

You have a few hours between flights and want to check out the city but 
don't want to turn on the roaming nor purchase a local SimCard to check 
the public transport real-time information
You are on the tram and hear the next stop names being announced but it's hard to recognize them in a foreign language or bad quality audio

You just moved to a new city for a job, university studies or any other reason and don't know how the public transport works in the city
And many more examples...
Let's fix it in two simple steps:
Switch on the WiFi in your smartphone
Get close a auto bus, tram, train or any form of public transport
That's all, you'll receive real-time information, among others about the route, bus stop, delays and accurate position, all this without Internet nor using GPS
Pricing after crowdfundingYou might be thinking "Okay, this idea is cool and useful, but come on, how much will this app cost?", the answer is simple:                                      The WIPIN app will be free of charge for everybody!How is the scheme of this service?WIPIN device collects the vehicle information and is transmitting it cryptographically signed by a wireless network that the WIPIN device creates. This information can be received only by the WIPIN application that you have on your phone. You have different options to set up alerts and notifications for the  information that you can receive in the application on your phone.What does WIPIN do?
Modern public transport systems are
packed with interesting information, wouldn't it be cool to be able
to access all that data directly from your smartphone? With WIPIN you
can get the public transport information in real time (route, stops
information, real-time departures, estimated arrivals, you can see the
vehicle's GPS location). All this with NO Internet connection needed!
The information is transmitted to you Smartphone via WIFI over a safe network that it's in the public transport vehicle, so you're getting dynamic information, accurate and in real-time coming right from the
bus/tram/train you're on or standing next to!There are plenty of offline public transport apps...Yes, for these (also useful) apps, you need to, previously download the information to your smartphone, then you'll be able to access to this information without Internet connection. This is one point that we want to improve, for instance, using an offline app, the information that you must previously download is collected from the public transport website which shows how the route and schedules should be, but no how the route and schedule is at the time of applying the many variables and surprises that daily traffic of a city brings to the public transport.With WIPIN:
You don't depend on a Internet connection

You get real-time and accurate data about the public transport
You don't need to use the GPS in your smartphone to know your location
You will save a lot of battery on your phone 
WANT TO LEARN MOREFeel free to ping us with questions @Wipin_eu, or check out 
the site - www.wipin.eu There you can also sign up to be notified when 
the app launches!How does it work?                                                  That's it. Quite easy, right?                                                   Who we are?We are a group of young people with a spirit of dreamers, we all have several years of experience working inter alia in phone application development, communication and wireless networks, development of embedded computer boards.We see this project as an opportunity to create something really useful, that each person can use it in their daily life, that’s why it will be free, so that everyone benefits from this service at any time.This means, we are not making this project a business, all the money raised in the campaign will be destined to the project, nothing of these funds will go to our pockets.If you have questions and want to know more about the project and about us, contact us at contact@wipin.eu, we will be more than happy to answer your questions.Are Wipin device and Wipin app the same?
No, the Wipin device is in the autobus/Tram/train and you don't need to do anything with it, when you're using the Wipin app, this is requesting the information to the Wipin device automatically, basically, all what you'll "see" is only the Wipin app.FAQQ: How much will the app cost?Nothing! It's for free!Q: Will this service consume a lot data transfer from my internet plan in my phone?No, You don't need to have Internet data transfer in your phone at all. No internet connection is required.Q: How much do I need to pay to get the information in my smartphone?Nothing! All is for free!Q: Keeping my WiFi active will consume more battery than keeping the 3G active?Wi-Fi is more efficient and uses less battery in modern phones than the 3G radio while associated with an access point. - More info: http://people.cs.umass.edu/~arun/papers/TailEnder.pdfQ: Will my smartphone be able to receive this information?The information is transmitted to your phone using the regular WiFi connection. It means that, if your smartphone has WiFi, it's “able” to benefit from this service.Q: Does this mean I can access Internet for free in the tram?No. WIPIN gives you read-only access of the vehicle information. You can only receive what the tram decides to tell your phone.Q: Is this secure?All information is cryptographically signed and cannot be faked.Q: How far is this service available from the autobus/tram/train?WIPIN transmission range works just like any other WiFi device, with ranges up to 200 meters. However, we plan to limit the transmitters to ~2m range to make sure you won't be confused with info from more than one vehicle.Q: Why do you want to make it free?Like everyone we like free and useful stuff, WIPIN is going to be a platform made by US for US. We believe that only free services have a chance of spreading worldwide! This isn't a business for us, it's an opportunity, with your help, to create something really cool and useful for everybody, and the most important thing, free!Q: Can I interact in the WIPIN app with other users in the autobus?No, the point of WIPIN is to give you information (context) about the bus, not to communicate.Q: Is WIPIN app trying to replace the others public transport applications?We are not trying to replace those apps. We want to give you real time information about the physical bus you are standing next to. Depending on the situation and your need, you can use any public transport app that is more suitable for you.Q: But my phone is able to find my location with GPS in 3 seconds! Why are you talking about location?!99% of the time your phone is using WiFi scanning to triangulate your location based on data from Google or others. If you have no Internet connection (e.g. abroad) you will quickly find out how "slow" and inaccurate your GPS really is.

story:
**NOT ONLY FOR IPHONES, BUT ALL!!!**

***Fundraising for Tech Startup - TheATeam***


WHAT IS CableCAP?

Finding it troublesome when you break your charging cable by unplugging at the pressure points?


Charging cables are part of our lives. We use them to charge our phones, tablets, laptops, etc. Let's be honest to ourselves, we are all panicking when our phones run out of battery. Breaking an iPhone charging cable is like losing the love of our lives. It costs you time, as you need to run to an Apple store to grab a new one; and it costs you money, as each cable retails for $19 at the store. It is even more expensive if you break your MacBook charging cables. 

Although micro-USB cables may be more affordable, why not consider an even cheaper and sensible option? Simply PROTECT YOUR CABLES BEFORE THEY BREAK!

With CableCAP, you are now hassle-free.


Just CAP it at the 2 edges of your iPhone cable, MicroUSB cable, MacBook Cables, etc. The CableCAP protects the pressure points and greatly reduces the chances of breaking the cables at the edge! So NO MORE BROKEN CABLES!

As you can see it's so EASY TO USE! We are sure that no matter you are 3 or 80,  you can fit your cable in quickly! (But we would recommend you to keep it away from the 3-year-olds if they are still putting everything into their mouth. It is not as advanced as eatable yet.)


WHAT ARE THE OTHER USES?

As we have mentioned above, the usage of CableCAP is NOT limited to iPhone charging cables! There are plenty of uses as well! Such as:

- MicroUSB Cables Protection (e.g. Android Phones, Blackberries, Portable Harddisk Transfer Cables)
- Laptop Charging Cables Protection (e.g. MacBook, USB-C Cables, PC Laptop, Chromebooks)
- Earphones Cable Protection

and MORE...


WHAT WE OFFER?

CableCAP currently comes in 10 colors:
1. Snow White
2. Cassiopeia Purple
3. Hulk Green
4. Cherry Red
5. TequilaRose Pink
6. Minions Yellow
7. Carrot Orange
8. Maldives Blue
9. Annoying Orange
10. Tiffany Blue
WE RECOMMEND YOU TO USE TWO CableCAPS, ONE AT EACH END FOR A COMPREHENSIVE PROTECTION SO OUR PERKS COME IN PAIRS!

OUR PERKS:
1. THANK YOU! - US$1 - Thank you so much for your support!
2. CableCAP-ture our offer! - US$12 - 3 pairs of CableCAP (6 CableCAPS)
3. CableCAP for your gadgets! - US$22 - 6 pairs of CableCAP (12 CableCAPS)
4. CableCAP for you & fam! - US$42 - 12 pairs of CableCAP  (24 CableCAPS)

5. CableCAP for fam & frds! - US$100 - 30 pairs of CableCAP (60 CableCAPS)
6. CableCAP for many fam & frds! - US$150 - 50 pairs of CableCAP (100 CableCAPS)
7. CableCAP for you & office! - US$500 - 200 pairs of CableCAP (400 CableCAPS)
8. CableCAP for you & school! - US$1000 - 500 pairs of CableCAP (1000 CableCAPS)

I am sure for the colleagues/schoolmates of those who purchased the office/school perk will love you so much as you gifted them one of the most useful and practical thing they can find in this decade! (Maybe) (Provided that you gift them.)

ANY NEXT STEPS?

This is our first crowdfunding campaign and to be very honest we would be very happy and excited if we can reach our crowdfunding goal. However we want to set a few next steps goals to unlock, which can make us do even better!
Goal 1: US$20,000
New Colors:
1. Apple Gold
2. Apple Black
3. Apple Silver
If we can reach US$20,000 we will unlock these three colors for iPhone users so to match your iPhones! Help us unlock this goal iPhoners!
Goal 2: US$40,000
New Option: CableCAP with CableCLIP!
If we reach US$40,000 we will unlock the CableCLIP as well for you to tidy up your cables! No more messy cables in handbags!

Goal 3: US$100,000

New Option: CableCAP with new shapes!

- MYSTERY Shape
- Night Glow Version

If we reach US$100,000 we will unlock new shapes including a Mystery Shape (don't worry it won't be a d***) and a night glow version for you to brighten up your cable! No more gloomy white cables!


WHO WE ARE?

We are TheATeam, a student run startup formed by students from the University of Bristol and the University of Warwick.  We focus on online applications and tech-related products development. We are raising this campaign not only to promote our CableCAP product, but more importantly to raise funds for our startup.  Nowadays it's getting harder and harder to run a startup company. We are not as rich as the multi-national corporations, which can throw millions and millions to promote their business moves, so we need your support to keep our innovations going! There will be a few new TheATeam indiegogo campaigns going on after this so stay tuned for our next project!


Q & A

Q. What kind of materials are CableCAP made of and how does it work?
A. CableCAP is made of strong PU+PC plastics, its dual layer characteristic wrap the pressure points of the cable which greatly reduce the pressure applied on the point to avoid breaking the cable.
Q. When will the products be delivered?
A. We will first perform some high level quality control then ship the products after inspection. First shipping is expected in late December 2015. (Should be on time for Christmas!)
Q. If I got some additional questions, who should I ask?
A. Easy! Just email us at theateamstartup@gmail.com!

Thank you for your time and support!

story:
At BeansUp, we make beautiful, intuitive technology that enhances your brand ethos and your businesses bottom line. Everything we do is underpinned by a passion for coffee.  


"This Indiegogo Campaign Gives Any Coffee Shop a Branded Order + Pay App Just Like Starbucks....With None Of The Huge Expense"


We take all the time, expense and technical knowledge required out of creating a beautiful, fully branded mobile order & payment app for your coffee shop. We give you an app, and the simple, intuitive software to integrate it into your business today.

The large corporate brands like Starbucks are making mobile payment apps, and the new levels of customer convenience they offer, ubiquitous throughout the coffee industry....increasing their customer loyalty and spend as they do it. Why can't coffee shops just like yours offer customers this same innovative technology?? The huge cost and time of developing your own solution makes it an unaffordable and high risk proposition. This is where BeansUp comes in. We bring you this innovative coffee-focused app technology for an affordable subscription. 

Your app is completely customised with your branding and available in the iOS and Android app stores. Customers simply search your brand name and hit download. It's that easy. Your app enables your customers to order & pay from their phones, earning loyalty points as they spend. Whether thats an office worker pre-ordering and paying for a sandwich and a coffee to collect, or a customer at a table working on their laptop ordering a second coffee without having to leave their seat and precious cargo unattended! 

Engage your customers by sending tailored offers directly to their phones. Easily edit your loyalty reward, menu or almost anything using our intuitive web-based business dashboard. 

Check out our features list and videos below


We launched nearly a year ago and have built a customer base from Chicago to Dublin, with our apps being used to process thousands of orders, increase consumer loyalty and spend while promoting the rich origins of coffee. Our wealth of experience means you can have confidence that we can deliver...we already have, to customers just like you. Back us today, to receive the latest version of our customised order & payment app, the intuitive management software used to run it and updates that are free, forever. Your help on Indiegogo will be invaluable in enabling us to add exciting new features into what is already an award winning product. Take advantage of these exclusive Indiegogo discounts. Future-proof your business, today. 

Why have we spent two years developing, improving and testing this amazing product for coffee shops? 

We have immersed ourselves in the world of coffee from perfecting our Aeropress techniques at home, to exhibiting at the SCAE World of Coffee events in Rimini and Gothenburg. One thing is clear, how customers are interacting with coffee shops is changing rapidly. 

The coffee industry is in the midst of a seismic shift towards consumer focused technology. This focus is revolutionising how customers interact with coffee shops just like yours. The entire industry has awoken to the huge opportunity of mobile and payment technology. These innovations are app based, and industry shaping. This technology isn't being utilised merely for technologies sake, it is consistently boosting sales, loyalty, customer satisfaction and in-store efficiencies.  

This shift towards mobile app innovation is becoming a staple of the branded chains, boosting their performance and winning them new customers, but the opportunity hasn't yet filtered to the independents and smaller chains. Why?!  

While we have been hard at work creating an amazing product for the independently owned coffee shops, the corporate giants like Starbucks have proven the global markets embrace of this new app technology. Their latest app update, like our product, enables customers to pre-order and pay to collect, and has been a resounding success with over 20% of total orders being placed by customers through their app, millions of transactions a week, and to quoteHoward Schultz (Starbucks CEO) 

"In those stores where mobile order and pay app has been deployed...lines are shorter....service is faster.....we are more efficient"



This order & pay app technology is fast becoming ubiquitous across the coffee industry and with the clear benefits it presents, this would be a brilliant opportunity for all coffee shops.....if there was a level playing field. A bespoke app solution involves a budget in the tens of thousands, upfront risk, a development team and months of work. This is a huge problem, not for the large corporate chains with exponential resources, but for the vibrant independent coffee shops like yours, who have worked tirelessly to source their coffee, create their menu, and earned the loyalty of their customers. Why should you not be able to take full advantage of this technology to offer your customers the quality products and service you have perfected, with all the convenience offered by a customised app solution.

 In a modern age where faster simply isn't fast enough, your customers convenience is everything, and convenience is an app based solution for your cafe. 


We believe technology should work to enhance your customer experience and compliment your brand ethos, and our platform does. Over the coming years the term customer experience will be all encompassing of both your face to face AND digital to consumer interactions. Both should be personal, and personalised, with our bespoke apps they will be. We've built our platform from the ground up with and for coffee shop owners just like you. We've listened to what you care about and brought these ideas to life. Like having a way to tell your bean to cup coffee story to customers. Check out our app feature list below to find out more about our"Origin and Traceability" feature. 


At BeansUp we give you so much more than an app. We give you an ecosystem with all the necessary tools including an intuitive, easy to use CMS (content management system). This means that although we provide everything setup, and ready to earn you money out of the box, you have all the control if you wish to tweak any aspect of your content. The power is in your hands!


How Do My Staff Receive The App Orders?

We've created an amazingly simple and intuitive Order Management Software (OMS) for your staff. The best part? 100% Compatibility with your current Point of Sale. 

We've built our OMS with staff in mind from the ground up. The Order Management System runs on a tablet that attaches to your current POS. This means we are compatible with any till system and highly adaptable to any of your needs.

The OMS tablet is provided as part of our Essentials Package Reward but the software is web based and can run on any wi-fi enabled device you own like a laptop. If you already own tablets or want to source your own thats no problem. The OMS device we supply (Google Nexus Retina Tablet) simply attaches to your current POS. 

The OMS acts as an "always on" display. Staff simply view customer app orders and ring them into your current till as normal. All app orders are already paid for so we recommend staff input the order into the till, keeping their end of day receipts and totals balanced. Most of our customers simply programme an "App" button to sit alongside "cash" and "card" on their POS. 

We have spent almost 2 years working alongside staff to find the best solution thats easily integrated into their existing daily habits. They love that they don't have to learn how to use complex and intimidating new software and that the screen real estate of their till isn't made smaller to allow room for the app OMS. All staff have found it a familiar process akin to serving a customer at the counter, and because the order tablet is attached just above the till screen, alerting them as orders arrive, they never miss a trick. 

View the order and ring it into the POS. It's that simple. 


Order & Pay

Your customers can order + pay from your menu. Whether that's office workers pre-ordering and pre-paying their lunch to collect, or someone looking to order a 2nd coffee from their table.

Pre-Order To Collect

Customers can pre-order & pre-pay to collect. It's as easy as pre-order, walk-in store, collect + go! Customers ♡ the convenience, and staff ♡ that they know exactly when customers are arriving. Less pressure = happier staff!


Loyalty Points

Your customers earn loyalty through your app as they spend. Unlike the very limited, traditional stamped loyalty cards you can reward your customers in exciting and engaging new ways. Double reward points on the quieter weekdays? No problem!


Tailored Offers

No more marketing guesswork. Engage your customers with personalised offers. The best thing....our software does the hard work for you! Want to reward only your top 5% of most loyal customers with a free coffee? BeansUp has you covered.


Promote Your Coffee Origins & Traceability

Educate your customers in a personalised way on the origins and traceability of your coffee. You simply enter the origin, roast and body type. You can even add brew methods. We take this information and display it in a beautiful way to the customer. Of course, you can choose to ignore this feature and simply upload your coffees with name and price. The control is in your hands.


Bank Level Security

All customer payments made to you by customers are secured with 256 bit encryption, that's bank level security. This is why we use Stripe as our payment processor. One-touch payments, an intuitive payments interface and data security.....also they have the cheapest payment processing rate available. 


Have a look at the video below to see a short demonstration of one of our apps. Don't forget, your app will have all of your branding and colour scheme, bespoke menu icons, customised app loader and of course, its own unique listing on the apple and android app stores.  

Our business dashboard works on all your mobile devices from tablets to laptops. It allows you or your staff to easily make changes to your apps menu, loyalty reward, create offers and more. All your changes are instantly reflected in your app. Its really that simple. Take a look at the video below for a glimpse at its features. 


Have a look at the short video below to see how your new app will be used from your customers perspective. 


It's all about the brand you've worked so hard to create, not ours. There are other companies out their that build app solutions, but spending the first year testing and getting feedback we heard the same issues appearing repeatedly.

Others build apps that are all about promoting their brand, leaving yours to sit amongst a long list of other (usually competitors) businesses. They aren't industry specific. We set out from the beginning to be all about coffee, not just because thats a passion of ours but because we felt diluting our product across multiple industry sectors was always going to conclude in a compromise to contend with the requirements of many instead of the exceeding the needs of few. By supporting us with this Indiegogo we will be able to do even more to keep our feature list laser focused, and hugely beneficial to your coffee business.

Again.....with BeansUp, it's all about the brand you've worked so hard to create, not ours.


We are offering rewards at exclusive Indiegogo perks & discounts! We have a package for your brand whether you are an independent coffee shop looking to innovate and build customer loyalty, or a chain of ten locations across the country. 

Our platform is normally available for a small one time app creation fee of £499 and a monthly subscription. Building your own in-house app solution would cost upwards of £45,000 and at least 12 months of your time. Our standard app package with everything you need is the amazing price of £1,747 a year but Indiegogo packages start at £500 and you'll have your app in January!!! 

With Indiegogo we are offering discounts of over 70% and your full years subscription is covered with one package. The best part?? We will honour this discounted subscription rate after your first year!! 



Building the BeansUp platform has been a labour of love for the past two years. We've worked tirelessly to bring this product to life!

With support from around the globe and amazing feedback from some of coffees top industry experts, the coffee community is so far reaching and vibrant that it seems only fitting that we turn to Kickstarter to bring brand new functionality and continue the growth of BeansUp. 


Risks and challenges

Risks.

We've engineered this Indiegogo to create almost zero risk for our backers. The platform is ready to go now and it has been in stable daily use by cafes from Scotland to Chicago for over a year.

App Store Submission

If we are inundated with backers for apps it could cause a slight delay as all apps are individually customised and sent off to the Android and iOS app stores for approval. As we have been launched for nearly a year now and have the process as streamlined as possible it significantly reduces any risk of short delays. We will be bringing in extra members to the team if required.

Customers simply search your brand name and hit download. It's that easy. Your app enables your customers to order & pay from their phones, earning loyalty points as they spend. Whether thats an office worker pre-ordering and paying for a sandwich and a coffee to collect, or a customer at a table working on their laptop ordering a second coffee without having to leave their seat and precious cargo unattended! Engage your customers by sending tailored offers directly to their phones. Easily edit your loyalty reward, menu or almost anything using our intuitive web-based business dashboard. Check out our features list and videos belowWe launched nearly a year ago and have built a customer base from Chicago to Dublin, with our apps being used to process thousands of orders, increase consumer loyalty and spend while promoting the rich origins of coffee. Our wealth of experience means you can have confidence that we can deliver...we already have, to customers just like you. Back us today, to receive the latest version of our customised order & payment app, the intuitive management software used to run it and updates that are free, forever. Your help on Indiegogo will be invaluable in enabling us to add exciting new features into what is already an award winning product. Take advantage of these exclusive Indiegogo discounts. Future-proof your business, today. Why have we spent two years developing, improving and testing this amazing product for coffee shops? We have immersed ourselves in the world of coffee from perfecting our Aeropress techniques at home, to exhibiting at the SCAE World of Coffee events in Rimini and Gothenburg. One thing is clear, how customers are interacting with coffee shops is changing rapidly. The coffee industry is in the midst of a seismic shift towards consumer focused technology. This focus is revolutionising how customers interact with coffee shops just like yours. The entire industry has awoken to the huge opportunity of mobile and payment technology. These innovations are app based, and industry shaping. This technology isn't being utilised merely for technologies sake, it is consistently boosting sales, loyalty, customer satisfaction and in-store efficiencies.  This shift towards mobile app innovation is becoming a staple of the branded chains, boosting their performance and winning them new customers, but the opportunity hasn't yet filtered to the independents and smaller chains. Why?!  While we have been hard at work creating an amazing product for the independently owned coffee shops, the corporate giants like Starbucks have proven the global markets embrace of this new app technology. Their latest app update, like our product, enables customers to pre-order and pay to collect, and has been a resounding success with over 20% of total orders being placed by customers through their app, millions of transactions a week, and to quoteHoward Schultz (Starbucks CEO) "In those stores where mobile order and pay app has been deployed...lines are shorter....service is faster.....we are more efficient"This order & pay app technology is fast becoming ubiquitous across the coffee industry and with the clear benefits it presents, this would be a brilliant opportunity for all coffee shops.....if there was a level playing field. A bespoke app solution involves a budget in the tens of thousands, upfront risk, a development team and months of work. This is a huge problem, not for the large corporate chains with exponential resources, but for the vibrant independent coffee shops like yours, who have worked tirelessly to source their coffee, create their menu, and earned the loyalty of their customers. Why should you not be able to take full advantage of this technology to offer your customers the quality products and service you have perfected, with all the convenience offered by a customised app solution. In a modern age where faster simply isn't fast enough, your customers convenience is everything, and convenience is an app based solution for your cafe. We believe technology should work to enhance your customer experience and compliment your brand ethos, and our platform does. Over the coming years the term customer experience will be all encompassing of both your face to face AND digital to consumer interactions. Both should be personal, and personalised, with our bespoke apps they will be. We've built our platform from the ground up with and for coffee shop owners just like you. We've listened to what you care about and brought these ideas to life. Like having a way to tell your bean to cup coffee story to customers. Check out our app feature list below to find out more about our"Origin and Traceability" feature. 


At BeansUp we give you so much more than an app. We give you an ecosystem with all the necessary tools including an intuitive, easy to use CMS (content management system). This means that although we provide everything setup, and ready to earn you money out of the box, you have all the control if you wish to tweak any aspect of your content. The power is in your hands!



How Do My Staff Receive The App Orders?
We've created an amazingly simple and intuitive Order Management Software (OMS) for your staff. The best part? 100% Compatibility with your current Point of Sale. 
We've built our OMS with staff in mind from the ground up. The Order Management System runs on a tablet that attaches to your current POS. This means we are compatible with any till system and highly adaptable to any of your needs.
The OMS tablet is provided as part of our Essentials Package Reward but the software is web based and can run on any wi-fi enabled device you own like a laptop. If you already own tablets or want to source your own thats no problem. The OMS device we supply (Google Nexus Retina Tablet) simply attaches to your current POS. 
The OMS acts as an "always on" display. Staff simply view customer app orders and ring them into your current till as normal. All app orders are already paid for so we recommend staff input the order into the till, keeping their end of day receipts and totals balanced. Most of our customers simply programme an "App" button to sit alongside "cash" and "card" on their POS. 
We have spent almost 2 years working alongside staff to find the best solution thats easily integrated into their existing daily habits. They love that they don't have to learn how to use complex and intimidating new software and that the screen real estate of their till isn't made smaller to allow room for the app OMS. All staff have found it a familiar process akin to serving a customer at the counter, and because the order tablet is attached just above the till screen, alerting them as orders arrive, they never miss a trick. 
View the order and ring it into the POS. It's that simple. 


Order & Pay
Your customers can order + pay from your menu. Whether that's office workers pre-ordering and pre-paying their lunch to collect, or someone looking to order a 2nd coffee from their table.


Pre-Order To Collect
Customers can pre-order & pre-pay to collect. It's as easy as pre-order, walk-in store, collect + go! Customers ♡ the convenience, and staff ♡ that they know exactly when customers are arriving. Less pressure = happier staff!

Loyalty Points
Your customers earn loyalty through your app as they spend. Unlike the very limited, traditional stamped loyalty cards you can reward your customers in exciting and engaging new ways. Double reward points on the quieter weekdays? No problem!



Tailored Offers
No more marketing guesswork. Engage your customers with personalised offers. The best thing....our software does the hard work for you! Want to reward only your top 5% of most loyal customers with a free coffee? BeansUp has you covered.



Promote Your Coffee Origins & Traceability
Educate your customers in a personalised way on the origins and traceability of your coffee. You simply enter the origin, roast and body type. You can even add brew methods. We take this information and display it in a beautiful way to the customer. Of course, you can choose to ignore this feature and simply upload your coffees with name and price. The control is in your hands.


Bank Level Security
All customer payments made to you by customers are secured with 256 bit encryption, that's bank level security. This is why we use Stripe as our payment processor. One-touch payments, an intuitive payments interface and data security.....also they have the cheapest payment processing rate available. 


Have a look at the video below to see a short demonstration of one of our apps. Don't forget, your app will have all of your branding and colour scheme, bespoke menu icons, customised app loader and of course, its own unique listing on the apple and android app stores.  




Our business dashboard works on all your mobile devices from tablets to laptops. It allows you or your staff to easily make changes to your apps menu, loyalty reward, create offers and more. All your changes are instantly reflected in your app. Its really that simple. Take a look at the video below for a glimpse at its features. 



Have a look at the short video below to see how your new app will be used from your customers perspective. 




It's all about the brand you've worked so hard to create, not ours. There are other companies out their that build app solutions, but spending the first year testing and getting feedback we heard the same issues appearing repeatedly.
Others build apps that are all about promoting their brand, leaving yours to sit amongst a long list of other (usually competitors) businesses. They aren't industry specific. We set out from the beginning to be all about coffee, not just because thats a passion of ours but because we felt diluting our product across multiple industry sectors was always going to conclude in a compromise to contend with the requirements of many instead of the exceeding the needs of few. By supporting us with this Indiegogo we will be able to do even more to keep our feature list laser focused, and hugely beneficial to your coffee business.
Again.....with BeansUp, it's all about the brand you've worked so hard to create, not ours.


We are offering rewards at exclusive Indiegogo perks & discounts! We have a package for your brand whether you are an independent coffee shop looking to innovate and build customer loyalty, or a chain of ten locations across the country. 
Our platform is normally available for a small one time app creation fee of £499 and a monthly subscription. Building your own in-house app solution would cost upwards of £45,000 and at least 12 months of your time. Our standard app package with everything you need is the amazing price of £1,747 a year but Indiegogo packages start at £500 and you'll have your app in January!!! 
With Indiegogo we are offering discounts of over 70% and your full years subscription is covered with one package. The best part?? We will honour this discounted subscription rate after your first year!! 






Building the BeansUp platform has been a labour of love for the past two years. We've worked tirelessly to bring this product to life!
With support from around the globe and amazing feedback from some of coffees top industry experts, the coffee community is so far reaching and vibrant that it seems only fitting that we turn to Kickstarter to bring brand new functionality and continue the growth of BeansUp. 


Risks and challenges
Risks.
We've engineered this Indiegogo to create almost zero risk for our backers. The platform is ready to go now and it has been in stable daily use by cafes from Scotland to Chicago for over a year.
App Store Submission
If we are inundated with backers for apps it could cause a slight delay as all apps are individually customised and sent off to the Android and iOS app stores for approval. As we have been launched for nearly a year now and have the process as streamlined as possible it significantly reduces any risk of short delays. We will be bringing in extra members to the team if required.

story:
We are an Internet company with offices in Kuala Lumpur, Singapore, Hong Kong and China. As most of us know, the Great Wall has blocked popular sites such as Google, Facebook, Twitter and Youtube. We had purchased various VPN (virtual private network) services which claimed to be able to access blocked sites. Not to mention most charged an expensive recurring fees, ranging from $6 to more than $30 per month,  it's also a great hassle to download the vpn software in each computer, and the need to switch from servers to servers as she keeps blocking VPN servers. Recently, we experienced even more difficulty in accessing VPN services in China with a widespread blockage of VPN servers. See a report at the International Business Times.

To solve this problem, we have hired a team to develop the first "Plug and Browse" USB flash drive in-built with VPN services. It's just the size of a thumb and is easy to carry.

There is no software to download. Just carry this small USB and plug to any laptop or computer usb port.

Then I will be prompted to enter a password and click confirm.

Voila!  I can successfully access Google, Facebook, and Twitter in just less than 3 seconds! This can even unblock Youtube and the videos can be played smoothly. So a computer dummy like me can use this magic device with super ease.

This magic VPN USB also works anywhere to access blocked sites. I was in Malaysia and was not able to access some China websites and some sites were very slow loading. After I plugged in the USB into the computer, all the sites can be accessed within just a few seconds.

A side advantage is that our team has developed an encryption technology, which prevents tracking the ip address of the computer we are using, to maintain our online data privacy and security.

This  has turned into a major security for virtually everybody as we are now all at risks of being spied over by authorities or even hackers when we are using computers or going online. They can see the web sites we are visiting and the things we are writing, even what we are doing is perfectly legal.

Your ISP knows everything you have done online, who may report to government authorities on your activities. Hackers can use your IP address to trace your personal information such as street address and phone number. 

 However, our encryption technology enables our VPN USB to act as an IP shield so no matter where you go online, your real IP address cannot be traced. They can only get the IP address of our server.  Hackers are therefore prevented from stealing your personal information or launching attacks against your IP address.

I am now going online and writing in Kuala Lumpur, and my ip address can be tracked online  as shown below.

Now I plug our USB into my laptop, and my real ip address is masked and changed to another ip in Hong Kong immediately as shown below.

Accordingly, we are able to surf the Web anonymously with privacy, security and peace of mind. 

Currently, this USB is only for the use of our own team. However, we have received a lot of requests from our customers and friends who are interested to get one or more for their use and their company's. So this sparks the idea of making this device commercially available for everyone. To make this possible, we need to subscribe for more dedicated servers, and upgrade encryption technology for more widespread use. Currently, this USB can only be used for Win7 operating system. We will need to develop new USB for Win8, and also for Mac in the near future, if there is sufficient demand.

So we appeal to your contribution to enable us to complete this project to help make the Web safer and more secure, not just for our benefits, but also to protect the data privacy and security of all our families and young children as we can't live without going online in this era of the Great Internet.

Wait, we need a brand name for this USB. What about "Faceoff VPN" USB? Surfing the Web without showing our face, unless we want to! Sounds good?

UPDATE as at March 3, 2015

One backer asked me whether this device can access banned sites in schools and offices. While I have not personally tried this out, I have consulted my tech team and they replied in the affirmative, as sites are banned only with the server they are using to access the banned sites. However, this USB will change the original server to our server automatically, and our server can access any sites.

FAQs

story:
While reading this please think about how much you don't care about $5 and how much you hate revenge porn. Given how recent this problem is politicians are mostly a generation away from understanding the issue or how to address it. We have to do it for them. What do you have to lose? 

 

https://www.facebook.com/technocratic.solution...

 

The major impact of this is political. This is a three part global campaign to end revenge porn in any democracy. Simply, we will:

1. Create an app that meets the legal requirements of "beyond all reasonable doubt" so that anyone who takes a photo of a screen will be convicted.

2. Through the awareness garnered creating the app and the fact that it is free, take up a large portion of the market and have mass usage.

3. Help push for criminalisation in any democracy by notifying all users of who introduces any bill to criminalise and which way their local representative in the lower house and state representatives in the upper house (or local political equivalent) voted.

 

This problem became a serious issue when I was a teenager and I've seen friends have their lives shattered with no justice. In most of the country and the world this is still not a criminal offence and it remains hard to convict where it is. I am hoping to end the latter and do what I can for the former. Which will be a lot if the app is built.

 

The app will be using some of the best encryption software in the world. As open source it has been worked at from every angle with everyone being able to see the code. The project it is based on (Truecrypt) was audited a year after it was discontinued and they could not find any holes in it. We'll be using a project that kept working on that code. To open the app you will need to use your fingerprint if your phone can scan it or, if it can't or you cut up a lot of lemons, take a photo of your face (with the eyes open) as well as putting in a code. Whoever sends a photo will be able to add additional security like having to put in a randomly generated code that is sent to your email every time you open the photo. We will also be talking to google about having websites that host revenge porn being regularly indexed so that you can reverse image search your photos to see if they've been leaked. There will also be the option to switch your face for a selection that come with the app.

 

As for the money. We are asking for a lot but these things cost a lot. The complexity of the features I have come up with so far has meant that the app could cost into the hundreds of thousands of dollars and I keep coming up with, and having to write down, more features while I'm trying to go to sleep. We will also be seeking further legal advice during the development to make sure the convictions are as clean as possible. This crowdfund is to cover the initials costs of guaranteeing the app. A Kickstarter campaign will be launched in the near future to raise a further $400,000 to cover server and maintenance costs for five to ten years.

 

As for the perks, I don't have a whole lot to offer but I am offering what I can (requests will be considered).

 

This project is relatively risk-free. This technology is a necessity so I am confident that one way or another we can get it made. It's simply a matter of financing and a little creativity. And ultimately, this is an incredibly cheap way to stop this level of harm. We could see the end of almost all of it within six months to a year.

 

So please, share the campaign online. Give what you can spare. Tell everyone you know about it. And help me make the world a happier and less vile place.

 

UPDATES:

- People in the industry have told me that normally when you create an app you have to keep all ideas confidential till the launch because patenting laws hardly apply here and others will steal your idea. I just want to say that I know, I read economics (for fun, by the way). This technology is a necessity and I have every intention of creating competition around this idea. I also have every intention of winning that competition.

 

- When we're referring to it being unhackable we're not referring to an advanced persistent threat (APT). We're referring more to keyboard warriors than teams of engineers. But the servers we're looking at protect billions of dollars worth of information and have never been hacked, so we're fairly confident. And for the phone itself. The app will lock after a week of not being updated. The android and iOS hacks that people use to control the root of their phones are usually two software updates behind, so we just have to make sure the app can't be opened anywhere near the OS being that old.

story:
Choice of Available Colors....


Blue Rolopower Prototype


On your next trip, take a Rolopower Carry-on bag with you and we promise that your phone will never run out of battery again.....EVER!

See all those people that are bogged down in airport lounges, crowded around the outlets charging their phones? Do you want to elbow your way around them? Do you want to fight for an outlet just to have to sit down to recharge? 

FORGET IT! Its bad enough that you are going to have to sit in a tight airplane seat next to a total stranger.

Rolopower has a unique USB power generating and storage technology. There are no moving gears or parts, so there is no drag.  It has been specifically designed to fit inside each wheel of the base trolley. So you have not one, but two dynamos for extra power and efficiency. They do not take up any of the valuable space inside the bag.



NO GEARS OR MOVING PARTS

Direct Drive Technology

The way it works:

When you pull the Rolopower carry-on, the wheels rotate and immediately start generating electric power. This power is then stored in a large internal battery which is capable of recharging your phone several times.This way you can charge your phone anytime, even when you are not walking.

You can also recharge the battery externally using a powered USB connection.

With a press of a button you can easily see the level of charge left in the internal battery. Also the LEDs will light up when you walk indicating that power is being generated and stored.



Whenever you need to recharge you phone, simply plug it in Rolopower USB port and continue on your journey.


There is a convenient phone holder on top of the bag with a see through cover. This way you can plug your phone in and let it charge while you walk. The clear cover allows you to easily see if you have a call or a message.



Rolopower works with all types and sizes of phones.You can also charge any USB rechargeable device - phones, tablets, or eBook readers too!


SMART CONNECTED APP

Rolopower is really SMART. It comes with a free mobile app that connects with the Carry-on via Bluetooth. You can monitor the internal battery, your walking max/current/average speed. You can also keep track of the distance covered, distance to full charge and other smart features.

You will also need to know the distance you covered and upload it to our website if you wish to join the Rolopower Challenge... More about that later...

And for those smart geeks out there like ourselves, we decided to add the ability to check the status of each generator such as the RPM and voltage being generated. We thought it would be a nice engineering touch!

STAY TUNED! WE WILL BE INTRODUCING A LOT OF EXCITING NEW FEATURES TO THE APP.

With Rolopower carry-on bag you can continue walking past all of the crowds and head straight to your gate, take a stroll or do your last minute shopping. A bit of walking before a long flight is good for you and helps the time pass more quickly.

DUMP all the external batteries, power banks, chargers or other fancy bags with internal batteries. WHY? Because all batteries eventually run out of juice and need to be plugged into a power outlet. You don't have time for this, and no one wants the frustration of a dead battery! With the Rolopower carry-on, you have an endless power source at your disposal.

Go to your gate sooner with a charged phone.

RETAIN your mobility. It is called a mobile phone after all. It is supposed to keep you mobile. This is true except for when it needs to be recharged, then it has to stay plugged into an outlet with you babysitting it. Well now you have green power generation at your disposal that will keep you and your phone mobile again.

Lets face it, airports are getting bigger and bigger and terminals are getting longer and longer. Why not use all that energy in walking for a useful purpose? Why not convert that green energy to charge our power-hungry mobile devices?

Also, after using many same-old boring carry-on bags and luggage, we thought "why not come up with an innovative, smart, stylish and modern design".

By combining an ingenious USB charging power features and stylish designs the ROLOPOWER idea was born.



Next time you go to the airport stop searching for that elusive power outlet. You don't need it!


Rolopower can come in a number of unique color accents once we hit our first stretch goal.

We are not calling it Rolopower innovative just because it can generate power and recharge your phone. Wait until you see the new features we want to add when we reach some of our stretch goals! You will see how truly innovative Rolopower really can be!!  More on Stretch Goals later!

GET your very own ROLOPOWER NOW at an INCREDIBLE pre retail price.

LIMITED QUANTITIES

Each carry on comes with;
  • Stylish 21" carry-on luggage
  • USB power generation wheels with choice of accent color (accent color dependent on reaching our first stretch goal)
  • Large internal battery
  • Power USB port
  • External Power Recharge USB port. 
  • LED internal battery charge level indicators
  • Convenient phone holder and cover
  • Mobile App to monitor battery level, speed, distance, RPM, voltage, and much much more...

REFFERAL PROGRAM

Refer as many people as you can and get your own ROLOPOWER!!
During our campaign we are running a referral program and offering rewards to the top 5 referrers. 
When you make your contribution, you will be prompted to refer to other contacts. We will be tracking the referrals and at the end of the campaign will select the top 5 who will each receive their very own Rolopower absolutely free!

What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $50,000 to get us to the next level in our prototyping and manufacturing process.

In return, you will get the next generation, stylish and most unique carry-on. Each carry-on comes with the dual direct drive wheel charging trolley with convenient phone holder and cover, LED charge level for the internal battery, mobile app to monitor voltage, rpm and battery level, plus more advanced features. With your generous help, we'll be able to make these carry-ons as high quality as possible.


The Impact

Combining charging power features and stylish designs  gave birth to the Rolopower idea.

Also, we are not calling it innovative just because it can generate power and recharge your phone, but wait until you see what new features we want to add when we reach some of our stretch goals! You will see how truly innovative Rolopower really is!!

Risks & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. Thus, during our manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our factory to make sure that everything is up to our very high standards. We recognize that this might result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, and we find it very important to make sure that these are shipped in a timely matter, but we will prioritize quality. Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on throughout the process so there will be no surprises. 

FAQ

When will the new features be added?

Depending on reaching certain milestones in our campaign we will be introducing new features listed above PLUS OTHERS....

Will Rolopower work with all type and size smart phones?

YES, Rolopower is equipped with a power USB port that can recharge any type or size phone. Simpy use your normal USB charging cable that came with your phone.

How can I buy more than one Carry-on?

Simply multiply the amount of your pledge by the number of cases you want. Also, you need to multiply the shipping costs as well.

How can I select the color of the Carry-on?

Upon reaching our first stretch goal, you will be able to select the color of your case from a choice of four; Blue, Red, Orange and Green. We will be sending out email notices to all our contributors to ask them for their color selections.

Can I recharge the internal battery from an external power source?

YES, Rolopower is equipped with a separate recharge USB port. so you can recharge the internal battery using an external power source.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn Rolopower into a reality by sharing this campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons and  let the world know about our awesome Rolopower. 

There are still more ways you can help...Continue to follow us here and on facebook and twitter for more updates and info.

    Thank you for reading our campaign!
story_txt:
Choice of Available Colors....

Blue Rolopower Prototype




On your next trip, take a Rolopower Carry-on bag with you and we promise that your phone will never run out of battery again.....EVER!



See all those people that are bogged down in airport lounges, crowded around the outlets charging their phones? Do you want to elbow your way around them? Do you want to fight for an outlet just to have to sit down to recharge? 
FORGET IT! Its bad enough that you are going to have to sit in a tight airplane seat next to a total stranger.

Rolopower has a unique USB power generating and storage technology. There are no moving gears or parts, so there is no drag.  It has been specifically designed to fit inside each wheel of the base trolley. So you have not one, but two dynamos for extra power and efficiency. They do not take up any of the valuable space inside the bag.





NO GEARS OR MOVING PARTS

Direct Drive Technology

The way it works:
When you pull the Rolopower carry-on, the wheels rotate and immediately start generating electric power. This power is then stored in a large internal battery which is capable of recharging your phone several times.This way you can charge your phone anytime, even when you are not walking.
You can also recharge the battery externally using a powered USB connection.


With a press of a button you can easily see the level of charge left in the internal battery. Also the LEDs will light up when you walk indicating that power is being generated and stored.




Whenever you need to recharge you phone, simply plug it in Rolopower USB port and continue on your journey.


There is a convenient phone holder on top of the bag with a see through cover. This way you can plug your phone in and let it charge while you walk. The clear cover allows you to easily see if you have a call or a message.



Rolopower works with all types and sizes of phones.You can also charge any USB rechargeable device - phones, tablets, or eBook readers too!



SMART CONNECTED APP



Rolopower is really SMART. It comes with a free mobile app that connects with the Carry-on via Bluetooth. You can monitor the internal battery, your walking max/current/average speed. You can also keep track of the distance covered, distance to full charge and other smart features.
You will also need to know the distance you covered and upload it to our website if you wish to join the Rolopower Challenge... More about that later...
And for those smart geeks out there like ourselves, we decided to add the ability to check the status of each generator such as the RPM and voltage being generated. We thought it would be a nice engineering touch!
STAY TUNED! WE WILL BE INTRODUCING A LOT OF EXCITING NEW FEATURES TO THE APP.



With Rolopower carry-on bag you can continue walking past all of the crowds and head straight to your gate, take a stroll or do your last minute shopping. A bit of walking before a long flight is good for you and helps the time pass more quickly.
DUMP all the external batteries, power banks, chargers or other fancy bags with internal batteries. WHY? Because all batteries eventually run out of juice and need to be plugged into a power outlet. You don't have time for this, and no one wants the frustration of a dead battery! With the Rolopower carry-on, you have an endless power source at your disposal.
Go to your gate sooner with a charged phone.
RETAIN your mobility. It is called a mobile phone after all. It is supposed to keep you mobile. This is true except for when it needs to be recharged, then it has to stay plugged into an outlet with you babysitting it. Well now you have green power generation at your disposal that will keep you and your phone mobile again.
Lets face it, airports are getting bigger and bigger and terminals are getting longer and longer. Why not use all that energy in walking for a useful purpose? Why not convert that green energy to charge our power-hungry mobile devices?
Also, after using many same-old boring carry-on bags and luggage, we thought "why not come up with an innovative, smart, stylish and modern design".
By combining an ingenious USB charging power features and stylish designs the ROLOPOWER idea was born.



Next time you go to the airport stop searching for that elusive power outlet. You don't need it!





Rolopower can come in a number of unique color accents once we hit our first stretch goal.
We are not calling it Rolopower innovative just because it can generate power and recharge your phone. Wait until you see the new features we want to add when we reach some of our stretch goals! You will see how truly innovative Rolopower really can be!!  More on Stretch Goals later!


GET your very own ROLOPOWER NOW at an INCREDIBLE pre retail price.
LIMITED QUANTITIES

Each carry on comes with;



Stylish 21" carry-on luggage
USB power generation wheels with choice of accent color (accent color dependent on reaching our first stretch goal)
Large internal battery
Power USB port
External Power Recharge USB port. 
LED internal battery charge level indicators
Convenient phone holder and cover
Mobile App to monitor battery level, speed, distance, RPM, voltage, and much much more...


REFFERAL PROGRAM

Refer as many people as you can and get your own ROLOPOWER!!


During our campaign we are running a referral program and offering rewards to the top 5 referrers. 
When you make your contribution, you will be prompted to refer to other contacts. We will be tracking the referrals and at the end of the campaign will select the top 5 who will each receive their very own Rolopower absolutely free!


What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $50,000 to get us to the next level in our prototyping and manufacturing process.

In return, you will get the next generation, stylish and most unique carry-on. Each carry-on comes with the dual direct drive wheel charging trolley with convenient phone holder and cover, LED charge level for the internal battery, mobile app to monitor voltage, rpm and battery level, plus more advanced features. With your generous help, we'll be able to make these carry-ons as high quality as possible.







The Impact

Combining charging power features and stylish designs  gave birth to the Rolopower idea.Also, we are not calling it innovative just because it can generate power and recharge your phone, but wait until you see what new features we want to add when we reach some of our stretch goals! You will see how truly innovative Rolopower really is!!

Risks & Challenges We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. Thus, during our manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our factory to make sure that everything is up to our very high standards. We recognize that this might result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, and we find it very important to make sure that these are shipped in a timely matter, but we will prioritize quality. Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on throughout the process so there will be no surprises.
