When will the new features be added?
Depending on reaching certain milestones in our campaign we will be introducing new features listed above PLUS OTHERS....
Will Rolopower work with all type and size smart phones?
YES, Rolopower is equipped with a power USB port that can recharge any type or size phone. Simpy use your normal USB charging cable that came with your phone.
How can I buy more than one Carry-on?
Simply multiply the amount of your pledge by the number of cases you want. Also, you need to multiply the shipping costs as well.
How can I select the color of the Carry-on?
Upon reaching our first stretch goal, you will be able to select the color of your case from a choice of four; Blue, Red, Orange and Green. We will be sending out email notices to all our contributors to ask them for their color selections.
Can I recharge the internal battery from an external power source?
YES, Rolopower is equipped with a separate recharge USB port. so you can recharge the internal battery using an external power source.

Other Ways You Can Help

 
There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn Rolopower into a reality by sharing this campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons and  let the world know about our awesome Rolopower. 
There are still more ways you can help...Continue to follow us here and on facebook and twitter for more updates and info.
 

Thank you for reading our campaign!

story:
Introducing: Fledging Shell 

The world's FIRST portable NVMe SSD compatible with USB ports.

Shell is great for accessing and storing large amounts of individual files and programs that hard drives and SATA drives can’t handle well. Ideal for programmers, researchers, photographers, gamers, and those looking to condense their most precious memories onto one insanely quick, insanely accessible portable solid state drive that uses cutting edge storage solution technology.  

Transfer 15GB of data in 16 seconds - 1GB/s average speed!

Up to 10x speed of external HDD and 2x speed of portable SSDs*  

*Tested on an Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch 2017. Only devices with USB 3.1 10Gbps or Thunderbolt 3 port can achieve this speed. Normal USB 3.0 5Gbps ports are capped at 500 MB/s in read and write speed. To ensure the best performance please check your devices specifications.

Shell is compatible with everything 

 PC, Mac, Smart TV*, Android Phones**, gaming consoles*** - you name it! 

* Tested on Sharp LC-55Q7030U using FAT32 file format.

** Tested on Oneplus 5

*** Tested on Xbox One

Active cooling for data safety

Using our active cooling solutions, Shell will protect the safety of your data. The optimal operating temperature of SSDs are usually below 70°C. Comparable products often burn the SSDs inside with 90+°C heat. By staying cool, the lifespan of the SSD inside your Shell will dramatically increase and your data will stay safe.  

Backers will receive one Fledging Shell (SSD capacity dependent on tier), a USB-C to USB-C cable, a USB-C to USB 3.1 cable, and a small & cute Phillips screwdriver.  

Domestic shipping is free. Customer pays international shipping and customs, calculated at checkout.    

We've already begun shipping out orders for Shell!

We're Fledging - a startup based in Birmingham, Alabama that specializes in storage solutions for Macs and PCs. 

Starting with internal storage solutions, Fledging’s products have served 2,200 customers in 70 countries across 6 continents. Validated by our legendary 100% positive feedback rating, we firmly believe that customer satisfaction is the best path to achieve our mission of making premium electronics for everyone.

Check us out at fledging.net!   

*This list is inclusive. We've tested the drives above and we've verified that they work with Shell. All M.2 2280, 2260, 2242, 2230 NVMe SSDs should work.

Risks and challenges

Nothing makes customers happier than delivering premium products on time. We have already established a stable manufacturing pipeline with the capacity of 1,000 units per month.

After beta testing Shell with our customers for three months, we’ve progressed through multiple iterations. Thanks to feedback from our users, we’ve created the best version yet and it’s finally ready for you.

We believe that you will be thoroughly impressed!

story:
The latest MacBook Pro only offer USB-C Charging with traditional cable to charge our New MacBook Pro.

Don’t you think your MacBook Pro Deserve a better charging experience?

 

By becoming a backer of this campaign and choosing a reward, you will be pre-ordering one of our new Smart Snap Adapters. Aside from getting a huge special early backer discount, you'll also be one of the first in the world to own it.

We're a Product Development Company based in Hong Kong that is backed only by ourselves. We have no external investors. Instead we launch products through the magic of crowd funding. The funds raised here will not only go towards manufacturing, they will also help us to design future products.

If you have any questions please email help@elementlab-intl.com and we will respond within 48 business hours.

 

 

 

The Smart Snap is safe and simple connects to all your USB-C devices.

1. Insert the tip into the port of your device, which stays connected securely.

2. Attach the Smart Snap Body to your existing USB-C cable

3. The Smart Snap will magnetically connect when placed near the tip

4. Once its connected the LED will lite up

Now your Smart Snap works for MacBook Pro 2017 and USB-C devices with the charging status LED at a glance.

               

            

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have the solution for you to change the charging experience on your MacBook Pro 2017

We designed Smart Snap to have reversible connector and this will ensure precise connection every time with 1 hand free and no more trouble of tip not position in the correctly. With the design of 0.65mm ball head along  with 3+3 gold plated, this allows the connection to be reversible and ensure high current charging comply with Power Delivery Fast Charge.

The Tip of the Smart Snap prevent dust and dirt from entering. By leaving the tip in MacBook Pro 2017, it will also extend the life of your port from the normal wear and tear of cables being inserted and pulled out on a daily basis.

 

 

 

Full CNC Aluminum Casing

Fine Sandblast and anodizing

Super lightweight 4g

Strong magnetic force pull weight up to 400g

LED indicator – shows charging status at a glance

Max power 4.3A compatible Comply with power delivery standard (MacBook Pro fast charge friendly)

Compatible with all USB-C devices. 

Best connectivity with 6 gold plated pogo pin design

Diameter 0.65mm ball head pogo pin design allows more stable charging 

Locate properly Reversible connection (no orientation concern)

                         

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Smart Snap will soon start following international certifications and ensure the acquired before shipping.

 

 

 

 

Please support us by selecting a perk !

 

 

The top-quality manufacturing is ready to start production! With your help, we will be able to meet the requirement of minimum orders to start production.

Pledge now and help us spread the words, together we will bring Smart Snap to the consumers and market and of course your hands!

 

 

If our shipping provider attempts to deliver to your address and the package is returned because of any of these reasons, there will be a reshipping fee: no-one is available to receive the package, the location is not accessible, you've provided the wrong address or you have moved without notifying us before the delivery dispatch.

If you have any questions please email the Customer Friendly Team on help@elementlab-intl.com and we will respond within 48 business hours.

story:
Hello, my name is Edward and I want to tell you a short story.  Several years ago, my business partner, Jeff, was frustrated trying to find a cell phone stand that worked well for all phones, was easy to use, was flexible and could be easily taken with you.  He finally gave up looking outside and looked within and created the uBond cell phone stand and holder.  His years as a professional engineer allowed him to design something that was sleek and practical and incorporated the cutting edge technology of micro-suction cells to eliminate the need for messy adhesives.  

Our goal from the beginning was to make peoples’ lives a little bit better, a litter bit easier and with our constant use of our cell phones, creating a solution to reduce dropped phones and cramped hands from awkwardly holding your phone was a big one for us. 

But that was only half the equation, we wanted a stand that would work on all phones and stay put when you put it down.  We also wanted something that you could put in your pocket or toss in your purse and take it with you so you weren’t always searching for something to prop up your phone.

With your support, we will get our first manufacturing run of the uBond to market and you’ll receive the last phone stand and holder that you will ever need.  We have our prototypes ready and are set to begin manufacturing in quantity so we are offering the uBond in numerous configurations and at great introductory pricing!

Pick your favorite color for the flexible hand strap, get one or choose the more cost effective 2 pack.  If you want them for your family, there’s the family pack of 5 with 5 different colors so nobody takes your uBond.  Heck, we even have corporate packages for your team and your marketing department and we can even do custom laser engraving with your logo.  Did I mention that most of our packages include free world-wide shipping?  No, well, they do!

In addition to creating the molds and producing the uBond in quantity, we are also pursuing our patent applications in many countries around the world so you can always be assured that you are getting the original uBond.  With your support, we can make uBond the most popular cell phone stand and holder in the market, but it takes that first step.  Your support can be something as easy as sharing this video and our campaign or liking our Facebook page or tagging us on Pinterest or sharing our video clips on Instagram. 

Thanks for your support.

story:
In case you missed my current campaign on Kickstarter, here's your second chance ;-)

1.5 years after the first successful campaign for the original GPIO Card Extended there is now a revised and improved version!

Why

In the last time I've worked a lot with the card and I can say it is working perfectly!

But, yes but...

... how to remove the card?

Disconnect all cables and then plug them in again without help? Not really, right? Bullshit!

I know the example is simple and easy... ;-) But what when you have 10 or more wires to connect?

While I was thinking about - the brilliant idea came... Why must be holes on the sides?

Slots should work as well...

What

So I developed a new version of the GPIO Card Extended! With slots...

Now you can pull the card out to the side without removing the cables

The rest remained unchanged. That means the card can still be used in all conceivable configurations... With headers on top, on bottom and as well with old 26 pin and new 40 pin headers. And also not only with Raspberry Pi...

So the GPIO Card Extended V2 was born :-)   For sure a good reason to start a new campaign and worth to share it with you!

History

If you don't know the original version and want more information please see the description under the following links:

  • https://gpiocard.ch/ks-projects/gpio-card-extended
  • https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/stefan-rossbach/quickstarter-gpio-card-extended-not-new-but-differ

Since the stretch goal was reached in the initial campaign the GPIO Card Extended V2 is available in green/white and black/gold!

Delivery

At the moment everything is very slow...  So delivery can take up to 3 month :-( This is the reason why I set the delivery date to December... If it is not possible to ship to your country due to restrictions I will contact you directly to discuss the best solution for you.

I plan to ship in October, but see above...

If you need more boards please contact me with your needs ;-)

And if you want to share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram... I would be very glad!

story:
What is Proactive Touch

Proactive Touch service is a cloud based program used for customer review of a product, service, branch, employee or whole brand.

Our mission with Proactive Touch is to raise service/product quality awareness and help management with their businesses.

  

Quick Facts: 

1. Customer rates product by pressing predefined icon

2. Clarifies its response by choosing predefined answer or answers

  

3. The results are shown in real time on a user interface


4. Promotional messages (video or pictures) are available when system is idle



Touch:

& evaluate product


Touch:

& evaluate service


Touch:

& evaluate employee



Results:

satisfaction report in REAL TIME



Responses are automatically generated and contain graphical statistical details.

The report can be exported as .xml file and can be analyzed as key performance indicator (KPI) and delivered straight to management.



Proactive Touch:

whenever - wherever


Results can be checked via any mobile device, laptop, computer or tablet, all you need is a internet connection.

Be proactive, know your product or service value whenever, wherever.


It is:

your touch


Change your wallpaper, font, color and set of icons to match you brand colors.

There, put your own logo now! 


Connectivity:

works with Android devices via Wifi or Mobile Network connection


We need you:

We have designed, programmed, and tested Proactive Touch service. 

In order to proceed to next step and make it available on Android and iOS devices, we need to create final version and test it on recent iOS and Windows based devices available on the market.

Though we have big ambitions, we are a small company and we don`t have the capacity to finance production of unique stands and holders. Therefore, one of our biggest concerns is making unique and modern designed stands, casing and holders for device to complete our product. This will take most of our time and money to create best and yet affordable solution.

This is where you come in. You can help us to develop and finalize product which we can deliver to our customers. Your support will make this possible.

We appreciate your involvement! We are Touched!



Perks

Founder Sticker

Have your name permanently placed onto the memory wall in our office. Be part of history.

Touching the World

Great looking, wooden/PVC, remote hand on stick. Great for remote control of your devices, room lights, picking nose or whatever you think is suitable.  :) Free Shipping within EU Countries. (Additional $15 for International Shipping).



                                           

We are inspired

We are inspired by technology and invested all our knowledge, expertise and positivity in innovations and quick solutions made with passion.

Proactive Touch is our success.

Our mission with Proactive Touch is to raise service/product quality awareness and help management with their businesses.

Ways you can also help

Whether you donate to our campaign or not, you can still help us to achieve. And we thank you for that.

·  Ask your local store (service, retail...) to take a look at our product.

·  Share this via email

·  Spread the word on Facebook or Twitter. Don`t be shy! :)

·  Stay connected. Send us your opinion via proactive-media.hr contact form.


Tech specs

Software

— Testing on operating system: Android 4.0 and higher
— Full screen
— Screen, buttons and menu lock
— Screensaver support (video, slideshow, webpage)

— Developing iOS version


- On completion -

— Any Android or iOS device 

3 Holders and stands – Display, Floor and Desk




____________________________________________

Press

Please email touch@proactive-media.hr for more information.


Have some questions?

What colors are available on Proactive Touch?

Any color. You can change wallpaper, font, color and set of icons to match you brand colors. You can even put your own logo! :)

How many devices with Proactive Touch can one location have?

It is really up to store space and needs. You can have one device for each product or employee if you wish.

Who can review collected data from my devices?

Statistical data can only be seen by administrator and appointed user accounts. Every appointed account have specific view/edit rights on device or data chosen by admin.

What if device is idle for some time?

You can choose screen to be on/off, run promotional video or picture until touched.

What if someone didn't make the rating all the way?

If someone did not press OK after the rating proccess, the screen will self refresh in time decided by admin (1, 2, 3, 4, 5,....10...30..sec).

If we need to stop using Proactive Touch on our devices, can devices work normally ?

Absolutely! All devices can be used without Proactive Touch and be reactivated by admin in a matter of seconds!

Is Proactive Touch easy to use?

Very! All features and admin panel is intiutive, user friendly and easy to use! Responses are formulated in graphical statistical details and easy to read, with an option to export in more detailed xml statistical data.

What's your plan for iOS support?

Some of the features are available only for Android due to lock screen option. It is in our plan to make Proactive Touch available on all devices, even TV`s!

Oops! I forgot to add international shipping! What should I do?

Please contribute the shipping amount ($15) and select no perk (or International Shipping perk). We will match your contributions.

I want to upgrade my perk

Please contribute the difference and select no perk. We will match up your contribution to the correct perk and will confirm after the campaign.

Other questions or problems?

Please contact touch@proactive-media.hr.

story:
Short Summary
Fluky Chat is an application that allows anonymous chatting between all users throughout the world. Fluky Chat also offers a trending area, allowing users to see what is trending and then go talk about it with each others. This application is a fun, safe way to talk to people all over the world anonymously. This application has already been developed and we are reaching out looking for funds for marketing, design, and to enhance our backend. 

What We Need & What You Get
We are looking for funding to help market the Fluky Chat app across a broad audience. Also, funding will go towards review and re-design by world class designers, and to create a stronger backend for our users. 

// Level 1: Your name on the "Contributors List" on our website!

// Level 2: Your name on the "Contributors List" on our website and app!

// Level 3: Both Level 1 & Level 2, and a Fluky Chat t-shirt!

// Level 4: Level 1 - Level 3 & your own chat room for 1 week!

// Level 5: Check Perk Levels 

// Level 6: Check Perk Levels

The Impact

Fluky Chat delivers a way to let users talk safely and speak their mind without any judgment. Fluky Chat makes sure that users are safe, and know that their data will not be sold, tampered or used for the financial gain of the Developers. All of Fluky Chats data is removed from the server once both users leave that specific room. 

One major thing this funding will help create is a way to break the language barrier by allowing our users to see the translated version of chatssent from other countries. With this feature who knows what could happen to the news industry, and the benefits that this will bring.  

Another feature this app has in a future update is the ability to create your own anonymous chat rooms. With this feature users can tell others to join in, not only can they chat but as soon as they leave all of the messages are gone! No more people snooping on your messages, or people spying on what your saying! All messages are deleted once you leave the room!

There are not many websites and currently no apps that have the same concepts fluky chat delivers. We care about our users and know how important it is for them to keep their children safe and their selves safe from others that may try to harm them. Our app offers a mature language filter; with this filter users cannot see any foul language or anything that we may find offensive to them. 

We do not allow images to be sent to others.

Our app allows users to not only talk to one user but multiple users at one time. How can you tell whom you’re talking to? With their preset color that the user currently has set on their device. 

Risks & Challenges

There are currently no risks or challenges with delivering this product. The product has already been developed and is in beta. We are looking for funding for marketing and for future development costs. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this with friends!

Email us flukychat@gmail.com for any questions, concerns, or general information.

If you have an idea that you would like to add into the app feel free to let us know!

If you have a skill that may be useful to use, feel free to let us know we are looking for new and creative people!

story:
Hi, We are ZapdoMedia and we need your help!

We are developing the fun and addicting app called ‘Tree Trauma’ 


What is ‘Tree Trauma’? 

Tree Trauma is a mobile app where you play as a squirrel, trying to climb a tree. Sounds simple? not quite, while climbing the tree you have to move from left to right and right to left to avoid falling apples. Pick up your IOS device and get ready because tree trauma will be jumping its way into the Apple app store by the end of April! Rack up a high score, Try out each character and get your reaction speed up because once you start playing this fun and addicting you’ll never stop! Want to give it a try? Currently Tree Trauma is in its late stages of development but we currently don’t have the resources to get the necessary licences and software to finish it off. Even a donation of $1 will help us finish this app and get it published to the Apple App Store as soon as possible. Not hooked yet? be sure to watch the video above to get a sneak peak at whats to come!




Why Indiegogo? 

Developing games and apps, even small ones take time and money. You need software for programming, graphics and licences to put the app on the App Store. Since ZapdoMedia is a small company we do not have funding for a large amount of these products. Tree Trauma will be free on the App Store, and the only revenue we will earn is a small amount from advertising in the game. Although we don’t want to have to put adverts in the game, even with the Indiegogo campaign we still need funding to continue development of Tree Trauma to insure there are regular updates and to keep our small company alive. We really hope you can help with the creation of this game by contributing to this campaign. 


Who are ‘ZapdoMedia’?

ZapdoMedia is a small start-up game and app development company based in the UK. Started by Olly Namey and Ben Charter with the aim to turn it into one of the largest game development companies! Unfortunately we do not have the time or money to get this company off the ground. Currently we have no offices and can only work on developing games part time. But thats set to change! Every donation towards this campaign helps us dedicate more time a resources to this company and the games we are producing! 



Only IOS?

Currently ’Tree Trauma’ is in development for IOS. As much as we would love to release the app on android as well currently this is not possible since we do not have the resources. But this is not set in stone, If the campaign and release of ‘Tree Trauma’ is successful we hope to be able to develop and release an android version.

story:
We are pleased to introduce BBC: Big Black Cable exclusively to the Indiegogo audience.

When it comes to performing that bothersome charge, make sure you have the quality, big, black, and Apple certified cable to fulfill and satisfy all charging needs. 

BBC: Big Black Cable features the following:

  • 100% Apple Certified Cable (chemistry of champions)

  • 10ft. long cable with high quality 38% thicker coiling (long ongoing enhancement)

  • Black TRU color braiding to reduce cable tears and improve durability (Boost thickness)

  • Machined black steel tips (sleek for heightened arousal)

Used daily, BBC: Big Black Cable along with an iPhone, iPad, and/or iPod can contribute to an extremely satisfying and unprecedented confidence in your charging experience.




FREE U.S. SHIPPING ON ALL PERKS!!! Canada $8 Other International $12 

As special thanks, any campaign funders that also share the campaign on Facebook and/or Twitter will also receive a FREE iWoody Premium USB Wall Charger with your BBC: Big Black Cable(s).





Currently, we foresee the timeline to deliver the final product with original art packaging within 60 days after completion of this campaign. Any changes or future challenges we will keep the team and updated. We sincerely appreciate your help and support.



Sharing is caring at www.commachargers.com

Share our YouTube video, please:

Here is YouTube Video


Like us on Facebook, please:

       

Here is Facebook Page


Remember, when you share our video to tell your friends, "I WANT A BIG BLACK CABLE (BBC)!"

story:
Optimal is an ultra-thin, high-end protection case that's designed to keep your smartphone in its ideal operating temperature. By constantly monitoring for temperature shifts and adjusting accordingly, Optimal makes sure your smartphone operates at maximum performance levels during any task or weather conditions. 

Optimal is designed to function as an active extension to your smartphone’s metal chassis and it is specifically planned from the ground up for each phone model by their individual thermal characteristics. The case measures just 5 mm/0.19 inches thin and is equipped with the latest in micro technology. 

To date, Optimal is the smartest way you can protect your smartphone, from the inside out.


__________________________________________________________________________

"Optimal is just one way our devices are getting smarter, cooler and much better in performance levels."- iPhone Life magazine

"Up until now, it has been difficult to find a solution to such problems, though one company has managed to do just that." - Topweb

"A great new product is in the making " - Recognition

"Optimal letting you continue your work without any sudden off or hang of it, due to excess heat" - Technoguide

_____________________________________________________________________________

In addition to Optimal sensors, the case syncs with your smartphone over Bluetooth and constantly analyses the phone's temperature. If it gets too hot, Optimal will cool your phone using the latest technology in micro-fans. These fans help the phone dissipate heat faster and cools down the device before it gets to the point of overheating.

Placing your smartphone in direct sun light will overheat your device to the point it fails. With Optimal case, you can now track and use multiple applications for long hours, your smartphone will never let you down.

At an average temperature of 0°C (32°F), a lithium-ion battery will lose six per cent of its maximum capacity. At 25°C (77°F) degrees that number jumps to 20%. With Optimal’s unique approach, your battery is always kept at recommended operating temperatures. Don't carry bulky battery cases when you can utilize your own battery - in a smart way.

Playing a game requires a lot of resources from your phone’s CPU and graphics engine and heat builds up quickly during highly demanding tasks. Optimal micro fans are strategically placed in order to dissipate heat from key areas and eliminates the risk of overheating (SoC). Optimal case brings Mobile Gaming to a whole new level.

One of the most common effects of cold weather is battery drain. You may notice that your smartphone is losing charge quicker than usual, or it will suddenly go dead. Optimal is designed to sense the slightest temperature drop and will engage Anti-freeze heating coils to make sure your device and battery stays within the safe zone. With Optimal, your smartphone is protected from the cold.

It doesn't matter what the conditions are, have no fear from the elements. Optimal’s unique IP56 certified breather grills blocks fine dust, small particles, rain, snow and water while allowing fresh air movement into the chassis for thermal management operation.

 ____________________________________________________________________________


All the major manufacturers warn about using their smartphones in extreme temperatures and offer operational guidelines. For instance, Apple provides a temperature range of 0 to 35 degree Celsius for their devices and are not covered under warranty if you use it in conditions that are any colder or warmer.

Extreme temperature will affect your smartphone by slowing down overall performance levels, degrading GPU & CPU, Battery lifespan, system shut downs and it could even cause permanent damage.

We believe that in 2015, our smartphones should keep up with our fast paced lives and ever changing weather. We decided to create the most advanced protection case ever made, and we're going to cut no costs in making it.

We approached the problem with the following goals in mind:

Our first mission was to make sure Optimal will allow your smartphone to operate at maximum performance levels and never fails, anywhere you go, in cold or hot climates, and during any task.

We designed Optimal to feel like it is an integrated part of your smartphone, and not just another phone cover. Every component was carefully chosen and tested in order to develop Optimal into a complete effective solution, while keeping it under 5mm.

Optimal can be ordered to fully protect your smartphone in one smart button click, (Ghost) and will only engage protection when sensing a temperature shift that could risk your device. if you are interested in a bit more, you can dive into Optimal dedicated application and control everything from independent fans rpm's to setting your own multiple safe zones.

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________



Smartphones have a very different set of thermal constraints then your PC. If the device’s thermal threshold is suppressed, the SoC begins to throttle back its frequencies, and thus performance in efforts to reduce heat. The proximity of high power components and the material used in your smartphone to dissipate the heat are some of the methods employed by manufacturers to help cool down your device.

Optimal is designed to work in the same manner and function as an active extension to your smartphone metal chassis. Using high thermal conductivity materials, boosted with our dead silent micro-fans and high accuracy sensors, Optimal makes sure your smartphone dissipates heat much faster, and the reason Optimal is designed and can be used on higher-end smartphones models only, that share the same metal chassis design. Optimal system and is incompatible and could never be used for lower-end, plastic or polycarbonate smartphones models.
_____________________________________________________________________________


While all other case manufacturers offer you drop and shock protection, We at Amited choose to take a different approach and create a true protection case, A case that will protect both, the delicate internals components and the external chassis of your smartphone.

_____________________________________________________________________________




_____________________________________________________________________________


At our current stage of development, we are offering Optimal for :

Apple iPhone 5/5s, iPhone 6 and Samsung Galaxy S5*.

with the following Anodized coating colors:

Space grey, Natural silver and Champagne gold.

* Samsung Galaxy S5 back cover should be removed when installing Optimal

 ______________________________________________________________________________________________________


Throughout the campaign and for our Indiegogo backers only, we will offer a limited version of Optimal in Copper. This is the case with the highest efficiency and is the most beautiful out of them all. Optimal in Copper is electronically treated with 3 layers of protective coating to the highest standards, in order to maintain the characteristics and the stunning looks of the case during continuous use.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support Optimal. (select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page)

_____________________________________________________________________________


_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

Everyone at Amited has a single-minded focus to deliver the highest quality case ever made for smartphones. For us to get to this point was very challenging, we've formed an amazing team of  gems around the world and together we've made it happen. We would like to give a special thanks to our friends that took part in this project, engineers, advisers, Optimal pilot testers, rangers, motivators and friends that helped us get here.



Join us at www.amited.com or through our social networks: 

                           

____________________________________________________________________________

Optimal system has been in development under the radar for over a year, the system has undergone extensive environmental testing in different locations in the world, with success.


We are now moving ahead and we're focused on:

  • Finalizing and further optimization of Optimal core system (efficiency)

  • Further optimization of Optimal mobile application (stability, more features, shadow operation)

We will soon begin the process of:

  • Designing packaging

  • Tooling

  • Materials procurement

  • Certificates

  • Production

_____________________________________________________________________________


We are a small company and only have the capacity to finance modest production runs,  placing an order of multiple thousands of Optimal units is beyond our grasp.

This is where you come in. Your support will make this possible and will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with creating the best case ever made for your smartphone. In addition, your support will allow us to continue and develop Optimal system for a wider range of Smartphones and Tablets.



Optimal is not a concept idea, nor a 3D promise. To this date, Optimal is the ultimate in smartphone protection, and when you back this campaign, you be the first to get Optimal for your smartphone. (and we mean it)

_____________________________________________________________________________




What is Optimal?

Optimal is the world's first high-end case designed to protect the internal electronic components of your smartphone from extreme temperatures shifts, excessive use or overclocking. ensuring ideal conditions will result better performance levels, better battery and longer lifespan of your device.

How do I install Optimal on my smartphone?

Optimal is designed to be as simple as it gets. All you have to do is place your smartphone in the case, press the Smart On button and you’re all set.

Will Optimal be available for more phone models?

Yes. We are in continuous development in order to make Optimal available for a wider range of Smartphones. We set a golden rule at Amited, that we will make sure everything is top notch and built to the highest standards. Every new case we design goes through extensive lab & outdoor testing before we can bring it to you. Stay in the loop on our latest updates and progress, sign up for Amited Newsletter @ www.amited.com and we will keep you updated.

Q: Will Optimal compatible with Apple Touch ID?

Yes, Optimal does not interfere with Touch ID functions.

Q: Can I take pictures/use Optimal?

Definitely. Optimal system is guaranteed to meet the full manufacturer’s demands of perfection in design. Special attention was given to the Camera section to make sure no flash glare will stand in your way to get the perfect shot.

Q: Is it waterproof?

Optimal is highly weather resistant, but it is not water submersible.  All Electronics are sealed and protected with our special IP56 certified Breather grills which keeps the elements out while allowing high flow of air into the case chassis. Fine dust, small particles, sand, spilled water, rain & snow are all kept out. 

Q: Does this case reduce Cellphone reception?

No, all Optimal models offer Antenna Cut-Outs in order to allow a healthy TX/RX reception of your smartphone. in most cases, Optimal will not affect service or reception.

Q: Has Optimal been tested?

Yes, Optimal has undergone extensive environmental testing in freezing temperatures, snowboard activities, multitasking and use in extreme heat with success.

What does Optimal includes:

In the box you will get the world’s first active thermal protection case, user manual, Micro-USB charging cable and Optimal Gorilla glass screen protector for your selected model.

Do I have to charge it?

Yes, The Optimal system is powered by an internal high capacity battery and does not require power from your smartphone. Charging is done simply by connecting the supplied Micro USB cable to any normal USB power source.

How long does one charge last for?

It really depends on your activity. Optimal is designed to be operated in Ghost mode throughout its operation and by that saving precious battery life. Optimal will engage the protection needed only when sensing a shift in temperatures, and only when your device will be at risk. 

What is the planned Retail cost for Optimal?

Optimal is designed to be the first truly high-end case for your smartphone. Prices are not final at this stage and we estimate Retail cost of $170 for the US market.

Is there a belt clip?

At the moment, we are not developing a Belt Clip for Optimal, stay tuned for updates via Amited newsletter as we plans to bring the ultimate Extreme kit for Optimal later this year. 





Q: Why Flexible funding?

We decided to go with Flexible funding only because we wanted to give everyone the option to get Optimal. With Flexible funding you have the option to pay via PayPal and you are not limited to CC payments as in a fixed campaign.

Q: How can I choose a color?

We will send a survey after the campaign ends where you will be able to choose your color preferences.

Q: How can I add the $15 for int’l shipping after I’ve already completed my order?

Please email our customer service at support@amited.com and we will assist you asap.

Q: Beyond pricing, is there a difference in the system offered in the early bird vs. non-early bird perks?

No, this is the exact same Optimal Thermal Protection system. The only difference is that early bird gives you the opportunity to buy Optimal at significantly reduced cost and you will be the first to have it.

Q: How can I reach customer service?

Email us at any time support@amited.com

Q: I’m an international backer, do I have to worry about custom charges?

Customs fees vary depending on the country, we would recommend checking with your customs office.

Q: is there a warranty?

Yes. We will provide 1 year limited warranty on the Optimal case assuming you are using the product through the use we recommend. We can’t provide a warranty if you drop your case from the Freedom Tower, but we will however, repair or replace a defective unit at no cost to you.

Q: Do you accept returns?

Unfortunately we do not accept returns from Indiegogo project. You are welcome to cancel your pledge at any point before we ship for a full refund.
story_txt:
Optimal is an ultra-thin, high-end protection case that's designed to keep your smartphone in its ideal operating temperature. By constantly monitoring for temperature shifts and adjusting accordingly, Optimal makes sure your smartphone operates at maximum performance levels during any task or weather conditions. 




Optimal is designed to function as an active extension to your smartphone’s metal chassis and it is specifically planned from the ground up for each phone model by their individual thermal characteristics. The case measures just 5 mm/0.19 inches thin and is equipped with the latest in micro technology. 
To date, Optimal is the smartest way you can protect your smartphone, from the inside out.












__________________________________________________________________________


"Optimal is just
one way our devices are getting smarter, cooler and much better in performance
levels."- iPhone Life magazine
"Up until now, it has been difficult to find a solution to such problems, though one company has managed to do just that." - Topweb


"A great new product is in the making " - Recognition


"Optimal letting you continue your work without any sudden off or hang of it, due to excess heat" - Technoguide




_____________________________________________________________________________


In addition to Optimal sensors, the case syncs with your smartphone over Bluetooth and constantly analyses the phone's temperature. If it gets too hot, Optimal will cool your phone using the latest technology in micro-fans. These fans help the phone dissipate heat faster and cools down the device before it gets to the point of overheating.





Placing your smartphone in direct sun light will overheat your device to the point it fails. With Optimal case, you can now track and use multiple applications for long hours, your smartphone will never let you down.
















At an average temperature of 0°C (32°F), a lithium-ion battery will lose six per cent of its maximum capacity. At 25°C (77°F) degrees that number jumps to 20%. With Optimal’s unique approach, your battery is always kept at recommended operating temperatures. Don't carry bulky battery cases when you can utilize your own battery - in a smart way.




Playing a game requires a lot of resources from your phone’s CPU and graphics engine and heat builds up quickly during highly demanding tasks. Optimal micro fans are strategically placed in order to dissipate heat from key areas and eliminates the risk of overheating (SoC). Optimal case brings Mobile Gaming to a whole new level.


One of the most common effects of cold weather is battery drain. You may notice that your smartphone is losing charge quicker than usual, or it will suddenly go dead. Optimal is designed to sense the slightest temperature drop and will engage Anti-freeze heating coils to make sure your device and battery stays within the safe zone. With Optimal, your smartphone is protected from the cold. 










It doesn't matter what the conditions are, have no fear from the elements. Optimal’s unique IP56 certified breather grills blocks fine dust, small particles, rain, snow and water while allowing fresh air movement into the chassis for thermal management operation. 

 ____________________________________________________________________________







All the major manufacturers warn about using their smartphones in extreme temperatures and offer operational guidelines. For instance, Apple provides a temperature range of 0 to 35 degree Celsius for their devices and are not covered under warranty if you use it in conditions that are any colder or warmer. 
Extreme temperature will affect your smartphone by slowing down overall performance levels, degrading GPU & CPU, Battery lifespan, system shut downs and it could even cause permanent damage.






We believe that in 2015, our smartphones should keep up with our fast paced lives and ever changing weather. We decided to create the most advanced protection case ever made, and we're going to cut no costs in making it.
We approached the problem with the following goals in mind:








Our first mission was to make sure Optimal will allow your smartphone to operate at maximum performance levels and never fails, anywhere you go, in cold or hot climates, and during any task.



We designed Optimal to feel like it is an integrated part of your smartphone, and not just another phone cover. Every component was carefully chosen and tested in order to develop Optimal into a complete effective solution, while keeping it under 5mm.





Optimal can be ordered to fully protect your smartphone in one smart button click, (Ghost) and will only engage protection when sensing a temperature shift that could risk your device. if you are interested in a bit more, you can dive into Optimal dedicated application and control everything from independent fans rpm's to setting your own multiple safe zones.



_____________________________________________________________________________







_____________________________________________________________________________




Smartphones have a very different set of thermal constraints then your PC. If the device’s thermal threshold is suppressed, the SoC begins to throttle back its frequencies, and thus performance in efforts to reduce heat. The proximity of high power components and the material used in your smartphone to dissipate the heat are some of the methods employed by manufacturers to help cool down your device. 









Optimal is designed to work in the same manner and function as an active extension to your smartphone metal chassis. Using high thermal conductivity materials, boosted with our dead silent micro-fans and high accuracy sensors, Optimal makes sure your smartphone dissipates heat much faster, and the reason Optimal is designed and can be used on higher-end smartphones models only, that share the same metal chassis design. Optimal system and is incompatible and could never be used for lower-end, plastic or polycarbonate smartphones models.
_____________________________________________________________________________






While all other case manufacturers offer you drop and shock protection, We at Amited choose to take a different approach and create a true protection case, A case that will protect both, the delicate internals components and the external chassis of your smartphone.



_____________________________________________________________________________







_____________________________________________________________________________








At our current stage of development, we are offering Optimal for : 
Apple iPhone 5/5s, iPhone 6 and Samsung Galaxy S5*. 
with the following Anodized coating colors: 
Space grey, Natural silver and Champagne gold. 





* Samsung Galaxy S5 back cover should be removed when installing Optimal

 ______________________________________________________________________________________________________


Throughout the campaign and for our Indiegogo backers only, we will offer a limited version of Optimal in Copper. This is the case with the highest efficiency and is the most beautiful out of them all. Optimal in Copper is electronically treated with 3 layers of protective coating to the highest standards, in order to maintain the characteristics and the stunning looks of the case during continuous use. 


_____________________________________________________________________________




Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support Optimal. (select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page)










_____________________________________________________________________________















_____________________________________________________________________________





_____________________________________________________________________________


Everyone at Amited has a single-minded focus to deliver the highest quality case ever made for smartphones. For us to get to this point was very challenging, we've formed an amazing team of  gems around the world and together we've made it happen. We would like to give a special thanks to our friends that took part in this project, engineers, advisers, Optimal pilot testers, rangers, motivators and friends that helped us get here.











Join us at www.amited.com or through our social networks: 
                           

____________________________________________________________________________




Optimal system has been in development under the radar for over a year, the system has undergone extensive environmental testing in different locations in the world, with success.
We are now moving ahead and we're focused on: 

Finalizing and further optimization of Optimal core system (efficiency) 
Further optimization of Optimal mobile application (stability, more features, shadow operation)

We will soon begin the process of:

Designing packaging
Tooling
Materials procurement
Certificates
Production



_____________________________________________________________________________




We are a small company and only have the capacity to finance modest production runs,  placing an order of multiple thousands of Optimal units is beyond our grasp.
This is where you come in. Your support will make this possible and will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with creating the best case ever made for your smartphone. In addition, your support will allow us to continue and develop Optimal system for a wider range of Smartphones and Tablets.




Optimal is not a concept idea, nor a 3D promise. To this date, Optimal is the ultimate in smartphone protection, and when you back this campaign, you be the first to get Optimal for your smartphone. (and we mean it)
_____________________________________________________________________________

story:
Please Allow us to Introduce Belooky

Belooky is a virtual image consulting platform that allows individuals to make a free complete makeover, and professionals to benefit from a powerful and unprecedented sales force.

Discover The Secret Of Belooky

How is this possible? By analyzing and automating from beginning to end the image consultant business.

Think Makeover Is Just For Girls?

For whom is Belooky intended? For those (regardless of gender or age) who want to make their appearance better, assert their style and personality, gain self-confidence, find a new job or even increase their seductive potential.

How a Mouse Gave Birth to a Mountain

“The technology pushes each day a little more the limits of what is possible.”

Belooky (www.belooky.com) was born from a desire to share (all services are 100 % free for individuals), and from this simple observation against conventional wisdom: "Makeover responds to scientific rules."

Watching this video, you will learn everything about the great idea that gave birth to Belooky:


Why Belooky will Be your Best Friend

“Each dream deserves to become reality.”

Today, a professional makeover requires not only time but also quite a lot of money. Besides, have you ever dreamed of improving your appearance?

In a society where appearance plays a key role, where consumption is pervasive, Belooky wants to help individuals without any financial compensation, by teaching the image's keys to everybody: a first step towards self-esteem, in personal as professional field. By offering a free professional makeover, Belooky delivers a strong message: “everyone can improve its appearance, just being aware and acting”.

Feeling good about ourself is a top priority, it’s essential for self-confidence and social integration. Looking beautiful allows us to seduce, and that’s also fundamental for our professional career and all our relationships.

Please look at this video and see how Belooky could easily change your life; and let’s talk about tomorrow together!


Imagine Having a Magic Mirror in your Pocket, To Tell you How to Be the Fairest One of All

“The only limit is our imagination”

What looks like a magic trick today, tomorrow can be a reality.

Imagine a totally virtual "Before, After", built after a single scan of your body and face.

Imagine a personal shopper following you everywhere on the web, but also in stores; you know what you like, he knows what fits you.

Imagine that your computer, tablet or mobile screen is a magic mirror, where you can look at you at leisure, revamped from head to toe.

Imagine you've landed a job interview, and that a click is enough to know what is wrong with your outfit.

Imagine it’s just a beginning…

Contrary to popular belief, makeover is not a matter of taste: it’s scientific.

And despite appearances, beyond the machine, there is also a living being: Eva Cordel, a famous French image consultant.

For the high-profile activity of image consulting, real fad in recent years, Belooky is nothing less than a revolution.

Don’t You Want a Revolution?

“We all want to change the world” (The Beatles)

Do you know the Blue Ocean strategy?

“Blue oceans, in contrast, denote all the industries not in existence today – the unknown market space, untainted by competition. In blue oceans, demand is created rather than fought over. There is ample opportunity for growth that is both profitable and rapid. In blue oceans, competition is irrelevant because the rules of the game are waiting to be set. Blue ocean is an analogy to describe the wider, deeper potential of market space that is not yet explored.” (Wikipedia)

Belooky fits into this powerful strategy: its activity does not yet exist, direct competition either.

By offering to individuals a free complete image consulting service online (immediate, available 24 / 24 and 7 / 7, with an unlimited access), Belooky is indeed about to disrupt the rules of image consultant trade.

At a glance, here are some of Belooky’s highlights :



Get Rid of Whatever You Can’t Stand in your Appearance for Free

You don’t like your flat nose? Your big calves? Your straight hair? Your small size? Your thin lips? Belooky has an answer for each issue. All you have to do is to follow advice. Amazing, right?

Never forget Belooky's bet: being the first complete (face, silhouette, colors and style) virtual makeover website in real time, and totally free.

The Truth About Belooky Founders

Because makeover naturally fits into a "human" relationship between client and counselor, it's Eva Cordel, image consulting specialist and “Allure sur mesure” company founder, who welcomes visitors in her virtual private room, and reveals her secrets, know-how and advice.

On the scientific side (algorithms and automation), Cecile Duclos, a computer scientist fascinated by new technologies and challenges of all kinds, will be in control.

Two sisters involved in the same completely innovative project, with an international goal (French touch requires)!

See Belooky in Action

In 2013, we've been through a long creative process, from early concepts to online platform, and a variety of test handsets.

Launched in January 2014, Belooky already offers key services to individuals:  

  • Both simple and ergonomic, the website is optimized for desktop computers, laptops, tablets and smartphones.
  • You can choose between 2 languages: French or English.
  • You can go through all the steps of a partial or complete makeover (face, body, color, style) on the website, for free, even without any registration; just answer a few questions online, and you will have access to many advice and tips.
  • You can yet take advantage of the first automatic detection functionalities, using your webcam or downloading a photo.
  • You can join the community, registration is free. As a VIP member, you have access to many exclusive benefits. A space is entirely dedicated to hairstyle, another one to eyeglasses. You have the possibility to back up your makeover (ended or not), in order to complete or read it later. And you even have the opportunity to download a personalized booklet.
  • You can follow Belooky on Facebook and Twitter, and share your favorite pages or advice on many social networks. You can also use Facebook Connect to create an account on Belooky.

Thousands of French Citizens Now are Satisfied with their Look – Who Never Thought They Could

And the first feedbacks are quite promising: in 14 months, Belooky won almost 16 000 users in France! With an average session length of 8 minutes, we can affirm that the interest is here.

That’s why we established a complete business plan, with its market research, detailed application development plan, financing plan and business model. And now, all we need is… YOU!

Where Your Money will Go?

“All the things I could do, if I had a little money” (ABBA)

After spending two years developing Belooky makeover platform, perfecting algorithms, testing, writing down our own business plan, we are finally “ready to roll”!

We’ll use the Indiegogo funds to fulfill all your dreams for expected deliveries between December 2015 and December 2016, and here's how:

We will create a powerful mobile application (Android, iOS, Windows Phone).

We will develop our platform adding a lot of amazing services.

We will do research in advanced technologies like facial recognition and augmented reality, to implement a real virtual “magic” mirror (on computers but also for mobiles).

We will transform your smartphone into a handheld scanner to know in real time what colors show you at your best.

We will create a “magic” guide, following you anywhere you want (not only on Internet), helping you to choose clothing, shoes and glasses, to change haircut, to prepare a wedding, a romantic date or a job interview, or even to sort your wardrobe.

We will offer you the opportunity to know if you are well dressed and what is wrong with your outfit.

For all this, we will forge partnerships with fashion industry and welfare professionals, hairdressers, beauticians and opticians, in order to make our makeover services available for everybody everywhere, on Internet but also in real life (shops, beauty salons, supermarkets…).

You like the idea? Let see our video!


Believe it or not, it’s not a joke.

Today, it’s a dream.

Tomorrow, thanks to your support, it will be a reality.

To know the exact scope of this reality, please see our funding levels!

Want to Know More about Technical Specifications?

What will precisely Happen After Indiegogo?

First, our supporters will be invited to participate in our platform development process through feedback surveys, questionnaires, and bug reports. Depending on raised funds, discover now what our common dream will look like!

Here are the different funding levels:

  • 5 000$: we will provide a new VIP free online space, entirely dedicated to makeup.
  • 10 000$: we will add 30 new makeover tips in our analysis algorithms.
  • 20 000$: we will open a new VIP free online space, this time dedicated to lingerie.
  • 30 000$: we will translate Belooky in Spanish language; Hispanics are estimated at between 500 and 550 million globally, making Spanish the second most spoken language in terms of native speakers.
  • 50 000$: the first release of the mobile application will be delivered for Android and Windows Phone devices, optimized for both tablets and smartphones.
  • 80 000$: the second release of the mobile application will be delivered for Android and Windows Phone.
  • 100 000$: we will open a new VIP free online space, especially dedicated to the best day of your life, your wedding day.
  • 140 000$: the third release of the mobile application will be delivered for Android and Windows Phone.
  • 200 000$: the third release of the mobile application will be delivered for iOS (optimized for both iPhone and iPad).
  • 500 000$: we will enrich our makeover platform with awesome new services like the wish list, a dedicated makeover marketplace, the connected wardrobe (that you can scan, sort and keep with you in our pocket), and new spaces dedicated to clothing, makeup, costemics as well as events like job interviews, gala parties or first dates.
  • 1 500 000$: we will complete our platform and mobile application (the fourth release for Android, Windows Phone and iOS) with the most advanced technologies (augmented reality for virtual fitting; artificial intelligence for facial, age, gender and body recognition; color analysis for clothing and accessories scanning…). We will also provide many features dedicated to professionals: online fashion and welfare shops will be able to subscribe to the services of a great "seller", a makeover expert, in order to decrease the rate of returns and online exchanges, and increase their sales force; artisans such as hairdressers, beauticians or opticians, but also little shops to supermarkets, will be able to call on a virtual image consultant to guide their customers; and many more services, always 100% free, at the end, for individuals! You will then be able to take advantage of all our image consulting skills, online and everywhere offline (shops, hairdresser, optician, beautician, at home, in the street...) with your mobile. Finally, Belooky will be available in many other languages, including Italian, German, Indian and Chinese.

Your image has no price? Belooky will greatly make it better for you, always for free.

Don’t forget, the only pockets getting filled by this campaign will be yours.

How Belooky will Make Money, Legally

But how Belooky will earn its own money, to go on growing up after Indiegogo?

The answer is simple: If Belooky is free for individuals, it must be paid for professionals.

That’s why Belooky will provide innovative business services to companies in fashion industry, to hairdressers, beauticians, opticians, and welfare professionals, on Internet but also in real life (shops, beauty salons, supermarkets…).

And through these partnerships, individuals will benefit from expert advice while, for example, shopping online or in their favorite store close to home, or even in their usual beauty salon.

Will You Help Us Embellish Your Life?

Belooky services are free for individuals and will always be free, because everyone should have control of his image. However, as we need individual contributors right now, we do have some special perks for them. Let discover those perks!

Belooky in The Press

Eva Cordel, the image consultant of Belooky and “Allure sur mesure” (she founded her own French agency in 2007), is regularly the subject of articles, TV shows and media reports. Here are some :


Excerpts :

"The employer is not seeking to hire someone with the look of a supermodel, but someone with a neat appearance, in accordance with his profession. For the same job, he will often have several candidates with equal skills. In the end, their image will make the difference." (Eva Cordel, in Maxi)
"My mission? Highlight a person without resorting to surgery, through the revelation of a potential existing in each of us" (Eva Cordel, in Brèves de Bordeaux)

"We all have strengths that we can play to. While some will develop them naturally, others will leave them fallow. To remedy this situation, minor adjustments are often enough.” (Eva Cordel, in Ça m'intéresse)

How to Help Belooky Without A Penny

You do not have enough money to contribute directly to the growth of Belooky?

No panic: word-of-mouth is also extremely valuable to us.

If you like Belooky, do not hesitate to make it known! Social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram...) using Indiegogo sharing tools, but also and especially parties with friends, coffee break at work, discussions at the bar, family dinners: your word is worth gold. Indeed, the more important the community is, the more it will be easy for us to raise the necessary funds.

In advance, thanks to all of you for supporting us!
