Besides, have you ever dreamed of improving your appearance?In a society where appearance plays a key role, where consumption is pervasive, Belooky wants to help individuals without any financial compensation, by teaching the image's keys to everybody: a first step towards self-esteem, in personal as professional field. By offering a free professional makeover, Belooky delivers a strong message: “everyone can improve its appearance, just being aware and acting”.Feeling good about ourself is a top priority, it’s essential for self-confidence and social integration. Looking beautiful allows us to seduce, and that’s also fundamental for our professional career and all our relationships.Please look at this video and see how Belooky could easily change your life; and let’s talk about tomorrow together!

Imagine Having a Magic Mirror in your Pocket, To Tell you How to Be the Fairest One of All
“The only limit is our imagination”
What looks like a magic trick today, tomorrow can be a reality.
Imagine a totally virtual "Before, After", built after a single scan of your body and face.
Imagine a personal shopper following you everywhere on the web, but also in stores; you know what you like, he knows what fits you.
Imagine that your computer, tablet or mobile screen is a magic mirror, where you can look at you at leisure, revamped from head to toe.
Imagine you've landed a job interview, and that a click is enough to know what is wrong with your outfit.
Imagine it’s just a beginning…
Contrary to popular belief, makeover is not a matter of taste: it’s scientific.
And despite appearances, beyond the machine, there is also a living being: Eva Cordel, a famous French image consultant.
For the high-profile activity of image consulting, real fad in recent years, Belooky is nothing less than a revolution.
Don’t You Want a Revolution?
“We all want to change the world” (The Beatles)
Do you know the Blue Ocean strategy?
“Blue oceans, in contrast, denote all the industries not in existence today – the unknown market space, untainted by competition. In blue oceans, demand is created rather than fought over. There is ample opportunity for growth that is both profitable and rapid. In blue oceans, competition is irrelevant because the rules of the game are waiting to be set. Blue ocean is an analogy to describe the wider, deeper potential of market space that is not yet explored.” (Wikipedia)
Belooky fits into this powerful strategy: its activity does not yet exist, direct competition either.
By offering to individuals a free complete image consulting service online (immediate, available 24 / 24 and 7 / 7, with an unlimited access), Belooky is indeed about to disrupt the rules of image consultant trade.
At a glance, here are some of Belooky’s highlights :



Get Rid of Whatever You Can’t Stand in your Appearance for Free
You don’t like your flat nose? Your big calves? Your straight hair? Your small size? Your thin lips? Belooky has an answer for each issue. All you have to do is to follow advice. Amazing, right?
Never forget Belooky's bet: being the first complete (face, silhouette, colors and style) virtual makeover website in real time, and totally free.
The Truth About Belooky Founders
Because makeover naturally fits into a "human" relationship between client and counselor, it's Eva Cordel, image consulting specialist and “Allure sur mesure” company founder, who welcomes visitors in her virtual private room, and reveals her secrets, know-how and advice.

On the scientific side (algorithms and automation), Cecile Duclos, a computer scientist fascinated by new technologies and challenges of all kinds, will be in control.

Two sisters involved in the same completely innovative project, with an international goal (French touch requires)!
See Belooky in Action
In 2013, we've been through a long creative process, from early concepts to online platform, and a variety of test handsets.
Launched in January 2014, Belooky already offers key services to individuals:  


Both simple and ergonomic, the website is optimized for desktop computers, laptops, tablets and smartphones.
You can choose between 2 languages: French or English.
You can go through all the steps of a partial or complete makeover (face, body, color, style) on the website, for free, even without any registration; just answer a few questions online, and you will have access to many advice and tips.
You can yet take advantage of the first automatic detection functionalities, using your webcam or downloading a photo.
You can join the community, registration is free. As a VIP member, you have access to many exclusive benefits. A space is entirely dedicated to hairstyle, another one to eyeglasses. You have the possibility to back up your makeover (ended or not), in order to complete or read it later. And you even have the opportunity to download a personalized booklet.
You can follow Belooky on Facebook and Twitter, and share your favorite pages or advice on many social networks. You can also use Facebook Connect to create an account on Belooky.

Thousands of French Citizens Now are Satisfied with their Look – Who Never Thought They Could
And the first feedbacks are quite promising: in 14 months, Belooky won almost 16 000 users in France! With an average session length of 8 minutes, we can affirm that the interest is here.
That’s why we established a complete business plan, with its market research, detailed application development plan, financing plan and business model. And now, all we need is… YOU!
Where Your Money will Go?
“All the things I could do, if I had a little money” (ABBA)
After spending two years developing Belooky makeover platform, perfecting algorithms, testing, writing down our own business plan, we are finally “ready to roll”!
We’ll use the Indiegogo funds to fulfill all your dreams for expected deliveries between December 2015 and December 2016, and here's how:
We will create a powerful mobile application (Android, iOS, Windows Phone).
We will develop our platform adding a lot of amazing services.
We will do research in advanced technologies like facial recognition and augmented reality, to implement a real virtual “magic” mirror (on computers but also for mobiles). 
We will transform your smartphone into a handheld scanner to know in real time what colors show you at your best.
We will create a “magic” guide, following you anywhere you want (not only on Internet), helping you to choose clothing, shoes and glasses, to change haircut, to prepare a wedding, a romantic date or a job interview, or even to sort your wardrobe.
We will offer you the opportunity to know if you are well dressed and what is wrong with your outfit.
For all this, we will forge partnerships with fashion industry and welfare professionals, hairdressers, beauticians and opticians, in order to make our makeover services available for everybody everywhere, on Internet but also in real life (shops, beauty salons, supermarkets…).
You like the idea? Let see our video!

Believe it or not, it’s not a joke.
Today, it’s a dream.
Tomorrow, thanks to your support, it will be a reality.
To know the exact scope of this reality, please see our funding levels!Want to Know More about Technical Specifications?
What will precisely Happen After Indiegogo?
First, our supporters will be invited to participate in our platform development process through feedback surveys, questionnaires, and bug reports. Depending on raised funds, discover now what our common dream will look like!
Here are the different funding levels:
5 000$: we will provide a new VIP free online space, entirely dedicated to makeup.
10 000$: we will add 30 new makeover tips in our analysis algorithms.
20 000$: we will open a new VIP free online space, this time dedicated to lingerie.
30 000$: we will translate Belooky in Spanish language; Hispanics are estimated at between 500 and 550 million globally, making Spanish the second most spoken language in terms of native speakers.
50 000$: the first release of the mobile application will be delivered for Android and Windows Phone devices, optimized for both tablets and smartphones.
80 000$: the second release of the mobile application will be delivered for Android and Windows Phone.
100 000$: we will open a new VIP free online space, especially dedicated to the best day of your life, your wedding day.
140 000$: the third release of the mobile application will be delivered for Android and Windows Phone.
200 000$: the third release of the mobile application will be delivered for iOS (optimized for both iPhone and iPad).
500 000$: we will enrich our makeover platform with awesome new services like the wish list, a dedicated makeover marketplace, the connected wardrobe (that you can scan, sort and keep with you in our pocket), and new spaces dedicated to clothing, makeup, costemics as well as events like job interviews, gala parties or first dates.
1 500 000$: we will complete our platform and mobile application (the fourth release for Android, Windows Phone and iOS) with the most advanced technologies (augmented reality for virtual fitting; artificial intelligence for facial, age, gender and body recognition; color analysis for clothing and accessories scanning…). We will also provide many features dedicated to professionals: online fashion and welfare shops will be able to subscribe to the services of a great "seller", a makeover expert, in order to decrease the rate of returns and online exchanges, and increase their sales force; artisans such as hairdressers, beauticians or opticians, but also little shops to supermarkets, will be able to call on a virtual image consultant to guide their customers; and many more services, always 100% free, at the end, for individuals! You will then be able to take advantage of all our image consulting skills, online and everywhere offline (shops, hairdresser, optician, beautician, at home, in the street...) with your mobile. Finally, Belooky will be available in many other languages, including Italian, German, Indian and Chinese.
Your image has no price? Belooky will greatly make it better for you, always for free.Don’t forget, the only pockets getting filled by this campaign will be yours.
How Belooky will Make Money, Legally
But how Belooky will earn its own money, to go on growing up after Indiegogo?
The answer is simple: If Belooky is free for individuals, it must be paid for professionals.That’s why Belooky will provide innovative business services to companies in fashion industry, to hairdressers, beauticians, opticians, and welfare professionals, on Internet but also in real life (shops, beauty salons, supermarkets…).
And through these partnerships, individuals will benefit from expert advice while, for example, shopping online or in their favorite store close to home, or even in their usual beauty salon.
Will You Help Us Embellish Your Life?
Belooky services are free for individuals and will always be free, because everyone should have control of his image. However, as we need individual contributors right now, we do have some special perks for them. Let discover those perks!

Belooky in The PressEva Cordel, the image consultant of Belooky and “Allure sur mesure” (she founded her own French agency in 2007), is regularly the subject of articles, TV shows and media reports. Here are some :

Excerpts :"The employer is not seeking to hire someone with the look of a supermodel, but someone with a neat appearance, in accordance with his profession. For the same job, he will often have several candidates with equal skills. In the end, their image will make the difference." (Eva Cordel, in Maxi)"My mission? Highlight a person without resorting to surgery, through the revelation of a potential existing in each of us" (Eva Cordel, in Brèves de Bordeaux)"We all have strengths that we can play to. While some will develop them naturally, others will leave them fallow. To remedy this situation, minor adjustments are often enough.” (Eva Cordel, in Ça m'intéresse)
How to Help Belooky Without A Penny

You do not have enough money to contribute directly to the growth of Belooky?No panic: word-of-mouth is also extremely valuable to us.If you like Belooky, do not hesitate to make it known! Social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram...) using Indiegogo sharing tools, but also and especially parties with friends, coffee break at work, discussions at the bar, family dinners: your word is worth gold. Indeed, the more important the community is, the more it will be easy for us to raise the necessary funds.In advance, thanks to all of you for supporting us!

story:
Now you have ports again.

Sparrow connects the Macbook USB-C with the world you live in.



Sparrow is a collaboration from a bunch of curious, fun loving, semi-crazy tech folks living and breeding all around the Bay Area, California. Team Sparrow currently works with or has worked with a tonne of companies including: Apple, Amazon LAB 126, Hitachi, CNET, ZDNET, G-Technology, Seagate, Western Digital, Boxbee, Handle, Blue Otter Corp, Roxio, Glam Media, Stanford Learning, Clever Solar, Reach Media, Shopping.com/eBay, etc... so yeah, we have some experience.


As an old Greek philosopher — whose name we forgot, so maybe we'll leave it for your own Googling — once said: “The only constant is change.” In the longview, this is a positive concept; innovation leads to bigger and better things. In the short-term, though, it can be annoying as all hell. Take the new 12-inch, super-thin MacBook's maddening lone USB Type C port.

// THE GOOD: The USB-Type C is one of those so-called “game-changers.” It adapts to all sorts of peripherals, is backwards-compatible with other USB ports, and has the potential to transfer data at incredible speeds while powering them at the same time! All the while using only using one port. Say hello to the new gold port standard.  

// THE BAD: It's only one port. Quick! Look around at the myriad of devices you have plugged into your laptop right meow. Maybe an external monitor, external hard drive, SD card reader, perhaps a keyboard, how 'bout ethernet? Certainly, your power cord's also nearby if you're running low on juice. With the new 12” MacBook design, you're allowed one—and only one—of those input/outputs at a time and of course only if you purchase an adapter. 


With SPARROW, all you do is slide in your cool, new 12” MacBook into our badass, new dock. From there, it'll split into 7 different ports. SPARROW will support your external monitor, your external hard drive, your HDMI enabled device, SD cards, or charge any mobile device much faster than standard USB*. The point is, if you want to keep your desk clean/ free of clutter, have a much more efficient workflow, and you want to look awesome doing it, SPARROWS's your bird.

*SPARROW DOCK supports 2.1 amp USB Type A charging


Of course we created SPARROW to be functional but we designed it to be different then anything the marketplace currently offers. We wanted to invoke sci-fi, anime, uniqueness, edginess, gaming, origami and wow. 


Height: 7.76” 

Width: 8.46” (wingspan), 1.2” (chassis)

Depth: 11.47”

Weight: 2.2 lbs

This is something we literally wouldn't be able to accomplish without your support and backing. So, in addition to the various perks we're doling out for different levels of contribution, you know: Much gratitude and thanks for all the fish!

// WHAT YOUR SUPPORT WILL ACCOMPLISH FOR US

  • Continuation on R&D activities

    • Engineering efforts in the US and Asia ODM

    • Board layout, design and testing

    • Tooling design and development

    • Proto builds of final product

    • Testing equipment

    • Hardware testing and validation during development stage

    • Worldwide certification (currently focusing US-FCC & EU-CE certs )

  • Components and material readiness for mass production
  • Massive kowtowing and appreciation when you back us



Like us on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/sparrowdock

Follow us on Twitter -   https://twitter.com/sparrowdock

Instagram http://instagram.com/sparrowdock

Press - Download high rez images here and/or contact us at press@sparrowdock.com

  • We are passionate about the design of SPARROW and we want this to be a product Macbook users will love to use. The campaign funding goal we set for this does not cover all the tooling, certification, production costs etc. The goal we set is to determine if there is enough interest in SPARROW to continue moving forward with us putting a lot of our own $$$ to cover the costs to manufacture and ship. 

  • Since the USB Type C port is so new, we might have compatibility issues with other peripheral standards. Part of your contribution will be going to solve these potential problems before we ship the product to our backers. 

  • The core SPARROW team has worked with manufacturers (ODMs/OEMs) for over 10 years. So this isn't our first rodeo. Our experience with creating products allows this campaign the best chance for on-time delivery. Why just a best chance and not 100%? Well, we would be lying if we could guarantee it. Life throws a tonne of randomness and obstacles so we have to respect that. Of course we will be working like crazy to deliver on-time. 


Q: Why do I want the SPARROW DOCK?

A: Because it's freaking edgy! Pretty much all products for apple now have the apple design language. Go against the grain. Ours has the sci-fi / anime / origami / mech / edgy look that no one does anymore.

Q: Do we support worldwide shipping?  

A: Yep, we have options for both US and Worldwide shipping in the Perks section.

Q: Will the SPARROW DOCK include a USB-C to USB-C cable?

A: The Sparrow will not come with an included USB-C cable. The USB-C cable that comes with the 12” MACBOOK will be used for the SPARROW. However, depending on the funding amount we might include another one in a future stretch goal.

Q: How many external monitors can connect to the SPARROW DOCK ?

A: At the moment we support one external monitor, but we are working on functionality for two.

Q: Does the SPARROW DOCK charge your MacBook when docked?

A: Yep, the SPARROW DOCK is meant to be as convenient as possible. Just dock it and you are ready to go.

Q: What Mini Display Port version are you going to support?

A: The display port version we will be using is 1.2 and it supports 4k at 60hz.

Q: What USB standard are you supporting?

A: All the USB ports will be 3.0. One USB port will be 2.1 amps. This allows for much faster charging of your iphone/ipad or other mobile devices. 

Q: What monitors are supported?

A: Monitors that support Mini Display Port or HDMI should have no problem working.

Q: Does the SPARROW DOCK work with Thunderbolt Display?

A: No, the SPARROW DOCK does not work with Thunderbolt Display. (This needs to be firmed up.)

Q: Can I use the Mini Display Port and HDMI at the same time?

A: Sorry but at this time we only support one or the other. Not both at the same time.

Q: Does the SPARROW DOCK need to be connected to an external power or does it work with the MacBook's USB-C?

A: Yes, the SPARROW DOCK uses its own provided power adapter to power all ports. 

Q: What are the specs for the SD card reader?

A: These are the specs:

  • SDHC/ SDXC support

  • Up to 500 Mbps transfer rates

Q: Will there be a version of SPARROW for other Mac laptops?

A: Yes we plan on it! Visit us at www.sparrowdock.com and sign up for our updates. (of course we will not spam or sell your info) Or send an email to products@sparrowdock.com and let us know which version you want us to support. The 13” Macbook Pro Retina or 15” Macbook Pro Retina.

Q: What color choices do I have for my Sparrow? 

A: The choices are:

  • Standard Colors
  • White Chassis - with choice of Silver, Gold, Gray
  • Black Chassis - with choice of Silver, Gold, Gray
  • Special Perk Colors
  • White Chassis - with choice of Red, Blue, Black
  • Black Chassis - with choice of Red, Blue, Black
  • White Chassis - Rainbow

story:
Funded & Supported By

 

    

 

 

The Incubator GIKI
 
 

 

 

 

 

 
  Has any of this happened with you?
 

Technology has improved our lives by offering thousands of helpful devices. They are becoming smaller and more mobile: from huge desktops to laptops, onto tablets and smartphones, and now we have smart watches and glasses. Your smartphone isn't just a communication device any more. It is your business associate and an entertainment buddy. You take it everywhere you go. 

Too Many Apps Drain Your Battery

 

 

 

How often has your cellphone died in the middle of an urgent task?

The reason is that you rely on a lot of applications that make your day to day work possible and those apps consume a huge chunk of your battery. And suddenly, we find ourselves powerless, and restricted by old-fashioned wires and proximity to the closest wall outlet; until now. 

 

Here Is The Solution

             Introducing Flash Pack - the new rapid-charging power bank. 

 

Click Bellow to view the 3D version of Flash Pack. You can even view it through VR Headset.

 

We Make Mobile Devices Truly Mobile

We have found a great solution to “dead battery syndrome”. Flash Pack utilizes a 2500 mAh Lithium Nano Phosphate battery for a fast and full charging. Our technology reduces the charging period by up to ten times!

The best thing about it is that you can use it to charge ANY of your devices! Flash Pack is a cross-platform and cross-device charger, equipped with auto-sense technology. Hence, it is compatible with Android, iOS and Windows Phones, or any other USB powered devices. Auto-sense technology automatically adjusts to a device’s needs for optimum charging. This simple, all-in-one solution makes Flash Pack the most versatile battery bank in the market. 

 

 

Flash Pack can be re-charged by two modes

Flash Pack employs a single fast charging rechargeable battery that can be charged by two methods: fast and conventional charging. 

The fast charging mode allows you to fully recharge the battery in 14 minutes. You can achieve this by charging the Flash Pack with any of the existing standard laptop chargers with the following specs:

Output Voltage Range = 18 - 20 V

Output Current Range = 3 - 3.2 A

This is all you need to get enough power to, for example, recharge an iPhone 6s for one and a half times!

Plug in your laptop charger

The conventional mode uses the standard micro USB cable (1A), which takes about 2 hours to recharge the battery. You can utilize it as an emergency tool, when no laptop charger is available.

Also charges from your phone charger

Campers, off-the-grid adventurers, and even ordinary travelers will appreciate the opportunity to charge their batteries super-fast, ensuring that all of their devices will remain active for several days. 

With the Flash Pack, you’ll never miss an important call, taking an unforgettable photo, or a chance to connect with friends, family, or colleagues. 

 

How To Use It

Plug the charger into the port on Flash Pack, and it will begin to charge immediately. The indicators monitor the process by showing tri-colored LED: 

-less than 33% charged - red light

-between 33% and 66% - yellow light

-more than 66% charged – green light.

After 14 minutes, just remove the battery bank and you are good to go! Charge your smartphones, tablets, or smart watches whenever they need some extra juice.

Flash Pack is Supper Easy to use

Just Plug in your device with your own charging cable and your device will instantly start charging

 

Never again be on a short leash of your device’s charging cord. Free yourself with Flash Pack!

 

 

 

 

In The Box

We understand that you might have a different connector than the one showed here, but we have got you covered. You would be asked to provide your preference for the charger tip that would sit on top of your existing laptop charger. The connector may that be a Mac charger or an HP/Dell, etc.

 

 

 

 

Update!
 

 
Flash Pack Advantages

Flash Pack utilizes the same chemistry which is used in bulky electric car batteries. Now, you can use it for your mobile devices! The technology significantly increases charging speed, durability and reliability of the battery banks, combined with a slower rate of capacity loss (aka greater calendar life).

Flash Pack battery bank features a 3 times longer cycle life compared to conventional lithium ion batteries. Even if you recharge it to full capacity on a daily basis, it will serve you for a minimum of 4 years.

Nano-phosphate battery chemistry used in Flash Pack is environment friendly because the lithium doesn't cause environmental hazards, unlike ordinary lead-acid or lithium polymer batteries. 

Our product offers improved safety features and great performance in the toughest conditions by providing battery short circuit and fuse protection in the battery bank to safeguard the device and the user in case of unexpected voltage or current spikes. In addition, the battery bank has excellent abuse tolerance so it won’t be damaged easily even if you accidentally supply greater current.

 

Technical Specifications 

 

 


 

 

 

Certifications

FCC, CE, UL

 

Your Rewards

 

 

 

 

 

Prototype

 

 

 

Flash Pack Fits In Your Hand

 

 

 

 

Stretch Goals

 

 

      When Will You Get Your Reward

 

 

 

Referral Program

 

An exciting opportunity to become super backers, get your friends and family members to buy Flash Pack from your custom link and win cool Prizes!

 

How Did this Happen?

Flash Pack started as a struggle to find a battery bank that gets me charge for my gadgets for one whole day, and was so quick that people like me who hardly remember to charge their phone let alone charging battery banks too still get to leave home on time without the worry of running short on  juice for my phone, in few months this struggle went from discovery for the existing products to building something like this my self, 100s of hours spent into banging head on walls and building, Iterating on prototypes and spending Seed money from Start-up Chile , finally lead to this beauty, which I proudly call Flash Pack, but after making it soon realized why be selfish why not share this with all people out there who are just as desperate for a better battery bank as I was that's how i decided to talk to manufacturers in china and design a campaign on indiegogo to share my beloved battery bank with the masses, 

Stages of Product Development

I) First Prototype

 

II) Second Prototype

 

Finally Removed the Dock from the product and made it Compatible with laptop charger

Now, we are asking for your feedback and support in order to bring Flash Pack to the market. The funds raised on Indiegogo will allow us to buy supplies in bulk and cut production costs, so everyone could afford to live mobile lives, free from cords and low battery anxiety.

Join our community - choose your reward, tell your friends, and let’s make it happen! 

 

Who is Behind This Madness

Acknowledging the Advisors and Supporters of Flash Pack

 

Design Advisor
Manuel Saez
Founder & CEO Broklynes

Business Advisor
Luke Ball
Assistant Director Start-up Chile

Business Mentor
Jehan Ara
President P@SHA
 

Business Advisor
Ali Khurshid
Business Incubation Manager at The Nest I/O

Prototyping Support
Gorgio Fedric
In-charge FabLab UC Santiago

 

With the latest rapid charging technology, cutting edge design and experienced suppliers with 10+ years in the electronics and consumer product industry, we ensure safety, quality and portability.

We wanted to share Flash Pack with the Indiegogo community here first because of the strong community supporter, innovators and early adopters. With your Support not only will you help Start our journey to bring next generation of batteries to the world, you'll also bring us one step closer to furthering future applications of this technology. Imagine next generation drones, robots using the same technology and charge in a flash, So help us start the new battery technology revolution!

The major portion of your contribution will go into purchasing supplies investing into tooling and managing logistics so that you can get your reward on time!

You can help us by contributing to this campaign and/or sharing this campaign with your friends and family!

 

 

Risks and Challenges

Like all hardware products Flash Pack has to overcome an awful lot of challenges like certification delays, inflation affecting the cost of raw material, production delays and shipping issues but that won't stop it from reaching you as soon as possible, Flash Pack would not be possible without you and together we will make it happen.  Your support and pledges will be building blocks for the future variants and further research into rapid charging technology. 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Why would I buy Flash Pack over any other rapid charging power bank?
A: Flash Pack is the only fast charging power bank that does not require any separate charger instead it charges from your own laptop charger and that too in just 14 minutes. All you would need is a connector tip to go with your charger, which we will provide.
Q: Will Flash Pack Charge an iPhone 5 in 7 minutes?
A: No. Here is how it works, you would charge Flash Pack from your laptop charger for 7 minutes, and then you can use it to charge your iPhone 5 from 0 to 100%, the charging speed of phone would be the same as if it was connected to a wall charger.
Q: Can I charge Flash Pack while charging my phone from it?
A: Yes you can. the Flash Pack is designed in such a way that you can even charge your phone while the Flash Pack gets charged so to save you more time.
Q: What is the battery life of Flash Pack?
A: Flash Pack has 3 times more cycle life than ordinary battery banks usually battery banks only last for 300 cycles, whereas Flash Pack would last for 1500 Cycles.
Q: Can Flash Pack damage battery of my phone?
A: No. Charging from Flash Pack is as if your phone was connected to a standard wall mount charger, and won't void any of your phone warranty.
Q: Which devices are compatible with Flash Pack?
A: Flash PAck has the ability to charge all USB devices including: iPhones, Android phones, Windows phones, iPads, Android Tablets, GoPros, Bluetooth headphones and you can even power USB lights.
Q: Can I charge Flash Pack from my regular USB phone charger?
A: Yes. You can charge the Flash Pack in the following ways: 
(1) To 100% in 14 minutes via your laptop charger
(2) At regular speed using your current USB wall charger or car USB outlet.
Q: Can I charge Flash Pack from my car? 
A: Yes. to do so you would need a standard car laptop charger, with following specs, Voltage range between 18-20 and can provide current upto 3 Amperes.
Q: When is Flash Pack expected to ship?
A: Flash Pack will start shipping by the end of june 2016.
Q: Which countries do you ship to?
A: We ship will ship worldwide excluding the following countries which have been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria & Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any these countries we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more, however we cannot guarantee the shipment's arrival.
Q: How will my order be shipped?
A: We will be shipping with the most suitable premium courier and that will vary between countries. All shipments will have tracking which will be emailed to you once the delivery has been shipped.
story_txt:
Funded & Supported By 
    
 
 

The Incubator GIKI
     
 
 
  Has any of this happened with you?


 

Technology has improved our lives by offering thousands of helpful devices. They are becoming smaller and more mobile: from huge desktops to laptops, onto tablets and smartphones, and now we have smart watches and glasses. Your smartphone isn't just a communication device any more. It is your business associate and an entertainment buddy. You take it everywhere you go. 
Too Many Apps Drain Your Battery   How often has your cellphone died in the middle of an urgent task?The reason is that you rely on a lot of applications that make your day to day work possible and those apps consume a huge chunk of your battery. And suddenly, we find ourselves powerless, and restricted by old-fashioned wires and proximity to the closest wall outlet; until now.  Here Is The Solution             Introducing Flash Pack - the new rapid-charging power bank. 
 Click Bellow to view the 3D version of Flash Pack. You can even view it through VR Headset. We Make Mobile Devices Truly MobileWe have found a great solution to “dead battery syndrome”. Flash Pack utilizes a 2500 mAh Lithium Nano Phosphate battery for a fast and full charging. Our technology reduces the charging period by up to ten times!The best thing about it is that you can use it to charge ANY of your devices! Flash Pack is a cross-platform and cross-device charger, equipped with auto-sense technology. Hence, it is compatible with Android, iOS and Windows Phones, or any other USB powered devices. Auto-sense technology automatically adjusts to a device’s needs for optimum charging. This simple, all-in-one solution makes Flash Pack the most versatile battery bank in the market.   Flash Pack can be re-charged by two modesFlash Pack employs a single fast charging rechargeable battery that can be charged by two methods: fast and conventional charging. The fast charging mode allows you to fully recharge the battery in 14 minutes. You can achieve this by charging the Flash Pack with any of the existing standard laptop chargers with the following specs:Output Voltage Range = 18 - 20 VOutput Current Range = 3 - 3.2 AThis is all you need to get enough power to, for example, recharge an iPhone 6s for one and a half times!Plug in your laptop chargerThe conventional mode uses the standard micro USB cable (1A), which takes about 2 hours to recharge the battery. You can utilize it as an emergency tool, when no laptop charger is available.Also charges from your phone chargerCampers, off-the-grid adventurers, and even ordinary travelers will appreciate the opportunity to charge their batteries super-fast, ensuring that all of their devices will remain active for several days. With the Flash Pack, you’ll never miss an important call, taking an unforgettable photo, or a chance to connect with friends, family, or colleagues.  How To Use ItPlug the charger into the port on Flash Pack, and it will begin to charge immediately. The indicators monitor the process by showing tri-colored LED: -less than 33% charged - red light-between 33% and 66% - yellow light-more than 66% charged – green light.After 14 minutes, just remove the battery bank and you are good to go! Charge your smartphones, tablets, or smart watches whenever they need some extra juice.Flash Pack is Supper Easy to useJust Plug in your device with your own charging cable and your device will instantly start charging Never again be on a short leash of your device’s charging cord. Free yourself with Flash Pack!    In The BoxWe understand that you might have a different connector than the one showed here, but we have got you covered. You would be asked to provide your preference for the charger tip that would sit on top of your existing laptop charger. The connector may that be a Mac charger or an HP/Dell, etc.    

Update! 


 Flash Pack Advantages
Flash Pack utilizes the same chemistry which is used in bulky electric car batteries. Now, you can use it for your mobile devices! The technology significantly increases charging speed, durability and reliability of the battery banks, combined with a slower rate of capacity loss (aka greater calendar life).
Flash Pack battery bank features a 3 times longer cycle life compared to conventional lithium ion batteries. Even if you recharge it to full capacity on a daily basis, it will serve you for a minimum of 4 years.
Nano-phosphate battery chemistry used in Flash Pack is environment friendly because the lithium doesn't cause environmental hazards, unlike ordinary lead-acid or lithium polymer batteries. 
Our product offers improved safety features and great performance in the toughest conditions by providing battery short circuit and fuse protection in the battery bank to safeguard the device and the user in case of unexpected voltage or current spikes. In addition, the battery bank has excellent abuse tolerance so it won’t be damaged easily even if you accidentally supply greater current.
 
Technical Specifications 

 
 

 


 
 
Certifications

FCC, CE, UL
 
Your Rewards
 
 

 
 
 
Prototype
 
 

 Flash Pack Fits In Your Hand


 
 
  Stretch Goals



        When Will You Get Your Reward

story:
JoanLightsMusic

A unique bluetooth smart LED light bulb controlled by iPhone or Android by a mobile APP.

* 16 Million Colors with full RGB and White light management,
* Music Syncronization with external sounds allows a pop band's rhythm to give the lighting effects! ** MIC function (color changes via collecting outside sound or music).
* Multiple bulb control up to 6 bulbs allows for bigger area of fun and party!
* Timer setting allows for various alert needs including waking up, calling coming in bulb blinking, time to shut off lights, etc.
* Scene Mode for quick adaption of needs like Reading, Candlelight, Party, Disco.

                            


Installation



App Screens Breakdown



Product BreakDown

Quick Details

  • Light Source: LED
  • Item Type: Bulb Lights
  • LED Light Source: Epistar (30% better luminous efficacy). Luminous efficacy is a measure of how well a light source produces visible light.
  • Type: E27 LED light bulb
  • Input Voltage(V): AC100-240V
  • Lamp Power(W): 7.5
  • Lamp Luminous Flux(lm): 640
  • Lamp Luminous Efficiency(lm/w): 85
  • )">CRI (Ra>): 85          aka    color rendering index (CRI)
  • Color Temperature(CCT): Natural White
  • Working Temperature(℃): -10 to 50
  • Working Lifetime(Hour): 50000
  • Lamp Body Material: Aluminum
  • Base Type: E27
  • Warranty: 2-years
  • Base: E27/E26/B22 (optional)
  • Application fields: home, party, festival, hotel, office, etc
  • Beam angle: 270 Degree
  • Net weight: 120g


1. Luminous Comparison with other similar Production


About Us - The Team


We are a core bunch of ex-Singapore Polytechnic friends, including computer engineers, programmers, marketing consultants, administrative and operations consultants. We want to bring back " fun " into people's lives once more. Generally in Singapore, everything is pretty mundane and " not happening", if that's the word to use.

We do want to make our daily lives more memorable  for the entire family, being everyone is so engrossed with their phones individually. And with the crazy pokemon go craze, things just got worse.

Hence we want to empower "FUN" into each family's daily life.

Moving forward, our vision is that tools and products you use should have a twist and not just as it is. Of course the practical use must still be there.


FAQ

What makes JoanLightsMusic different?
Most smart bulbs requires an external hub. Ours do not. Plug and play and have more fun! A typical multi bluetooth-enabled smart bulb in the market requires users to purchase an external hub to control multiple light bulbs and this creates additional costs and physical handling.

Is it difficult to setup?

Similar to any normal LED Bulb, you can plug our bulb into a compatible LED socket, and it will work just fine. You can then download the app on Apple Store or Google Play Store to control it on your smartphone.

Is it going to be affordable for the home user?
If you look at many projects in crowdfunding, the initial teams never realise the many cost incurred including credit card tax % on the project and commissions to indiegogo and the cost of making the goods with branding and software and publishing and marketing and operational costs notwithstanding.

End result? After several months and some projects even took years, they do not make enough items or fully commit to all the backers and backers are left with empty hands. Some projects even go "dumb" - the teams fail to response any more.

Our commitment is that we want this project to work first, and later we can see how to bring down cost as much as we can for the home user.

Right now, as upscale mass production is still an anticipated target setting, we have no choice but to offer this high quality bulb at a reasonable price as low as we can without negative cost outlay incurred.

That is why we offer lower cost per bulb for more bulbs per purchase in our perks!

Are you offering any warranty on JoanLightsMusic bulbs?
Yes, we are offering a 2-year warranty (subject to terms and use).

Where will you be shipping from? Have you calculated import/tax fees?

We will be shipping from the ShenZhen, China, where the factory is based. So you will need to determine additional fees and import taxes based on your country.

We intend to use DHL, UPS, FedEx or TNT at the moment. This part is still at planning.

Can you finalise a shipping date?

We are confident to complete by 9 months lead time latest. However, we will let all backers know if any unexpected changes pops up.

story:
O Windows Mobile Portugal

O Windows Mobile Portugal é um site dedicado à divulgação do sistema operativo móvel da Microsoft, o Windows Phone e futuramente o Windows 10 Mobile. Visto não existir nenhum espaço em Portugal com este objectivo, decidimos criar este website para a promoção e discussão do dia a dia do Windows Mobile, das suas aplicações, dos smartphones e ainda transmitir aos nossos leitores tutoriais para ajudar na experiência diária com este sistema operativo.
Ao nos ajudarem, temos a certeza que seremos reconhecidos como o site Nº 1 em Portugal para o Windows Mobile e será assim um espaço de referência e de qualidade para os nossos leitores.

O nosso objectivo com a campanha

Precisamos da vossa ajuda porque queremos criar algo inovador, diferente e que tenha impacto junto dos nossos leitores. Mais do que um site de informação, queremos criar um conjunto de meios para atingir o fim proposto por nós: Trazer mais utilizadores para a plataforma Windows Phone. Mostrar este sistema operativo de diversas formas fará com que isso aconteça.
Por isso pedimos este investimento. São 1000€, um valor que não é alto mas que irá permitir atingir metas que temos pensadas e prontas a executar.

  • Revista Mensal Windows Mobile Portugal Impressa ou Revista Digital interactiva.
  • Merchandising oficial do Windows Mobile Portugal - Investimento inicial de 150€ para stock a um valor mais baixo.
  • Aposta em servidor de alta fidelidade para o site - Cerca de 110€ anualmente.
  • Windows Mobile Portugal TV no YouTube com conteúdo diário
  • Aplicação Universal para Windows 10 com possibilidade de fazer a mesma para Android e iOS.


Riscos e Obstáculos

Como em qualquer projecto, existe um risco associado. Um website sobre o Windows Mobile, um sistema operativo que possui uma fatia diminuta do mercado móvel, associado a um público alvo que se baseia apenas em Portugal, nos PALOP - principalmente o Brasil - e ainda na comunidade portuguesa no estrangeiro, exige que o projecto seja bem delineado de forma a se tornar numa referência a nível nacional. Só assim se tornará num projecto auto sustentável criando uma comunidade à volta dos diversos meios utilizados pelo Windows Mobile Portugal para a comunicação com os nossos leitores. Aqui fica essa promessa!


Como nos pode ajudar?

A ajuda que mais queremos é uma: Que sejam leitores fidelizados ao nosso site. O nosso trabalho dia após dia tem como princípios a informação correcta, isenta e fidedigna sobre tudo aquilo que se passa no mundo Windows Mobile. 
Existem, claro, outras maneiras de ajudar na sustentação de todo o nosso projecto. A publicidade que apresentamos nos nossos meios de comunicação são um mal necessário para que consigamos combater todos os custos associados ao nosso projecto, sejam eles de alojamento ou mesmo domínio. É importante salientar que nenhum membro da nossa equipa recebe remuneração, sendo todo o trabalho feito numa base de gosto e interesse em informar os nossos leitores da melhor forma possível.

Existem, claro, outras maneiras de ajudar na sustentação de todo o nosso projecto. A publicidade que apresentamos nos nossos meios de comunicação são um mal necessário para que consigamos combater todos os custos associados ao nosso projecto, sejam eles de alojamento ou mesmo domínio. É importante salientar que nenhum membro da nossa equipa recebe remuneração, sendo todo o trabalho feito numa base de gosto e interesse em informar os nossos leitores da melhor forma possível.

About Us: Who we are: 

TeknoAVR, a company having Offices in India, United Kingdom and HongKong, 

having over 200 employees, is one of the leading companies engaged in developing 

Augmented Virtual Reality and Naked eye 3D Technology smart Gadgets. 

A team comprising of Imminent Futuristic Thinkers, Scientists, Engineers, 

Software and Android Developers, at TeknoAVR, we continuously strive to develop 

new cutting edge technology that can have the capability to change the way we see, perceive and interact with our surroundings.


Introduction:

We are living in a world dominated by technology! Not only is the Technology

changing at a very rapid rate, but we are also witnessing the birth and use of 

such newer technologies which were once thought to exist only in Sci-fi movies. 

TeknoAVR was founded to take this legacy ahead with its innovative gadgets that 

can change the face of the world we live in and also as we see it. 

It is said “If you change the way you see the world, you can change the world you 

see” and that’s what we follow at TeknoAVR

We welcome you all to be a part of the revolution that TeknoAVR has begun and 

witness the new possibilities that we have opened for you!


Introducing World's Naked Eye 3D Smartphone with Rear Touch Technology:

Watch your favorite Videos and Game characters pop out of the screen and float in the air in front of your eyes. 
Features and Highlights:

The 5 MP Front Camera lets you capture true to life Selfies.
Also capture SBS 3D Images and watch them anytime in Stereoscopic 3D Format!

3D Gaming Experience:


Experience Gaming Like never before in Naked Eye 3D Format. 

You won't just play, you would be in the Game!


Smart Security Features:

Use any of the above smart locking mechanisms for unparalleled and unmatched security of your device!
Many more Exciting Features:

story:
Hello. My name is Maura and I live in the New York City area. I'm self employed working as an English As A Second Language (ESL) teacher. I worked for many years in corporate America but lost my job in 2009 when the economy collapsed.  If I had been stuck in an office job, perhaps these opportunities and insights would not have occurred.  I am always looking for ways to not only increase my own income but help others. It has always been my way - volunteering in soup kitchens and shelters, donating blood, political campaigns for progressive candidates, etc. 

Travel is also a passion in my life - I have been to many countries (born in Italy to parents from Ireland) and meeting people from everywhere only furthers my commitment to lending assistance. 

One of my favorite places on the planet is Jamaica. My deep love for reggae began when I was 14 (over 30 years ago). I have visited this beautiful island four times. Every time I am reminded of the hospitality and kindness of the people. 

On my most recent visit, the friend I was traveling with gave her solar phone charger to a local guy we met. I was surprised to find out that these didn't exist here! What - with the sun shining brightly nearly every single day?! 

The light bulb went off! YES! Let me bring solar powered phone chargers to the Caribbean! 

I'm starting very small as I am only one person and one other local person in Jamaica is helping me spread the word. 

Besides using a natural source of energy, I want to help a local person support his family in a place where consistent opportunities are not available. 

I am a person who is grateful for every single day and firmly believe that a positive attitude and helping others is the way to live a blessed, happy life. 

I hope that you will help me achieve this goal. Thank you very much. 

With gratitude and good vibes,

Maura

story:
​

ReachMe LiveTag by NousLogic

(Patent pending)

The ReachMe LiveTag service is a way for the user to be notified through a web based URL with an anonymous ID. It offers a 2-way communication chat service with GPS support.

ReachMe LiveTag notification service solves these problems and more: 

  • How can I leave a tag on anything that will not expire or change even when I change my contact information or travel?
  • How can I be anonymously notified without exposing my identity or contact information?
  • How can I leave specific messages for each physical "notification tag" and also update the messages?
  • How can I leave crucial medical information for easy access in the event of an emergency?

How Does ReachMe Work?

You register as a ReachMe user with an ID.

The ReachMe administration allows you to configure how you can be reached through:

  • NousLogic ReachMe App (via push notification message)
  • Social media messaging
  • Chat with GPS support
  • Email (future release)
  • Phone call
  • SMS (future release)

You then post a QR Code generated by the ReachMe web application on anywhere that you expect to be notified.

Anyone looking for you can then simply scan the QR Code to contact you and then the web application will prompt the person to type in a message. The NousLogic server will then locate you through Push Notification. If you are using NousLogic App, you will then be able to communicate back (through chat service) with the person looking for you without exposing your personal contact information.

What Can You Do with ReachMe LiveTag?

Here are just a few of the examples of what you can do with the ReachMe LiveTag app and service:

  • It allows an emergency response personnel to contact the user if he is not at home in case of emergency (home fire or maintenance issues such as a power outage or fallen tree).
  • It allows you to leave specific messages for visitors to your home (delivery person, friends, repairman, or anyone who needs access while you are away).
  • Lost & found - Post a ReachMe QR Code on luggage tag, pet or a child's school bag.
  • For the retail shop owner, office worker, warehouse manager, medical staff and just about anyone who needs to be reached when they are away from their usual location or outside of office hours the ReachMe LiveTag service allows customers and patients to connect with you without surrendering your personal contact information.
  • Allow emergency response personnel to quickly access a person's critical medical information and contact friends and families.
  • You want your clients or customers to be able to reach you outside of office hours, but do not want to give out your mobile phone number.
  • You have a vacation rental property and ReachMe service allows your visitor to reach someone if there is any emergency where they can not access the property or reach the rental office.

-> Sign up for a free trial

-> Download iOS App

-> Download Android App

Early Success And News About ReachMe LiveTag

  • Acquire customers such as hospitals and health clinics
  • Our company was chosen as an Airbnb partner at the Airbnb Open 2016 in Los Angeles on Nov 17-18 to showcase our SmartTag to the Super Hosts at Clifton's Club House. The SmartTags were given out to the Super Hosts to be used as Smart Doorbell, Luggage Tag and Pet Tag.

More Exciting Things To Come

Your support will help to create new applications for LiveTag.

How much does ReachMe services cost?

For this crowdfunding project only, you can print your own tags for $2 (Maximum 100 tags/account; more tags than anyone will ever need!). This also includes free lifetime ReachMe cloud services which normally retail for $2/year. We also include various options on printed plastic tags we produce: key tag or credit card sizes, generic or personalized tags with your own uploaded photo.  

Instead of paying $2/year, you pay just a one time, lifetime fee of only $2.

Sizes

Custom - 2 1/8" x 1"

Generic - 2" X 1"

Large - 3 3/8" x 2 1/8"

Who Are We ?

NousLogic is a startup based in Irvine, California. It provides a system and devices to manage access to your home and monitor events that are happening inside and around your home. Together with NousLogic ReachMe service, it aims to become your smart home management and security partner.  

The company was founded by Hoang Nhu, who has 30 years of hands-on experience working for Hewlett Packard and Broadcom in state-of-the-art product innovation and development of digital signal processing algorithms, SoC System-on-Chip architecture/design, wireless, mobile HW/SW application platform, and emerging technologies. 

Sonic Unity has successfully completed a few crowdfunding projects, is assisting NousLogic in managing and marketing of this crowdfunding. 

For post project followup, please contact support@nouslogic.com and sales@nouslogic.com.  Do not contact Sonic Unity.

Ways You Can Help?

We need your help. Your contribution will help us implement new features to the NousLogic ReachMe services. You will be the first to learn about our next crowdfunding projects: the NousLogic Garage Watchman and DoSomething sensor that can work with ReachMe ActionTag.

Please tell your friends about us. Share us on Facebook, Pinterest, Instagram, Twitter and other social media. Post on reddit and other forums. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out and let people know about this great new product!

story:
Mobile data is too expensive!

 

The facts are startling:

  A typical family-of-4 pays approximately $275 per month for home internet, a mobile family plan, and internet equipment leases – that’s more than 7% of monthly net income for a US median average household.

 

 

  Millions of Americans cannot afford both home internet and a mobile data plan.*

  Family cell phone plans should be affordable, but some cost more than a car payment.

 

**

 

  23% of smartphone owners find a data plan necessary, but a financial burden.*

 

PalWiFi wants to make mobile data more affordable for everyone with a Better Way to Share WiFi!

We are excited to introduce our technology platform that helps the community share and save on internet access spending.  We ask for your support to drive the consumer movement and to help our community.

Together, we can make a difference in our community! 

 

PalWiFi invites consumers and small businesses to join and share your unused home internet capacity via our sharing technology. By sharing WiFi, users receive and use free WiFi as members of the growing PalWiFi trusted community.  Members use more free WiFi instead of using costly mobile data.

 

 

Join PalWiFi - membership is free.  As a member, you are a host and a guest on a secure platform. 

Share your WiFi, get free WiFi. 

Turn your home WiFi router into a community shareable hotspot and share WiFi with family, friends and neighbors in the community.  When away from home, your devices will easily connect to PalWiFi hotspots. 

Using PalWiFi, everyone shares, everyone saves, everyone benefits!

 

  Easy Access to a growing community of WiFi hotspots you help to build.

  Save money by using more free WiFi and less smartphone data.

  Contribute any broadband internet - cable, DSL, or fiber.

  Intuitive and easy. Share. Find. Connect.

 

 

Let’s build PalWiFi – one home, one local business, one neighborhood, one community at a time.  Consumers and small businesses create a growing community of PalWiFi hotspots, sharing and saving money together.

PalWiFi Community - potential for unlimited reach

 

 

PalWiFi developed a cloud-based technology and a software platform that enables a simple, safe and secure WiFi sharing experience to help us all save on our mobile phone bills.  

 

It's all in the App!

    Join

    • Membership in PalWiFi's trusted community is free. (Quick and simple to signup using your Facebook or Google account)
    • Download the free App and you're on your way to lowering your cell phone charges. Save!

    Share

    • Contribute your guest network to share. 
    • Your password is safe and encrypted in PalWiFi's platform.
    • Trusted community members use the PalWiFi App to connect to your shared guest network without seeing your shared password.  Secure!

    Find

    • Find nearby PalWiFi hotspots in our trusted community by enabling location services.
    • Use the map in the App to search for nearby free hotspots.  Simple!

    Connect

    • From your Wi-Fi list, choose the Wi-Fi network labeled "PalWiFi."
    • The PalWiFi App will securely push the shared password to the shared hotspot and you quickly connect to free WiFi.
    • Psst … retailers … no more being asked for the WiFi password by PalWiFi members!  Seamless!

     

     

    Share.  Find.  Connect.

     

     

     

     

    “Imagine all the people, sharing all the world…  I hope one day you’ll join us... ”  John Lennon

    At PalWiFi, with our patent-pending technology, we’re bringing the sharing technology we’ve imagined to life.  But we need you to join the movement!

     

     

    Consumers:  We need your support to help PalWiFi grow one home, one local business, one neighborhood, and one community at a time.  You enjoy free WiFi at other PalWiFi hotspots, use less cellular data, and you save money.

     

     

    Small Business Owners:  We need your support. You already attract more customers to your business with free WiFi. We created a better way for you to share your WiFi that saves you time and protects you. Customers will use the PalWiFi App to access your store’s PalWiFi trusted hotspot. (We designed the App with WiFi sharing security features to prevent bad people from doing bad things to us without being detected.)

     

     

    We invite the community to join together and bring more affordable mobile data to all Americans!

     

     

    At PalWiFi we have a plan.  We have the know-how.  We have been working on PalWiFi for the past year and we've come a long way.  As we continue our development to make sharing WiFi even better, we need some help to make PalWiFi available everywhere for everyone.

    Maybe you can help?

    Funding: We need help and funding to build the Android App, improve the existing iOS App, pay for Virtual Machines (VM's) to host the cloud platform, scale the software, scale the cloud platform, make the solution better, protect privacy better, protect our security better, and pay for marketing to grow PalWiFi everywhere you want free WiFi. We will build the virtual mobile network platform that powers the sharing economy for all of us to confidently contribute, share, and save!

    Referrals: Word-of-mouth referral is the best gift you can give us.  Download the App, join the trusted community, share, and use free WiFi.  Tell your friends, your family, your neighbors, and your local businesses to join.  Let's start a sharing revolution together!

    Give us a review of our App:  Tell us what you like and what we can do better. We would love your input!

     

     

    The Risks

    Service Providers may prevent consumers from sharing their home WiFi:  The PalWiFi service requires that every member contribute their home internet service to share with the community. Our go-to-market strategy is designed to help landline broadband service providers protect their core internet access business from the threat of broadband cord-cutting.

    It will take a little while before consumers see real benefit from millions of free PalWiFi hotspots: We are committed to investing in people, resources, and marketing campaigns to launch PalWiFi one neighborhood, one community, and one city at a time.

    The Reward 

    … "I can't afford a family data plan. My teenagers get flip phones. They use WiFi at home. PalWiFi will be great when they leave the house." Mr. Adkins

    … "My family-of-4's data plan costs more than my car payment. It will be great to save money."  Mrs. Bates

    … "When our parents get new cell phones, we get the hand-me-downs, but, no data plan. Free wifi? Count us in!"  Kelley & Stacey

    … “Tuition, books, and food cost so much at school, we can’t afford to have a bigger data plan.  Free WiFi would be awesome.” George & Simon

     

     

    Ensuring your ultimate safety and security is our foremost concern!

    The PalWiFi Cloud platform enables a simple sharing experience that mitigates security and fraud concerns.  Share your guest network password in the PalWiFi App and we will act as your concierge to facilitate the WiFi sharing discretely and securely.

     

     

    With the PalWiFi cloud platform, we endeavor to ensure your shared password is secure, your network privacy is protected, and in the near future, we will help you manage appropriate content consumption for your children while they are using the growing PalWiFi virtual network.

     

     

    We are passionate and committed to solving this challenge affecting our community.  This passion inspired our team to create PalWiFi. 

    Our experience and expertise in having built very large broadband and WiFi networks for companies like Comcast, AT&T, and @Home Network, drove us to build a network platform that empowers the sharing economy. 

     

     

    We will not be satisfied until we have tens of millions of PalWiFi trusted hotspots for our community to use free WiFi!

     

     

    Our team invites all Americans to join PalWiFi.  Download the App today and let's start sharing and saving!

     

    Thuy Nguyen, Founder 

    Broadband is in Thuy's DNA - @Comcast, ALU, CSCO, ATHM. Network Management is Thuy's passion. Personal network management in a wireless connected world is the new challenge.

     

    I. K. N., Co-Founder & Technical Lead

    I.K. is an Architect and Engineering Leader. I.K. has developed some very large WiFi platforms serving AT&T and Comcast subscribers.

     

    Nicole Antonopoulos, Co-Founder & Creative Lead

    Nicole is our creative and design leader.  Nicole leads us in getting things done.

     

    Don Hutchison, Advisor - @Angellist, @Work, ATHM, NetCom

    Mark Sue, Advisor - @Lehman, RBC, GoldmanSachs

     

    _________________________________________________________________

    Disclaimer:  While millions of users share Internet using the Guest Network feature of their WiFi routers, we recommend you check the rules of your own Internet provider to ensure it's not prohibited.

    Sources:

    * PEW Research Center

    ** Best Cell Phone Plans 2016, tom's guide, September 29, 2016
story_txt:
Mobile data is too expensive! The facts are startling:  A typical family-of-4 pays approximately $275 per month for home internet, a mobile family plan, and internet equipment leases – that’s more than 7% of monthly net income for a US median average household.    Millions of Americans cannot afford both home internet and a mobile data plan.*  Family cell phone plans should be affordable, but some cost more than a car payment. **   23% of smartphone owners find a data plan necessary, but a financial burden.* PalWiFi wants to make mobile data more affordable for everyone with a Better Way to Share WiFi!We are excited to introduce our technology platform that helps the community share and save on internet access spending.  We ask for your support to drive the consumer movement and to help our community.Together, we can make a difference in our community!  PalWiFi invites consumers and small businesses to join and share your unused home internet capacity via our sharing technology. By sharing WiFi, users receive and use free WiFi as members of the growing PalWiFi trusted community.  Members use more free WiFi instead of using costly mobile data.  Join PalWiFi - membership is free.  As a member, you are a host and a guest on a secure platform. Share your WiFi, get free WiFi. Turn your home WiFi router into a community shareable hotspot and share WiFi with family, friends and neighbors in the community.  When away from home, your devices will easily connect to PalWiFi hotspots. Using PalWiFi, everyone shares, everyone saves, everyone benefits!   Easy Access to a growing community of WiFi hotspots you help to build.  Save money by using more free WiFi and less smartphone data.  Contribute any broadband internet - cable, DSL, or fiber.  Intuitive and easy. Share. Find. Connect.  Let’s build PalWiFi – one home, one local business, one neighborhood, one community at a time.  Consumers and small businesses create a growing community of PalWiFi hotspots, sharing and saving money together.PalWiFi Community - potential for unlimited reach  PalWiFi developed a cloud-based technology and a software platform that enables a simple, safe and secure WiFi sharing experience to help us all save on our mobile phone bills.   It's all in the App!Join
Membership in PalWiFi's trusted community is free. (Quick and simple to signup using your Facebook or Google account)

Download the free App and you're on your way to lowering your cell phone charges. Save!
Share
Contribute your guest network to share. 
Your password is safe and encrypted in PalWiFi's platform.
Trusted community members use the PalWiFi App to connect to your shared guest network without seeing your shared password.  Secure!
Find
Find nearby PalWiFi hotspots in our trusted community by enabling location services.
Use the map in the App to search for nearby free hotspots.  Simple!
Connect
From your Wi-Fi list, choose the Wi-Fi network labeled "PalWiFi."
The PalWiFi App will securely push the shared password to the shared hotspot and you quickly connect to free WiFi.
Psst … retailers … no more being asked for the WiFi password by PalWiFi members!  Seamless!
  Share.  Find.  Connect.    “Imagine all the people, sharing all the world…  I hope one day you’ll join us... ”  John LennonAt PalWiFi, with our patent-pending technology, we’re bringing the sharing technology we’ve imagined to life.  But we need you to join the movement!  Consumers:  We need your support to help PalWiFi grow one home, one local business, one neighborhood, and one community at a time.  You enjoy free WiFi at other PalWiFi hotspots, use less cellular data, and you save money.  Small Business Owners:  We need your support. You already attract more customers to your business with free WiFi. We created a better way for you to share your WiFi that saves you time and protects you. Customers will use the PalWiFi App to access your store’s PalWiFi trusted hotspot. (We designed the App with WiFi sharing security features to prevent bad people from doing bad things to us without being detected.)  We invite the community to join together and bring more affordable mobile data to all Americans!  At PalWiFi we have a plan.  We have the know-how.  We have been working on PalWiFi for the past year and we've come a long way.  As we continue our development to make sharing WiFi even better, we need some help to make PalWiFi available everywhere for everyone.Maybe you can help?Funding: We need help and funding to build the Android App, improve the existing iOS App, pay for Virtual Machines (VM's) to host the cloud platform, scale the software, scale the cloud platform, make the solution better, protect privacy better, protect our security better, and pay for marketing to grow PalWiFi everywhere you want free WiFi. We will build the virtual mobile network platform that powers the sharing economy for all of us to confidently contribute, share, and save!Referrals: Word-of-mouth referral is the best gift you can give us.  Download the App, join the trusted community, share, and use free WiFi.  Tell your friends, your family, your neighbors, and your local businesses to join.  Let's start a sharing revolution together!Give us a review of our App:  Tell us what you like and what we can do better. We would love your input!  The RisksService Providers may prevent consumers from sharing their home WiFi:  The PalWiFi service requires that every member contribute their home internet service to share with the community. Our go-to-market strategy is designed to help landline broadband service providers protect their core internet access business from the threat of broadband cord-cutting.It will take a little while before consumers see real benefit from millions of free PalWiFi hotspots: We are committed to investing in people, resources, and marketing campaigns to launch PalWiFi one neighborhood, one community, and one city at a time.The Reward … "I can't afford a family data plan. My teenagers get flip phones. They use WiFi at home. PalWiFi will be great when they leave the house." Mr. Adkins… "My family-of-4's data plan costs more than my car payment. It will be great to save money."  Mrs. Bates… "When our parents get new cell phones, we get the hand-me-downs, but, no data plan. Free wifi? Count us in!"  Kelley & Stacey… “Tuition, books, and food cost so much at school, we can’t afford to have a bigger data plan.  Free WiFi would be awesome.” George & Simon  Ensuring your ultimate safety and security is our foremost concern!The PalWiFi Cloud platform enables a simple sharing experience that mitigates security and fraud concerns.  Share your guest network password in the PalWiFi App and we will act as your concierge to facilitate the WiFi sharing discretely and securely.  With the PalWiFi cloud platform, we endeavor to ensure your shared password is secure, your network privacy is protected, and in the near future, we will help you manage appropriate content consumption for your children while they are using the growing PalWiFi virtual network.  We are passionate and committed to solving this challenge affecting our community.  This passion inspired our team to create PalWiFi. Our experience and expertise in having built very large broadband and WiFi networks for companies like Comcast, AT&T, and @Home Network, drove us to build a network platform that empowers the sharing economy.   We will not be satisfied until we have tens of millions of PalWiFi trusted hotspots for our community to use free WiFi!  Our team invites all Americans to join PalWiFi.  Download the App today and let's start sharing and saving! Thuy Nguyen, Founder Broadband is in Thuy's DNA - @Comcast, ALU, CSCO, ATHM. Network Management is Thuy's passion. Personal network management in a wireless connected world is the new challenge. I. K. N., Co-Founder & Technical LeadI.K. is an Architect and Engineering Leader. I.K. has developed some very large WiFi platforms serving AT&T and Comcast subscribers. Nicole Antonopoulos, Co-Founder & Creative LeadNicole is our creative and design leader.  Nicole leads us in getting things done. Don Hutchison, Advisor - @Angellist, @Work, ATHM, NetComMark Sue, Advisor - @Lehman, RBC, GoldmanSachs _________________________________________________________________Disclaimer:  While millions of users share Internet using the Guest Network feature of their WiFi routers, we recommend you check the rules of your own Internet provider to ensure it's not prohibited.Sources:* PEW Research Center** Best Cell Phone Plans 2016, tom's guide, September 29, 2016

story:
Regular desks are often boring by design and don't have what you really need.

You often end up needing to buy additional gadgets, but then run out of free space.

Sometimes they break if you try to move them, or you simply can’t position them properly to fit your needs and you end up buying a new one.

The solution is simple and Deskbloks puts an end to it with its modular design!

Deskbloks - one desk to rule them all.

 

 

You can combine every bloks we have to build your perfect desk, in the future we will have some various combinations of size, weight, shapes and functionality of our bloks.

Now there are available choice of only 5 different bloks, but as our campaign continue we will make others and new one to match your perfect desk, and we will give some of you chance to design bloks for us, and even you will get paid for every bloks that is designed from you after we sell it, for ever and ever.

How our campaign move forward we will unlock and make new bloks for you,  and we will accept all your ideas so you can be part of this project.

 

You like our project and want to write about us, contact us through our email.

Deskbloks is something new and revolutionary in desk design. Your desk no longer needs to be simplistic. Now, with Deskbloks, you can make it larger, smaller, you can rotate it, make it fit any of your walls, add new bloks with some cool gadgets that will save your space, etc.

If you want to use Deskbloks as a regular desk, no problem, you can use just regular bloks. But if you need USB ports, for example, then you can use bloks with USB ports. Hey, but what about a speaker? Maybe you don’t have enough room on your desk or you simply hate the cables. No problem - in that case, you can use bloks with a USB speaker built-in.

In today’s modern times, you probably own a smartphone. We thought of that as well, with bloks that have wireless charger built-in.

What about cables for your PC or a laptop? All our bloks are designed with cable management in mind, that’s why we created channels in bloks and holes in desk legs for cables to pass through. Cable mess behind your desk is history!

At the moment, there are 5 different bloks that we created. With your help and if the crowdfunding campaign proves to be a success, we will create additional bloks.

Some of you will even get a chance to design their own bloks.

The great thing about that is - you earn percentage of profit from sales of that particular bloks, as long as that bloks keeps selling! Possibilities for bloks are endless.

     

     

     

Currently, for our prototype, we are only using one type of wood - the Croatian oak, but in the future, we will allow our customers to choose between more types of wood, depending on their preferences of desk color, structure and design.

 

Our bloks are connectable in all directions, providing for infinite possibilities. It takes less than a few minutes to connect 6 types of bloks, together with legs, into a fully functional desk.

The process is easy:

  • Pick your bloks, then group and arrange them as you wish
  • Put them on the backside
  • Use our metal plates and screws to secure them together
  • Add legs
  • Done

The same process is used for adding new bloks and reversed for disassembly.

It's practical and easy to transport it.

Perfect cable management.

All future orders will be goin through our web shop where you will have online configurator that will help you to create your perfect desk.

The idea of Deskbloks goes a few years back. We saw Dave Hakkens, a Dutch designer and his concept of a modular mobile phone - Phonebloks, and later Project Ara from Google, with a similar design.

We decided that we wanted to build a modular PC case, but that proved to be challenging, so we came to an idea to build a modular desk.

First it was supposed to be only a simple case/desk, but one day I played Lego with my little cousin and we built a desk out of Legos. That’s when I came to an idea for Deskbloks (the name came later).

After some research on the Web, we saw that no one has made anything like it. One day we were watching Lord of the Rings at our friend’s house and talked about this idea. They liked it, and one of the friends shouted “One desk to rule them all!”

We liked it and stuck to that motto till today.

After that, we started working on Deskbloks. In our first versions we used cheap wood but soon discarded it since it proved not to be up to our desired quality level. We decided that from now on, we’ll only be using a good, hard wood, resistant to wear by time, weather conditions, and temperatures and chose to go with the world famous Croatian oak.

During the production time, we usually get ideas for new bloks, but since we don’t have our own CNC machinery, we had to pay others to make them for us, which had impact on our budget and we were thus able to produce only 5 different bloks.

Build to last.

Our team now counts 2 members only. Our head of production is Stephan, who has a degree in IT engineering and computer science.

Tony is our assistant, who constantly helps around the project and was here from the start, together with Stephan.

We started as a team of 5, but in the meantime, some of our members found jobs in other areas and left the project. In spare time, they still try to help with ideas and such, but we hope they’ll be back some time after the campaign so we can be a full team again.

For every contributor we have prepared some awards which, we think, will show our gratitude for helping us with the project.

If you like what we are doing, and cannot contribute funds, please share us on Facebook and other social media with included #deskbloks hashtag.

All help counts and means a lot to us. We will show our gratitude in the future.

Here are the official links for you to share:

WEB, Facebook, Twitter, Google+, YouTube

We think Deskbloks is a good concept and some work is already done. We have a working prototype and are ready to make more.

With your investment, you will help this project come to life with minimal risk.

We promise the funds will be spent carefully into making the best possible Deskbloks for you and on the graph below you can see just how the funds are distributed.

No matter the outcome, our goal is to get Deskbloks to market and to your place. We don’t plan to give up on the project, it is our passion.

MANUFACTURING: It takes about 1-2 days to create one regular bloks. But, to minimize the production cost and time, we are looking into and talking to a few bigger companies that have better machines, and if the campaign is successful, we will probably rent our own machines and hire more people, therefore decreasing the build time and increasing the quality even further.

PRODUCT: Current desk is not final, we like to say it’s desk numbered 000, a kind of prototype. The final product will differ from desk 000, but in a good way. Our desks and bloks will improve in many ways over time and you will be updated about it. We will also accept and consider your suggestions.

SHIPPING: After the successful campaign end, we will rent the machines and hire more people, so we can get going faster. We hope that we could start sending our first shipments in the Q1/Q2 2017. Special care needs to be taken of packaging, because different wood reacts differently (shrinks and widens) to weather conditions, humidity, temperature, etc. Therefore, in order to get them to their destination in perfect condition, some desks can be shipped sooner and some later.

We are very confident and excited about the project. We believe we're further down the development path than most similar projects on crowdfunding sites. You will be informed on weekly basis and in the event of an unexpected situation, we will work hard to minimize the impact on delivery times.
