story:
Du möchtest eine Fremdsprache lernen, ohne lästiges Vokabeln pauken und Grammatik büffeln? Mit jetMovie lernst du gehirn-gerecht, effizient und vor allem mit mehr Spaß!

You want to learn a new language without cramming of vocabularies and grammar? 
With jetMovie you'll learn brain-suitable, more effective and with more fun!

 

So funktioniert's 

How it works


Die Birkenbihl-Methode
Vera F. Birkenbihl war Bestsellerautorin und eine der erfolgreichsten Managementtrainerinnen Deutschlands. Über 20 Jahre lang beschäftigte sie sich mit dem Sprachenlernen. Dabei entwickelte sie eine Methode, mit der ihre unzähligen Schüler verblüffende Erfolge erzielten.

 

 

Das Erfolgsgeheimnis der Methode:
Gehirn-gerecht: So wie es unser Gehirn will. Neues Entdecken, Zusammenhänge verstehen und Interessantes, sich merken. So wie wir die Muttersprache gelernt haben.  Und jetzt machen wir es mit Filmen. Das ist (fast) so wie es selbst erlebt zu haben, wie ein Aufenthalt im fremden Land. Intuitiv. Die "De-Kodierzeile" (Oben ist die Fremdsprache, unten die Wort-für-Wort Übersetzung) hilft uns die Bedeutung der Fremdsprache zu verstehen, anstatt mühevollem Vokabeln pauken.

The Birkenbihl Approach, Language learning made easy!​
The Birkenbihl Approach is based on study results from neuroscience and social sciences. The idea is to learn a foreign language just like you have learned your own mother tongue. Children learn their mother tongue completely intuitively – without any cramming of vocabs or grammar rules. Adults should learn the same way as children, with the only difference to use their abilities to read, listen carefully and compare a foreign language to the mother tongue.

 

jetMovie – Sprachen lernen mit Filmen

jetMovie – learning languages by entertainment

Es geht noch mehr: Sprachkurse mit TV-Filmen!
Seit knapp 2 Jahren sind die ersten Episoden (Folgen) in Englisch und Spanisch verfügbar. Alle User fragen nach mehr. Weil's lustig und erfolgreich ist. Sprache lernen und Filme sehen!

There is one more thing:  Language Courses using Movies!
Five so-called jetMovies are already available, and the project plans to release 64 new films in the near future (next 3 month) in German, English, French and Spanish. Episodes of the television show Discovery Extra are already licensed and ready to be used. 

 

Jetzt im Crowdfunding Angebot:
  * 64 neue Episoden (Folgen) in
  * 4 Sprachen (EN,ES,FR,DE)
  * 1700 Minuten Lern-Spaß
  * Mega-Preis-Reduktion (bis zu -45% vom regulären Verkaufspreis)

 

Vera F.Birkenbihl – Zitat nach der Vorstellung der ersten marktfähigen Englisch-Kurse (2009): "Ja das ist gut, so kann man mit dem Computer erstmals wirklich eine Sprache lernen! Und jetzt machen Sie das ganze noch mit Filmen! Ein Blockbuster enthält mehr als 1200 Wörter (Wortschatz) damit können Sie die Sprache perfekt lernen. Sehr gut, darauf freue ich mich!"

We used The Birkenbihl Approach successfully with our Linguajet courses for years. Now we go even further: Using TV and movies as a learning strategy!

To summarize it: you get to watch funny movies in a foreign language, including a “karaoke”-like program called jetline, three times a day for ten-minutes. After six weeks, you’ll speak a new language effortlessly!

Together we can realize jetMovies in all languages – to make language learning so easy like never before.

 

Lerne  wann, wo und wie oft du möchtest!

Learning when, where and how often you want!

Bestimme deinen Lernerfolg. Dieser ist garantiert und hängt nur von der Anzahl Ihrer Übungen ab. Jeder kann so eine (oder mehrere - auch gleichzeitig) Fremdsprachen lernen.

Beispiel Ihres Lernerfolges:
  * 6 Wochen lang lustige Filme ansehen
  * 3 x 10 Minuten pro Tag genügen
  = Fremdsprache erlernt! 

 

 

Alle Vorteile auf einen Blick: 
That's what it makes unique!

 

 

Belohnung

Reward

Deine Unterstützung wird belohnt: Bis zu 45% Preisnachlass pro Kurs  – wer sich schneller für seinen Spaß entscheidet, hat eindeutig mehr davon! 

Your support will be rewarded: receive a discount of up to 45% per course!

 

Erweiterte Ziele

Stretch Goals

Was passiert, wenn wir höhere Umsatzziele erreichen?
Die Produktionsplanung und die Umsatzziele stehen klar fest. Die Lieferungen werden plangemäß umgesetzt. Zusätzlich bieten wir Bonusmaterialien und AddOn's an, die jeweils bei erreichter Umsatzhöhe an alle Käufer (Backer) zusätzlich geliefert werden.

Danke für deine Unterstützung! Wir freuen uns, wenn du uns bei der Verbreitung unserer Kampagne unterstützt!

Thank you for your support! Please spread the word! 

 

Webinar-Aufzeichnungen:

 

 

 

Weitere Movies about Linguajet:

Episodes of the television show Discovery Extra are already licensed and ready to be used. 

 
Jetzt im Crowdfunding Angebot:   * 64 neue Episoden (Folgen) in  * 4 Sprachen (EN,ES,FR,DE)  * 1700 Minuten Lern-Spaß  * Mega-Preis-Reduktion (bis zu -45% vom regulären Verkaufspreis)

 
Vera F.Birkenbihl – Zitat nach der Vorstellung der ersten marktfähigen Englisch-Kurse (2009): "Ja das ist gut, so kann man mit dem Computer erstmals wirklich eine Sprache lernen! Und jetzt machen Sie das ganze noch mit Filmen! Ein Blockbuster enthält mehr als 1200 Wörter (Wortschatz) damit können Sie die Sprache perfekt lernen. Sehr gut, darauf freue ich mich!"
We used The Birkenbihl Approach successfully with our Linguajet courses for years. Now we go even further: Using TV and movies as a learning strategy!
To summarize it: you get to watch funny movies in a foreign language, including a “karaoke”-like program called jetline, three times a day for ten-minutes. After six weeks, you’ll speak a new language effortlessly!
Together we can realize jetMovies in all languages – to make language learning so easy like never before.
 
Lerne  wann, wo und wie oft du möchtest!
Learning when, where and how often you want!
Bestimme deinen Lernerfolg. Dieser ist garantiert und hängt nur von der Anzahl Ihrer Übungen ab. Jeder kann so eine (oder mehrere - auch gleichzeitig) Fremdsprachen lernen.
Beispiel Ihres Lernerfolges:  * 6 Wochen lang lustige Filme ansehen  * 3 x 10 Minuten pro Tag genügen  = Fremdsprache erlernt! 

 
 
Alle Vorteile auf einen Blick: That's what it makes unique!

 
 
Belohnung
Reward
Deine Unterstützung wird belohnt: Bis zu 45% Preisnachlass pro Kurs  – wer sich schneller für seinen Spaß entscheidet, hat eindeutig mehr davon! 
Your support will be rewarded: receive a discount of up to 45% per course!

 
Erweiterte Ziele
Stretch Goals
Was passiert, wenn wir höhere Umsatzziele erreichen?Die Produktionsplanung und die Umsatzziele stehen klar fest. Die Lieferungen werden plangemäß umgesetzt. Zusätzlich bieten wir Bonusmaterialien und AddOn's an, die jeweils bei erreichter Umsatzhöhe an alle Käufer (Backer) zusätzlich geliefert werden.

Danke für deine Unterstützung! Wir freuen uns, wenn du uns bei der Verbreitung unserer Kampagne unterstützt!
Thank you for your support! Please spread the word! 
 
Webinar-Aufzeichnungen:





 
 

 
Weitere Movies about Linguajet:

story:
Short Summary

  • Hi, I am Laurent. I'm a passionate, creative idea man that puts all he has in his ideas. I am currently a student at Rutgers University with a major in computer science and a minor in business.
  • We are creating this app because every day as a college student I see students partying in an unsafe manner. I see students collapsed from alcohol poisoning and people searching the streets for their drunk friends. This app will provide a safe way for students and other young adults to go out. We at Silhouette know its important to have fun but we want people to be able to be able to navigate the streets safely, stay in touch with their friends and in the case of a medical emergency have the right information readily available. Our app puts the consumers' safety and wellbeing first.
  •  Contributors to this project will be able to help us fund the development of our application and the implementation of it into colleges and universities as well as cities that have a large population of young adults.  Our goal is to help save lives from alcohol poisoning.

 

Watch How it Works

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding for this app will go towards app development, business development, and marketing.
  • For donating to our great cause in return you will receive exclusive merchandise and can even get your business or yourself mentioned as a sponsor on our merch and website.
  • If our entire goal is not met our funds will be entirely focused on developing the app.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Our project will help save lives by helping prevent young adults from getting alcohol poisoning.
  • This app will provide ways for young adults to stay in touch with their friends and loved ones as well as provide a way for them to stay safe in a tough situation with features such as MediTag

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • The main challenge we face is getting the app to spread fast across the young adult market but with your funds, we will be able to advertise the app on multiple social media platforms and overcome this challenge. In addition, we have the support of many high ranking officials in the technology industry.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If your unable to contribute by donating, you can help by spreading our website, silhouetteapp.me to your friends and family
  • You can even use the Indiegogo share tools!

Check Out Our Website

silhouetteapp.me

 

Press Release

Click here, Silhouette has been featured in the following media outlets and more. The San Diego Union-Tribune, Star Tribune, Digital Journal, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette.

 

Perks-Swag

see some images of our swag in our image gallery at the top of the page!

story:
The Link Case is designed to link your phone to your hand so you can use your phone comfortably and securely. 

Whether you are browsing social media, texting, talking, or snapping pictures, the strap is designed to be used in either hand in both portrait and landscape mode. 

Designed for versatility, the strap is adjustable, interchangeable and removable. Our case also has a dual layer shockproof design, because accidents still happen. 

The Link Case started as a simple solution to an annoying problem, holding your phone. Whether you use your pinky finger to hold it up or both hands, smartphones are not easy to hold. Our ‘simple’ solution turned into years of design, research and prototypes and the end result…our patented Link case. 

 

Whether you are at home on the couch or going out, be ready with the Link Case.  

 

After years of developing the Link Case, we are still finding new ways to use it in our daily lives.

Show us how you use yours: Instagram, Facebook. 

From the beginning, our goal was to manufacture our case in the United States. Since then, we have  learned the cost of supporting jobs in America, and it is much higher than overseas where many companies outsource to. 

Despite the cost savings, everything from prototyping to manufacturing has been with companies located throughout the United States. For a small start-up, that means higher costs and stretching our budget even further. 

But with the help of our initial investors (friends and family), we have recently begun machining our custom molds right here in the U.S.A. We are scheduled to begin manufacturing in central Texas by the end of Summer. 

 

Back our campaign and help us launch the Link Case!

Make a contribution or pick a perk to back our campaign and receive an iPhone (6, 6S, 7, 8) Link Case that includes two straps (retail price $39.99). 

 

Risks and Challenges

Like any new project started by industry outsiders we have had to overcome a few challenges along the way to meet our milestones.  We secured patents, the machinery to make the case, and now we just need your help to get the raw materials turned into our thoughtfully designed cases.  We are excited to get the first units produced, tested and get our Link cases ready for the first pledged orders!

story:
Underinflated tires are hard to detect with the naked eye. Can you tell which tire is underinflated just by looking?

 

The Dangerous Facts About Underinflated Tires:

 

 

Meet the ZUS Smart Tire Safety Monitor. With ZUS, you no longer have to guess what's wrong with your tires. View individual tire pressure data directly on your smartphone for a safer drive and improved gas mileage. Powered by an intelligent algorithm, ZUS warns you of any slow leaks before they become a serious problem. It's perfect for your 4-wheel drive or pickup truck.

 

 

Top auto vlogger, Chris Fix, takes the ZUS Smart Tire Safety Monitor for a spin. Click to start watching.

All our products undergo rigorous testing before release, including several rounds of Beta testing. Here are comments from some of our Beta testers.

 

A set of 4 sensors, one for each tire, detects tire temperature and pressure data in real-time.

Data passes wirelessly through the in-car receiver and instantly appears on the ZUS app through Bluetooth. The receiver will blink and sound off an alarm whenever an issue is detected.

View individual tire pressures (as PSI/kPa/Bar) and temperatures (°F/°C) directly on your smartphone. Get app notifications whenever things look abnormal.

 

Why Slow Leaks Are Hard to Detect

Slow leaks caused by tire punctures from screws are hard to detect because the leakage rate is often too low (i.e. ~0.1% PSI per hour). Also, natural pressure fluctuations that occur due to temperature changes during the day can mask any slow leaks.

How Our Product Can Detect Slow Leaks

The ZUS app stores both tire temperature and pressure history, allowing our proprietary AccurateTemp Algorithm to normalize temperature fluctuations throughout the day, so that you can see accurate tire pressure changes. In this way, you can tell whether your tires are leaking slowly or not. 

 

With only 3 installation steps, take ZUS with you on your next trip and install it on your rental car in just 10 minutes - a small investment in exchange for yours and your family's safety while on the road.

 

Underinflated tires cause your fuel consumption to go up. Easily put more money back into your pocket by keeping your tires properly inflated. The ZUS app lets you know when your tire pressure is low. 

 

Keep sensors secured with our locking kit, a set of 4 locking nuts, which locks your sensor in place to prevent your sensors from being easily unscrewed by strangers. This locking system also keeps your sensors tightly fastened when going off-roading. Included free of charge.

 

Connect the receiver to a USB car charger and then charge up your mobile devices through the receiver's reversible USB charging port, which enables you to plug in your cable in any direction. This way, you never lose a charging port.

 

When compared to other products in the market, ZUS Smart Tire Safety Monitor not only offers more features but also at a steal of a price.

 

Next Generation German Sensor:

​

 

 

 

 

Manufacturing in Progress

 

For our US backers, enjoy free US shipping on us. For our international backers, we're offering flat-rate shipping. Please note that if you're located overseas, you may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees (i.e. VAT/GST).

 

nonda is a smart hardware startup based in Silicon Valley. We're on a mission to provide app-enabled devices to improve the lives of people everywhere, including those of car drivers around the world.

We've previously delivered the ZUS Smart Car Charger and ZUS Super Duty Cable on time right here on Indiegogo and we plan to do the same with the ZUS Smart Tire Safety Monitor!

User Ratings for Our Connected Car Products:

Our Design Awards

Just a Few of Our Media Awards

 

Will this work with my car?

The ZUS STSM will work on four-wheeled vehicles up to 19.6ft in length. Sensors compatible with most cars, but are not compatible with RVs, trailers, semi trucks or motorhomes.

Why order now?

By backing now, you'll get to own one of the very first ZUS Smart Tire Safety Monitors off the line plus exclusive access to prices only available during the Indiegogo campaign.

Is this theft-proof?

We've included an anti-theft locking system for free. The system will lock your sensor against others from unscrewing it. The anti-theft locking system comprises of the wrench and nuts that are included with the sensors. If you put the nut on the tire valve, put the sensor on the valve, and then unscrew the nut so that it presses up against the sensor you will not be able to unscrew the sensor after that. You will be able to remove nut and sensor only if you have the wrench in the correct size.

Do I have to pay VAT/GST?

Yes, customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient.

What is the difference between the ZUS Smart Tire Safety Monitor and traditional Tire Pressure Monitoring Systems (TPMS)?

As opposed to traditional TPMS products, we employ the most advanced sensors that can detect not only pressure but also temperature. Also, our proprietary AccurateTemp Algorithm is able to detect hard-to-notice slow leaks and reveal safety issues about your tires directly on your smartphone.

By law all cars are required to have a TPMS installed, why do I need this product?

Yes, by law all car manufacturers have to equip their cars with a TPMS system. However, most car manufacturers get around this rule by adding a cheap indirect TPMS system in their cars. The problem for indirect systems are: 1) it doesn't show you individual tire pressure. 2) it only alerts you when something goes wrong with your tire, but it doesn't tell you exactly what the problem is and which tire. 3) It only works for fast leaks and does not show the slow leaks coming from your tires. You can learn more about indirect TPMS by reading here.

ZUS STSM is a great upgrade from cheap and inadequate indirect TPMS systems. If your car already has a TPMS installed that tells you exactly which tire is underinflated, you won't need an upgrade to ZUS STSM. However, a lot of users with this type of pre-installed TPMS still get the ZUS Smart Tire Safety Monitor so that they can take it on-the-go in case they ever need it for another car (i.e. vacation car rental).

What devices is the app compatible with?

The app is compatible with iPhone/iPad/iPod touch with iOS 8 or later and Android 4.3 or later with Bluetooth 4.0 or newer.

What payment options do I have?

You can pay via credit card. Select a perk and you'll see the available payment methods at checkout.

How are your next generation German sensors different from other sensors on the market?

What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today?

There are risks with production at every step of the way, but luckily for you, we've done all the hard work of getting a product through the tooling process and getting ready for scale. We are using Indiegogo as a way to validate our product. All of the numbers are real, and the backers are real. We want your help to keep us and our team accountable at every step of the way. Now, we just want your help to scale the production process and get all units ready to ship. If there is anything you need to change or update, just reach out to us!

story:
Introducing the Mu Two - the World's thinnest international USB Type-C fast charger, and our most powerful Mu wall charger yet. 

Simultaneously charge your devices with the dual USB Type-C ports. Designed with a primary USB C port for the latest compatible Type-C charged laptops, and secondary USB C port for tablets and smartphones.
 


The Mu Two has a fixed split to share the 63W maximum power output to make it more useful for your daily charging needs. 

Though capable of 63W output, we guarantee that port #1 will always be able to deliver 45W to charge a Type-C PD compatible laptop when the secondary port is in use. Therefore, the maximum output of port #2 is 18W which is plenty to charge tablets and smartphones. 
 

This next generation USB Type-C 63W charger is more powerful than its predecessor - it charges Type-C laptops including the latest Macbooks and notebooks, as well as all tablets and smartphones.

Designed to charge Type-C, Micro USB and Lightning charged devices. 

Simply plug in to the wall and then use a Type-C to C cable, C to Micro USB cable or C to Lightning cable to your devices.

 

 

Under the Hood:

  •  Gallium Nitride Technology (GaN) Technology - Enabling very high-power in a super small space, all with over 90% efficiency. This technological breakthrough in power is the real genius under the hood, enabling us to provide big power in our tiny Mu Two.
  •  Power Delivery (PD) Technology - Fast charge, adaptive charge, quick charge – it’s all about being able to change the voltage output of the charger to adjust to devices and create a quick charging experience. The Mu Two comes with a PD controller onboard and will charge fast. 
  •  Quick Charge (QC) compliant - As well as PD technology, the Mu Two is also Quick Charge compatible for QC enabled devices.
  •  Auto-Detect Chip - Providing intelligent identification to iOS, Android and other devices to ensure that they charge at an optimum rate. The Mu Two provides the perfect charge no matter which device, make or model is being used, upto 63W.
     

The Mu Two boasts a patented fold-flat design with an interchangeable plug head system, enabling the product to be used in over 200 countries worldwide whilst remaining pocket sized and portable. 


Each unit ships with all three international interchangeable Mu plug heads.
 

 A super slim design makes the Mu Two the ultimate charger. Perfect for commuting and working, at home, or travelling when away abroad. Say goodbye to baggage bulges, plug scratches to your devices in your bag and bulky laptop power bricks.

 

Technical Overview

Pocket sized and compact, the Mu Two can reduce its size to an amazing 14mm thin.
 

 

Rewards

By pre-ordering through Indiegogo and picking a reward, not only will you be getting your hands on the second batch of the Mu Two before it goes into retail, but you will also get a huge discount to the expected RRP.

The Mu Two will be produced in black and shipped worldwide (UK & US shipping fee $5.00, Rest of World $10.00) with the following rewards:

PLEASE NOTE: This campaign is funding in $ USD.  In the rewards outlined below, the £ GBP is estimated at time of campaign launch. Exchange rate may vary.

 

• Mu Two

Includes:

  • Mu Two 63W Dual USB Type-C PD Wall Charger
  • Includes Mu international Heads (US, UK & EU)
  • Dual USB C ports for simultaneously charging your laptop, and smartphone or tablet

• Mu Two + Type-C Cable

Includes:

  • Mu Two 63W Dual USB Type-C PD Wall Charger
  • Includes Mu international Heads (US, UK & EU)
  • Dual USB C ports for simultaneously charging your laptop, and smartphone or tablet
  • Mu Type-C to C charging cable

• Mu Two: Twin Pack

Includes:

  • 2x Mu Two 63W Dual USB Type-C PD Wall Chargers
  • Includes Mu international Heads (US, UK & EU)
  • Dual USB C ports for simultaneously charging your laptop, and smartphone or tablet

 

• Mu Two: Quad Pack

Includes:

  • 4x Mu Two 63W Dual USB Type-C PD Wall Chargers
  • Includes Mu international Heads (US, UK & EU)
  • Dual USB C ports for simultaneously charging your laptop, and smartphone or tablet

 

Timescales

Upon completion of the initial Kickstarter campaign, the Mu Two will now be available to pre-order through Indiegogo In Demand.


• Kickstarter backers: Batch #1: Estimated shipping July 2020
• Indiegogo backers: Batch #2: Estimated shipping August 2020

 

But why did we decide to launch on Kickstarter first and then InDemand on Indiegogo?


We want to give as many people as possible the opportunity to get their hands on the 'all new' Mu Two, and Indiegogo to us has a wider overseas audience which we have not captured from Kickstarter so far.

 

Development

 

The Mu Story

What started as an award winning design evolved into the Mu One; the benchmark for compact chargers. Now the Mu Two leads this category forward as the next chapter of the Mu story. 

Previous winner of the British Design of the Year Award, Red Dot Award and the Accessory of Mobile World Congress, take a look at our last campaign to see how we've grown. 

 

 
 

Risks and challenges

Our small design team first successfully launched our UK version of the Mu in 2012 and since then we've continued to design and build a Mu family, whilst expanding to an international audience.

So, this isn't our first rodeo. In fact it's our 4th major product launch - previously we've successfully raised around $500K through crowd funding projects, have won numerous industry awards and we don't settle for second best!

Having run campaigns like this before we know that timelines can occasionally slip, but we have taken time to develop this next generation product and we have full confidence in our timescales, new manufacturing base and ability to roll out a first class product!

Saying that, as we have done this before, and we know that nothing is plain sailing! We have added some contingency into our timescales for the inevitable random item that we can't predict right now, but we know is coming.

We have a manufacturer already engaged and our enthusiasm is hitting the high notes.

Roll on 2020!
story_txt:
Introducing the Mu Two - the World's thinnest international USB Type-C fast charger, and our most powerful Mu wall charger yet. Simultaneously charge your devices with the dual USB Type-C ports. Designed with a primary USB C port for the latest compatible Type-C charged laptops, and secondary USB C port for tablets and smartphones. The Mu Two has a fixed split to share the 63W maximum power output to make it more useful for your daily charging needs. Though capable of 63W output, we guarantee that port #1 will always be able to deliver 45W to charge a Type-C PD compatible laptop when the secondary port is in use. Therefore, the maximum output of port #2 is 18W which is plenty to charge tablets and smartphones.  One charger, Two USB Type-C ports
 This next generation USB Type-C 63W charger is more powerful than its predecessor - it charges Type-C laptops including the latest Macbooks and notebooks, as well as all tablets and smartphones.Designed to charge Type-C, Micro USB and Lightning charged devices. Simply plug in to the wall and then use a Type-C to C cable, C to Micro USB cable or C to Lightning cable to your devices.
 

Charge a Type-C charged laptop, and a smartphone (or tablet) simultaneously Under the Hood:
 Gallium Nitride Technology (GaN) Technology - Enabling very high-power in a super small space, all with over 90% efficiency. This technological breakthrough in power is the real genius under the hood, enabling us to provide big power in our tiny Mu Two.
 Power Delivery (PD) Technology - Fast charge, adaptive charge, quick charge – it’s all about being able to change the voltage output of the charger to adjust to devices and create a quick charging experience. The Mu Two comes with a PD controller onboard and will charge fast. 
 Quick Charge (QC) compliant - As well as PD technology, the Mu Two is also Quick Charge compatible for QC enabled devices.
 Auto-Detect Chip - Providing intelligent identification to iOS, Android and other devices to ensure that they charge at an optimum rate. The Mu Two provides the perfect charge no matter which device, make or model is being used, upto 63W. 
Fold flat, interchangeable plug head system
 The Mu Two boasts a patented fold-flat design with an interchangeable plug head system, enabling the product to be used in over 200 countries worldwide whilst remaining pocket sized and portable. Each unit ships with all three international interchangeable Mu plug heads. Global versatility with changeable international heads - US, UK and EU
  A super slim design makes the Mu Two the ultimate charger. Perfect for commuting and working, at home, or travelling when away abroad. Say goodbye to baggage bulges, plug scratches to your devices in your bag and bulky laptop power bricks.Award winning 14mm slimline design Technical OverviewPocket sized and compact, the Mu Two can reduce its size to an amazing 14mm thin.  RewardsBy pre-ordering through Indiegogo and picking a reward, not only will you be getting your hands on the second batch of the Mu Two before it goes into retail, but you will also get a huge discount to the expected RRP.The Mu Two will be produced in black and shipped worldwide (UK & US shipping fee $5.00, Rest of World $10.00) with the following rewards:PLEASE NOTE: This campaign is funding in $ USD.  In the rewards outlined below, the £ GBP is estimated at time of campaign launch. Exchange rate may vary. • Mu TwoIncludes:
Mu Two 63W Dual USB Type-C PD Wall Charger
Includes Mu international Heads (US, UK & EU)
Dual USB C ports for simultaneously charging your laptop, and smartphone or tablet

 • Mu Two + Type-C CableIncludes:
Mu Two 63W Dual USB Type-C PD Wall Charger
Includes Mu international Heads (US, UK & EU)
Dual USB C ports for simultaneously charging your laptop, and smartphone or tablet
Mu Type-C to C charging cable

 • Mu Two: Twin PackIncludes:
2x Mu Two 63W Dual USB Type-C PD Wall Chargers
Includes Mu international Heads (US, UK & EU)
Dual USB C ports for simultaneously charging your laptop, and smartphone or tablet
 • Mu Two: Quad PackIncludes:
4x Mu Two 63W Dual USB Type-C PD Wall Chargers
Includes Mu international Heads (US, UK & EU)
Dual USB C ports for simultaneously charging your laptop, and smartphone or tablet
 Timescales Upon completion of the initial Kickstarter campaign, the Mu Two will now be available to pre-order through Indiegogo In Demand.• Kickstarter backers: Batch #1: Estimated shipping July 2020• Indiegogo backers: Batch #2: Estimated shipping August 2020 But why did we decide to launch on Kickstarter first and then InDemand on Indiegogo?We want to give as many people as possible the opportunity to get their hands on the 'all new' Mu Two, and Indiegogo to us has a wider overseas audience which we have not captured from Kickstarter so far. Development The Mu StoryWhat started as an award winning design evolved into the Mu One; the benchmark for compact chargers. Now the Mu Two leads this category forward as the next chapter of the Mu story. Previous winner of the British Design of the Year Award, Red Dot Award and the Accessory of Mobile World Congress, take a look at our last campaign to see how we've grown.  Original Mu One: 45W single port Type-C PD charger at a glance (launched in 2018)
 The Mu Two simultaneously charges a Type-C laptop, alongside tablets & smartphones  
Risks and challenges
Our small design team first successfully launched our UK version of the Mu in 2012 and since then we've continued to design and build a Mu family, whilst expanding to an international audience.
So, this isn't our first rodeo. In fact it's our 4th major product launch - previously we've successfully raised around $500K through crowd funding projects, have won numerous industry awards and we don't settle for second best!
Having run campaigns like this before we know that timelines can occasionally slip, but we have taken time to develop this next generation product and we have full confidence in our timescales, new manufacturing base and ability to roll out a first class product!
Saying that, as we have done this before, and we know that nothing is plain sailing! We have added some contingency into our timescales for the inevitable random item that we can't predict right now, but we know is coming.
We have a manufacturer already engaged and our enthusiasm is hitting the high notes.
Roll on 2020!

story:
---------- Design progress ----------

------------- 07.01.2015 --------------


Brushless camera gimbals nowadays are used to stabilize your camera when shooting a video. Unfortunately most of them are many times overpriced. My goal within this project is to design 3D diagrams and plans for 3D printing most parts for brushless 3-axis DSLR stabilizer. I will do web research to provide links where to order from the most advantageous electronics and other required parts worldwide. Most important after all I will provide step by step guide how to put everything together. All that information will be available free of charge for everyone.

I will design as much parts as possible 3D printable, so you don't have to go hardware store and buy carbon pipes etc. I believe in 10 years 3D printers in homes are as common as usual 2D printers now.

Specifications goals:

  • Must carry at least 3kg full size DSLR with lens
  • Will use 32 bit logic board with free basecam electronics software for maximum precision
  • All possible parts which I consider to be reasonable will be 3D printable

I'm a freelance 3D artist, video operator/technician. I have over 8 years of 3D art and modeling experience involving CAD knowledge.

One of my hobbies is to create things. Over the years I've designed many different gadgets for shooting film. For example I engineered silent motorized 35 mm adapter which gave film look for then affordable small sensor cameras, or I've constructed many 6 cm standard dslr rigs with wireless remotes for shoulder or crane use, also I engineered a stabilizer for crane head which could be mounted on the car roof for filming smooth visually impressive clips of city streets and architecture.

I am a technical person by nature, one of my life dreams is to engineer and design devices which function in harmony with life as whole. Good design must be simple yet functional and also foolproof.

I want that all the best video capturing hardware would be available around the world for every amateur or professional video/film maker.

I ask only as much resources as I need. I need to cover:

  • 3D printing prototyping costs
  • Some different electronics(motors, controllers, gyros, batteries), to compare which suits best for universal application
  • I thought about making my own website where I will release free tutorials, so I need little bit of money for maintaining this too

I have also vocational degree on "Computers and computer networks" from Tallinn's Polytechnic school, so I have basic electronic knowledge and little experience on C, C#, Python, PHP, Visual Basic programming.

Designing a dslr gimbal is not hard for me, I just need some time and support from you guys. I think it takes maximum 3 months to release final plans for building dslr gimbal. Probably I need to order some different parts from china multiple times, this is most time consuming part, it usually takes 2-3 weeks to receive them.

I've already done some research and ordered one set of parts needed for gimbal. As I surfed the web for information, I didn't come by a simple step by step tutorial, so please help me to support community and give me a motivation for dedicating my time! :)

I am planning to release gimbal diagrams on my own website and on grabcad. If you have any other ideas where plans would get to the hands of people, let me know in comments please.
Even if I don't reach my entire goal I am willing to finish this project anyway.

story:
What is TexyFi?

TexyFi is a new messaging app for smartphones.

It was built to address the privacy concerns we all have about our personal information like mobile number, email address, real name, etc... 

We wanted a solution for this issue, therefore we thought, planned, designed and engineered this state of the art application and wanted to share it with the world. 

  1. You don't need to share your mobile number to use it.
  2. You don't need to share your name. 
  3. All your messages are encrypted and only you have access to them.

The app is currently running on Android market places (Google Play store), we got 220'000 downloads in the first 45 days. Amazing right?!

This idea is being developed and maintainted by a group of engineers and developers to ensure the best quality possible. Maintenance and development require new hardware, software, manhelp and many other expensive things. 

We can fund the project but we need your help. We want to develop the iOS and Windows Phone versions to make sure that this is available to most smartphone users.

The current funding target - if met - will keep us moving for the next 6 months!

The most powerful 3 features of TexyFi are:

  1. Encryption of messages
  2. Protection of privacy
  3. Translation of messages

    Read below for more details..


  • Powerful protection of messages


  • Complete privacy: you don't need a mobile number



Meet friends: chat with users from around the glob using the coolest map ever

A user can search of fellow TexyFi-ers aroud the world. Select the country and hit the green button, a grid of images will illustrate the results. Search can be refined using gender or Pin. A pin is a unique 8-digits number assigned to each user to be used of identification. It can be used to invite or call using the upcoming voice call service. No mobile number is required! Here is a snapshot taken from an Android device running TexyFi:

  • Instant translation: you can chat with anyone no matter what their language was

    Sergio and Mark both use TexyFi. They met using the Map. Mark is from London and Sergio is from Lisbon. You can see that each one is using their own language. Check it out:

    Sergio's screen:



    Mark's screen:




  • We plan to have a sequence of videos to explain more about the app, here is the first episode:


>>>>>> TexyFi has 20+ new unique features, for example you can attach any file type and send to your friend in a click of a button (videos, PDFs, DOCs, MP3, etc...). No need for emails!

We are on Indiegogo because we want you to be involved

Your contribution gives us another reason to keep running and enhancing the service. We are now working on the following stuff:

  • Building iOS and Windows Phone versions.
  • Research and Development: our engineers are working on cool stuff.
  • System upgrades: our user base is growing and we want to have everyone on board!
Great progress

We've been working on this project for a while now, and the results are just wonderful. 220'000+ users in 45 days makes us want to go further. 

Spread the word 

Spread the word with us using any of the sharing tools here on Indiegogo. Thank you!

story:
You are walking on a street, in a city you've never been before. And you see a great building / monument / site. But you don't have a clue about it. 
How can you learn? 
You don't know the name to look it up in travel guides or travel apps. Are you going to describe it to google??? 
No, of course not! Just take a picture of it and DogKnows! will offer you instant info. Onspot, without the need for internet. Easy, fast and fun!

How it works?

Which cities will be featured in your app?

Well, we have scheduled a lot of packages and more will follow. Our cities were selected after researching the most visited cities in 2014, in total and per continent, the increase or decrease tourists numbers each one was showing and the potentials they have. Take a look at the packages planned to launch until January 2016.

Why do you need the money?

The funds we need is going to the development of the app, for both iOS and Android, to the website design and also to the research necessary in order to keep adding new cities and monuments constantly.
Our goal is to upload as many cities as possible, with as many locations as possible, to offer travellers all around the world fast and easy access to information and create for them a joyfull experience.
Our first launch will be in Apple store, where the app will be for sale and a few days later our app will also launch in Google Play. 

And what is it for me?

Well, we really appreciate your support and want you to be part of our team. So, we offer you the chance to be members of our team, take part in the beta testing, receive the new packages firts, even get weekly update from our headquarters! Of course, anyone being a beta tester gets the package he tested for FREE upon release!

We need your support to be able to complete this app. We want to add a little fun in traveller's adventures around the world. We want you to be able to share information and experience the places you are visiting like never before.

If you can't contribute, just share our campaign! We will be equally grateful for this!

Do you have a timeline?

Of course we have! It is impossible to do something this big without timeframe!

And who are behind all this?

Our developers have a huge app portfolio, Chrisa and Tonia are experienced graphic designers (check www.gra-fistiki.gr), Nikolina and Vicky are experienced in project management, Aphrodite is an expert in financials and Irene is the one to deal with bureaucracy and proccessing problems. As you can see we are a completed team, where everyone has his role and talent.

This projects requires a huge amount of data, list of monuments per place, info, coordinates etc. But we are young, creative and excited about this. We are anxious to create this app, to be able to use it in our upcoming trips and offer it to other travellers as well!

story:
This is a unique solution to protect WordPress websites from hackers and bad bots. The Bad Bot Exterminator is a firewall that monitors visitor activity and blocks hacking attempts.

As an engineer I have spent most of my working life developing and inventing new technologies, software, equipment and gadgets.


Inventions to date

1. Car air conditioner electronic control system

The car air conditioner can consume anywhere between 10% to 30% of the engine power and fuel consumption, depending upon your engine size, make and air conditioner. I had developed an unconventional air conditioner controller that was saving me upto 10% in fuel consumption but never tested on other cars.



2. An Alternative Theory of Economics

It took me the better part of 18 years to develop an alternative theory of economics that was based upon probability theory and wave theory. This theory explained the difference between inflation and hyperinflation, showed the relationship between Demand and Supply and Inflation. Also showed that probability can be greater than 1 or 100% and invented group (or crowd) probability theory. It showed that economies experience oscillations or business cycles and if we could identify these oscillations we could predict stock and commodity trends up to 2 to 3 years into the future. The main equations developed were:-

M(z) = W(z) + I(z) + N(z) ... Market Behaviour

and

D - S = kI ... the relationship between Demand, Supply and Inflation

Was awarded a Doctorate in Economics for developing this theory.


Brent Crude Predictions made in December 2012

The prediction charts below show the actual trend, blue line, and the predicted trend, red/maroon/brown line.

Did you notice that I got the turning points, when it turns up and when it turns down, on the trend line almost spot on? The data used is based upon one closing price data per month. On 12th December 2012, when the Brent Crude prices was $110, I had published my prediction that Brent Crude price would peak in 2013 and then drop by 2014.

I was expecting it to drop down to $73 but it dropped further. When I published my charts in December 2012, no one was expecting the price to drop, in fact most people thought my predictions were wrong and Brent Crude prices would hold at around $110 forever. Amazing. May be I should have done a little more analysis to show how the price would behave into 2015 or 2016. I was predicting Brent Crude price trends one and a half years into the future. Did I make history? Please check the 5 year chart at http://www.tradingeconomics.com/commodity/brent-crude-oil which shows that Brent Crude actually hit $118 in February 2013. I got that right!

Palm Oil Price Prediction done in 14th January 2013

You can compare this prediction with the current palm oi prices as shown in http://www.indexmundi.com/commodities/?commodity=palm-oil&months=120. My chart was don in Malaysian Ringgit where as the current data by indexmundi is in US$. The Malaysian Ringgit has fluated during this period from RM3.30 to RM4.4 to the US$. The blue line is the actual trend and the red line is the predicted trend.


Silver Price prediction between June 2011 to September 2011


I predicted, on 19th June 2011, that the price of silver would spike between June 2011 and September 2011. Those who believed my prediction could have made a lot of money. Of course some fund managers got it into their head that their duty was to spend millions to ensure the spike did to occur so the top of the spike was flattened.

As you can see from http://www.macrotrends.net/1470/historical-silv... and select the 5 year chart option you will see that the actual silver price peaked in August 2011. The price peaked around $42. My timing was remarkable.


 Rapeseed Price Prediction in 2009 for trend until 2012

It is truly an amazing price prediction as I had tried to predict the rapeseed price trend up to 3 years ahead. I did the price prediction chart in October 2009, the top chart and came back in 2012 to show the actual price trend which is the lower chart. That is why there are two charts on this image.

Between 2009 and 2010 I was expecting a sideways market - not worth trading in. I expected the rapeseed price to rally after that. The rally came a little earlier than expected. What is amazing is that the prediction trend shows that rapeseed price falls in 2012. That is almost 2 to 3 years ahead I was predicting that the rapeseed prices fall. The price has been falling since 2012 until end of 2014! Please see http://www.indexmundi.com/commodities/?commodity=rapeseed-oil&months=120 for the actual historical price trend.


Soybean Price Trend Prediction

I must admit that I may have done this soybean price prediction erroneously and I did not go back to update the prediction. There can be several reasons for this error but I still show this prediction to show you the truth - that it is possible to make errors when generating the  prediction trend charts.

The actual price trend is shown in http://www.nasdaq.com/markets/soybean.aspx?timeframe=5y.  For the trained eye there are a lot of similarities but I mistook the overall trend so my prediction does not look similar. I did predict that the soybean price would peak in 2013 which it did, so that part was correct.





3. A method of making bread without kneading - The Batter and Dough Method

For over thousands of years mankind has made bread with the Straight Dough Method or the Sponge and Dough Method. The Batter and Dough Method is very different way of making bread and is based on allowing gluten formation in batter. This reduces the need for kneading the dough. The recipes and more explanation is provided at http://bachutha.com/how-to-make-homemade-bread-that-does-not-go-stale-9-days/


Use bread flour, instead of plain flour / all purpose flour or strong bread flour, then you will not need to change the amount of water used in the recipe.

You will notice, in the video, that I am using Calcium Propionate as an anti-fungal agent. You can leave it out if you do not want any chemicals in your bread. If you do leave it out your bread would last about 4 to 5 days before you may see fungal growth on your bread and need to throw it away even though the bread has not gone stale or dried up.

I am freely giving away this method of making bread so that many people can benefit especially the poor who cannot afford a bread making machine and the old who have no strength to knead bread.

Try making your own bread at home with bread flour and you will find that even simple bread recipes are simply delicious.

If you liked this video and found it helpful please make a donation as research and development takes a lot of time and funds.



4. The Bad Bot Exterminator - WordPress website Firewall

The latest development is PHP firewall to protect WordPress sites from hackers and bad web crawlers from attacking and overloading your websites as described below.


There are other inventions, related to rubber technology and computer architecture, that I have not included here.




The Perks and what you get

1. Short Stories : Perfect Love

This book, PDF version to be emailed, "Perfect Love and Other Stories", was written around 1996 / 1997 when I was stuck with some mathematical problems. Writing the book was an emotional roller coaster ride and I enjoyed every minute of it.

My stories are true fiction. They range from soppy mushy romances to ghost and horror stories. I even have some science fiction and ghost stories. Some are really funny fiction and others are horrid. Many have a moral behind the story … if you can find them. Most are set in Malaysia but there are some stories set in Japan, UK (...errrrr...almost partially ) and Singapore. Much of my fiction is twisted. You will know what I mean when you read the book. By the way, many of the stories are of mature content so I don’t think they are suitable for children.

I tested out my short stories on friends and strangers before deciding to publish them hence they clearly have a reasonably high standard of narration … at least with respect to the people I tested them on. Crowd Funding for The Bad Bot Exterminator for WordPress blogs

The Bad Bot Exterminator, with its proprietary engine, has a unique way to identify and block hackers and bad bots from attacking your WordPress websites. It took under three years of development and testing to launch this powerful anti hacking PHP software. It is so good that even DoS (Denial of Service) attacks failed to crash my WordPress website.

My bread making blog is at http://bachutha.com, and many hackers from Russia, Ukraine, Moldova, France, Germany, USA, Canada, Turkey and China continuously attack my blog every day, every year. As a result, during 2011 to 2013, my web hosting server was overloaded trying to meet the demand for webpages to be viewed by these hackers and the site slowed down considerably. Some days no one could view my website and as a result my visitor count dropped from 1200 per day to 200 per day. Worst still my website pagerank dropped from 4 to 2. So after two years of hacker attacks I decided to do something about it and developed the Bad Bot Exterminator.


Always monitor the activity around your website

Originally, I was monitoring my other website manually by checking the visitor statistics daily.  Actually, you will not know if your website was attacked until you check the historical data.


As you can see from the data above, there was nothing I could do about it but just watch them attack my sites.

The hosting services provide Awstats and Webalizer for you to monitor the activity on your website. Awstats does removes bot activity from the data so you will never know how many bots are visiting or attacking your site. Webalizer should show you all the data, whether its bot or human activity but it is difficult to manually go through all the data to determine if they were bots or human visitors.

It was for this reason I developed the The Bad Bot Exterminator, a anti hacking software firewall, to block hackers as they came in for the attack. This meant that I did not have to look helplessly at the data after the attacks occurred.


You will never know how severely your site is under attack

Here was my e-commerce cart under attack. They attacked this site 28 million times in a single day.


The Bad Bot Exterminator defends against DDoS attacks successfully

The table above shows how successfully my website was protected during the DDoS attack that lasted 9 days. That is a very long period of time to be under an attack. The attack was carried out by a large multinational corporation and yet no one noticed the attack. My WordPress website was running as if all was well with the world.


Websites are attacked very often
Our websites are attacked more often then we think as most of us are not monitoring visitor activity of our sites on a regular basis.

We never know when our websites will be attacked by hackers. In most cases, based on my experience, about 10% to 30% of our webpages are attacked by hackers looking for weaknesses.




The best anti hacking protection for your WordPress websites

Ease of Use
Installation: It is not complicated and does not need to be installed as part of your server Linux operating system. It was designed and developed to operate in shared hosting environment. Just treat it as another program to be uploaded into your server. It is very easy to install and use. Upload the emailed .zip file into your server and unzip it and run the program. Then install the recommended WordPress plugins. [HELP DOC]
Technical: You do not have to be a technical person and you do not need to know how to program. Just answer a few simple questions during setup.[HELP DOC]
Videos: Help video available
Multiuser: Yes, the Bad Bot exterminator can be used on multi user sites

Powerful Security and Anti Hacking Features
Lock Feature: You can lock up your WordPress site so that no one can log in. Brute force login hackers have failed after years of trying.
Block Hackers: Blocks all hackers to your WordPress website. It can also block unknown bots and hackers too. This means that those bots that will be developed in the future can be blocked too.
SQL injection attack: It does try to prevent SQL injection. We plan to improve on this in time to come.
Differentiates
Real Visitors: 		Differentiates between real visitors and bots.
Block by Name: Specify the name of the bot to be blocked.
Block by IP address: Many bots are cunning and that is why we block bad bots and hackers by an IP address or a range of IP addresses.
Allow Good Bots: Yes, you can keep a white list of allowed good bots.
Automated: Every thing is automated for you and you do not have to do a thing. Just tell the Bad Bot Exterminator what type of website you are running and either take the default settings or customise it for your site.
DDoS attacks: One of the best features is that the Bad Bot Exterminator is one of the most effective DDoS protection software available. Most your visitors would not notice that your website is under a DoS or DDoS attack.
Visitor Stats: Yes there are useful WordPress visitor stats. You can see which of your web pages have the most visitors, by day, by month or for the whole year. That will give you an idea of what your visitors like.
Referral Stats: Yes there is WordPress referral tracking. If you are advertising and promoting your website on other sites or even Google Adwords, your WordPress referral traffic will show you who is bringing the most traffic to your site. The stats are shown by day, by month and for the whole year.

Requires PHP 5.3 or higher on your web hosting server.

Performance Boost for WordPress blogs

Did you know that when you install and run the Bad Bot Exterminator firewall and the SuperFast Cache plugin, which is the cache controller, together there is a performance improvement to your blog. This is because the cache accelerator is built into the Bad Bot Exterminator. Together you WordPress webpages run about 100% to 300% faster. This means your visitors and Google will notice the performance difference.


Together, they form a caching system for WordPress blogs that is one of the fastest in the world.




I urgently need your help

Over the years I have found that
1. I am not allowed to apply for patents in Malaysia. In 1998 / 1999 I applied for a patent but the patent office held back my applications for 7 years, until 2005. This means my patent applications are blocked.

2. In 2011, my house was robbed and my computer was stolen. They took all the backups drives and CD's. There was about 20 years of research work in my computer. This work involved unpublished mathematical models on product pricing and other works.

The police refused to check for fingerprints. In Malaysia everyone, the locals and foreign workers, are issued Identity Cards with their fingerprints stored in the chip and government databases. This means that with the fingerprint, offenders can be identified within seconds. Many of my friends suspected that very powerful people were involved in the theft and that was why the police did not check for fingerprints.

3. In 2015, the bank blocked my debit card from being used to make payments overseas, to Google and my hosting accounts. When I complained to the bank, they froze my account and I could not withdraw any funds from my account. It is frightening what the banks are now doing. I have found missing money and extra money in many banks over the last 7 years and the banks are in denial of this.

4. In January 2016, the Inland Revenue department is now claiming I had earned a huge amount of money between 1992 and 1997 (fictitious figures - this is what powerful people can do behind the scenes) and want to take me to court to declare me a bankrupt. I was broke during this period and worked temporary jobs, like waiter & typist, to fund my research. I have since written a 26 page letter to the Inland Revenue Service.

5. I suspect that my emails are monitored and many times I am blocked from accessing my websites. I had complained to my hosting provider in London and they said that the problem was coming from the Malaysian side.


I blogged about the first two situations at http://drpetersnews.com/problems-problems-and-more-problems.html. I do not know why very powerful people want to destroy my work. I have been under constant attacks, over the last 18 years, by these people.


I think these powerful people found out that I was applying for crowdfunding and had decided that, before the crowdfunding funds materialises,  I should be declared a bankrupt so that the can sell off my apartment, my computer (sell to themselves) and my car - the house and car I bought with my pension funds. That is how they are planning to get all my technology for free!


Please help donate so that I can escape these difficulties. Please pass the word around as my only protection is if the public know how very powerful people are trying to destroy me.

By the way I am the guy who coined the term "Real Economy" back in 1998.




Why I need your support


I have been working on the Bad Bot Exterminator for almost 3 years. Now I need your help to move into marketing and sales of The Bad Bot Exterminator and I really need an expert in internet marketing to join my company. Someone who can join me as a partner or as an employee. Preferably someone who has a proven track record.

Furthermore, I have come to the point where I need to hire staff to help me finish off other products in the pipeline, such as a contact form with built in security features and a proxy email server. There is a version of The Bad Bot Exterminator for custom PHP based websites - this version is almost complete just a little more work to be done.

I had got this far by doing odd and temporary jobs and help from family. I had an office before but sold of my printing equipment and closed the office due to the difficulty of raising capital and getting partners. If I receive excess funds I would pay off my bank loan, which was used to fund my research and rent a new office space, hire programmers and sales staff. Then I don't have to ever worry about how to pay off my loan and I can focus on more technological development and sales. That would be a huge burden lifted off my shoulders.

Lets make the internet a safer place where anonymous hackers have a very difficult time hacking your websites because of the Bad Bot Exterminator firewall. Lets make it happen.

Best regards,
Peter Achutha

PS. Please pass the word around about my crowd funding requirements and let your friends know about the perks and benefits.
story_txt:
This is a unique solution to protect WordPress websites from hackers and bad bots. The Bad Bot Exterminator is a firewall that monitors visitor activity and blocks hacking attempts.
As an engineer I have spent most of my working life developing and inventing new technologies, software, equipment and gadgets.

Inventions to date

1. Car air conditioner electronic control system 
The car air conditioner can consume anywhere between 10% to 30% of the engine power and fuel consumption, depending upon your engine size, make and air conditioner. I had developed an unconventional air conditioner controller that was saving me upto 10% in fuel consumption but never tested on other cars.





2. An Alternative Theory of Economics
It took me the better part of 18 years to develop an alternative theory of economics that was based upon probability theory and wave theory. This theory explained the difference between inflation and hyperinflation, showed the relationship between Demand and Supply and Inflation. Also showed that probability can be greater than 1 or 100% and invented group (or crowd) probability theory. It showed that economies experience oscillations or business cycles and if we could identify these oscillations we could predict stock and commodity trends up to 2 to 3 years into the future. The main equations developed were:-
M(z) = W(z) + I(z) + N(z) ... Market Behaviour
and 
D - S = kI ... the relationship between Demand, Supply and Inflation 
Was awarded a Doctorate in Economics for developing this theory.

Brent Crude Predictions made in December 2012

The prediction charts below show the actual trend, blue line, and the predicted trend, red/maroon/brown line.

Did you notice that I got the turning points, when it turns up and when it turns down, on the trend line almost spot on? The data used is based upon one closing price data per month. On 12th December 2012, when the Brent Crude prices was 
$110, I had published my prediction that Brent Crude price would peak in
 2013 and then drop by 2014. 

I was expecting it to drop down to $73 but 
it dropped further. When I published my charts in December 2012, no one was expecting the 
price to drop, in fact most people thought my predictions were wrong and
 Brent Crude prices would hold at around $110 forever. Amazing. May be I should have done a little more analysis to show how the price would behave into 2015 or 2016. I was 
predicting Brent Crude price trends one and a half years into the 
future. Did I make history? Please check  the 5 year chart at http://www.tradingeconomics.com/commodity/brent-crude-oil which shows that Brent Crude actually hit $118 in February 2013. I got that right!
Palm Oil Price Prediction done in 14th January 2013


You can compare this prediction with the current palm oi prices as shown in http://www.indexmundi.com/commodities/?commodity=palm-oil&months=120. My chart was don in Malaysian Ringgit where as the current data by indexmundi is in US$. The Malaysian Ringgit has fluated during this period from RM3.30 to RM4.4 to the US$. The blue line is the actual trend and the red line is the predicted trend.

Silver Price prediction between June 2011 to September 2011

I predicted, on 19th June 2011, that the price of silver would spike between June 2011 and September 2011. Those who believed my prediction could have made a lot of money. Of course some fund managers got it into their head that their duty was to spend millions to ensure the spike did to occur so the top of the spike was flattened.As you can see from http://www.macrotrends.net/1470/historical-silv... and select the 5 year chart option you will see that the actual silver price peaked in August 2011. The price peaked around $42. My timing was remarkable. Rapeseed Price Prediction in 2009 for trend until 2012
It is truly an amazing price prediction as I had tried to predict the rapeseed price trend up to 3 years ahead. I did the price prediction chart in October 2009, the top chart and came back in 2012 to show the actual price trend which is the lower chart. That is why there are two charts on this image.

Between 2009 and 2010 I was expecting a sideways market - not worth trading in. I expected the rapeseed price to rally after that. The rally came a little earlier than expected. What is amazing is that the prediction trend shows that rapeseed price falls in 2012. That is almost 2 to 3 years ahead I was predicting that the rapeseed prices fall. The price has been falling since 2012 until end of 2014! Please see http://www.indexmundi.com/commodities/?commodity=rapeseed-oil&months=120 for the actual historical price trend.
Soybean Price Trend PredictionI must admit that I may have done this soybean price prediction erroneously and I did not go back to update the prediction. There can be several reasons for this error but I still show this prediction to show you the truth - that it is possible to make errors when generating the  prediction trend charts.The actual price trend is shown in http://www.nasdaq.com/markets/soybean.aspx?timeframe=5y.  For the trained eye there are a lot of similarities but I mistook the overall trend so my prediction does not look similar. I did predict that the soybean price would peak in 2013 which it did, so that part was correct. 

3. A method of making bread without kneading - The Batter and Dough Method
For over thousands of years mankind has made bread with the Straight Dough Method or the Sponge and Dough Method. The Batter and Dough Method is very different way of making bread and is based on allowing gluten formation in batter. This reduces the need for kneading the dough. The recipes and more explanation is provided at http://bachutha.com/how-to-make-homemade-bread-that-does-not-go-stale-9-days/
Use bread flour, instead of plain flour / all purpose flour or strong bread flour, then you will not need to change the amount of water used in the recipe.You will notice, in the video, that I am using Calcium Propionate as an anti-fungal agent. You can leave it out if you do not want any chemicals in your bread. If you do leave it out your bread would last about 4 to 5 days before you may see fungal growth on your bread and need to throw it away even though the bread has not gone stale or dried up.I am freely giving away this method of making bread so that many people can benefit especially the poor who cannot afford a bread making machine and the old who have no strength to knead bread.Try making your own bread at home with bread flour and you will find that even simple bread recipes are simply delicious.If you liked this video and found it helpful please make a donation as research and development takes a lot of time and funds.4.
