The police refused to check for fingerprints. In Malaysia everyone, the locals and foreign workers, are issued Identity Cards with their fingerprints stored in the chip and government databases. This means that with the fingerprint, offenders can be identified within seconds. Many of my friends suspected that very powerful people were involved in the theft and that was why the police did not check for fingerprints.
3. In 2015, the bank blocked my debit card from being used to make payments overseas, to Google and my hosting accounts. When I complained to the bank, they froze my account and I could not withdraw any funds from my account. It is frightening what the banks are now doing. I have found missing money and extra money in many banks over the last 7 years and the banks are in denial of this.
4. In January 2016, the Inland Revenue department is now claiming I had earned a huge amount of money between 1992 and 1997 (fictitious figures - this is what powerful people can do behind the scenes) and want to take me to court to declare me a bankrupt. I was broke during this period and worked temporary jobs, like waiter & typist, to fund my research. I have since written a 26 page letter to the Inland Revenue Service.
5. I suspect that my emails are monitored and many times I am blocked from accessing my websites. I had complained to my hosting provider in London and they said that the problem was coming from the Malaysian side.
I blogged about the first two situations at http://drpetersnews.com/problems-problems-and-more-problems.html. I do not know why very powerful people want to destroy my work. I have been under constant attacks, over the last 18 years, by these people. 

I think these powerful people found out that I was applying for crowdfunding and had decided that, before the crowdfunding funds materialises,  I should be declared a bankrupt so that the can sell off my apartment, my computer (sell to themselves) and my car - the house and car I bought with my pension funds. That is how they are planning to get all my technology for free!

Please help donate so that I can escape these difficulties. Please pass the word around as my only protection is if the public know how very powerful people are trying to destroy me.
By the way I am the guy who coined the term "Real Economy" back in 1998.
Why I need your support
I have been working on the Bad Bot Exterminator for almost 3 years. Now I need your help to move into marketing and sales of The Bad Bot Exterminator and I really need an expert in internet marketing to join my company. Someone who can join me as a partner or as an employee. Preferably someone who has a proven track record. Furthermore, I have come to the point where I need to hire staff to help me finish off other products in the pipeline, such as a contact form with built in security features and a proxy email server. There is a version of The Bad Bot Exterminator for custom PHP based websites - this version is almost complete just a little more work to be done. I had got this far by doing odd and temporary jobs and help from family. I had an office before but sold of my printing equipment and closed the office due to the difficulty of raising capital and getting partners. If I receive excess funds I would pay off my bank loan, which was 
used to fund my research and rent a new office space, hire programmers and sales staff. Then  I don't have to ever worry about how to 
pay off my loan and I can focus on more technological development and 
sales. That would be a huge burden lifted off my shoulders.Lets make the internet a safer place where anonymous hackers have a very difficult time hacking your websites because of the Bad Bot Exterminator firewall. Lets make it happen.Best regards,Peter AchuthaPS. Please pass the word around about my crowd funding requirements and let your friends know about the perks and benefits.

story:
The global app to help you promote your business for less than $1 a day and helps people look out for deals/offers on an everyday basis.

It is an app not just for businesses, but also for consumers with a business idea.

Meet Squizzy App

The Squizzy App is the brain child of Reg Zegers (I) who comes from a successful background in traditional advertising in published media. At one point, I realized that there should be a better way for businesses to connect with their customers than the current range of digital online directories and mobile search platforms/apps. With much brainstorming and months of trial and error designs and drawings, I came up with a concept.


It was developed to satisfy a customer’s need of having better access to deals and special events that businesses offer. At the same time Squizzy App makes it possible for businesses to address their target market in a more direct way by promoting their business and their special offers or events. Besides that Squizzy App offers its registered users a simple way to find local businesses in the area by business type, product/service keywords and geo-location or any combination of these.

Introducing Squizzy App

The Squizzy App is a new hybrid directory style mobile application that has some new and unique concepts incorporated to keep users engaged and therefore offer great value for those using the app to promote their business. It gives businesses the opportunity to advertise their services/products cost-effectively (under a dollar a day) via the application.


Squizzy App will also promote the deals that local businesses are offering and special events they are running from their business pages and through push technology directly into the user’s app. It is a free application where users can download the app on to their Android or an iOS supportive smartphone and use the app even without registration. However to take advantage of the various club benefits, have access to deals and events or participate in the unique Jackpot program, users will need to register with the Squizzy App directly or through their Facebook account.

Businesses will also be able to register and list all their information free so there will be no barrier for compiling the business directory database quickly. Business will pay a small fee (less than $1 per day) to offer deals or to promote an event through the app and have this deal or event pushed to users in the local area. Deals and events will have duration of up to 1 month and businesses can have up to 5 deals/promotions or events running concurrently. 

Why the name Squizzy App?

Squizzy is used in the Australian urban language meaning ‘to have a look’. At the same time it can be associated with quick, prompt and fast. Squizzy is a term that is fun to pronounce and easy to remember. Naming the application Squizzy is due to the fact that users can take a peek at the special offers and events of several businesses and have a look for what is in their interest. The logo also carries the animation of an eye indicating ‘to have to look’.

Squizzy App’s key features

  • Playful design
  • Ease of use
  • Quick and simple search for local deals and events
  • Advanced search by business type, keywords, range determination
  • iOS and Android compatibility
  • Push notification
  • Database collection
  • Geo-location functionality
  • Social media sharing

How does Squizzy App work

>> Once you download the Squizzy App, you have to create a personal profile within the app.

>> You can then start searching for local businesses and the deals they are offering.

>> This process will start with selecting search requirements such as your current location, location range and what type of company or service you are looking for.

>> Businesses and deals that satisfy the query will show up. Deals can be either discounts, conditional discounts or a giveaway.

>> Events are either a sale or perhaps a private release type function which is promoted to all users or could be limited to users following the business through their favourites function in the app.

>> Deals from advertisers can be stored and redeemed.

>> When you receive notification of a deal or event that you want to use, you can move the voucher for that deal to a ‘wallet’ called ‘My Deals’ so that it can be easily managed and redeemed at any point of time.

>> The app will also notify when one of the deals in your ‘My Deals’ section is about to expire.

>> You will be able to post a rating on any business and provide other customers with information about your personal experiences as well. 

>> You can also share your deal or business details on social media platforms.

How does it benefit customers

Squizzy App users will admire the fact that the application enables interaction between users and businesses. The app reaches a large audience, whether a customer is searching for a fancy or casual restaurant or for local family events. 

Users have a quick overview of what the application has to offer due to its well-structured design and features. The download of Squizzy App as well as the use of the application is free which is beneficial for customers who like to browse for great deals and offers. Also the fact that users can collect points and get even greater discounts will attract customers. You will also enjoy level ups and a jackpot system which will entitle you for more deals and better offers based on your activity and level up!

How does it benefit consumers


Are you a one-man or one-woman service based individual looking to advertise your services to a local audience? If you are someone who provides cleaning or nanny service, take dogs for a walk, provides cooking classes or any other kind of service or small business, this could be your platform! With advertising under $1 a day, this is the best opportunity for you to let your neighbourhood know about your services. Advertising for a month would only cost you $29.95 and you will have access to edit and updates your deals/promotions 24x7.

How does it benefit businesses

Squizzy App is   a   unique   marketing   tool   that   can   be   used   by   businesses   to   promote   their products/services to their target audience. This is a great opportunity for businesses to generate brand exposure and publicize their product/service. Ideally people experience special offers and/or events of a specific business and generate positive word-of-mouth advertising. As the trend of owning a web-enabled smartphone is rising in today’s market scenario, it is important that businesses have to keep track with these trends and hence increase their online presence.

Squizzy App is different from other applications as it enables to store and redeem deals. When users find or receive specific notifications of a deal or event that they want to use,they can move the voucher for that deal to a wallet type file called ‘My Deals’ so that they can be easily managed and redeemed at anytime. The app will also notify the user if one of his/her deals in the ‘My Deals’ section is about to expire. The Squizzy application allows businesses to upload up to a maximum of 5 promotions a day with no lock-in contracts making it extremely flexible for businesses and they can also provide special discounts/deals to people who have selected their business as a ‘favourite’ on the app.

Login Process for Business

Businesses have to register through a registration panel on the Squizzy App website, which will be a portal the back-end web service accessed by the app. This set-up process will be an easy step-by-step system and will also lead businesses through the process of establishing their discount structure. After initial registration, the business will be verified by the Squizzy App Admin and will then be eligible to create deals and events that will be included on their business listing and also which will be broadcast by push notifications out to all users of the Squizzy App in the locality. Further more a business will enjoy 24x7 back-end service, which means you will be able to access and edit their business and deal information at anytime by logging in to their profile on the Squizzy App’s website.

Pricing Strategy

The cost of promoting deals, events and special offers for a business will be $29.95 per month. That means, businesses can promote their product/service throughout the entire month for a low monthly charge of $29.95 or for less than $1 a day. Squizzy App is the only tool that allows businesses to be promoted on the application for less than $1 dollar a day.

Club Levels

1. Squizzy Newbie - All users start at this level when they first register

2. Squizzy Active Club - Level 1 up after achieving 1,000 points in 3-months

3. Squizzy Priority Club - Level 2 up after achieving 5,000 points in 3-months

4. Squizzy A Lister Club - Level 3 up after achieving 10,000 points in 3-months

Users can earn points in numerous ways. By downloading a deal, claiming a deal, exploring a deal more than 30 - 3000 km from last deal, rating an existing business and many many more ways.

What the Jackpot System is all about

The Jackpot system is exclusive to the Squizzy App and is the most unique aspect of the system. It is a mechanism designed specifically to help incentivize users to continuously be using the  app by striving to attain then next club level or maintain their existing club level. By ensuring a high level of continued user engagement, we will be able to increase traffic to the businesses offering deals, events and jackpots and therefore ensure a high level of business participation because they will have a large and engaged audience and increased business.

Businesses can apply to Squizzy App Admin through the website to offer their products or services as a Jackpot prize to users of the Squizzy App. Businesses can specify which club level they would like to target and their total budget for the prize. The total number of Jackpot prizes can then be determined for the promotion.

Jackpot prizes will be awarded totally randomly and will be straight unconditional prizes. To ensure users are aware of the current Jackpot prizes on offer, there will be ‘advertisements’ about all Jackpots in the notifications section of the app.

Timeline

How funds will be spent

All funds will be spent on the development of the Squizzy App for the iOS and Android platform and other costs surrounding that development.

Front and Back-end landing page -  Yes, we are a mobile app and we estimate that the largest part of users will use our mobile applications more than visiting our landing page, but we will be developing one to let people know exactly what they can look out for in the app. The back-end of the landing page deals with all the servers and requirements to link the website with our applications.

IOS Application Development - This covers all the costs of iOS development and design. This also covers debugging the application to ensure that there are as little amounts of problems with the application as possible. Back-end operations developer’s salary will also be covered.

Android Application Development - This covers all the costs of Android development and design. This includes debugging the application for errors so that the amount of problems that could occur when the application is launched are kept to a low. Back-end operations developer’s salary will also be covered.

Marketing - To gain our audience and encourage them to use the app, we will first need to market ourselves. This makes it an essential part of our project. It will cover costs of advertisements, social media promotions and more.

Administration Costs – This will cover accounting staff wages and consulting expenses. The costs for internet, landline and mobile telephone services are also included in these expenses.

Miscellaneous Costs – This includes personal costs like calls made, travel expenses, app maintenance costs and more.

The greater goal we achieve, the greater possibilities we have. If we exceed our goal we aim to add more functions and abilities to our application. Funds raised above USD $150,000 will be spent on further development and promotion of the Squizzy App. It will bring us much closer to establishing the App on an international level targeting more businesses and users worldwide. It will sure help take the app to a whole new level. 

Squizzy App Teaser 1


Squizzy App Teaser 2


Special thanks to:

SUN SURF PRODUCTIONS

www.sunsurfproductions.com

Squizzy App’s website, video on Squizzy App for Consumers and Reg's introductory video creatives were created by Sun Surf Productions. They played a major role in Squizzy’s journey.

Sun Surf Productions is a creative & IT focused agency that embraces new technology, and focuses on consumer web habits that looks to foresee future trends and be a leader in the marketplace.

INTEGRA GLOBAL SOLUTIONS

http://www.integraglobalsolutions.com


Squizzy App’s social media presence, thank you cards & video creatives and the entire Indiegogo campaign’s content and strategy was planned and executed by Integra Global Solutions, India.

Integra Global Solutions is a premier provider of outsourcing solutions to clients in USA, UK, Canada, Europe and Australia. They have been offering high quality business services to various industries including bookkeeping, accounting, app development, web development, call center, customer support, online retail, finance and insurance since 2004. Their headquarters is located at Pennsylvania, USA with branches located at Berkshire, UK and multiple offices in India.

LEGALVISION

https://legalvision.com.au

Squizzy App's name trademark and copyrights, legal services were handled and provided by LegalVision. 

LegalVision is an online operation that provides a high-quality, cost-effective solution for Australian businesses seeking legal assistance, advice or documentation. Their strengths lie in setting up business structures, franchising, commercial leasing, contract law, online law, IP/IT law and employment law.

VMP

http://www.vmp.com.au


Squizzy App’s main video and the teasers were prepared by VMP in August 2015.

VMP is a Brisbane-based full service production house that produces engaging screen content for any purpose. Their expertise includes television commercials, corporate, promotional and training videos, webcasting and custom e-learning solutions. They thrive on producing unique and cost effective solutions that achieve spectacular results.

BUZINGA APP DEVELOPMENT

 www.buzinga.com.au

The Project Overview for Squizzy App was prepared by Buzinga App Development in (Melbourne) Australia in August 2013.

Buzinga, fuelled by a vision of building a premium, solution-centric software development company that delivers innovative solutions for emerging tech businesses. Today, Buzinga is a team of 25 in-house, highly skilled app development professionals. From passionate iOS and Android experts, internationally experienced project managers and some of the most talented UX/UI designers make it to their team.

MARKETING MECHANICS

www.marketingmechanics.com.au

The Business Plan and Squizzy App Presentation were prepared in February and August 2014 respectively by Marketing Mechanics in (Sydney) Australia.

Marketing Mechanics is a renowned Sydney award winning agency. With over 14 years’ experience, they have grown to be one of the leaders in the marketing and advertising arena. 

Help Make this happen:

story:
I went through years of frustration attempting to organize the wiring behind my entertainment center. Lots of products would help one way or another, but it was always expensive, time consuming, lacking flexibility and lacking the option to rearrange or reuse. I wanted simple, easy and control. My solution and Invention...

Ball Tip Clips

PUSH IN   PULL OUT

SIMPLE, EASY, CUSTOMIZABLE 

Each individual Ball Tip Clip holds a single wire. But if you put several together in a strip you gain the spaces between as another clip... 1+1=3!

                      

The Ball Tip Clip Strip... a Powerful Wire Management Tool!

Tough, Versatile...

Ball Tip Clips are made of tough resilient nylon in strips of eight, each capable of holding 15 wires or cables. Every Ball Tip Clip has a mounting hole in order to be screw mounted and the design allows for separating clips as needed from the strip by twisting or cutting; flexibility to customize to the needs of your project.

    

What I Need & What You Get

I am not asking for a hand out, but I could use a helping hand.

I have product ready to ship with the ability to produce as required. I need sales to help financially, of course. However, what really I need is exposure, help getting the word out about this amazing product! I need all the shout outs you can give me. Share with your friends... like my pages!

What you get if you make a purchase, is a new, innovative piece of American ingenuity that will be a powerful solution for your home & office wire management needs. Keep in mind that Ball Tip Clips make a great gift idea. They are packaged in arrangements and rates discounted for this promotion. You get a great product, made in America, at a fair price, that will fulfill your expectations!

In addition, you get my gratitude for your patronage and the satisfaction of helping out a fellow entrepreneur working hard to create a useful product and business.


The Goal of this Campaign

My starter goal is $35,000. This will use up my existing stock, plus one reproduction and keep me busy in front of this upcoming Holiday season. (Great gift idea... remember!) These proceeds will be used to get me into 2016 with excellent momentum for continued growth to meet my 2016 goals.

Your help will be an incredible and valuable assistance!

Follow up Goals

My goals for 2016 is to work with I.T.  and maintenance departments in large and small businesses to get them to incorporate Ball Tip Clips into their wire management  tool kits. This will be facilitated by small ad campaigns (including much needed new pictures and video). I also want  to include a big campaign for Christmas Light Clips next year and promote my website.

Once again, your help will be an incredible and valuable assistance!

Home & Office

Around every home and office there are wires, cables, cords, usually in unsightly tangles and messes. I would love to tell you that I can make them pretty... I can tell you they can now be easily managed and tamed! Ball Tip Clips are like magic!


Maintenance and I.T. Departments

If you work at a small or a large business, then Ball Tip Clips can help you with all the wire tangles you have. Clean up the mess behind the desk, get the wires off the dusty floor. Computer rooms, break rooms, work benches... anywhere and everywhere you have wires and cables. Your maintenance and I.T. departments will love them!

Customizable and Reusable

Ball Tip Clips are extremely versatile and customizable.They don't lock down the wires, rather they loosely hold and guide the wire. Strong enough to hold oversize wires and still be used with smaller wires if you choose. Also available with two styles of Peel & Stick adhesive tapes; a common foam indoor tape and a powerful Low Temp exterior tape.

Peel & Stick Adhesives

The common foam tape is on our Home & Office Clip and the Low Temp Clips were designed for attaching to gutters at Christmas, even in freezing temperatures. However, Ball Tip Clips can be used how you want, where you want. I used the low Temp Clips to guide the wires on my TV wall mount. I can move it without worry about the cables. They go along for the ride... in safety!


Push In...Pull Out

Best of all, if you need to fix a component, move a cord, add or rearrange, you just pull the wires out and push them back in when you are ready. If you need to move the Ball Tip Clips themselves, obviously if it has an applied adhesive that will be lost. But the Ball Tip Clip still has a mounting hole and can be reused, again and again.


Wire Management made..... Sexy...

Wire management can be boring, a pain, a necessary chore, but with Ball Tip Clips it is now spiced up, maybe fun or even dare I say... SEXY!

Christmas Lights

Hanging Christmas Lights is all about wire management and Ball Tip Clips are a powerful tool for hanging Christmas Lights! Each Ball Tip Clip Strip makes eight Christmas Light hangers that can stretch for 12 linear feet at 18" intervals. Once attached it is unbelievably easy to put up and take down your Christmas Lights.

But, remember... 1+1=3

Be creative! With Ball Tip Clips you can create totally custom multi string displays! Use two section Ball Tip Clips and hang a set of icicle lights, a string of minis and a string of traditional lights! Your creativity can really be set free...

The Ball Tip Clip Strip... a Powerful Wire Management Tool!

Future Goals

My future goals include getting Ball Tip Clips into stores where they will be easier to find and purchase for consumers. I already mentioned plans to work with businesses and bulk sales for maintenance and I.T. departments. I also have two additional related products on the drawing board that I hope to introduce by 2017 at the latest. I believe that this little product has a big future! Ball Tip Clips.

   I would appreciate your help!

Please make a purchase for your business or office. For your personal use at home or for a gift, or both. I will send you your Ball Tip Clips and anxiously await your feed back on how many different uses you find for them. I had one guy use them to hold pool cue tips on his rack! I know you have a wire that has been bugging you. Tame it and send me a picture.

And please, whether you make a purchase or not, help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

You can contact me at mark@balltipclip.com in addition to above at Indiegogo and also at balltipclip.com.

I look forward to mailing you your very own... Sexy... Ball Tip Clips!

Thank you for your time and consideration!

story:
**ORDER NOW FOR FIRST DELIVERY BATCH**    

                                    HURRY, PRICES WILL GO UP!


CLICK HERE TO FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK

Eneroid is an innovative AA battery charger that automatically charges at an extremely quick speed and even stores them after.









You can charge AAA rechargeable batteries 
and use C or D type batteries via charged AA
by Eneroid.





About 1 billion alkaline batteries are being thrown away around the world a year and most of them are buried in the ground causing the environment pollution. About 3 million batteries are thrown away every day. The battery that is thrown away after being used only one time causes an economic damage and brings on enormous disaster to the earth.


We can use the rechargeable battery instead of battery. The rechargeable battery can be used by recharging from 500 times to 1500 times. But since we have to charge one by one, it is inconvenient to use. We have to repeat putting the battery in the charger and taking it out again after waiting. We hardly use it because we have to repeat it.


As it is not easy to keep the rechargeable battery after recharging, it is easy to lose the batteries. Since charged ones can be easily mixed with uncharged ones, it is hard to use. Also, the bulk existing charger is not easy to keep because it occupies a wide space.


Eneroid is a epoch-making product that resolved all of these problems. If you put the rechargeable battery on it and press the button one time, it charges and keeps automatically. You just take it out when necessary. 

You can protect the environment

and reduce the cost by Eneroid.



* Delivery of rewartds/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.


Eneroid exhibit CES2016 that biggest technology and awe-inducing exhibition in the world  being held January 2016 . We are looking forward to meeting you at Las Vegas.

Booth Number : 82219  /  Venue Sands G

FIND THE ENEROID'S BOOTH ON THE MAP

story:
Charging Cables are a Vital Tool in our Lives

Personal electronics play an important role in our modern lives. Keeping them fully charged is required if we want to stay connected. Too often, we are left disappointed because our worn cables are no longer capable of recharging our devices.


Take Action Before the Damage Starts

Without protection from wear and tear, many experience the inconvenience of having their charging cable break in less than 6 months of use. Many try to repair their broken cables, but struggle to find a permanent solution. Rather than putting a bandage over an open wound, it is better to prevent the damage before it starts. The TUDIA Klip works to stop strain, before wires become exposed and the cable stops working.



The Klip Reduces Strain on Charging Cables by 80%

By covering the sensitive area where the charging cable meets the charging plug, the Klip provides stability and support. By preventing the charging cable from easily bending, the likelihood of your cord fraying and breaking reduces by 80%.


The Costs of Buying Replacement Cables Quickly Adds Up

The Klip allows you to invest in preserving your original charging cable and saves you money in the long term. Rather than buying a new cable, the Klip allows you to preserve your original Apple Lightning or 30-pin cable for only a quarter of the price.


The Klip is Easy to Install

The Klip snaps on to your charging cable in seconds. Frustration free, the simple two-piece design locks in so the Klip stays on tight.


Tiny Size, Big Impact

Despite its small size, the KLIP makes a big impact extending the durability and life of your charging cable. KLIP keeps your cable functioning longer, helping you stay connected and fully charged


The Klip Keeps your Charging Cable Working Longer and Looking Good

Weighing only 0.08 oz, the lightweight design adds very little bulk to your charging cord. Available in 5 different options, the Klip adds personality with a splash of color. The colorful end pieces make your cable stand out and easier to find.



PERKS


TIMELINE



May 22nd 2015 UPDATE:

Dear Funders,

Good news! We are able to negotiated for a lower initial manufacturing units to a range where we can afford. Which means,  whether or not the $25,000 goal is achieved, all supporters will receive the PERK they ordered !!

 

Support with confidence and share with your friends !

Thank you again,

TUDIA TEAM

story:
Let's Talk About the Problem

Hosting control panels haven’t changed much in the last two decades. After years of remaining stagnant, it’s time to bring some fresh blood to the game.

Awkward...

The current contenters, cPanel and Plesk, have a plethora of shortcomings (beyond usability).

Minimum Requirements

cPanel and Plesk have minimum disk space requirements of 20GB and 10GB respectively. Much of this is eaten up in the excessive graphics which hamper performance and proprietary backend software. A more modern, streamlined approach can negate this issue.

Extensibility

While both panels support plugins, they are rudimentary at best and provide minimal documentation. Building on the proven (and extensible) WordPress codebase allows us to offer an unprecedented level of flexibility in a language that many developers are already familiar with.

Sustainability

In the hosting world, security and continuing development are crucial. Other control panels require a significant amount of work to keep up to date with the latest issues. Through leveraging the WordPress codebase, we are decreasing our development effort.

Brandability

Neither of the major contenders for top control panel was built with rebranding in mind. Overly-complicated template systems make the process time-consuming and expensive. HostPress is being built to be rebrandable by design. In fact, reworking the interface can be easily done with only a few lines of code!

So Who am I?

I am an independent software developer with a focus on WordPress application development. Throughout the years I have been a Core Developer for Arch Linux and Easy Digital Downloads and the co-founder of Redux Framework. I am an active member of the WordPress community as a speaker for the local user group and head organizer for WordCamp Omaha and have released over thirty public plugins.

And What is HostPress?

Simply put, HostPress is the future of web hosting control panels.

Extensible

With HostPress, there is no need to rely on a specific language to write your own plugins. Between native extensibility, a fullscale API, and direct command-line access, you have the power to write plugins as you see fit! Beyond the ability to write your own plugins, at release we will have a robust archive of plugins available to the public covering the most popular server software.

Beautiful

A clean, streamlined design makes using HostPress a breeze. No graphics to slow you down and no bulky UI elements to cause screen resolution-dependency issues. From mobile devices through retina displays, icon fonts and clean lines make HostPress beautiful and functional no matter how you use it!

Powerful

WordPress powers a quarter of the Internet! By building on one of the most widely-used platforms in use today, we are working with proven code. Beyond the well-known scalability and flexibility of the WordPress core, it is the software behind some major players on the Internet. If it’s good enough for companies like Sony and Samsung, it’s good enough for us!

Some Stats...

Here's a few numbers on the market today...

Individual Users

There are 4,101,891 individual servers running active, licensed cPanel and Plesk installations (according to BuiltWith).

Product Value

That’s $82,037,820.00 per month spent on control panels (assuming a $20 per month price tag… cPanel runs $45 per month for dedicated servers). And that doesn’t include the money spent on support and plugins!

User Base

While nobody knows the exact number of websites online at any given time, Internet Live Stats has estimated that as of September, 2014, the Internet has surpassed one billion websites… with nearly a million being created daily!

What I Need

While I am a WordPress developer, I'm not a network architect. I can write the majority of what makes HostPress awesome by myself (and I'd LOVE to be able to make this a labor of love), but I need to hire a server guru to make this a reality. As such, I'm hoping to raise $175,000 to support myself and my son, and cover the server fees and salary of a server guru for one year.

What You Get

If funded, the goal is to release a beta version in June 2016 with the following properties:

  • A modern, open-source, extensible server control panel
  • An intuitive (and responsive) interface
  • A fully-localized platform (HostPress speaks your language!)
  • A platform developers can build on, including the ability to simply rebrand the panel without complex template languages.

Following the initial beta, we will spend another six months fixing the inevitable bugs (patches are welcome!), responding to user feedback, and working to provide translations for languages other than English before the first stable version is released.

If we are not fully funded, the project will go on... but at a slower pace. Putting food on the table and paying bills is too important to give up completely, to say nothing of the expenses inherent in hiring a server guru!

The HostPress Impact

At the very least, this project will result in a very cool piece of open-source technology being released. That said, our goal is to provide the Internet with an alternative to the clutter and complexity of server management. Even if we don't become a major contender in this space, the support we do get will put pressure on the existing solutions to up their game. Basically... catch up with the times, or die.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help us financially, there's still plenty you can do! Share this campaign with your friends and colleagues. If you're bilingual, familiarize yourself with Transifex so you can help translate the beta.

Updates

Screenshot!

Since you asked so nicely, here's a very early screenshot of our current progress. The Account Details widget is about two-thirds live data (bandwidth, email, and FTP aren't pulling from anywhere yet), and the News widget pulls from our blog, though the blog isn't live yet :(

User management, a very primitive domain manager, and the file manager work to at least some extent. Extensions connects to our (currently empty) extension database and Support is currently just a simple email form that opens a support ticket (eventually, it will be fully integrated and have a built-in FAQ/tutorial section). As of now, everything else links to blank pages... But it's a start!

iPhone Screenshot!

Updates
Screenshot!
Since you asked so nicely, here's a very early screenshot of our current progress. The Account Details widget is about two-thirds live data (bandwidth, email, and FTP aren't pulling from anywhere yet), and the News widget pulls from our blog, though the blog isn't live yet :(
User management, a very primitive domain manager, and the file manager work to at least some extent. Extensions connects to our (currently empty) extension database and Support is currently just a simple email form that opens a support ticket (eventually, it will be fully integrated and have a built-in FAQ/tutorial section). As of now, everything else links to blank pages... But it's a start!

iPhone Screenshot!

story:
Our Story

The idea in the first place was to have a device that you can plug between your computer and your modem/router, and everything behind that device will be encrypted. Upcoming data retention laws and the ever increasing mass surveillance call eagerly for solutions. The Enigmabox enables people with no technical backgrounds to protect themselves from spying - by just plugging in a cable.

Just a Plug & Play VPN Device?

Encrypt everything you do online is one part. "Making phone calls and sending emails inside this encrypted network should also be possible." "Using a central telephony and email server? I'm not a fan of that, and it doesn't scale." In fact, it didn't scale. And then, we discovered Cjdns. This piece of software provides public key networking, end-to-end encryption for every packet, and is designed specifically for mesh networks.

But there is more.

The IP address is the cryptographic hash, which is your authentication. There is no need for a central authentication server. We can build our telephony system distributed. And in fact, we have! Every Enigmabox runs a telephony server and an email server. They are communicating encrypted, using their IPv6 as authentication, backed by a private key. It works!

So what IS the Enigmabox?

The Enigmabox is a networking device that encrypts your Internet traffic - comparable to a VPN, but implemented as a hardware appliance. Plus, you can make secure phone calls and exchange encrypted emails with other Enigmabox users. Also the default firewall configuration protects your computer or network from outside access.

Why Indiegogo?

Thus far, not many people know about the Enigmabox. Your support will help us move out of our garage into full production. We hope to get the Enigmabox into as many hands as possible. If our campaign does not get funded, it’s back to the garage, making them a few at a time when we can. We thank you for your pledge, in any amount. This is a cause we believe in very much and hope others see value in. High five!

The Impact

The Enigmabox has been protecting people from all walks of life - journalists, lawyers, dentists, families, local councils, enterpreneurs. It actually works and has proven to withstand surveillance for over 1.5 years now. We currently have 500 active users. But we need more to make a real difference in the world.

Our goal is to make cryptography accessible for everyone, and thus lay in your hands an effective tool for protection against tyranny and oppressive states. Help us spreading the word!

Technology & Security


100% Open Source, 100% Control

Last year, we ported every piece of software neccessary to run the Enigmabox to OpenWRT. Every user has root access on his Enigmabox via SSH. This is your device, you are in control over your data. Servers only move encrypted data around and store nothing - no emails, no phone calls, no address book. This is all stored locally on your Enigmabox. And since every network packet is encrypted, servers don't even know if the data they transmit is a phone call, an email or an image from the Internet.

Have a look at the source code on GitHub: https://github.com/enigmagroup/enigmabox-openwrt


Secure your Internet connection

Wherever you are, you always get the "trusted" Internet from the Enigmabox servers, bypassing law enforcement agencies, snooping secret services or evil dudes who have targeted your PC and try to put some malware on it.

Unblock content

Unblock content that is being blocked in your country.


Filter ads

Filter ads and trackers, mask your browsers identity.


Firewall in full shielding mode by default

  • Regular incoming network traffic is completely blocked
  • Only traffic from selected friends inside the encrypted network is allowed

Dear attacker: You have to be *inside* the network AND you have to be in my address book to have a chance of attacking me.


Forward secret communications

A unique session key is generated for communication. After you hang up your phone, that key is thrown away and not even *you* are able to decrypt the encrypted phone call traffic. Those session keys are regenerated every now and then.


End-to-end encryption

  • All Enigmabox emails are end-to-end encrypted
  • All Enigmabox phone calls are end-to-end encrypted

Obfuscated metadata

Encryption is baked into the protocol, so not even headers are exposed. You can't tell if that traffic stream was an email.


No central server involved

  • The telephony- and mailserver run on the Enigmabox
  • The address book is stored on the Enigmabox
  • No central mail-, telephony- or directory servers involved
  • Server doesn't even know that you are sending an email
  • Servers only pass around encrypted datastreams
  • Keys are generated on the Enigmabox

story:
DIY Tank Robot

Hello ladies and gentleman.

We are three friends who are studying in university and want to build a robotic & energy company.

We would like to share our robotic project detail (technical desing, android studio, arduino and visual studio codes) with you for the funds which we need for buying 3d printer to make our robots.

When this project is over, we will share another robotic projects with you.

First of all we always say that "do it yourself". This is our  password for the success.

If you want to be a good engineer, you must follow this password. for this reason, we share our designs and codes. Then you can change the codes and you would learn all programs about robotic projects.

You can change the image in android studio, or you can change in visual studio button fonts. Then you will learn to build your own robot with your own desing and code.

We have a big plans for the future. We want to set up a company, and submit you another robotic and solar energy projects. We hope this system will improve our engineer candidates technics.

You can share this designs and codes with your children and we hope they will be a good engineers in the future! When you fund us, we will give you full support to build your codes and designs.

Lets talk about the project

We have a tank project which is our finishing exam at the same time that we would like to share with you!

Thecnical Information

Our tank robot can be controlled with android smart phone. We have another program for engineers to control the tank. If you want, you can control your tank robot with visual studio.

You can change your program designs or system. You can add sensors and you can make a smart tank robot. You can change your robot for full outonom system.

We have a 2 dc motor and one arduino micro controller. One bluetooth module and one lipo battery charger.

When your battery finish, you must reload your battery with lipo battery charger.

We will share arduino code, android studio code and visual studio code. You can build your designs with 3d printer.

We will show you how can you assembly the designs. You can chance all designs and codes. And we will give you full support!

Lets talk about connection with your tank robot

In our project, you will connect with bluetooth module to your tank robot. Because of this you must have bluetooth device(smarth phone, tablet or laptop) for connection.

We will give you an easy visual studio form to connect to your tank. This form have a lot of buttons for motion. forward, left, right and back. Also another button to connect your bluetooth module in your tank.

Secondly we will send the program(apk.)  for this tank robot. You can download this program and use it to connect your tank. And also we give the android program codes. You can change the codes if you want. And create you own robotic connectivity program. Maybe you will put that on play store :)

Thanks

Thank you all for funding our project in advance! If we get enough funds, we will start to build our company. First of all we need to buy 3d printer as i said before and than we will share a new project with you.

Kind Regards.

story:
Helping nonprofits take their mission mobile.

GiveRight provides nonprofits and charities with a fully branded fundraising app at ZERO upfront cost to them. The app is customized for each charity from features to graphics – GiveRight remains completely behind the scenes! 

Why a nonprofit app?

We know the nonprofit world, and we know it well. We’ve seen the passionate people behind the charities work tirelessly to raise money to keep their programs and services going.

With a mobile app that is designed to create direct relationships with donors to inspire them around the mission, combined with shopping rewards that can be used to make donations, we can help non-profits grow much faster than they can with current approaches.

We know that every dollar helps keep the lights on, staff paid, supplies purchased and programs funded. Most nonprofits aren’t able to allocate funds to dive into the mobile technology world and interact with over 207 million smartphone users.

That’s where we come in. 

The power of the micro-donation.  

While most nonprofits are spending energy going after large scale donations, they’re missing out on a huge revenue stream through micro-donations, which are – you guessed it – small donations (think businesses collecting spare change at registers).

The amazing thing about micro-philanthropy is that these small amounts add up to BIG DOLLARS over time. Our belief is that through its own custom app, nonprofits will be able to rely on small, but consistent income through the coupon-based donations offered through GiveRight’s app.

Win-win for donors and nonprofits  

Remember those Entertainment ® books that were full of useful coupons for restaurants, movies, mini-golf and hotels? Well, we’ve partnered with those fellow charity-loving folks to take their coupon book mobile AND raise money for nonprofits. 

Here's how it works: 

  1. Stacey, a supporter of the YWCA goes to the App Store and downloads the FREE YWCA app (each nonprofit’s app is custom-branded for them – GiveRight is all behind the scenes!)
  2. Stacey searches for coupons and special offers near her. She’s craving pizza.
  3. She finds a pizza joint right down the block that has an awesome deal of $5 off a $10 large pizza. Stacey scores pizza and saves money.
  4. At check out, the app shows Stacey that she saved $5, and asks if she’d like to donate 20% of that amount to the YWCA. Of course she does! 
  5. Stacey just donated $1.00 to the YWCA! 

Just think, if Stacey did that just once a week, she would be able to contribute more than $50 to the YWCA this year, without ever feeling the pinch. Even better, Stacey would become a tangible part of the YWCA's great mission of "Empowering Women". And it only took a single click to make that happen!

Even more cool stuff!   

The app has a front-page section where supporters and donors can keep up with the charity’s latest information, events and volunteer opportunities.

Donors can see exactly how their money is being used! The app will allow nonprofits to set fundraising goals and let users know what their $1, $5, $10 donation just went toward in real-time!

Donors see their savings and the impact they made daily! The app’s dashboard will show donors exactly how much money they’ve saved using coupons, and how much money they’ve donated to the charity. Talk about a feel-good moment all the way around! 


Where your money is going

We’re about half way through our full app development. We need your help to finish it and get it in the hands of thousands of deserving charities across the United States! Whether you can donate $10 or $1,000, we’ll make sure you know what your money is going toward during our 40-day fundraising campaign. Follow us on social media for app updates and progress. We view you as part of our ever-growing community to help get the heart of GiveRight on its feet! 

Here’s what’s complete:

  • Demo-ready mobile application for iPhone
  • Specifications for completing mobile application development (iPhone & Android)
  • Preliminary integration with coupon vendor
  • Design specifications for back-end system and dashboard, social media integration and demographics tracking, donation processing, tracking and reporting
Here’s what needs to be done (that’s where you come in!):
  • Continued app development for iPhone & Android
  • Full integration with coupon vendor
  • Back-end system and dashboard
  • Field trial process and acceptance
  • Refinement of an integrated marketing program that GiveRight provides non-profits at no charge to them

We already have a short list of non-profits ready to launch a GiveRight mobile app for their organization. All we need is you to help us make their dreams a reality.


About our team:

Cynthia Hammersley - Managing Partner & Co-founder

As you approach the bottom of the 8th inning of your career, you spend more time looking for ways to give back to those who come behind you.  It is my wish to take the skills and knowledge gained over more than 35 years in the technology business to find a way to help those in need at a rate far greater than I could by just writing a check.  GiveRight was founded on the concept of, "give a person a fish, they eat for a day, teach a person to fish, they eat for a lifetime."  By pulling together an end to end solution to address the problems most charities face in engaging people in their cause and funding the good works they do, we hope to give charities the tools to turbo charge the good they can do in our communities. I hope you will join me in this quest by helping us fund this campaign.

Curtis Gruninger - Co-founder 

GiveRight grew out of a lifelong charity mindset instilled in me by my parents. This mindset combined with my 28 years of experience in the technology sector was the driving force behind what you see today. As a second generation Eagle Scout, community focus and charitable giving has always been of paramount importance to me. Along with my GiveRight partnership team we have over 100 years of combined experience in start-up, small, medium and Fortune 500 business. We see GiveRight as our legacy, our gift back to the community after successful careers and happy lives.

THANK YOU! THANK YOU! THANK YOU!  Without your support and faith in our mission it would take us much longer to get our solution finished and that would delay our ability to help 100's or 1,000's of non-profits "do more good".  

All of us at GiveRight wish you and your family much happiness, prosperity and good health as 2016 unfolds.  

-The team at GiveRight:  Cynthia H., Curtis G., Bill D., Lisa R., Ashley R., Jen M.-

story:
What is ORIGIGRIP?

ORIGIGRIP is an affordable, dexterous robot gripper/hand/end effector for hobby & research robotics projects.  It is made from just a few 3D printed parts: simple yet robust!  It is driven by a standard (high torque) hobby servo yet can handle an incredible variety of objects.  It can open to 225 mm (almost 9") and has 2 "fingers", each with 2 articulating segments giving the ORIGIGRIP a firm hold on almost anything.  Rubberized finger padding provides extra grip and helps to cushion the object being grasped.

You can add wrist rotation by mounting ORIGIGRIP to a standard servo via the included mounting horn at the back (Available as a separate perk).

Here's just a sample of what the ORIGIGRIP can hold:


How does it work?

The ORIGIGRIP opens and closes quickly and fluidly.  When its "fingers" come in contact with and object, they begin to enclose it, conforming to its shape to get a great grip!



Design:

ORIGIGRIP was designed from the ground up to be extremely versatile, lightweight, strong, and affordable.  Its design is that of an "under-actuated" gripper, where just one actuator can manipulate multiple degrees of freedom.  This means your robot can grip almost anything while being driven by a single control signal (Open / Close).  The "fingers" are driven using artificial tendons made of durable mono-filament line.  The lower (proximal) segments will begin to close first, until an object interrupts their path, then the further (distill) segments will continue to close until the object is fully grasped.  The gripper opens in a similar fashion until it reaches the completely open position.


Dimensions:



The entire ORIGIGRIP can be mounted to a standard servo via the included 25t servo horn attachment located in the rear.


Rewards:

story:
Update 15th December

The campaign is over but you can still purchase the Christmas Soldering Kit from the AusThai Shop.


Christmas Kit for Arduino or Raspberry Pi

My name is Tom and I've been fiddling with electronics since I was 12. Nowadays electronics is my business. AusThai Solutions is where I make my ideas happen.

At AusThai we have come up with a fun project for the festive season. It’s a soldering kit that will take about an hour for a beginner to build (less if you’re an experienced solderer). It’s designed to plug into a Raspberry Pi or an Arduino. It will take a few minutes to program the Raspberry Pi or Arduino and then the project is ready to show to your friends.

There are three LEDs that can be controlled in whatever sequence you program. There is a small music chip with piezo speaker that will play Jingle Bells when you send it a ‘start’ signal. Then there is a photo-sensor to detect when you pass your hand overhead. 

There are small differences between the Raspberry Pi and the Arduino versions. 

  • The Arduino version has a male header and the Raspberry Pi version uses a female header. 
  • The Arduino version feeds the voltage from the photo-sensor directly into an Analog pin on the Arduino. The Raspberry Pi version doesn’t have analog inputs so it includes a comparator circuit that feeds into a GPIO input.

The same PCB is used for both versions. The difference is in which components are loaded. 

Please note that the PCB will not fit in the Raspberry Pi 1 Model B that come with the yellow video connector. We just couldn't quite make it that flexible. It does fit onto the Raspberry Pi Zero.

What do you get?

If you contribute we will thank you by giving you one or more of the kits. For a contribution of $10 you get the PCB and all parts shipped to wherever you are in the world. Soldering instructions and programming details for both Arduino and Raspberry Pi will be posted on our website. 

There are perks with discounts for larger quantities. (See the perks for details.)

More images are coming

The sample you see in the video is made using a prototype board and is running on our own Freescale based controller. The PCBs arrived on the 25th of November. We have just made up one of each version. There are images below. We have also added lots of images of the build in the gallery. We will upload some videos here soon.

Here is the Arduino version of the kit.

Here is the Raspberry Pi version of the kit.

We have put more images and videos up in the Gallery.

We have two shipping dates

Early bird perks will ship by the 3rd of December. Shipping by airmail takes two weeks so early bird shipments should arrive in time for Christmas. We would love to give a guarantee here but it is out of our hands. (The post office assures us they will take two weeks.) We are shipping three weeks before Christmas to allow for postage delays.

Non early bird perks will ship approximately 2 weeks after the end of the campaign (See 'how long will it take' below for details).

After you claim a perk we will contact you to ask if you require Arduino or Raspberry Pi versions of the kit.

What do we need?

The main cost in this project is the PCB. The PCB has a setup cost so things become cost effective when we do a larger run-size. We can meet the $10 a board price with an order size of $600 or more, so that is our funding target.

We’re sure you have questions….

Can we really deliver?

When I finished high school I studied engineering and made electronics my profession. In 2002 some friends and I set up AusThai Solutions to design and develop electronic solutions for all sorts of applications from industry to education and hobby electronics. Our industry designs are sold exclusively to the client while our educational and hobbyist kits are sold online under our AusThai Educational and Maker’s Corner brands. 

This project is on the simple end of the scale when compared with the sort of project we are designing all the time.

How long will it take?

We have the PCBs ordered and on the way. Other parts will be no problem to source in time. We will have two shipping dates. We have ordered enough to cover the early bird perks and these will ship on the 3rd of December. 

At the end of the campaign we will order PCBs and parts for the remaining perks and we will ship these as soon as we have them. The PCBs usually arrive two weeks after ordered.

What will we do if we don’t hit the $600 target?

With a deep sigh we will reach into our pockets and make up any difference needed to make it happen. We have kept the target small enough so that we can cover it if needed.

There's more coming....

This is our second crowd-funding campaign. We don’t intend to stop crowd-funding after these two campaigns. We have lots of ideas in the works and we will be rolling them out over the next few months. If you have an idea for a project you haven’t seen on the market then click here and let us know. If it fits with our capabilities we’ll put it on the list and when we develop it we’ll give you one for free.

If this project doesn’t match your current needs but you’re a Maker or an electronics enthusiast then keep an eye on us and check out our future projects. You can follow us on Twitter or like us on Facebook.

Tell your Friends

If you know someone who might be interested in this project please feel free to spread the word using the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
MagPower Magnetic Wireless Power Banks


MagPower devices were ergonomically designed to extend the battery and comfort of your phone. Simply attach the included backplate to the back of your phone and upgrade to wireless charging!

Enjoy the latest features of your new smartphone and never worry about battery life again. All EAK products pair perfectly with the latest phones from Apple. Wirelessly charge your iPhone X/ XS/ or XR with MagPower.

 
EAK MagPower N1
 

Experience the perfect balance of charging capacity, charging speed, light weight and portability.

EAK MagPower N2 + N2 GamePad

This power bank will wirelessly super charge your phone through the most rigorous use.

The N2 power bank is designed to nest neatly inside the N2 GamePad, bringing you the most comfortable and ergonomic mobile gaming experience available for smartphones.  

 

MagPower is suitable for all WPC Qi charging phones. Compatible with iOS and Android systems.

Simply attach the (included) EAK backplate to the back of your phone. The MagPower power bank will magnetically secure itself and start wirelessly charging your phone. It’s that easy!

 

Don’t let your phone’s battery affect your performance!

The ergonomic N2 GamePad is designed to relieve soreness and tension from your wrists, thumbs and hands while playing mobile games. Both N2 and N2 GamePad have magnetic plates to ensure a simple and secure wireless charging connection.

We modeled, tested and fine-tuned many mock ups until arriving at the best ergonomic experience possible. Pairing the N2 with the N2 GamePad is the best way to play your favorite games without worrying about running out of battery or sore wrists. You can also tether-charge multiple devices while gaming without interruptions.

Protect your phone with your favorite case. The EAK backplate fits under most phone cases so there’s no need to compromise your personal style.

Rounded edges, slim body and an elegant feel come together so you can use your phone + N1 for extended periods of time with unrivaled comfort and ease.

Keep taking pictures and videos! The N1 can charge your phone on the go without blocking your camera.

 

The N-series power banks can be used on any desktop magnetic stand and allow you to use your phone while it’s charging.

 

  • Wireless Charging

The N2 supports wireless charging speeds 2X faster for both iPhone and Android (compared to other 5w wireless chargers). MagPower devices allow up to 10W output, the highest watt output in a power bank.

  • Wired Charging

2X faster (than outlet) charging for iPhone 8/X with PD 3.0 using USB-C (0-50% in 1 hr)

7.5w max for iPhone 8/X

4X faster (than outlet) charging for Android with QC 3.0 (0-80% in 35 min)

10w max for Android

 

 

Who is the team?


EAK Design is a group of forward thinking industrial designers who came together in San Francisco, CA to use their combined talents and bring innovative solutions, style and purpose to a market saturated with cheap knockoffs and identical products. After identifying this sad trend of cheap imitation and half-measures in the tech industry, we aim to never cut corners and use research insights and modern craft to bring innovation and excellent user experience to our customers.

 

The campaign:


This campaign is an effort to bring great products to the market and establish a global brand that will help more industries benefit from the industrial design process. Through careful research and 3D prototyping we have been able to design products that are ergonomic and purposeful. Beauty and function incarnate. Our goal is to use this same approach to bring stylish products to every aspect of your life.

 

Enjoy the benefits of better design:


By helping us spread the idea of innovation with style, contributors will benefit from an influx of products that have been thoughtfully, sustainably and smartly realized. EAK’s vision is to become a leader in innovation and technology by providing the premium quality tools you need to succeed in your busy life.

 

How your support will help us:


We are ready for production and just need your support to start shipping out the N1 and N2 power banks. As soon as the funds are released we will pay our manufacturing partners and mail out the power banks. This will also help fund research and design for the next phases of our power banks and further products. Our approach ensures that we are connecting with our customers and constantly improving our offerings based on real user feedback.

 

The challenges that we face:


While there are many other power banks in the market, many of them virtually identical, we wanted to make an impact by redefining a product category. It will be challenging to compete for attention among so many different products but our studio’s unique vision and core beliefs keep us marching steadily towards our goals. When you support us, you are supporting a whole new generation of industrial designers and creatives who give their lives to bring beautiful and meaningful objects into your daily life. As industrial design spreads through industries, we can expect to see a rise in sustainable, durable, stylish and useful products in every facet of life.

We are working tirelessly to promote and drive traffic to our Indiegogo page through Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and other digital advertising.

 

We need your support!


It may be challenging to enter a saturated market, but it is in our nature to face challenges head on and ask for help when needed. We have the connections and expertise but cannot complete this project alone. We need your support to spread the word. By sharing this project through Indiegogo and social media you are helping us usher in a new type of market. A market where the customers come first and enjoy the benefits of thoughtful and beautiful products. Please share with your friends and use the tag #MagPower, #EAKpowerbanks, #believeinyourchoice to help us spread the word.

 

 

FAQ 

 

Are you considering bigger battery capacities for your power banks?

In order to find the right balance between weight, charging capacity and holding experience, we have maxed out the current charging technology. We look forward to offering higher capacity power banks as the technologies become available.

 

Can I order more than 1 battery? 

Yes. There is no limit to how many batteries you can order. 

 

Can the gamepad support the N1? 

No. The N2 Game Pad only supports the N2 power bank. 

 

How do I know when the battery is low? 

The white LEDs indicate the charge level. The battery is low when the row of white LEDs is less visible. 

 

What does the red LED mean? 

The red LED means that the battery is not connected, it will turn blue when the wireless charging is active. 

 

Are EAK products waterproof? 

No. Our power banks and GamePad are not waterproof, yet. 

 

Is the magnet safe for my hard drive? 

Yes. Your devices won’t be affected negatively by our magnets. 

 

Can the N-Seriers charge my laptop?

Only the N2 can charge your laptop with USB Type-C.

 

Can I take my power bank onto a plane?

Yes. All of our power banks are built within fireproof cases and are safe for flying.

 

Are the internal batteries replaceable?

No. The internal batteries are not replaceable.

 

Is this battery going to melt? 

No. The battery is designed to monitor it’s own internal temperature and shut down before overheating. It’s also covered in a fireproof casing.

 

When will I receive my EAK purchase?​

The N1, N2 and N2 GamePad will be delivered starting December 2018. Please keep in mind that shipping times may vary by region, weather conditions and heavy holiday traffic.

 

Where will you be shipping?

We are offer shipping for the following countries and regions.

U.S.,  Canada, European Union, Australia, East Asia, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, India,        United Arab Emirates.

 

How much will shipping cost me?

We offer free shipping for our American backers.

Shipping costs, import duties and taxes will vary depending on where you live. If you live in a "remote or difficult to ship area" please contact us directly as additional costs may apply. US, Canada and EU regions can expect to receive a tracking number upon shipment.

 

Where is EAK located?

-Our products are designed and tested in San Francisco, California and manufactured by our partners in China.
