story:
Summary

BeerDropper is an alcohol delivery app focused on making alcohol consumption by adults of legal drinking age safer and more convenient in the undeveloped, on-demand college and residential markets. Partnering with local retailers, BeerDropper (which doesn't sell or deliver alcohol itself), acts as a middle man and marketing channel for retailers to reach their customers. BeerDropper is uniquely suited for this market due to its patented ID validation and data management technology that can help make on-demand delivery more safe, secure, convenient, and efficient. After proof of concept in this industry, we plan to expand to adjacent markets including pharmaceuticals, healthcare, banking, government, education, entertainment, and transportation. 

For Consumers

  • We offer convenience of ordering from home, saving time and effort
  • Delivery means potentially avoiding driving while intoxicated. 
  • Our prices are the same as they find in-store, only a small delivery fee is charged.


For Retail Partners

  • Our patented ID validation technology reduces risk by making it easy and simple to check for fake IDs (18% of college students surveyed report using a fake ID to obtain alcohol), possibly lowering insurance rates.
  • We open up a whole new channel (internet-based sales) for them to reach their customers
  • We increase their marketing presence by acting as their internet marketing department.
  • We help increase sales by partnering with alcohol manufacturers to provide them with exclusive deals and promotional giveaways.


The Solution

  • Safe and secure ID validation and data management app (iPhones, Androids)
  • Mobile web apps for the consumer, retailer, and deliverer 
  • State-of-the-art and proven ID scanning software (no hardware, just camera)
  • Convenience and efficiency - delivery to your door, saving you time
  • Website: www.beerdropper.com
  • Patent: http://www.google.com/patents/US20130112746
  • Patent: http://www.google.com/patents/US20150186962 
  • LAUNCH: Spring 2016!



The Market Size

  • According to the US Census report, there are about to 16 million students enrolled in colleges across the United States (US).
  • The top 10 percent of American drinkers - 24 million adults over the age of 18 consume, on average, 74 alcoholic drinks per week. That works out to a little more than four-and-a-half 750 ml bottles of Jack Daniels, 18 bottles of wine, or three 24-can cases of beer. In one week. (Citation: https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/wonk/wp/201...)
  • The average beer, wine, or liquor store generates $400,000 in sales. 



The Revenue Streams

  • Technology and Marketing Licensing Fee (from Retail Partners)
  • Delivery fee per order (from Consumers)
  • Advertising revenue potential - exclusive 21+ real estate
  • Big Data


The Funding

  • Operational costs (domain, hosting, continuous improvement, maintenance)
  • Pre-launch marketing (creating awareness, social media, email, guerilla)
  • Sales / support

The Differentiators

  • Operating in the mostly un-tapped college town and residential markets
  • Patented and novel technology 
  • Second patent ID Validation and Data Management System issued by the USPTO on March 15, 2016
  • Approval from Alcohol Beverage Commissions / State Liquor Authorities
  • Consumer, Retailer, and Driver App - enabling unique delivery platform
  • Target market - college markets (residential) followed by cities
  • Co-branding with retailers allowing both businesses to spread their names
  • Big data analytics valuable to manufacturers, distributors, and retailers

The Impact

  • Safety: reduce the incidence of drunk driving and death 
  • Security: reduce fraudulent usage of fake ID's and underage distribution
  • Eco-friendly: paperless processing, recyclable bags, efficient gas emissions 

The People

BeerDropper has a management team with deep industry knowledge as well as decades of retail, distribution and manufacturing expertise. Many members have years of global experience delivering superior results in both Fortune 500 companies as well as entrepreneurial start-ups.

Some fast facts regarding our senior management team:

  • Worked in Fortune 500 as well as start-up environments
  • Global experience across the Americas, EMEA, and APAC
  • Involved in over 200+ new product launches
  • Over 150 combined years of relevant experience
  • All have executed both sales & operational functions
  • Proven ability to run profitable growth businesses
  • Implemented exit strategies from start-up through sale of company
  • Numerous individual and product awards and industry recognitions

Most importantly, our team is made up of dynamic and energetic executives that roll up their sleeves, get into the trenches and "get things done!"


The Key Risks & Challenges
  • Privacy - SSL Certificate and Encryption
  • Big Data Analytics - Aggregated anonymized data made to order
  • Legal - Approval to operate by Alcohol Beverage Commissions / State Liquor Authorities in remainder of 50 states
  • Growth - It will be best to have a density of marketing for prospective customers. We are planning our initial launch in the Florida market.
  • Competition - We are aware of other competitors. This is now a validated market. We will offer disruptive technology to change this industry.


Meet The Team


Jeremy Krell

Founder, CEO

Dr. Jeremy Krell is Founder and CEO of BeerDropper. Jeremy performs recruitment, capital introduction, and strategic management services. Prior to BeerDropper, and founding venture incubator CEO in A Box,Jeremy has 12 years of experience as an entrepreneur, with three successful exits. Jeremy has a Bachelors of Science degree from Brandeis University and two graduate degrees (DMD - Tufts University, MBA - University of Chicago). He is a licensed and practicing dentist and serial entrepreneur.


Clyde Danganan

Chief Technology Officer

Clyde is responsible for the software architecture, design, and development of the BeerDropper consumer and partner mobile web applications. He has over 17 years of professional experience as a software/web developer, architect, and manager. He has worked in the computer leasing, financial and academic industries and is currently the Assistant Director, Academic and Administrative Applications Group, in the Biological Sciences Division at the University of Chicago. Clyde earned a PhD in Microbiology from the University of Illinois at Chicago, an MS from the Illinois Institute of Technology and a BA from Washington University. He holds the Microsoft Certified Application Developer certification and has recently completed the Chicago Management Institute certificate program through the Chicago Booth School of Business.


Tom Ramsey

Chief Financial Officer, CAB

Tom has an undergraduate degree from the University of Michigan and two graduate degrees (from the London School of Economics and the University of Chicago). Tom performs corporate finance functions and conducts investor relations, in addition to structuring new B2B relationships for BeerDropper on behalf of venture incubator, CEO in A Box. Tom’s work experience includes Ascente / LibertyID and Mercer Investment Consulting and Merrill Lynch.


Alex Mathai

Product Manager

Alex is the Product Manager for BeerDropper and works closely with the CEO, oversees the sales and marketing team to increase order volume, and participates in strategic business development. He is an experienced strategist with an aptitude for innovative thinking and operational improvement. Alex is a big picture thinker with experience advising companies from early stage to Fortune 100 in size, who uses data driven analysis and creativity to find solutions to complex problems. Alex has a Bachelors of Science from Illinois Institute of Technology, an MBA from the University of Chicago Booth School of Business, and is a member of MENSA.


Gregory Drozdow

VP of Marketing

Greg Drozdow is the VP of Marketing for BeerDropper LLC. Greg’s role is to continue to grow BeerDropper’s marketing strategy, build strong relationships with its retail partners, and help both its partners and consumers connect quicker and more efficiently. Greg has focused his career in private wealth management and has served as a Financial Advisor for McAdam Financial since 2012. Serving 1000s of clients across 5 major cities in the U.S., Greg leads a team of advisors and is part of a group that manages over $1 billion in Assets Under Management. Greg is fully licensed as an Investment Advisor Representative and received his Bachelors degree in Health Policy and Business from Brandeis University.


Jared Dunn

VP of Sales

Jared is the VP of Sales for BeerDropper, LLC where he is responsible for sales sourcing and enablement – identifying prospects and communicating the value proposition of the products and services offered – as well as channel management. He has experience as a Data Integration Account Manager and Consultant at Oracle as well as launching and growing several startups. He received the Top Performance award for consistent quarterly quote achievement. Jared has dual undergraduate degrees from Brandeis University in Computer science and Business. 


Mike Agee

Advisor

Michael Agee is an Advisor for Beerdropper. Michael has been developing web-based and mobile application for more than 20 years, working for such companies as Ernst & Young, Cap Gemni, Fidelity National Financial and a host of startups. Prior to coming to BeerDropper, LLC, Michael was the Vice President of Technology for the Board Network, a syndicate of over 20 job board in the financial services and accounting industry. Michael has a BS from DeVry University in Computer Science and an Executive Juris Doctor from Concord University School of Law. 


John Durkin

Investor, Advisor

John Durkin is an investor and advisor at BeerDropper. He received his Bachelor degree in Economics and History from the State University of New York at Albany in 1994. After leaving Albany, John worked at Anheuser-Busch from 1995-99. He held many different positions rising to manager of the NYC district in the contemporary marketing team and the district as a Sales Manager. In 1998 John invested in, and later acquired and grew, an establishment called Mad River Bar and Grille. John now runs River Partners, which has 12 locations of various themes and concepts.
story_txt:
SummaryBeerDropper is an alcohol delivery app focused on making alcohol consumption by adults of legal drinking age safer and more convenient in the undeveloped, on-demand college and residential markets. Partnering with local retailers, BeerDropper (which doesn't sell or deliver alcohol itself), acts as a middle man and marketing channel for retailers to reach their customers. BeerDropper is uniquely suited for this market due to its patented ID validation and data management technology that can help make on-demand delivery more safe, secure, convenient, and efficient. After proof of concept in this industry, we plan to expand to adjacent markets including pharmaceuticals, healthcare, banking, government, education, entertainment, and transportation. 

For Consumers

We offer convenience of ordering from home, saving time and effort
Delivery means potentially avoiding driving while intoxicated. 
Our prices are the same as they find in-store, only a small delivery fee is charged.






For Retail Partners


Our patented ID validation technology reduces risk by making it easy and simple to check for fake IDs (18% of college students surveyed report using a fake ID to obtain alcohol), possibly lowering insurance rates.


We open up a whole new channel (internet-based sales) for them to reach their customers

We increase their marketing presence by acting as their internet marketing department.
We help increase sales by partnering with alcohol manufacturers to provide them with exclusive deals and promotional giveaways.








The Solution

Safe and secure ID validation and data management app (iPhones, Androids)
Mobile web apps for the consumer, retailer, and deliverer 
State-of-the-art and proven ID scanning software (no hardware, just camera)

Convenience and efficiency - delivery to your door, saving you time

Website: www.beerdropper.com
Patent: http://www.google.com/patents/US20130112746
Patent: http://www.google.com/patents/US20150186962 

LAUNCH: Spring 2016!




The Market Size

According to the US Census report, there are about to 16 million students enrolled in colleges across the United States (US).

The top 10 percent of American drinkers - 24 million adults over the age of 18 consume, on average, 74 alcoholic drinks per week. That works out to a little more than four-and-a-half 750 ml bottles of Jack Daniels, 18 bottles of wine, or three 24-can cases of beer. In one week. (Citation: https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/wonk/wp/201...)

The average beer, wine, or liquor store generates $400,000 in sales. 








The Revenue Streams

Technology and Marketing Licensing Fee (from Retail Partners)
Delivery fee per order (from Consumers)
Advertising revenue potential - exclusive 21+ real estate
Big Data


The Funding

Operational costs (domain, hosting, continuous improvement, maintenance)
Pre-launch marketing (creating awareness, social media, email, guerilla)
Sales / support

The Differentiators

Operating in the mostly un-tapped college town and residential markets
Patented and novel technology 
Second patent ID Validation and Data Management System issued by the USPTO on March 15, 2016
Approval from Alcohol Beverage Commissions / State Liquor Authorities
Consumer, Retailer, and Driver App - enabling unique delivery platform
Target market - college markets (residential) followed by cities
Co-branding with retailers allowing both businesses to spread their names
Big data analytics valuable to manufacturers, distributors, and retailers
The Impact
Safety: reduce the incidence of drunk driving and death 
Security: reduce fraudulent usage of fake ID's and underage distribution
Eco-friendly: paperless processing, recyclable bags, efficient gas emissions 



The People
BeerDropper has a
management team with deep industry knowledge as well as decades of retail,
distribution and manufacturing expertise. Many members have years of global
experience delivering superior results in both Fortune 500 companies as well as
entrepreneurial start-ups.
Some
fast facts regarding our senior management team:



Worked
in Fortune 500 as well as start-up environments


Global
experience across the Americas, EMEA, and APAC


Involved
in over 200+ new product launches


Over
150 combined years of relevant experience


All
have executed both sales & operational functions


Proven
ability to run profitable growth businesses


Implemented
exit strategies from start-up through sale of company


Numerous
individual and product awards and industry recognitions


Most importantly, our
team is made up of dynamic and energetic executives that roll up their sleeves,
get into the trenches and "get things done!"


The Key Risks & Challenges
Privacy - SSL Certificate and Encryption
Big Data Analytics - Aggregated anonymized data made to order
Legal - Approval to operate by Alcohol Beverage Commissions / State Liquor Authorities in remainder of 50 states
Growth - It
     will be best to have a density of marketing for prospective
     customers. We are planning our
     initial launch in the Florida market.
Competition - We are aware of other competitors. This is now a validated market. We will offer disruptive technology to change this industry.



Meet The Team





Jeremy Krell

Founder, CEO
Dr.
Jeremy Krell is Founder and CEO of BeerDropper. Jeremy performs recruitment, capital introduction,
and strategic management services. Prior to BeerDropper, and founding venture
incubator CEO in A Box,Jeremy has 12 years of
experience as an entrepreneur, with three successful exits. Jeremy has a Bachelors of Science degree from
Brandeis University and two graduate degrees (DMD - Tufts University, MBA -
University of Chicago). He is a licensed and practicing dentist and serial
entrepreneur.





Clyde Danganan
Chief Technology Officer
Clyde is responsible for the software
architecture, design, and development of the BeerDropper consumer and partner
mobile web applications. He has over 17 years of professional experience as a
software/web developer, architect, and manager. He has worked in the
computer leasing, financial and academic industries and is currently the
Assistant Director, Academic and Administrative Applications Group, in the
Biological Sciences Division at the University of Chicago. Clyde earned a
PhD in Microbiology from the University of Illinois at Chicago, an MS from the
Illinois Institute of Technology and a BA from Washington University. He holds
the Microsoft Certified Application Developer certification and has recently
completed the Chicago Management Institute certificate program through the
Chicago Booth School of Business.






Tom Ramsey
Chief
Financial Officer, CAB
Tom has an
undergraduate degree from the University of Michigan and two graduate degrees
(from the London School of Economics and the University of Chicago). Tom
performs corporate finance functions and conducts investor relations, in
addition to structuring new B2B relationships for BeerDropper on behalf of
venture incubator, CEO in A Box. Tom’s work experience includes Ascente /
LibertyID and Mercer Investment Consulting and Merrill Lynch.




Alex
Mathai
Product Manager
Alex
is the Product Manager for BeerDropper and works closely with the CEO, oversees
the sales and marketing team to increase order volume, and participates in
strategic business development. He is an experienced strategist with an
aptitude for innovative thinking and operational improvement. Alex is a big
picture thinker with experience advising companies from early stage to Fortune
100 in size, who uses data driven analysis and creativity to find solutions to
complex problems. Alex has a Bachelors of Science from Illinois Institute of Technology,
an MBA from the University of Chicago Booth School of Business, and is a member
of MENSA.

Michael Agee is an Advisor for Beerdropper.
Michael has been developing web-based and mobile application for more than 20
years, working for such companies as Ernst & Young, Cap Gemni, Fidelity

Michael was the Vice President of Technology for the Board Network, a syndicate

industry. Michael has a BS from DeVry University in Computer Science and

Durkin
Investor, Advisor
John Durkin
is an investor and advisor at BeerDropper. He received his Bachelor degree in

After leaving Albany, John worked at Anheuser-Busch from 1995-99. He held many
different positions rising to manager of the NYC district in the contemporary
marketing team and the district as a Sales Manager. In 1998 John invested in,

John now runs River Partners, which has 12 locations of various themes and
concepts.

story:
It's embarrassing. We want to change this. 

Having loads of experience in electronic alarm systems, we set ourselves this manifesto:

  • Create autonomous motorcycle alarm system .
  • No wires, do-it-yourself  installation.
  • Make it smart and simple to configure and operate.
  • Its battery should last more than a year.
  • No subscription fee, any 2G/3G SIM card should do!

All this converted into monimoto:


Monimoto launches June, 2016

Meanwhile, we are polishing the firmware, mobile applications and testing monimoto in real life situations. There is one important task for us to do before we go public - certification. It's time, effort and money consuming process and we need your support here. In return we offer 30% off the M.S.R.P. (249€). 

Monimoto was created by this wonderful ELDES team:

It took almost 3 years since the inception to test batch production. And now we are ready to hear your opinion. 

How we see monimoto in action


Step by step explanation how monimoto works.

1. Placed monimoto anywhere under plastic covers.

Don't put it inside metal cabinets and boxes, as it blocks radio signals. 

2. You will configure monimoto using Android or iOS app or using geeky SMS syntax (in case you hate smartphones and apps).
3. One of the most important concepts in monimoto is about KEYS. There are two types of keys: smart key in your smartphone and master key in a key fob. 

They both operate using Bluetooth low-energy technology. 

4. When monimoto can see these keys (it's up to 10 meters/30 feet), the system stays in sleep mode. When keys move away, any kind of motion or vibration will trigger the alarm mode.  

5. The system will notify its owner on periodic tests, alarms and low battery events. Here are these possible scenarios: 

6. This is sample message that owner will get when monimoto kicks into alarm mode:


What comes in the package?



That is all. We love hearing feedback and talking to people. Let us know your thoughts in the comments, contacts on monimoto.com or our social networks. Thanks! Meet you on the road!

story:
A simple talk with friends about the future of technology spawned the innovative dreams of Bolong-Kanta Kejera.

Kejera has made great strides from his humble origins, as he has single-handedly begun development on an augmented reality computer headset, Genzo.

Kejera has been tinkering, and working with computer hardware and software from a very young age.

At first glance Genzo might seem similar to other devices that are currently making headlines such as Google Glass, or Oculus Rift. However, what separates Kejera’s invention from the pack is the fact that it is a fully operational computer; this machine is usable in the same capacity as a home PC and far more affordable than Microsoft's alternative.

“There is nothing you can’t do on Genzo.” Kejera states, “I have programmed on it. I have gamed on it. I have watched movies on it.”

Kejera explained that he created the device with the intention of making it user friendly and developer handy. “I want it to be open-source, and I want developers to have an environment where they can feel free to create,” he said.

Genzo’s portability is made possible by using the recently developed Raspberry Pi single-board computer, which is only slightly larger than a credit card.

Kejera has invested a lot of his personal time in the project, and over 2000 dollars have currently been spent on the development of Genzo. He has worked tirelessly, and has no intentions of slowing down in the near future.

In the original conversation that gave birth to Genzo, Kejera and his friends talked about how much they would love to have a gaming system they could wear with the ability to operate off of neural signals that were sent from the brain, to treat a truly immersive experience.

The project has taken a very different form since that initial conversation, scrapping some of the neuro-sensors, and expanding its potential beyond simply gaming, however many of the core ideas that Kejera and his friends shared have remained in the final product to this day.

“Genzo is a revolutionary product, and it revolutionizes the human to computer interface,” Kejera said. “Computers should be built around us, rather than us building our lives around computers.”

Why is it important we get funded?

Genzo is a unique consumer product that has never been on the market. It incorporates mixed reality with on the go computing power. It is a mobile device that gives you access to the internet (via a hotspot), videogames, movies, music,downloads all in a holographic experience that is affordable and convenient to all consumers. It is vital that Genzo is funded because it caters to a segment of the market that has been anticipating a successful AR/VR personal computer for 2 decades. The possibilities are endless.

story:
I am a Professional Firefighter, a Lieutenant, in Upstate New York. My partner is a Tool Maker/Product Design Specialist. We are both Marine Corps Veterans. Our drive to make The Pocket Shelf a success is relentless. The Pocket Shelf has two Patents applied for!

12/8/16 UPDATE! This is a picture of the FIRST PRODUCTION  POCKET SHELF!  Texturing and verbiage need to be added, on schedule to arrive by 12/16/16!

UPDATE!!! WE HAVE ORDERED THE PRODUCTION MOLDS ON 11/1/2016, WE EXPECT TO HAVE THE FIRST SHIPMENT BY THE SECOND WEEK OF DECEMBER!

The Pocket Shelf solves the most common household problems. Holes in your walls, phones and drinks on the floor and the need for a safe, clean place to put your phone or drink, INDOORS or OUT!

We've all had a drink knocked over on the floor, had nowhere safe to set our phone or needed a shelf where one isn't practical. Until now!

  • The Pocket Shelf  isn't just for drinks and phones either! Check out just some of the ways to use it! Inside or outside, The Pocket Shelf- support when and where you need it!

      The uses are endless, the potential markets are enormous! The Pocket Shelf is a must have for the home, office, workshop, traveling, college dorms or Military personnel living in housing, barracks or deployed. 

Use your imagination!

           

 

   The market research that we have done has gone EXTREMELY well. The Pocket Shelf was explained, demonstrated and followed by a 10 question survey. Survey questions covered visual appeal, usefulness and potential to purchase. All questions received approximately 80% top 1 and 2 responses. Groups focused on were general public (Mall shoppers), Military, college dorm students and travelers.

Market research setup!

                   

I was asked to present at 1 Million Cups of Syracuse, the response was again, incredible.

http://www.1millioncups.com/syracuse

http://www.saltmaker.org

We have partnered with a local product development company and have been able to reduce the initial cost significantly. Our goal is $19,000, that will fund our initial mold, product run and the staples to be included with each shelf.

We have a CUSTOMIZABLE Perk!    

  • Your custom photos, Logos or Art can showcase the face of the shelf with our virtually indestructible and CHANGEABLE custom option!
  • Starting at the $55. level!

 

Our biggest challenge is running a successful Flex funding campaign.

     We understand the concern of pledging to a Flex campaign, and they are absolutely valid. Scams and dishonest thieves have stigmatized it. Our integrity is VERY important to us, we still believe in the handshake that actually means something. Aside from that, if I were to run some scam, it would VERY likely END MY CAREER as a professional Firefighter. I am an Officer in my department and that stuff is not tolerated in any way. My partner has a long, distinguished and honorable Military service career in which he built his reputation upon honor, trust, and integrity. He is now trusted with his companies trade and business secrets while developing, testing and refining new products.

   We will run a very open, honest, transparent campaign. I can promise you, that I, will keep you up to date on everything that happens, as it happens. There are several ways to pledge to this campaign and all have safeguards for slimeballs.               

   Campaigns that are very successful usually have a promotion company that has done all of the work for them. We looked into it, and for our $19K goal, the upfront was $5000, over 25% of our goal. That would force us to increase our goal which we are not willing to do. There also are no guarantees on goal achievement, fall short, $5K is still gone. YOU are the only way that we will achieve the goal, PLEASE share, share, share on all of your Social Media sites!

Follow, Like and Share Us!

https://www.facebook.com/thepocketshelf/

https://twitter.com/ThePocketShelf

https://www.instagram.com/thepocketshelf/

https://www.pinterest.com/thepocketshelf/

www.thepocketshelf.com

Where will my money go?

All money raised here will go to support the initial costs of making the mold, production, packaging, inserts, strips and that is it. All business associated costs will be funded by me. If we go over the set goal? HOORRAAYYYYY!!! Still- ALL raised money will go to the business for more product or whatever may be needed. And again, I will keep you in the loop. No monies will be used for salaries or to pay back the over 10K that we have already invested in this, EVERY PENNY GOES BACK INTO THE BUSINESS, until everything is paid for and future needs such as marketing are met. We don't need a salary at this point, our goal is to bring this product, from my mind to market! YOU can be a BIG part of that!

Why don't you just get a loan or an investor?

Investors- I am asked this all the time... Why don't you go on "Shark Tank"? The fact is, it's not ready for that. I need to PROVE the market first. My market research ran about 80% top two replies to 10 questions. People LOVE it. Our goal is to get this off the ground first with our small team, THEN, we will seek strategic partners/ investors. They will have to be both. The initial run cost isn't so high, that we are willing to give up a huge chunk of our business because it is unproven. 

Loans- I am preapproved for a loan to cover the entire cost. However, that comes with interest. We would much rather keep my costs as low as possible, passing that along , to you, by offering The Pocket Shelf as a Pre-Sale. *IF* there is a shortfall, I have it covered.

We have assembled a first class team to make the process and production seamless and fulfillment as smooth as possible. With that said, there are always unforeseen obstacles that come up, no matter how well planned out your process is. Our team is very well capable of handling any issues that may arise in a very timely manner. Our production goal is mid-November 2016, but there are things that could happen to push that date back and we will keep you all up to date in real time as this project progresses.

***The photos and videos are of my 3D print or of my prototypes, they only color available, initially, will be BLACK. ***

11/17/16 UPDATE!

These are the production molds being built! Still, a lot of work to do, but they are progressing nicely! We have less than 200 left for guaranteed Pre-Holiday delivery so order YOURS TODAY!!!

And again, I will keep you in the loop. No monies will be used for salaries or to pay back the over 10K that we have already invested in this, EVERY PENNY GOES BACK INTO THE BUSINESS, until everything is paid for and future needs such as marketing are met. We don't need a salary at this point, our goal is to bring this product, from my mind to market! YOU can be a BIG part of that!
Why don't you just get a loan or an investor?
Investors- I am asked this all the time... Why don't you go on "Shark Tank"? The fact is, it's not ready for that. I need to PROVE the market first. My market research ran about 80% top two replies to 10 questions. People LOVE it. Our goal is to get this off the ground first with our small team, THEN, we will seek strategic partners/ investors. They will have to be both. The initial run cost isn't so high, that we are willing to give up a huge chunk of our business because it is unproven.  Loans- I am preapproved for a loan to cover the entire cost. However, that comes with interest. We would much rather keep my costs as low as possible, passing that along , to you, by offering The Pocket Shelf as a Pre-Sale. *IF* there is a shortfall, I have it covered.We have assembled a first class team to make the process and production seamless and fulfillment as smooth as possible. With that said, there are always unforeseen obstacles that come up, no matter how well planned out your process is. Our team is very well capable of handling any issues that may arise in a very timely manner. Our production goal is mid-November 2016, but there are things that could happen to push that date back and we will keep you all up to date in real time as this project progresses.***The photos and videos are of my 3D print or of my prototypes, they only color available, initially, will be BLACK. ***11/17/16 UPDATE!These are the production molds being built! Still, a lot of work to do, but they are progressing nicely! We have less than 200 left for guaranteed Pre-Holiday delivery so order YOURS TODAY!!!

story:
How does it work?

By activating the balance, direction and motion sensors in the case send compressed air to the air outlet at the four sides during the fall. The balance sensor and the direction sensor adjust the position of device with the air outlet and the rear side of the device is returned to facing down. It slows the device by giving compressed air from the four output just before the fall. There are pipes that transmits the air to the end and there is a tank involves the compressed air in the case. In this way, the device does not fall to the ground harshly.

Why?

Smart phones and tablet computers are devices that make your life easy. The shapes and sizes of these devices vary depending upon the technology development. Increasingly, they get thinner and have more fragile structure. Therefore, protection products have been a branch of this market. These protection products which have been produced in various shapes and properties have become increasingly more expensive and unpractical. You can use smartphone gelatin to protect your screen. Because this product is made of nylon, it can never fully protect the screen. Except for minor scratches, it is defenseless to falls, impacts and hard metal contacts. It reduces the image quality on the screen, makes bubbles and when it should be removed leaves an adhesive layer. Tempered glass, which is relatively more useful is a hard material with a thick structure. Though it is partially resistant to impacts, it does not provide complete protection. When it is broken it must be changed and is too expensive. In each breaking new fracture should be taken and it changes and breaks 4 times a year on average in the use. In this case, with a simple calculation a 30$ tempered glass means 120$ extra expense per year. It also has a negative impact on touchscreen sensitivity and image.

Apart from the screen you need to use protection case for the device as an extra. In this case a 40$ case need arises. As the levels of protection rise your device which is 7 mm will be 19 mm with case in average. For maximum protection, you will need 1 cm cover. In this case, you will have lost one of the most important features of the device you select for the thinness and portability. Another disadvantage of course is the increase of weight. A 499$ device would be 659 dollars with extra 160 dollars as an additional device for protection and this is just a one-time use. Screen savers will cost 120$ more in each break. At this rate, during the warranty period, the 499$ device will cost 779$.

What is the solution when there is so much trouble?

Futhark AirCase is the best solution...

Why?

Futhark AirCase is purchased only once and you can use it as long as you continue to use your device. The product price is only 29$. This is much cheaper compared to a tempered glass and case price. No need for additional protection on the screen because it is only in the form of case cover. Your device will never fall on the screen. Because the case is only 2.2 mm, it does not lose its thickness. While sensors are working, it will give direction to your device during the fall and it will always turn on the rear facing downwards. When there will be 6 cm left from the surface all outputs will slow down with air by working. There will not be problems such as scratches, refraction, the removal of paint on your device.

We trust our product, so we put a counter and the sensor monitoring system on it. Thus, while your device fall we will record this and if we determine that the device is damaged with Futhark AirCase we will meet all costs. No, not a limited warranty. As we have said there is no utilization limit. Just make sure the air is full.

What if the device falls into the water?

Then the airbag is activated to keep the device on the surface. When it is in the air, the rear side of the device will return against the water and protect the screen again. Don't panic, all entries of the device will be protected from water.


Where is the idea come from?

We are 4 university student. Smart phones and tablets are a big part of our lives and naturally we use them every day and every night. Small accidents are inevitable, of course. We started to think how we can get rid of continuous deterioration of the devices we fall, repairing costs we use for protection and ongoing expenses. Finally, an idea takes place while at the beginning it was a joke. We have explored the idea of AirCase. We have made a long research with an engineer friend and we have achieved a prototype. Then by going into mass production we productized it. This product is no longer a protection used only around friends. You can also have through the Indiegogo. Do not forget to write your device model if you order the product.

Two more innovative products are coming soon. We will make a special perk for the ones benefit from this campaign. Stay tuned ...

Futhark Technology Team

story:
The Oboe Reed Log

My name is Jeff Padgett, I am professional oboist in Chicago.  As any oboist knows, making good reeds is one of the greatest challenges of playing the instrument, and I am trying to do whatever it takes to help make this process easier and more efficient.  I want to bring reed making into the 21st century... we have been making reeds in the Dark Ages for far too long! 

It is vital to limit the variables in reed making, but it is incredibly easy to forget why that great reed in your reed box is as good as it is.  This app will track every aspect of your reeds, so that you can figure out what IS working for your reeds, and what IS NOT.  

Are you in a reed slump?  Now you can go back and look at the specifics for that great reed you had 2 months ago, and see what you are doing differently.

Thinking of making a change to your reed making?  You can track that change in your log, rate your reeds, and see whether they are overall better reeds than what you were making before.  

This app will also allow oboists to SHARE their work with others!  If you are a teacher, you can allow your students to see your reed log (including pictures) so they have models to use in their own reed making.  If you are a student, you can share your Reed Log with your teacher or other students or oboists, comparing notes and diagnosing problems.  

I am mastering Java and learning to program this myself, because I think this app is best coming from an oboist who knows the struggles.  I'm really enjoying learning how to code, and am currently working on the Android version of this app.  When it is near completion, I also plan to make an iPhone version of the app for distribution.

Eventually, i want to make this application available across the globe in various translations.  This campaign is for the Android version of Oboe Reed Log.  Coding this application takes quite a lot of time, and is impossible to do without support.  Please consider becoming a sponsor and bring reed making into the future!  

If you can't contribute financially, please spread the word so oboists can get excited about this useful tool.

Thank you so much!!

Jeff Padgett

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Multiple devices, not enough USB ports, tangled wires and messy tables. It's not just you, we all have that problem. That's why we designed this TESSAN Charging Station, to make your charging simple again.

DESK ORGANIZER

Thanks to the detachable phone holder, you can neatly store and charge all your devices at the same time. No more tangled wires, no more additional adapters. You can always keep your desktop clean and tidy!

USB-C CHARGING STATION 

 

There are 4 USB charging ports that can automatically identify your devices and charge at an optimal speed. The USB-C charging port charges up to 3A, which largely shorten the charging time.

SURGE PROTECTOR

Every year, thousands of fires result from power strips and electrical cords. But it doesn’t have to happen, at least not with this charging station. The secret is that it has a surge protector that can take a 510-joule hit, providing maximum protection of all your sensitive electronic devices during storms and power outages.

The switch you see is more than a control button, it’s an integrated circuit breaker. when you plug too many high-power appliances that exceed the rated power, the circuit breaker will open up, cutting off any more current flow, saving it from catching fire. It can also reset to normal position automatically.

BEAUTIFUL & DURABLE

With all these fancy electronic devices around, there is no reason to get a cheap-looking charging station on your desk. The TESSAN Charging Station has a matte finish for a smooth, silky surface that you can't resist touching! It won’t show pencil marks or fingerprints and will still seem like new even after long-term use.
For those who are sensitive to light while in sleep, you can’t go wrong picking this charging station. Unlike conventional power strips with a big red indicator, this one has a tiny white LED that lets you know the power is active but not so bright that lights up the room at night, just enough to let you know it’s there.

DESK OR WALL? IT’S UP TO YOU.

Equipped with 2 mounting holes and compact flat plug, you can easily hang it on walls, baseboards, or furniture to use as a wall adapter. For desks and nightstands, we added 4 anti-skid rubber pad on the bottom so it sits steadily in place.

TECH SPECS

Interface: 3 AC outles + 3 USB ports+ 1 USB-C port

USB-A Port: 5V/2.4A Max(Each Port) 

USB-C Port: 5V/3A Max

Total Output: 5V/6A 30W

Input: 100-240V~50/60Hz 0.8A Max

Energy Dissipation: 510J

Rated Power: 1250W

Plug Type: Flat Plug

Cord Length: 5 FT

Weight: 0.8 lb

Dimension: 4.25*4.25*1.22 Inches

 

IN PRODUCTION

We have already started production and completed more than a thousand hours of testing.

 

TIMELINE

 

Why Crowdfunding?

We are a group of young people gathered together with dreams inspired from daily life.
We both want to make a powerful intelligent socket, which is convenient, safe and practical.
After a series of surveys and brainstorms, we finally had a framework of the TESSAN Charging Station.This product took nearly one year from R&D to the final sample landing. We would like to show and introduce our outcome to the community before we made it to the market.
All the funds from Crowdfunding will be used for the product development, manufacturing, transportation and so on.
We wish you will enjoy the TESSAN Charging Station! If you have any ideas or comments, pls do not hesitate to contact us directly at support@tessan.cc. 

 

ABOUT US

TESSAN is a company specializing in the field of electronic technology products and aims to provide the best innovative product to the consumers. It's a young, dynamic and innovative team with an average age of 30 years old or less. Our team members are all from the same industry and are very familiar with the product development and market environment. Our ultimate aim is to bring a more comfortable and convenient life for you!

 

FAQ

What does shipping cost?

We offer free shipping to the consumers who live in USA.

When will you start shipping?

We are planning ship out all the rewards within a month after the campaign is over. We will keep you up to date on your progress and inform you the shipping track number through email once we ship your items out.

What colors do you offer?

Only black is available at this moment, the white one is coming later.

Who should I contact if I have more questions?

Please don't be hesitated to contact us if you have any further questions. We will respond as soon as we are available（leave messages on Indiegogo or email us at support@tessan.cc）.

Have ever you tried your product yourself?

We do use our charging station in the office, also recommend to family and friends.

Is your product safe to use?

Our products are verified by International Standard and have FCC/RoHS/CE certification. The plugs and wires are UL certified, passed more than 5,000 times tests during the research and development.

Is there a warranty?

We provide 18 months warranty period. Please kindly check our warranty card to get more details.

Where does the product manufacture?

The products are manufactured in China.

Will the price on Indiegogo be cheaper than on Amazon?

We guarantee that our items are much cheaper on Indiegogo than Amazon.

story:
Hi I'm John Duffin, creator of the concept for the Weigh2Go Case and Laser2Go case, and I'm excited to tell you about the patent pending concept called the Weigh2Go Case:

  • It's a brand new design for protective cases for smart phones and tablets that conveniently takes precise weight measurements. 
  • Weigh herbs, jewelry, luggage, packages, you name it...weigh it right on the case.
  • Measurements can be taken from .03 oz - 25 lb or from 1 g - 11 kg (imperial or metric results).
  • Includes retractable clasp for weighing heavier or bulky items. 
  • This is the super convenient scale that everyone's been "weighting" for!

The way forward in mobile case design is the Weigh2Go Case collection. With your contribution, you can make a difference by making this concept a reality. Hit the "BACK IT" button now and you'll be one step closer to having one of these cases in your pocket. To-date, I've invested in the legal (utility patent) and design materials and now I'm aiming to raise $100,000 to complete the build-out of the fully-functional prototype and set up for mass production.

I'm also excited to tell you about the companion product - the Laser2Go Case:

  • Takes precise length, width and height measurements directly from the case. 
  • Measures up to 825 feet or 250 meters. 
  • Efficiency and economical for industry - the Laser2Go Case can be deployed by contractors or to a fleet of engineers to standardize measuring and measuring tools.

​All cases will come with an integrated app to view your measurement results on your device via Bluetooth transmission.   For added value the app interfaces (API) with third party applications like Point of Sale (POS), Autodesk, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), and postal delivery services.  

This campaign is about enhancing the mobile user's experience. The novel design of the case is a perfect complement to your smart phone and tablet. Get your modern convenience on and start measuring on the fly.

The Weigh2Go and Laser2Go Case will make life easier and more economical and are ideal for farmers markets, small business owners, students, home improvement, contractors, outdoor adventurers, nutritionists, fitness fanatics and just about everyone who needs to measure on the go. Safe, handy and reliable, our happy customers will be shouting, "Weigh2Go!"

Let's Do This!

I came up with the concept of The Weigh2Go case while travelling in Morocco and noticed that many market traders didn't have scales to measure their freshly ground herbs and spices, but they all had phones. And that was my eureka moment!

To-date, I've invested in the legal (utility patent) and design materials and now I'm aiming to raise $100,000 to complete the build-out of the fully-functional prototype and set up for mass production. 

A one-stop-shop design and manufacturing partner is ready to go as soon we're funded. One of their existing reference customers is NASA, so I know the product development will be top notch. Our patent pending technology also overcomes the challenge of radiofrequency interference, so you can rest assured that your measurement data will be accurate.

We want to make this concept your reality, but if we fall short of the goal, contributions raised will go towards developing the essential parts of the prototype, namely the Weigh2Go and Laser2Go mobile phone cases.

Impact

The Weigh2GoCase Collection will ultimately enhance the way of life for people across the globe. For example, imagine the Weigh2Go tablet case in the classroom delivering real benefits for STEM related projects by enabling students to take and record weight and distance measurements for various experiments.  

Challenges & Opportunities

Time-to-market is the biggest risk in this fast-changing space.  We have pre-order interest from a couple of Amazon stores and national mobile phone retailers, so our goal is to start shipping by Q1 2019. 

The technology roadmap includes upgraded case designs such as the Weigh2Go Laser Case; combining both platforms into one case with wireless charging.  The roadmap also incorporates patent pending plug-and-play inserts that have broad applications for health care organizations and for safe marijuana (MJ) consumption.  The MJ Inserts provide safe delivery of THC in consistent doses.  Health Inserts measure for diabetes, temperature, blood alcohol content (BAC) and other health-related quantities.   

Thank You

If you decide this opportunity is not for you, no worries and thank you for your time.   Please follow us on facebook and twitter and share our latest developments. 

Many thanks and kind regards!

John

@Weigh2GoCase
story_txt:
Hi I'm John Duffin, creator of the concept for the Weigh2Go Case and Laser2Go case, and I'm excited to tell you about the patent pending concept called the Weigh2Go Case:
It's a brand new design for protective cases for smart phones and tablets that conveniently takes precise weight measurements. 

Weigh herbs, jewelry, luggage, packages, you name it...weigh it right on the case.
Measurements can be taken from .03 oz - 25 lb or from 1 g - 11 kg (imperial or metric results).
Includes retractable clasp for weighing heavier or bulky items. 
This is the super convenient scale that everyone's been "weighting" for!
The way forward in mobile case design is the Weigh2Go Case collection. With your contribution, you can make a difference by making this concept a reality. Hit the "BACK IT" button now and you'll be one step closer to having one of these cases in your pocket. To-date, I've invested in the legal (utility patent) and design materials and now I'm aiming to raise $100,000 to complete the build-out of the fully-functional prototype and set up for mass production.I'm also excited to tell you about the companion product - the Laser2Go Case:

Takes precise length, width and height measurements directly from the case. 


Measures up to 825 feet or 250 meters. 

Efficiency and economical for industry - the Laser2Go Case can be deployed by contractors or to a fleet of engineers to standardize measuring and measuring tools.
​All cases will come with an integrated app to view your measurement results on your device via Bluetooth transmission.   For added value the app interfaces (API) with third party applications like Point of Sale (POS), Autodesk, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), and postal delivery services.  This campaign is about enhancing the mobile user's experience. The novel design of the case is a perfect complement to your smart phone and tablet. Get your modern convenience on and start measuring on the fly.The Weigh2Go and Laser2Go Case will make life easier and more economical and are ideal for farmers markets, small business owners, students, home improvement, contractors, outdoor adventurers, nutritionists, fitness fanatics and just about everyone who needs to measure on the go. Safe, handy and reliable, our happy customers will be shouting, "Weigh2Go!"Let's Do This!I came up with the concept of The Weigh2Go case while travelling in Morocco and noticed that many market traders didn't have scales to measure their freshly ground herbs and spices, but they all had phones. story:
1.Alexa Speaker: Alexa-built-in speaker, just like the Alexa Echo.

PowerLounge comes with built-in support for Amazon Alexa, allowing you to control your devices and home through just your voice!


Voice Control Your Music

 

Alexa provides voice control for Amazon Music—just ask for your favorite artist or song, or request a specific genre or mood. You can also search for music by lyrics, when a song or album was released, or let Alexa pick the music for you. Listen to any song with Amazon Music Unlimited.

Alexa also provides voice control for Pandora, Spotify, iHeartRadio, and TuneIn.

Voice Control Your Smart Home

Ask Alexa to switch on the lamp before getting out of bed, turn on the fan or turn up the thermostat while reading in your favorite chair, or dim the lights from the couch to watch a movie—all by just using your voice.

Alexa works with smart home devices such as lights, switches, TVs, thermostats, and more from WeMo, Philips Hue, Sony, SmartThings, Insteon, Nest, ecobee, and Wink

2.Wireless Charger: fast charger, allows iPhones to charge to 55% and Samsung devices to 75% in 30 minutes. 

Wireless Charger for: 

  • iPhone 8, 8 Plus and X
  • Samsung S6,7,8 and Note 6,7,8 
  • Any Qi compatible devices

For iPhone 6/6S, 6 Plus/6S Plus, 7/7S and 7 Plus/7S Plus: Please select the Perk which includes a wireless charging case, which is needed to allow for wireless charging with PowerLounge.

With quick charge, PowerLounge charges even faster than a traditional cable.

Quickcharge allows the iPhone to charge to 55% and Samsung devices to 75% in 30 minutes; giving you power in a flash when you are in a rush.

3.Bluetooth Speaker: Bluetooth 4.2 Wireless Hi-Fi high quality speaker.

Hi-Fi quality speaker

PowerLounge has a Hi-Fi quality speaker connected through Bluetooth or Wi-Fi. With a powerful 7W subwoofer, PowerLounge plays your favorite songs with crisp bass and clear sound.

Two PowerLounge units can be paired together through True Wireless stereo or Multiroom to play from the same source, creating a stereo sound.

Hands-free video chat

PowerLounge enables convenient hands-free video chat through its low interference microphone and phone stand. Allowing you to pick up, make calls and hang up through one quick button on the side of the PowerLounge.

Phone stand

The wireless charging surface serves as a phone stand, providing a 60 degree viewing angle that makes watching videos and video calling comfortable.

 

PowerLounge is available in five colors:Obsidian Black, Silver Grey, Papaya Orange, Champagne Gold and Millennial Pink

Default color: Obsidian Black. But if you need other color, please leave us a note during ordering.

Our Story

Grace Union technology LTD. was founded in 2014 in Hong Kong. We strive to design innovative and unique mobile solutions .

PowerLounge was designed with convenience in mind. Allowing you to watch videos, play your music, video chat and control your home right from your desk.

Loved By

story:
Introduction

Hi, my name is Ali. I am the inventor of the DASHMO. I have experienced past nine years in engineering and programming. Outside of my daily work, I am an entrepreneur. I love inventing. It is almost 14 years that I am developing new products. It was for me an amazing experience and learning curve. When I see a problem, I like to look for the best solution possible. Early this year I established a new company called DMA Innovation. I intend to bring these products to the market through this company. For this, I am working with three other companies for production, fulfillment, and distribution. I hope to fund my first product DASHMO through this INDIEGOGO campaign, and I hope you can support me in this cause.

 

Invention

When I got a problem with a smartphone mount that I bought, I started brainstorming for better ways to fit my smartphone in my car. And then I came up with an idea to mount it on the dashboard behind the steering wheel.

 

Made for safety

The idea was a perfect solution for me because I could operate my smartphone while holding the steering wheel and always could stay focused on the road. It is a much safer way to drive. I was happy as I could save lives with this solution. So many car accidents happen every year. Nowadays many people can’t imagine their lives without smartphones. And unfortunately, they use the smartphone while driving even though it is dangerous. With DASHMO the smartphone gets mounted quickly in a moment.

 

Affordable

I wanted everyone to have DASHMO. Thus I spend special attentions to its design to make it one of the most affordable and high-quality product. I came up with one part design. It reduces the production cost by eliminating the assembly and reducing the component count, which makes it possible to be made in Europe with high-quality materials under European standards for an affordable price.

 

Durable

And also this unique design improves its quality because it eliminates moving parts which wear out quickly.

 

Material properties vs mechanical joints

Rather using mechanical joints to make the job done, I instead made use of its material properties like microchips do nowadays. It is very hard to do, but when done right it has many benefits.

 

Fused synthetic rubber skin

Also, I added high-quality synthetic rubber skin which gave it ultra-high grip. The rubber skin gets fused with the core material directly in the production mold, which means that the skin will never come off.

 

Elegant design

And of course, if something is affordable it does not mean, that it has to look ugly. DASHMO’s unique and beautiful design which is stylish and pleasing to the eye proves it.

 

All-in-One

DASHMO is mounted in cars, bicycles, used as a table stand and has many other purposes. It fits on all smartphones with or without a case/cover. In automobiles, it mounts on the dashboard, on the steering wheel, and sun visor. Passenger right next to the driver can use his smartphone on sun visor as well. And on bikes, it mounts on any frame pipe with a diameter greater than 27mm and less than 40mm. On the table, it can be repositioned very fast from portlet to landscape stand. With DASHMO you have not restricted yourself anymore where to mount your phone. Mount it where you wish!

 

Optimal visibility and voice recording

DASHMO mounts a smartphone near in front of the driver while retaining optimal view on the road. It makes it possible to see even small letters on the screen, and it is optimal chose for video calls. Because the microphone is near the driver in front of him, the caller can hear him much better.

 

Everything stays accessible

DASHMO does not obscure controls, air vents or CD slot on the dashboard in your car, unlike many other mounts.

 

Most reliable

DASHMO does not fall while driving, unlike many other mounts. It grips firmly because of its rubber skin and does not come off because of its unique mechanical connection.

 

Very stable

DASHMO does not vibrate or move while driving.

 

No stickers required

DASHMO does not need any stickers to hold a phone or to mount itself to the car.

 

Very fast and simple to use

DASHMO mounts and removes easily in a matter of seconds.

 

Charge while driving

DASHMO keeps the smartphone accessible for charging when mounted on the dashboard.

 

No assembly required

DASHMO consist of only one part which means that it does not require assembly.

 

Compact

DASHMO is small. It easily fits in the car’s door shelf. It can be taken along for use on a bike, as a table stand or for any other use.

 

Patent Pending

DASHMO is a registered trademark and pending for a patent.

 

How it works

DASHMO’s core made of high-grade engineering plastic acts like a spring which gives it consistent pressure while its high-quality synthetic rubber skin provides it ultra-high grip. It's lip flexes open allowing it to clamp on many places. Upper arm also flexes open to match smartphone’s width from 55mm up to 100mm. And its back flexes backward to match smartphone’s thickness from 4mm up to 15mm. The waves on the spine make it adjustable in height. The ribs on upper and lower arms protect smartphone’s buttons from pressing when clamped.

 

Adjust the car seat and the steering wheel

For an optimal view on the road, raise the car seat and lower the steering wheel. Then adjust DASHMO in height until the bottom of the smartphone lines up with the top of the steering wheel. On this way, you get the perfect view on the road and the smartphone.

 

Challenges

Because many had a bad experience with existing smartphone mounts, the challenge was to make a smartphone mount that works without all the existing downfalls.

Finally, the goal is achieved, and I am happy to offer DASHMO to you. For the production of the DASHMO, I need your help. I already chose the factories in Belgium and Germany which will produce and distribute DASHMO worldwide. I got from them quotations and estimated deadlines for the final product delivery.

 

Timeline

 

Why Pledge Now?

DASHMO is ready for production, and I need your help to start. By pledging now, you make it possible to bring DASHMO in the market and will be one of the first who gets it.

Please remember to share this campaign with others. You help as significantly by sharing this.

story:
Explore More...

 

As flagship smartphones continue to get bigger, more complicated and increasingly fragile, they don't necessarily meet the demands of active outdoor lifestyles. 

We previously designed Jelly, and now we are taking that concept and pushing the limits to the next level with Atom - an IP68 certified rugged outdoor phone with 4G compatibility. It is waterproof, dustproof, and shockproof, making it is the perfect phone for your outdoor adventures, business trips, and daily life.

 

    
The mini-sized design doesn't diminish the powerful features of Atom. It runs Android 8.1 Oreo and includes an Octa-core CPU, fingerprint scanner, NFC features and Corning Gorilla Glass. 

  • Hands On Review

Check this Atom durability test from Youtube Channel JerryRigEverything, Atom is reviewed by Zack Nelson, the great and famous technology enthusiast from Utah, United States. Thanks so much for his awesome work!

 

 
 

As a full-function smartphone in a tiny size, Atom is perfect for hiking, biking, running or any outdoor activities.

We also designed 3 useful Atom accessories to make it more convenient to carry: bike mount, armband, and belt clip.

 

  • Dual SIM Cards & Universal 4G Band

Dual SIM cards is a standard feature for many Android phones but the secondary card usually operates on the slower GSM network. Atom is different, it supports both SIM cards on the extremely fast 4G network (3G if you have not upgraded to 4G yet). 

Technically, Atom can work over any 4G network and we have tested it on most of the major mobile carriers` networks.

 

  • Programmable Key
 

Wanna a shortcut button for your favorite functions? Not a problem with Atom`s programmable key. Taking photos, setting alarm, opening App, or any function you`d like to open in a simple tap.

 
 
  • Fingerprint Scanner

The Fingerprint scanner provides more security for your phone and makes it fast and easy to unlock the screen to take important calls or capture a memorable moment with one of Atom’s high-quality cameras.

 
 
  • NFC Features

Atom’s convenient NFC features allow you to instantly make payments on the go at thousands of retailers and online stores.

 
 
  • USB On-The-Go (OTG)

Atom is USB OTG compatible, and you can transfer data/photos to other devices & much more.

story:
Advancements in technology are great and our world revolves around the use of devices. Often times, these devices come with a lot of accessories and maintenance. Each item in your purse or laptop bag requires at least a charging cable; not including charging blocks or ports. If you have a smartwatch and a phone you are carrying double to equipment. Why have all of those clutter when you can use one device for everything?

Smart watches aren’t going anywhere. They are here to stay and are quickly becoming a part of life for many people. But, with smart watches comes yet another cable. 

Introducing 


An elegant and stylish watch strap for all of your charging needs. You can charge your Smartwatches and Smartphones on the go.

As a charger 
Charge your smartwatch

Stop searching charging outlets and stop worrying about carrying chargers.

  • You can charge your smart watch by directly connecting to your iPhone/iPad/Android devices and windows phones with micro USB port.
  • CharSpace utilizes power from your smart phone battery and charge your smart watches on the go.

  • You can charge your smart watch by directly connecting to your laptop, power bank or any other USB outlet.

Charge your Smartphone

No more tangled wires, just bridge the CharSpace powered smartwatch between your mobile phone and USB power sources  such as laptops, Macbooks, power banks and even USB adaptors

 

As a Data cable


CharSpace acts as a data cable for syncing data between your devices. You can take backup of your data, videos, pictures in a lightning speed. Supports,

As a storage device
  • Running out of memory on your vacation? CharSpace comes with built in memory up to 128 GB, from which, you can load tonnes of music, pictures and movies. 
  • Stream movies and music without need of cloud storage or bulky external storage devices. 
  • High security protection gives you complete control over your files without getting worried of hackers braking online cloud storages.
  • Simply, CharSpace is your secret and secured vault on wrist.

Mobile app

CharSpace comes with app compatible software for iOS, Android and windows. supporting,
  • Data transfers,
  • Backups
  • Video and music streaming
  • Document editing,etc.,
Models

CharSpace is available in exclusive design for each of the smartwatches displayed above.
Technical Specifications
  • CharSpace uses high quality silicone for perfect fit and comfort
  • Size : 38 & 42, 130 to 215mm
  • Available in Black , Red and White. 
Timeline
  • December 2015 - Indiegogo campaign
  • January 2016 - App development
  • February 2016 - Trial run samples will be delivered to first 50 backers.
  • March 2016 - Shipment to all backers
FAQ
What devices could charge CharSpace one powered smartwatch?
Any mobile device having ports for Lightning connector,Micro USB and USB ports can charge smart watch.
Which devices can be charged using CharSpace?
Any devices that can be charged by Micro USB or Lightning charger
Can we use mobile phones to charge CharSpace powered smartwatch?
Yes, you can charge smartwatches using your iPad/iPhone/Samsung mobiles/any Android devices.
How much it costs to get shipping to USA?
CharSpace will be shipped to Indiegogo backers completely free of cost to any destination in the world
story_txt:
Advancements in technology are great and our world revolves around the use of devices. Often times, these devices come with a lot of accessories and maintenance. Each item in your purse or laptop bag requires at least a charging cable; not including charging blocks or ports. If you have a smartwatch and a phone you are carrying double to equipment. Why have all of those clutter when you can use one device for everything?
Smart watches aren’t going anywhere. They are here to stay and are quickly becoming a part of life for many people. But, with smart watches comes yet another cable. Introducing An elegant and stylish watch strap for all of your charging needs. You can charge your Smartwatches and Smartphones on the go.
As a charger Charge your smartwatch
Stop searching charging outlets and stop worrying about carrying chargers.










You can charge your smart watch by directly connecting to your iPhone/iPad/Android devices and windows phones with micro USB port.


CharSpace utilizes power from your smart phone battery and charge your smart watches on the go.





You can charge your smart watch by directly connecting to your laptop, power bank or any other USB outlet.



Charge your Smartphone
No more tangled wires, just bridge the CharSpace powered smartwatch between your mobile phone and USB power sources  such as laptops, Macbooks, power banks and even USB adaptors

 
As a Data cable




CharSpace acts as a data cable for syncing data between your devices. You can take backup of your data, videos, pictures in a lightning speed. Supports,





As a storage device


Running out of memory on your vacation? CharSpace comes with built in memory up to 128 GB, from which, you can load tonnes of music, pictures and movies. 


Stream movies and music without need of cloud storage or bulky external storage devices. 


High security protection gives you complete control over your files without getting worried of hackers braking online cloud storages.


Simply, CharSpace is your secret and secured vault on wrist.

Mobile app

CharSpace comes with app compatible software for iOS, Android and windows. supporting,


Data transfers,


Backups


Video and music streaming


Document editing,etc.,


Models

CharSpace is available in exclusive design for each of the smartwatches displayed above.Technical Specifications

CharSpace uses high quality silicone for perfect fit and comfort


Size : 38 & 42, 130 to 215mm


Available in Black , Red and White. 

Timeline

December 2015 - Indiegogo campaign


January 2016 - App development


February 2016 - Trial run samples will be delivered to first 50 backers.


March 2016 - Shipment to all backers


FAQ
What devices could charge CharSpace one powered smartwatch?
Any mobile device having ports for Lightning connector,Micro USB and USB ports can charge smart watch.
Which devices can be charged using CharSpace?
Any devices that can be charged by Micro USB or Lightning charger
Can we use mobile phones to charge CharSpace powered smartwatch?
Yes, you can charge smartwatches using your iPad/iPhone/Samsung mobiles/any Android devices.
How much it costs to get shipping to USA?
CharSpace will be shipped to Indiegogo backers completely free of cost to any destination in the world

story:
The internet is often spotty or non-existent when you need it -traveling,camping, sports, music festivals - the exact same time that you just took some great photos or a video that you would like to share with your friends that are with you.Many users use a USB flash drive to transfer files from computer to computer; it’s easy, fast, and convenient.That's why we've designed a flash drive in mobile internet today .DrivePlus allows you to transfer data (photos, music, video) between computers and iOS devices (iPhone, iPad & iPod touch) in no time, without the need for iTunes or the Cloud. You also can instantly back up your files when you don't have the internet access to your cloud back-up systems or iTunes. Also allows you to quickly copy files when your devices memory storage is getting full.

The DrivePlus comes with an integrated Apple Lightning connector,Android Micro-USB connector and a regular USB connector. Supports most smart devices in use today.

The DrivePlus  allows you to move all your movies, music, documents, and files quickly and safely to all your other devices (computers, iPhones, iPads, iTouches,Tablet ,Android Smartphone ) with ease.

No need for cellular data, Internet, wireless networks, or Cloud access when using the DrivePlus .

DRIVEPLUS FEATURES:

  • Stream 1080p HD Movies directly from the DrivePlus to your iPhone, iPad or Android.
  • Lightning / Micro-USB/USB 2.0 all-interface - easily share files between iOS,Android,Tablet,Mac, and PC (iOS/Android/Windows/ Mac OSX).
  • Upgrade your device storage up to 64 GB (16GB/32GB/64GB capacities).
  • Free universal iOS app for iPhone/iPad/iPod touch.
  • File Management (Create ,Copy ,Move,Delete ,Rename ,Open in ,and many more ).
  • Safe & Secure .Data doesn't need to pass thru 3rd party servers.
  • Ultra slim with Aluminum material design.
  • Low power consumption. Battery-less design. no need to charge DrivePlus

Free iOS APP (No need APP for Android and Windows)

PRODUCT  SPECIFICATIONS:

Capacity:  16GB, 32GB, 64GB
Connectors:  Apple Lightning Connector, Micro USB, and Standard USB 2.0
DrivePlus-to-USB Speed:  12MB/s (Read), 7.5MB/s (Write)
DrivePlus-to-iDevice Speed:  10MB/s (Read), 6MB/s (Write)
Dimensions:  W 22mm x L 52mm x H 8mm
Weight:  15g
Color:  Silver /Gold
System requirement:  Free iOS APP(No need APP for Android&Windows )
Compatibility:  iPhone/ iPad/iPod, Android, Windows smartphone and tablets.
Supported File Formats:
  Video: .mp4, .m4v, .mpv, .mov, .mpg, .mkv, .avi, .wmv, .rmvb, .flv, .3gp, .gif
  Audio: .wav, .aac, .aif, .aiff, .caf, .m4a, .mp3
  Images: jpg, tiff, gif
  Documents: .doc and .docx (Microsoft Word); .htm and .html (web pages); .key (Keynote); .numbers (Numbers); .pages (Pages); .pdf (Preview and Adobe Acrobat); .ppt and .pptx (Microsoft PowerPoint); .txt (text); .rtf (rich text format); .vcf (contact information); .xls and .xlsx (Microsoft Excel); .zip; .ics

Risks & Challenges

The DrivePlus that you see as below photos are actual production units.  
With your support, we can bring DrivePlus to worldwide users. We have started mass production and your contribution will help us achieve economies of scale and keep the product cost low. 

Perks:

  $33 - DrivePlus x1 (16GB) limited for Early Birds , Gold Color, 30% OFF,Regular retail price will be $48
  $34 - DrivePlus x1 (16GB) limited for Early Birds , Silver Color, 30% OFF,Regular retail price will be $48
  $48 - DrivePlus x1 (32GB) limited for Early Birds , Gold  Color, 37% OFF,Regular retail price will be $78
  $49 - DrivePlus x1 (32GB) limited for Early Birds , Silver  Color, 37% OFF,Regular retail price will be $78
  $68 - DrivePlus x1 (64GB) limited for Early Birds , Gold  Color, 37% OFF,Regular retail price will be $108
  $69 - DrivePlus x1 (64GB) limited for Early Birds , Silver  Color, 37% OFF,Regular retail price will be $108
  $87 - DrivePlus x2 (32GB) DrivePlusX2,Special price,any color you want !
  $125 - DrivePlus x2 (64GB) DrivePlusX2,Special price,any color you want !
  $410 - DrivePlus x10 (32GB) Small Pack,Special price,any color you want !
  $610 - DrivePlus x10 (64GB) Small Pack,Special price,any color you want !

THE COMPANY TEAM:

Other Ways You Can Help

If DrivePlus is not for you - maybe you have family and friends who can make a good use of it? Please share on your Facebook, tweet on Twitter, and plus on Google+ - every share is heartily appreciated! You can share through links at the top this page or through our DrivePlus page.
