story:
Short Summary

Pi EzConnect board (or shield or HAT) for a Raspberry Pi connects all GPIOs of the Raspberry Pi with easy-to-connect, documented terminal blocks. Power and Ground connections are also available via the terminal block allowing solder-less connections for sensors, LED's, pull-up resistors, pull-down resistors, or other electronic components.


Convenient breadboard capability on the board provides solder points for adding headers on the Pi EzConnect board. The breadboard solder points are spaced 0.1 inches (or 2.54 mm) apart. Male or female header pins can be soldered in those locations making a mini breadboard on Pi-EzConnect. Instead of connectors, electronic components like pull-up or pull-down resistors, LEDs etc. can  be soldered on to the breadboard. And if solder-less connections are needed, use the terminal blocks!!
Raspberry Pi header pins are extended approximately 8 mm - this allows enough space between the Pi EzConnect board and the next board in the stack. 


On the Pi-Ez-Connect, one can easily attach another board. The next board, for example, could be a Pi UpTime UPS, providing backup power and UPS functionality to the Raspberry Pi. Together, Pi EzConnect and Pi UpTime UPS makes the Raspberry Pi stack mobile. (This is shown in the video. The Pi UpTime UPS board is available on eBay - eBay item number (or eBay id number) is 191593451086.


The above picture shows a Raspberry Pi with Pi EzConnect and a TFT screen connected together. The Pi EzConnect has a DHT-22 temperature and humidity sensor attached and other sensor (not shown). A Raspberry Pi camera is also connected via the ribbon cable. All these devices are encased in an ICE Raspberry Pi Enclosure available from MCM Electronics. 

What We Need & What Will You Get

We are asking for $5,000 in funding. We need the funds to:

  • Cover manufacturing costs of these boards.
  • Create a web page (www.piezconnect.com) to document use cases, specifications etc.
  • Scan the board with a Raspberry Pi for any FCC emissions or noise. We believe it is not needed for a "passive" board like the Pi EzConnect. We want to make sure you are getting a quality product without any side effects e.g. noise.
  • Documenting RoHS compliance for all components used and manufacturing practices. 
Should we exceed the funding requirements, we will explore different terminal blocks. For example, a picture of a terminal block where the wires are connected to a separate terminal block header and the two are mated together to provide the connections. See the picture below. 



The Impact

If you ever used Raspberry Pi with sensors, pull-up or pull-down resistors, LED's or other electronics components connected to the GPIO, you probably already appreciate the value of this board. We hope to make the Raspberry Pi easier to use at an incremental cost. 


Risks & Challenges

There are minimal risks with this board. The board is working well and has received good feedback from beta users and early adopters. 

The components used on the board are passive and there are many suppliers for these both domestic (in the USA) as well as internationally.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you know of a Raspberry Pi user, make them aware of this board. They will appreciate the ease with with they can add components (sensors, LED's etc.) for their projects and learning or tinkering with a Pi. Making your community, friends, family etc. aware of the board will be a great, great help. And I will thank you for it with a referral. 

If you can create projects using this board so that people can learn or enhance their skill as they are using the board - we would like to know and even post that on the web page when it is ready. We hope you will be able contribute with some creative ideas. 

Please contact us if you plan to make this board available with a product / idea that uses a Raspberry Pi.

story:
Short Summary

Hi. I am a restaurant chef. I have been wearing glasses for a short while now. before that it was reading glasses.  Sometimes at work, in a kitchen, it is a burden to wear glasses. thats when I came up with the idea to have the glass on my phone case be prescription, or just reading strength. It will not cost alot and I only need a little help from a lot of friends to get the product marketed

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • I need to raise 10000 dollars. 7500 for the marketing, and 2500 for research on new uses for the product.

The Impact

I can use all the help , large donations or small, that I can get. The uses of the reading glass are almost unlimited. I already have the patent.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, please share the page so more folks can see it. it really will be able to make alot of lives easier

And that's all there is to it.

story:
If you are using iPhone 6 /iPhone 6 Plus, you have probably felt our frustration: cannot reach back button on upper left corner or add/confirm button on the upper right corner, unable to control with one hand, drop the phone and break heart. Traditional screen protectors “sacrifice” themselves in accident, but you still live in fear and inconvenience. Solution??


TEMPERED GLASS has driven its way to the industry during the last year. Before buying my own personal tempered glass cover about a year ago, I had NO idea what this meant. After a little digging and researching, I found out it is made by heating the glass and then cooling it very quickly. This type of glass breaks differently than normal glass, creating more rounded edges of glass pieces instead of jagged shards that regular glass creates. A tempered glass protector is a multi-layered screen protector. It has a bottom layer of absorbent silicon, PET film and an optically clear adhesive tempered glass and oleophobic coating in that order. Tempered glass is up to five times stronger than normal glass.

Tempered glass is more heat resistant than regular glass, meaning your phone is less likely to be damaged by heat. Plastic screen protectors are much more likely to be scratched than tempered glass protectors, which are up to five times as thick than standard plastic protectors. The smoothness and clarity of the tempered glass makes the screen protector feel more like your actual smart phone screen than a plastic screen cover would. Generally, tempered glass screen protectors are generally easier to put on your phone than plastic screen protectors.

So, how to combine the solution of the first problem without deteriorating the technology of tempered glass?

Solution: Add invisible BACK & ADD/CONFIRM buttons with a smart layer on the tempered glass on either sides of the Home button on the iPhone.

This is our solution for users who enjoy big iPhones.

Please back our campaign and show your support. Thank you.

story:
PLEASE WATCH OUR VIDEO ON YOUTUBE:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QCyAx6AY6Zg

Before you read any further!

Let us give you a quick guide to dealha.com. We all want efficiency, right? So why we still use our favorite shopping sites separately to find desired items? We finally put an end to it. Dealha.com will search for your desired items in all global eBay and Amazon sites at once. Even more so, you can now type words in your native language, choose item location by country or region, filter results, manage listings and much more! Now that`s a truly great shopping experience. We have performed a lot of beta testing and our site has proven itself. We found cheapest results from all over the world in their native languages, we would normally never find through eBay or Amazon directly. For more info on our project, please read below. Thanks, Dealha.com team.

Dealha.com! Global online shopping - sorted!

 

From the very start dealha.com project was meant to be as a project that unites biggest shopping sites in one friendly place. Let us give you an example - we all love eBay and Amazon, right? We all use both of these sites frequently to buy or to sell something. So we had an idea, why not start with these two giants by putting them together! Our target was to save our time and most importantly - our money! 

So in 2012 we were on the mission, we started practical research on how we can make it happen. 3 years later, after lots of trails and errors, we are almost finished.

Bumpy road ahead!

Starting this project, we had no idea of the challenges we would have to face or the real expenses. We were pretty sure that our first hired programmers team from India would finish project in a budget of 5K USD (too good to be true, right?). However we were more than happy and willing to spend it on our dream project. 

Main issue!

 

We didn`t expect any major technical issues, but we faced one - the big one! "Category collision" problem, how we call it now! Besides the fact that eBay and Amazon both have totally different category structure, eBay alone with its 22 national sites (eBay.com, eBay.de, eBay.it, eBay.co.uk...) has a complex and different category structure built in - different languages, different category titles.

 

Breakthrough!

 

 

At this stage of the project we have found a solution to this problem with our latest programmer (now, also shareholder - Toncho Dimitrov).

 

This is Toncho`s approach:

 

 

by using synonyms, combining together equal categories, joining subcategories and combined categories, we can resolve "Category collision" problem. We know it, because we are getting positive results while beta testing this new approach.

Guess what?

 

With this new approach we are no longer limited to eBay and Amazon, we can add MORE! Our next goal is to add Aliexpress.com to the mix!

A bit of statistics!

 

Our team

Our team consists of four people. All true believers of dealha.com project and better online shopping experience. Also all of us are shareholders of the company SIA "LeadSoft" (EU VAT number 40103777369):

 

What dealha.com can do?

For now, our innovative search engine will search all eBay and Amazon sites at once. YES, THAT'S RIGHT! Dealha.com has been made in a clean and uncluttered design matter. It`s easy to understand and navigate. 

 

 

Our mission - helping users find what their`re looking for - faster and cheaper. Let`s face it, most of Americans don`t want to buy products located outside of USA/Canada as well as most Europeans don`t want products outside European Union. So we are introducing not only your typical eBay and Amazon site to search in, but also item location filtering. Users can also check specific countries or regions (for example: China or Asia), that they don`t want the product to be from.

 

One of the major things that makes dealha.com unique and a step ahead of the competition is our built in translation function. Enabling this function allows users to find even more items for the best price. Think about it, you are looking for a leather wallet, preferably with location in Europe. You will never find all the listings, because some of them will always be listed in their national language. A seller in Germany who sells the exact leather wallet you need, will likely publish his listing in german, in this case you`ll never find it using eBay.com while typing in english “leather wallet”. But using dealha.com translation function you finally have the necessary tools. So just start typing - "lederhandschuhe" in quotes for "leather gloves" if you are german :) dealha.com will do the rest, displaying already translated and matching results from all eBay and Amazon national sites. 

Users can apply all kind of filters to their searches (similar to eBay), sort results, manage listings, save them to Listing Manager, categorize, compare. Users can also save their favorite sellers, comment them, contact them directly or visit their store and use many more options. More features will be added as project progresses.

Translation function in use below, word "chair" is translated, displaying results from eBay.de national site:

 

 

 

 

 

 

Next goals and ideas!

It`s hard to put all our thoughts and crazy new ideas in writing here, but trust us, we are here to deliver a great product, that will help all of us in our daily shopping. Saving both time and money!

Some of the upcoming NEW features that we will add to dealha.com, free of charge for our backers: 

 

  • Auction shooter - this function will help users win auction based listings at the last second. You control the price limit! 

  •  

    Item tracking system - track your newly bought item inside dealha.com. We will try to do this fully automatic if you bought your item trough dealha.com.

  • Buy more for less - in collaboration with major international distributors. We will create a new department offering deals with impressive discounts exclusively for dealha.com users!

  • No contest - feature that shows relevant listings without any bids on them 2 hours before ending. Pair that with auction shooter and you got yourself another great deal!

  •  

    Item location selection - you can choose to show items only located in specific region. For example if your location is USA and you don`t want item to be from China, you can exclude this region, this way avoiding long shipping time and taxes.

  • Exclude duplicates - with this feature you can exclude duplicate listings from different eBay`s and Amazon`s. Because let`s face it, a lot of sellers publish the same listing on all national eBay sites. 

This is an actual screenshot of dealha.com:

 

 

Current progress and timeline

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Why our team needs your help?

 

 

We have worked on dealha.com for over 3 years now. We have created a good team around us. All we need now is a little financial boost to officially launch our site. For a project of this scope, we don`t have enough financial resources. As well as general start-up capital to get things going. Some might say - you bit more than you can chew! Maybe, but we can`t quit now! Our main focus now is to link eBay and Amazon categories together and properly display them on our site. Then we will move on to adding new shopping sites to dealha.com.

 

 

 

Help us, so we can help you! We have done it right, our vision is clear. Help us succeed, so we can deliver a product you can all be proud of!

With your financial help, we will be able to:

  • Resolve category collision issue (make full eBay and Amazon integration and launch the site, that includes all the minor bugs and fixes on the site as well as site`s monetization)
  • Hire additional programmers to work on integration of more online shopping sites  - Aliexpress, Best Buy (our goal is not to clutter dealha.com with all the online shops out there) 
  • Start marketing campaign
  • Make site multilingual
  • Add more useful features to the site
  • Make Android and iOS mobile application
  • Invest in fast dedicated servers

How the money will be spent?

 

 

Follow us on Facebook and Twitter, for regular updates on the project.

Disclaimer

 

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. 

We will do our best to deliver promised rewards/perks to you guys. We believe that communication and honesty is the key, if we feel there might be some hiccups on our side, we`ll let you know. Your trust is important to us.
story_txt:
PLEASE WATCH OUR VIDEO ON YOUTUBE:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QCyAx6AY6ZgBefore you read any further!Let us give you a quick guide to dealha.com. We all want efficiency, right? So why we still use our favorite shopping sites separately to find desired items? We finally put an end to it. Dealha.com will search for your desired items in all global eBay and Amazon sites at once. Even more so, you can now type words in your native language, choose item location by country or region, filter results, manage listings and much more! Now that`s a truly great shopping experience. We have performed a lot of beta testing and our site has proven itself. We found cheapest results from all over the world in their native languages, we would normally never find through eBay or Amazon directly. For more info on our project, please read below. Thanks, Dealha.com team.Dealha.com! Global online shopping - sorted! From the very start dealha.com project was meant to be as a project that unites biggest shopping sites in one friendly place. Let us give you an example - we all love eBay and Amazon, right? We all use both of these sites frequently to buy or to sell something. So we had an idea, why not start with these two giants by putting them together! Our target was to save our time and most importantly - our money! So in 2012 we were on the mission, we started practical research on how we can make it happen. 3 years later, after lots of trails and errors, we are almost finished.Bumpy road ahead!Starting this project, we had no idea of the challenges we would have to face or the real expenses. We were pretty sure that our first hired programmers team from India would finish project in a budget of 5K USD (too good to be true, right?). However we were more than happy and willing to spend it on our dream project. Main issue! We didn`t expect any major technical issues, but we faced one - the big one! "Category collision" problem, how we call it now! Besides the fact that eBay and Amazon both have totally different category structure, eBay alone with its 22 national sites (eBay.com, eBay.de, eBay.it, eBay.co.uk...) has a complex and different category structure built in - different languages, different category titles. Breakthrough!  At this stage of the project we have found a solution to this problem with our latest programmer (now, also shareholder - Toncho Dimitrov). This is Toncho`s approach:  by using synonyms, combining together equal categories, joining subcategories and combined categories, we can resolve "Category collision" problem. We know it, because we are getting positive results while beta testing this new approach.Guess what? With this new approach we are no longer limited to eBay and Amazon, we can add MORE! Our next goal is to add Aliexpress.com to the mix!A bit of statistics! Our teamOur team consists of four people. All true believers of dealha.com project and better online shopping experience. Also all of us are shareholders of the company SIA "LeadSoft" (EU VAT number 40103777369): What dealha.com can do?For now, our innovative search engine will search all eBay and Amazon sites at once. YES, THAT'S RIGHT! Dealha.com has been made in a clean and uncluttered design matter. It`s easy to understand and navigate.   Our mission - helping users find what their`re looking for - faster and cheaper. Let`s face it, most of Americans don`t want to buy products located outside of USA/Canada as well as most Europeans don`t want products outside European Union. So we are introducing not only your typical eBay and Amazon site to search in, but also item location filtering. Users can also check specific countries or regions (for example: China or Asia), that they don`t want the product to be from. One of the major things that makes dealha.com unique and a step ahead of the competition is our built in translation function. Enabling this function allows users to find even more items for the best price. Think about it, you are looking for a leather wallet, preferably with location in Europe. You will never find all the listings, because some of them will always be listed in their national language. A seller in Germany who sells the exact leather wallet you need, will likely publish his listing in german, in this case you`ll never find it using eBay.com while typing in english “leather wallet”. But using dealha.com translation function you finally have the necessary tools. So just start typing - "lederhandschuhe" in quotes for "leather gloves" if you are german :) dealha.com will do the rest, displaying already translated and matching results from all eBay and Amazon national sites. Users can apply all kind of filters to their searches (similar to eBay), sort results, manage listings, save them to Listing Manager, categorize, compare. Users can also save their favorite sellers, comment them, contact them directly or visit their store and use many more options. More features will be added as project progresses.Translation function in use below, word "chair" is translated, displaying results from eBay.de national site:      Next goals and ideas!It`s hard to put all our thoughts and crazy new ideas in writing here, but trust us, we are here to deliver a great product, that will help all of us in our daily shopping. Saving both time and money!Some of the upcoming NEW features that we will add to dealha.com, free of charge for our backers:  
Auction shooter - this function will help users win auction based listings at the last second. You control the price limit! 

 
Item tracking system - track your newly bought item inside dealha.com. We will try to do this fully automatic if you bought your item trough dealha.com.

Buy more for less - in collaboration with major international distributors. We will create a new department offering deals with impressive discounts exclusively for dealha.com users!
No contest - feature that shows relevant listings without any bids on them 2 hours before ending. Pair that with auction shooter and you got yourself another great deal!

 
Item location selection - you can choose to show items only located in specific region. For example if your location is USA and you don`t want item to be from China, you can exclude this region, this way avoiding long shipping time and taxes.

Exclude duplicates - with this feature you can exclude duplicate listings from different eBay`s and Amazon`s. Because let`s face it, a lot of sellers publish the same listing on all national eBay sites. 
This is an actual screenshot of dealha.com:  Current progress and timeline         
 
 
 
Why our team needs your help?
 
 
We have worked on dealha.com for over 3 years now. We have created a good team around us. All we need now is a little financial boost to officially launch our site. For a project of this scope, we don`t have enough financial resources. As well as general start-up capital to get things going. Some might say - you bit more than you can chew! Maybe, but we can`t quit now! Our main focus now is to link eBay and Amazon categories together and properly display them on our site. Then we will move on to adding new shopping sites to dealha.com.
 
 
 
Help us, so we can help you! We have done it right, our vision is clear. Help us succeed, so we can deliver a product you can all be proud of!With your financial help, we will be able to:
Resolve category collision issue (make full eBay and Amazon integration and launch the site, that includes all the minor bugs and fixes on the site as well as site`s monetization)
Hire additional programmers to work on integration of more online shopping sites  - Aliexpress, Best Buy (our goal is not to clutter dealha.com with all the online shops out there) 
Start marketing campaign
Make site multilingual
Add more useful features to the site
Make Android and iOS mobile application
Invest in fast dedicated servers
How the money will be spent? 
 


Follow us on Facebook and Twitter, for regular updates on the project.
Disclaimer
 
Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. 
We will do our best to deliver promised rewards/perks to you guys. We believe that communication and honesty is the key, if we feel there might be some hiccups on our side, we`ll let you know. Your trust is important to us.

story:
• My name is Hide Kanakubo and I am the president of W-in Corporation USA.  I have been in the CE and Telecommunication industry for the last 35 years.  I have managed and headed the US operations of a large telecommunicationand consumer electronics product manufacturer from Japan, so I am experienced in overseeing a development of a new product from its conceptual stage to mass production. Our team that I have put together consists of professionals from CE, IT and wireless industry with extensive knowledge and experiencesin the field where this project belongs to with good track records respectively.   We are starting a new project called Smart Global Communication System to promote a new communication convergence system and its service for small offices and home offices to solve their daily issues.
  • While the last decade has seen a wireless substitution of landline service by mobile service, the demographics of global analog landline subscriber numbers among analog PSTN based numbers and IP based landline numbers has stayed around 1.7Billion number.  Why?  We believe it is because there are still "PLACES" where communal landline-based numbers are mandatory for all the workers in the facilities or communal groups to share.  Also, the emerging countries globally are finally overcoming the lack of their landline infrastructures and are shifting their concentrated reliance on the wireless communication service to landline based usage especiallyfor the communal “PLACES” like offices, restaurants, hospitals and schools.
  • In the world today that revolves and evolves around mobile technology, its entrenchment into every nook and corner of daily life is not only altering the daily life style, but also corporate work force structure.  By 2016, they are expecting 300 million mobile workers and 150 million telecommuters who rely their daily business communication heavily on a mobile phone.  BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) concept of using personal mobile phone as a part of business communication requirements is going to be a norm and providing mobile expense reimbursements to its sales force becomes an expensive burden for the company budget.
  • We believe our proposed system and service will help small office and home office or residential home deploy flexible communication service and lead to  communication expense reduction and enable the use of converged service not only to fully utilize what they already have but also to get more mileage out of the incumbent services.   We have initiated a piece of the solution puzzles by successfully developing a  product called PhonelinX that converges landline phone service with your smart phone as if smart phone hasbecome a cordless telephone extension to your landline phone service.  The following is the link to PhonelinX presentation video.

 http://player.vimeo.com/external/84264466.sd.mp4?s=6eefe9a140e06bb167a2db8dcbed5470

  • However, we believe the real goal of our system and service is to provide a global communication solution to the user.  In order to realize the global extensionof PhonelinX operation, we need to develop cloud based applications and host communication services on a cloud system.And we look for your contributionto help us develop the applications and modify the firmware inside PhonelinX to enable such applications and services globally.  When such global connectivity is established on the converged services between smart phone and the office/home phone service, while sitting in a café  inParis, you can call your business customers in USA from your US office phone number(service), thus eliminating the need for any international roamingcharges or even mobile minutes.  While you are on a business trip abroad,  you can push an extension to talk to people in your communication community on intercom without having to dial cumbersome international dialing sequence through roaming service or knowing such dialing sequence.  Our plannedSmart Remote Pairing application enables you to send a text to your parents smart phones, and automatically configure their smartphones tobecome an extension to your community group so that the  next call with them will be an intercom call.  
  • The contribution and the support that you backers make will enable us to accelerate the sales and deployment of PhonelinX and when Smart Global Communication System in motion, the PhonelinX will transform itself from a  local utility and solution provider to global communication solution provider. While we start building a sustainable business with PhonelinX, we will start to develop the next generation “AirTouch One” terminal with more advanced features with selective local connectivity for controlling peripheral terminals within office and home thus creating a generic global end to end (from smart phone to home/office premise) delivery highway as a home gateway for various digital services.  Your $350,000.00 contribution will gear us up on the improvements and upgrades on the current applications for Phonelinx and the firmware change within PhonelinX so that remote modifications and updates will become possible and PhonelinX can also take advantage of the new global connectivity applications that are being developed simultaneously.  $350,000.00 will also help finish up the development of  “AirTouch One” hardware and firmware. If we fall short of completing the target amount, we will be able to finish up the PhonelinX firmware change and the new global features that PhonelinX can operate. 
  • As you have seen in the video, we have successfully finished developing PhonelinX hardware, firmware, smart phone applications that control PhonelinX features, and we are at the point of commercialization.  We developed the world first docking station that has both cellular and PSTN line inside a cordless telephone that we had successfully sold to many US carriers. Our team members all have several projects that they led to successful implementation.  Because of the nature of PhonelinX and its associated services being the consultative sales orientation, we are trying our best to promote consumer awareness of the product.  We did a few limited but expensive testing of buying 60 seconds spot on TV media, but had a very positive responses from customers who either called in or purchased PhonelinX on the website.  We are in discussion with one of the largest TV shopping network in USA for running promotions on PhonelinX to create awareness among the consumer so that we are setting up a stage for national retail distribution.  While we prioritize PhonelinX deployment through landline telephone companies and cable companies, the process to get their interest, get their technical team to evaluate, and their management to package the product with some sales programs and campaigns are tedious process and sometimes it takes months.  We have started to promote PhonelinX with the expected global features to those carriers in both North and South America as we believe that our PhonelinX and its global services can help them retain their consumer as well as enterprise customers for their service by giving them additional value to their landline service as a part of the comprehensive global communication service package. For W-in to build product and service awareness through various channels will also help convince these landline carriers and cable companies to support our product into their portfolio.  Because of other products that we have been involved with, we have relationship with several major landline carriers as well as cable companies which will help us present the new endeavor that a completely new comer would find difficult to start.
  • We are also initiating a discussion to build a synergistic relationship with one of the largest SIP base chat service provider and provide our service as a  part of their service portfolio to entice enterprise customers to subscribe and if successfully implemented, we will be exposed to their 500M customersovernight.  Our sales strategy is semi-spiral and targeting the prospective customers from both ends, hardware sales and subscriptions and free subscription that leads to a purchase of hardware.  Just like some chat services that generated 200M active users within 2 years, word of the mouth andinvitation to use our free applications may help create our subscriber base quickly and thus leading to hardware adaptation for additional services.
  • The contribution from the bakers do not have to take the form of pledged monetary contribution. We would like to ask that all the backers and believers in our project to download the free applications when they are available and use them during the free promotional period or free terms per community configuration ( We are thinking about charging a monthly fee for usage per 5 extensions at a time. So up to 4 extensions, for a limited time, we will enable the free utilization of some of the global features.)  If a few % of the service users see the benefits and commit to subscribe, that will generate additional potential purchase for our hardware terminals as well for their own applications. 
  • Those wo have visited our presentation, please use Share tool on Indiegogo to share with as many prospective backers as possible.

  We thank you for taking the time to see and read our presentation. Have a great day!!

story:
Short Summary

Most people doesn't know why my smartphone and iphone is so slowly charged. There are some different occasions that can not perform maximum current charging.

Once you get this premium cables and adapter, you can easily get maximum current for any devices using micro, lightning and C type USB.

  • Extreme Cables : 99.99% 4N Oxygen Free Copper and Fully Gold plated USB A, Micro and Lightning.
  • Extreme Adapter : Secret of Power Stealer. On PC and Car, Just Insert.
  • Super Fast Delivery : All items will be shipped out from July to Aug 2016.

Let's get this Secret!!




The Impact

Let's see the Impact that we could get with this Extreme Adapter.

  • When using PC and Car USB port, You can get max 2~3X faster charging than Samsung, LG, Apple's bundle cables.

  • We tested Galaxy S6, iPhone 6 and LG G5 smartphones with bundle cables, Extreme cables and Adapter.
  • Best Choice is Composite of Extreme Cable and Adapter.

  • For the Extreme Adapter, you can use with any type of USB cables.


Let's Select materials and design for the Premium Micro cable and Lightning cable then. These are Extreme Cables.

  • Extreme Micro Cable(Charcoal Black Edition) : 18cm/80cm/160cm 
  • Extreme Lightning Cable(Charcoal Black Edition) : 18cm/80cm/160cm
  • Extreme Adapter(Charcoal Black Edition)

Super Fast Shedule

We, FUNDIAN have already made and tested the sample for mass production. We could assure that all items could be shipped out from July to Aug 2016.

Global Reseller or Distributor

If you want to be reseller or distributor of FUNDIAN Brand, we recommend that you try from "Mini Stock" or "Stock". Or you can contact to us for the mass production and long cooperation.


Risks & Challenges

Because we've prepared all things for mass production, we could assure that there's no risk.


Global Crowd Brand, FUNDIAN

FUNDIAN plan to open innovative new project every month. You can be our fan on fundian facebook and get "Secret Perks" for the next project.

story:
01 August 2017

Good News Everyone!

First of all, I want to apologize for the long delay. It has been almost 10 months now but during this time I have prepared two hardware revisions of “Joker TV” with various fixes. I also wrote software for FPGA and the host (for Linux/OSx/Windows) from scratch. This was a lot of work but now I’m ready to share all of it with you. I have decided to donate my work to the community and make this project an Open Hardware and Open Software project. Here is a post with additional information.

Additionally, I have just placed the first batch order to the factory and I’m anticipating the results which should be ready in about three (3) weeks. I will send freshly baked “Joker TV” gadgets to all backers! Once again, thanks for waiting, I do apologize for delay!

Stay tuned !

 

30 September 2016

Good news Everyone !

Stylish box is here ! Work in progress ... stay tuned !

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

16 September 2016

Good news Everyone !

First samples is here ! Work in progress ... stay tuned !

 

 

10 August 2016

Good news Everyone !

"Zero" hardware revision is finally here.  Cool shot was made :)

 

I'll start hardware testing and work on software part (FPGA firmware and drivers). So far so good. Everything is going as planned. I will post progress into this campaign. Stay tuned !

 

Good news Everyone !

06 July 2016

"Zero" hardware revision now in production. I'm waiting first hardware samples in few weeks (usually it takes 2-3 weeks for full assembly) - before the end of July 2016. 

Here is a case drawings draft and 3d models of the board.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Notice: I have decided to split RF-inputs - first for Satellite Dish and second for Terrestrial antenna. This allows to power (5v) Terrestrial antenna for better radio performance. 

 

Good news Everyone !

* If this campaign will be funded for 100% ($50k) I will make this project Open Hardware ! All schematic and PCB will be available on http://jokersys.com website.

* If this campaign will be funded for 200% ($100k) I will donate 10 pcs. of Joker TV gadget for educational organizations (just drop me email with brief description of your educational program).

* If this campaign will be funded for 300% ($150k) I will prepare OSx drivers for MacBooks. Open source, of course :)

 

Let's make best DTV receiver together ! Please share this info with
friends or on open-source/open-hardware sites and forums !
Big thanks for all !

F.A.Q

 * What this device dedicated for ?

It's small and compact Terrestrial and Satellite TV receiver for laptops, tablets and PC's.

 * Which channels I can receive ?

It depends on your location. Terrestrial TV is usually distributed by local TV provider and consist of local TV channels and some global TV channels. For example, in Florida you can receive more than 400 FREE TV channels ! Here is a link for summary: 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_televisio...

I'm planning to make updates for available TV channels in different regions of the world.

 * Do I need internet connection to receive TV channels ?

No

* Do I need to pay for TV channels ?

Basically no. Terrestrial and some of satellite channels usually free of charge (so called FTA channels). Some satellite channels requires CAM module and smart card - in this case you should pay for TV provider. 

* Dimension ?

D/W/H = 130/80/25 mm.

Weight: 200 gr.

 

I'm on vacation in Florida, USA. Of course, I'm watching TV channels here using Joker TV gadget ! On my Microsoft Surface 3 tablet.

 

Here is a world's digital TV standards map:

 

 

You can watch all of them using one device - Joker TV gadget !

 

Here is brief description of supported DTV standards:
DVB-S/S2 - satellite, all world
DVB-T/T2 - mostly Europe
DVB-C/C2 - cable, all world
ISDB-T - Brazil, Latin America, Japan
ATSC - USA, Canada, Mexico, South Korea
DTMB - China, Cuba, Hong-Kong, Pakistan
 

Used chipsets:

 * Sony CXD2858ER - universal Ter/Sat tuner

 * Sony CXD2854ER - DVB-C/C2/T/T2/S/S2 demodulator

 * LG LG3306A - ATSC demodulator

 * AltoBeam ATBM8881 - DTMB demodulator

 * Altera EP4CE22F17C8N - FPGA

 

 

 

Features

 

Open source Linux and Windows drivers

Open source firmware for FPGA (VHDL)

 

Supported standards

 

 

DVB-S/S2

QPSK, 8PSK

DVB-T/T2

ETSI EN-300744 v1.5.1 compatible

QPSK - 16QAM - 64QAM modulations

ETSI EN-302755 v1.2.1 compatible

DVB-C/C2

Decodes ITU-T J.83-Annexes A, B and C, and DVB-C bit streams

ETSI EN 302-769 v1.2.1

ISDB-Tb

Conforms to ARIB STD-B31

ATSC:

ATSC A/53 8VSB, American/Korean

DTMB:

Fully compliance with GB20600-2006 (DTMB)

 

And need to say that "Joker TV" project awarded "gold medal" by jury of largest inventors show in USA INPEX'2016 (held in Pittsburgh, PA on 7-9 June 2016):
story_txt: 01 August 2017Good News Everyone!First of all, I want to apologize for the long delay. It has been almost 10 months now but during this time I have prepared two hardware revisions of “Joker TV” with various fixes. I also wrote software for FPGA and the host (for Linux/OSx/Windows) from scratch. This was a lot of work but now I’m ready to share all of it with you. I have decided to donate my work to the community and make this project an Open Hardware and Open Software project. Here is a post with additional information.Additionally, I have just placed the first batch order to the factory and I’m anticipating the results which should be ready in about three (3) weeks. I will send freshly baked “Joker TV” gadgets to all backers! Once again, thanks for waiting, I do apologize for delay!Stay tuned ! 30 September 2016Good news Everyone !Stylish box is here ! Work in progress ... stay tuned !       16 September 2016Good news Everyone !First samples is here ! Work in progress ... stay tuned !  10 August 2016Good news Everyone !"Zero" hardware revision is finally here.  Cool shot was made :) I'll start hardware testing and work on software part (FPGA firmware and drivers). story:
What Is This About?

ALFTEL Systems Ltd. is a team of professionals based in Ottawa, Canada with a wealth of experience in the High Tech and IT Security industries. We love what we do and that’s why we do it so well.

The AIRBUD campaign is important to us because it introduces a flexible and powerful wireless platform. Whether you are a wireless professional or an enthusiast interested in monitoring your environment, developing and improving your pentesting procedures or creating new router and firewall applications, AIRBUD lets you do this quickly and easier with a smaller footprint package.

We have created AIRBUD to fill a gap in the wireless application development and testing communities. We are hoping it will be adopted as the platform of choice for multi-radio Open Source projects.

We have chosen a "Flexible" campaign goal, meaning that whatever our supporters pledge, will be delivered to us at the end of the campaign, whether we meet our goal or not. Don't let this make you hesitate to support us.

The purpose of our campaign is to offset the development costs of bringing a complex new device to market. By supporting us in this, you will have access to our early production at a reduced cost. We are also working with our production partners to see how we can upgrade some components for our early supporters. Right now we are offering a free GPS module to the first 20 supporters who choose an AIRBUD Perk. Stand by for more, but remember that early supporters will likely get the most benefit.

We are just weeks away from placing our order for the first production run. This will happen even if our goal is not met, and all our supporters will receive the perks they signed up for. Once the campaign ends, we will switch to commercial sales of AIRBUD at more realistic market prices for such a powerful platform.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

The design work is finished and the components have been selected. We are in the final stages of testing our prototypes. 

We are looking to hit a funding goal of 75,000 USD, which will help us with the first production run. We appreciate your support and have created perks to express our gratitude. Depending on your level of interest and involvement, we are offering a fully functional AIRBUD PCB, a 60W power supply, an open style acrylic assembly, and a complete set of antennas and connectors (see Cables, Antennas and Adapters for a full description). These are ready for assembly and populating with radio cards of your choice. All systems will come with the latest Ubuntu Server, Kali Linux, Parrot Security OS and Windows 10 Evaluation pre-installed. If you are not ready yet to try our AIRBUD platform, but are excited about what we are doing, you can still help our development work by opting for the $25 perk. This will be used as part of our documentation and training material development project. Check out our perks section for more details.

We are committed to making AIRBUD a reality. It is important to our team and the wireless test enthusiast community. Your support is needed to help recover the initial development and production costs. We are committed to rewarding your support by delivering the chosen perks to each of our supporters, even if the campaign goal is not reached, and we will use the knowledge and experience gained from working on a successfully funded Kickstarter campaign to help make this happen.

 

Why Are We Doing This?

As IT security professionals, we need easy access to high quality tools. Without the right tools, helping our clients is difficult. This problem is more common in the wireless domain, where security experts and hardware and software developers have limited high quality and high power monitoring and testing hardware available to them. There is nothing that allows them to rapidly switch among functions such as testing radio cards, simultaneous scanning on multiple frequencies, and monitoring wireless data in dynamic environments.

At ALFTEL, one of the things we have learned is that sometimes you have to do things yourself if you want to get things done right. Out of the need for a flexible, robust and reliable tool, we created AIRBUD.
 

What Are The Problems With Wireless Testing?

We did our research. Here is what we know about the WiFi pentesting and development environment:

  1. There are many powerful open source applications for WiFi testing and monitoring (like Aircrack-ng and Kismet) that are usually bundled into Linux distributions like Kali and Parrot Security OS or other custom crafted Linux installations.
     
  2. Most people tend to use single-radio USB WiFi dongles because it is easy. There are challenges with this approach:
     
    • There are very few chipsets compatible with Aircrack-ng and Kismet (monitor and injection mode support).
    • You are limited to the frequency bands available on the single radio implementation.
    • The only Airckack-ng and Kismet friendly USB dongle with 802.11a coverage (Ralink chipset) is no longer being produced and will soon be unavailable.
    • USB 2.0 has limited bandwidth for high speed 802.11ac/n in dual/triple chain modes.
    • Linux USB device drivers are generally not as robust as PCIe device drivers.
    • Many new USB 3.0 wireless dongles have “old USB 2.0” on the inside, having unknown compatibility with pentesting tools, have limited range, and use low power internal ceramic chip antennas.
    • Using multiple USB WiFi dongles to cover more channels and frequencies leads to bulky construction with multi-port hubs.
    • USB can only support low power radio cards (2.5W) without clumsy external power supplies.
    • Multiple USB dongles with external antennas become difficult to manage and generally use lower quality/power antennas.
    •  

What Are The Solutions To These Problems?

Unable to find a suitable device in the market, we undertook to improve the current state of technology in the wireless domain. Our end goals were to develop a solution that:

  • Provides the WiFi pentesting and open source development communities with a powerful and flexible tool for testing and monitoring, that would allow simultaneous use of multiple radio cards.
  • Is compact, self-contained, adaptable to future technology and easy to use; a small device that is low in cost, high in performance, and flexible across multiple operating systems and tools.
  • Creates the type of robust and flexible hardware that will support our own IT Security services
 

 

 

How Did We Arrive at AIRBUD's Specs?

We started off by searching for low power processors. ARM CPUs have a deep level of community support and development tools to go along with them. However, it was frustrating to be at the mercy of vendors’ kernel patches and hope that they would match with our interface requirements for an ARM CPU. Additionally, it was difficult to find reliable support in Linux for PCIe on most ARM processors.

We found success when we turned to Intel’s newer multi-core low power processors. Their advanced technology had the potential to provide the power profile we were looking for. They also have the added benefit of being able to use any x86 compatible OS and application, which includes Windows and virtualized environments. In particular, the Cherry Trail and Braswell processors offer speedy quad core variants with a very low thermal design profile in the 2W-7W range.

Next, we chose the mini PCI express form factor that gave us the adaptability we needed and kept us in line with the upcoming M.2 technology. This also allows for the power and versatility of using multiple simultaneous radio cards, as well as allowing for other types of mini PCIe and M.2 form factor cards. We would now also have a handy test platform for card function and compatibility without using clumsy external adapters or needing to disassemble our equipment.

PCIe radio cards, like Mikrotik, allow us to use sturdy MMCX RF connectors and high-quality N-type antennas, something not available with USB Wi-Fi dongles. The end result is that high power radio cards can operate at maximum capacity, much like mating well-designed speakers to a high end Hi-Fi audio system.

Finally, we added multiple PCIe interfaces so users can work with up to six radio cards simultaneously and in parallel with one another.

Our resulting wireless appliance is a best of breed penetration testing tool and hardware or software development platform. It is future-proofed by the ability to easily and quickly switch out the radio cards and CPU module as technology advances.

 

What Are AIRBUD's Features?

After exhaustive debate and discussion about what should be included and excluded, we settled on the following features:

  • Intel quad code Cherry Trail processor with 4W TDP (Thermal Design Profile) - the same processors found in modern 2-in-1  PCs.
  • An affordable and customizable CPU module that allows for easy upgrades.
  • As many mini PCIe slots as possible through a PCIe switch.
  • Support for ANY standard mini PCIe card: up to 7W per slot, PCIe Bus, I2C Bus, USB 2.0 Bus, SIM card interface.
  • USB 3.0 and HDMI video.
  • Serial console interface over USB
  • Ample flash memory and enough RAM to work smoothly with Linux and Windows.
  • MicroSD card slot for additional storage needs.
  • Support for cellular modem (SIM card slot) and GPS cards.
  • Power circuit design for support of high-power radio cards in each slot.
  • Small form factor.

 

AIRBUD Specifications

 

 

 

CPU 1.44GHz/1.86GHz Quad Core Intel
RAM 2GB DDR3
Storage 64GB eMMC
LAN 1x Gbit Port
USB 3.0/USB 2.0 2x
microSD 1x
SIM 1x
microUSB/UART 1x
HDMI 1x
mini PCIe (PCIe, USB, I2C, 7W) 5x
mini PCIe (USB, I2C, 7W) 1x

 

 

 

 

Applications - How Can I Use AIRBUD?

 

     

     

       

      • Pentesting Platform

      • Monitoring or Sniffing Platform

         

         

      •  

         

        Wireless Router or Firewall Platform

      • Wireless Intrusion Prevention System (WIPS)

      • Wireless Intrusion Detection System (WIDS)

      • Wireless Spectrum Analysis Appliance

      •  

         

        Test Platform for PCIe mini and M.2 cards

         

      •  

         

        Any business case where you need PC-like functionality and multiple PCIe mini or M.2 cards

         

      •  

         

        Any other wireless application - just use your imagination

       


      What Have We Achieved to Date?

       

       

       

       

      • Created proof of concept prototypes outfitted with different Mikrotik radio cards and delivered them to the developer of Aircrack-ng during DEFCON 24 in Las Vegas, 2016, pictured here:

      • Completed several development stages: Architecture, circuit design, component choice, schematics, PCB layout, manufacturer selection, and receipt of the first engineering pre-production samples.
      • Outfitted some engineering samples with different Mikrotik and Intel radio cards along with GPS modules and delivered for review and evaluation to the following companies: Kismet Wireless, Acrylic Wifi (multi-boot installation with Windows 10 and Kali Linux), and Parrot Security OS (multi-boot installation with Parrot Security OS and Kali Linux), pictured below:

         

      • We did prepare another demo unit housed in extruded aluminum case and will deliver it shortly to OpenWRT community developers for evaluation and potentially creating USB/CD installation packages. We see a great opportunity for developing extended OpenWRT applications.

      • Explored different design ideas for case enclosures adapted to various applications.
      • Approached possible partners to extend their software applications to take advantage of our powerful hardware platform.
      • Launched this Indiegogo campaign to help fund the production of AIRBUD and bring it to market.

       

      Risks & Challenges

      As with any technology project, there are risks. Examples include unpredictable issues such as supply chain, component availability, design, compatibility and integrating various hardware and software components. We, at ALFTEL, are using our decades of product development experience to minimize these risks by working closely with our supply chain partners, closely reviewing designs and monitoring intermediate results. We are using engineering samples which closely approximate the design to test radio cards with widely available software and to eliminate flaws in the mechanical design and firmware.  We are also using our first samples to work with select leaders in the wireless community to test our solutions.

       

       

      Other Ways You Can Help

       

      • Support early to help us trend in Indiegogo. For the first 20 supporters who opt for an AIRBUD PERK, we will add a GPS module to the selected PERK.
      • Share our posts on Indiegogo to your favorite social media portals.
      • Tell your friends and colleagues about AIRBUD, the ultimate wireless platform.
      • Suggest applications that can be used and ideas for evolving the product.
      • Ask questions and tell us what you think - we would love to hear your opinion!

We, at ALFTEL, are using our decades of product development experience to minimize these risks by working closely with our supply chain partners, closely reviewing designs and monitoring intermediate results. We are using engineering samples which closely approximate the design to test radio cards with widely available software and to eliminate flaws in the mechanical design and firmware.  We are also using our first samples to work with select leaders in the wireless community to test our solutions.  Other Ways You Can Help 
Support early to help us trend in Indiegogo. For the first 20 supporters who opt for an AIRBUD PERK, we will add a GPS module to the selected PERK.
Share our posts on Indiegogo to your favorite social media portals.
Tell your friends and colleagues about AIRBUD, the ultimate wireless platform.
Suggest applications that can be used and ideas for evolving the product.
Ask questions and tell us what you think - we would love to hear your opinion!

story:
We've been avid sports card collectors for over 30 years and would like to provide a service to everyone that makes card collecting much more cost effective and fun, especially to those who think they cannot afford the premium card market.

Card breaking is an affordable way to collect Sports Cards for a fraction of the cost of buying a case/box.

A box break is an service event where we or a "breaker" will open a box, case, or pack of collectible trading cards for individuals or groups of people during a live feed broadcast, so that everyone may see and share in the excitement of the event. This type of service provided by "breakers" is a cheaper way to potentially get high dollar or rare cards without having to buy a whole box or case.  Instead of paying thousands of dollars for high-end cases, you may be able to buy your favorite team for a fraction of the cost!

There are a few different options to buy into a break.  Some breaks will allow you to pick your own team, by purchasing that said team for a specific amount of money.  Any cards that are pulled from your purchased team will be shipped to you.  Some teams may get many hits, others may not hit at all.  You are guaranteed to receive any cards that may be pulled from the team your purchased for that specific break.  We have no idea what the exact contents are of any unopened, factory sealed pack/box/case. 

Other options may include random teams.  You will buy into the break and we will randomize the list of buyers thru random.org (or comparable site) live on our site, just prior to the break.  You will receive all cards that are pulled from your team.

We will be starting off slowly, breaking 2-3 nights per week, allowing our customers to purchase teams/spots in our breaks thru our website, which will be coming soon.  Our goal is to be able to break 6-7 days per week.  Getting to that goal requires a lot of behind the scenes, startup items.  With your help, we will be able to purchase all of our supplies and accomplish our goal much quicker than we could possibly imagine!!!

Please, check out all of our perks.  You will be able to take advantage of the low cost, premiere week deals and breaks!  We appreciate each and every one of you!

story:
Tech 'n' Trend

Wearable devices; Where fashion and technology collide. We at Inobrands know that understanding fashion is as important as the technology and engineering behind the product. 


50% Discount

The product will be soon available in retail stores near you. The retail price will be between USD.18 - USD.22. Support us now and get the product at  50% discount.


Which one should you buy?

Micro USB is universally used to charge Android Smart Phones and Lightning is used to charge Apple products since the launch of iPhone 5 and newer models. We unfortunately do not support iPhone 4/4s. If you are not sure if you picked the right cable, please mention the model of your mobile phone and we will send you the right cable to go with it.

MFI Certified & One Year Warranty

Unlike other similar products, ours comes with one year replacement warranty and the lightning cables are MFI certified.

Is Magnetic better or our Clip On ?

There are other similar products, which use magnets instead of a 'clip on' adapter like we do. Firstly magnets do not secure the band 100% and magnets also have an adverse effect on your strip cards such as credit cards. Hence we made our product without the use of magnets.

How do I specify my Pattern or Colour ?

Once you have made your purchase, we will get in touch with you asking for your preference. You can then specify your pattern or colour. Purchases made from Dubai, UAE will be fulfilled within 10 days of placing your order. Other countries will be shipped at the end of the campaign by first week of March as we will be doing bulk shipping by country.

story:
To Learn More Visit www.dscarmy.com



Daily Safety Check

Next Generation Computer Defense

Our whole life's are on our laptops: music, photos, finances. We think that we are keeping ourselves safe online. However, cyber criminals are actually watching us online gathering our passwords and personal information. Next thing you know, the computer is wiped clean and so is your bank account.

The founders of Daily Safety Check realized that the same technologies and methods used to protect banks, which are constantly under attack, could be adapted to protect home and small business computers.  Any top quality security system has principles, whether guarding a high risk computer system, or protecting a building, or even bodyguards protecting the president: prevention, detection and response.

1. Prevention

  • External prevention: As you would expect from Daily Safety Check, we have partnered with the best antivirus software available on the market, fully integrated with our product.  At no extra cost to you.

  • Internal prevention: No system that looks exclusively at external threats is safe. The largest vulnerability in most home computer systems is out of date software.  Major programs like Adobe Acrobat, Flash, Microsoft Office and others, have regular security fixes that antivirus cannot fix and was not designed to protect.

2. Detection

  • Computer Forensics:   Even if an intruder steals a password or makes it past your defenses, Daily Safety Check still performs daily checks for telltale signs of an attack, such as changes to user accounts, security settings and hard drive usage.

3. Response

  • Awareness: You would never install a home security system without an alarm. Why should your computer be different? Millions of people have viruses on their computer right now and have no idea that their passwords, financial information and sensitive documents have been compromised.  Daily Safety Check provides real time monitoring, with email alerts so you know if someone is attacking your computer.

  • Remediation: Our team of computer security experts will alert you, and provide information that can help you restore your computer.


Why Are We Creating this Project?

We created and developed the system but now we need your help to make this available for everyone. Through your financial contribution, you become a soldier in the battle against the cyber war that is upon us. We need that investment to strengthen our infrastructure, marketing, and development. Become a soldier and join the DSC ARMY today.



Why Do We Need Daily Safety Check? 

The cyber world is more dangerous than it has ever been. In just the last year, there has been a staggering increase in the number and sophistication of cyber attacks on home computers. Is your antivirus software keeping you safe?

Top 4 myths of home computer security

Myth 1: If I have antivirus software installed, then I am safe

Reality: Antivirus is only a small part securing any computer.

  • 1/3 of computers that have up-to-date antivirus software installed have a virus right now, according to security firm SurfRight.
  • 4 out of 5 computers have at least one security vulnerability that has nothing to do with virus or malware protection
  • Other programs can let hackers in, such as Adobe Acrobat, Flash, Office, Java and many more
  • Daily Safety Check ensures your entire computer is safe.

Myth 2: I don't need to worry. I don't have anything but music, photos and videos on my computer

Reality: Hackers are increasingly focused on home computers.

  • Hackers increasingly use viruses to steal your identity. Modern malware can sit on your computer for months, building a profile of your identity, finances, passwords and sensitive documents.
  • The average identity theft victim takes 6 months and over 2,000 hours to recover his or her identity. 40% haven't recovered their identity after a full year! Source: Federal Trade Commission.
  • How much of your life is online or on your computer? People live their lives through the digital wold, with photos, videos, music and documents all at risk from a hacker attack.
  • Daily Safety Check gives you bank-strength security, so hackers choose easier targets. 

Myth 3:Cybercrime isn't any worse now than in the past

Reality: Cybercrime is up sharply in the last year, and getting worse

  • Fast Company called 2012 the Cybercrime "Hell Year" because of the large number of attacks so far
  • Cybercrime in 2014 was about $12.7 million in the U.S., compared to $11.56 million in 2013, according to a new Ponemon Institute study.
  • Cyber crime has experienced staggering growth in the number and sophistication of attacks
  • Corporate security has changed dramatically in the last few years to adapt to this threat, but antivirus software has not changed significantly in over 6 years
  • Because home computers are now the weak point, hackers are increasingly focused on compromising the computers of a company's employees and customers to access their systems.
  • DSC uses the latest in security technology and concepts to keep cyber-criminals away. 

Myth 4: I would know if I had a virus on my computer

Reality: Most viruses and malware don't slow down or crash your computer.

  • Most people who have a virus or malware have no idea they have been compromised
  • Modern malware can sit on your computer for months, building a profile of your identity, finances, passwords and sensitive documents.
  • DSC alerts you if someone is trying to attack your computer. 

To Learn More visit www.dscarmy.com

How It Works

Daily Safety Check gives you bank-strength security for your home computer. Just like a high-risk banking system, Daily Safety Check uses layers of security to ensure you are safe:

Advanced protection - beyond antivirus

Real time monitoring for intruders

Alerts and help if you are attacked

Best of all, Daily Safety Check is easy to set up and use. Just install from the link in the welcome email, and we do almost everything. You will get a weekly email showing the status of every computer so you know you're protected.


1. ADVANCED PROTECTION

STATE-OF-THE-ART ANTIVIRUS

DSC has partnered with Vipre Antivirus, the most advanced malware protection software on the market, to bring you complete computer security. Every computer protected by Daily Safety Check Home Edition automatically includes Vipre Antivirus! 


Vulnerability Management

Vulnerability Management means that we look for security "holes" in your computer and fix them.

  • Daily checks and updates the latest security patches on dozens of software programs, such as Adobe Acrobat, Adobe Flash, Sun Java, Microsoft Office and more.
  • Daily checks and updates security settings
  • Daily checks and updates firewall settings and integrity

2. Real-time Monitoring

Traditional antivirus software watches for specific virus threats. DSC actively watches your computer for signs of an attack, even if that threat isn't protected by antivirus software.

Viruses leave telltale signs of suspicious activity. DSC watched your computer 24 hours a day for threats, such as changes to:

  • Operating system
  • User accounts
  • Security settings
  • Hard drives.

3. Help if you are attacked

Email alerts

Daily Safety Check has security professionals standing by 24 hours a day to help defend your computer:

  • Real-time email alerts in case of an attack
  • Modern malware can watch your computer for months, building a profile of your passwords, finances, sensitive documents and identity
  • Many people never know that their computer has a virus. Never be caught unaware again

Real-time response from security professionals

Daily Safety Check has security professionals standing by 24 hours a day to help defend your computer:

  • Assess the threat to your computer
  • Provide computer forensics to understand what was compromised
  • Give you information on how to defend and restore your computer


Daily Safety Check PC Magazine Review

Customer Reviews

Ellen Kelly
Florida
I love your product! It has protected our home computers wonderfully! Good job! Thanks!

Leonard Lindell
Illinois
I purchased DSC Home Edition two weeks ago and it downloaded so seamlessly. I never knew it was even doing it's job until I got my first weekly report. My 2nd report just came and thus far nothing has gotten through. Previously I was having to clean up from 5 to 15 viruses per week. DSC is a great product. I hope & trust they'll stay ahead of the hackers.

Aimee Schwab
Ohio
I renewed my subscription to the DSC home edition and during the last year I did not have ONE, not ONE issue with viruses, malware, spyware or anything else. I've had Norton, McAfee and many others and not a single one protected my computer the way DSC has. Get this! You will be glad you did.

Mark V.
Missouri
Incredible service and a hard working group of experts. I can't believe that I had never heard of this group before. I've tried Norton and McAfee and compared to DSC, they are worthless. Daily Safety Check all the way!

James Parrott
Florida
I am very happy with the product. With the increase in cyber crime it is important to be protected. This is like the probiotics of computer defense. The personal customer support is great. They take the time to explain the whole process to you, so that you understand how it works.

Joao Correa Filho
Minas Gerais, Brazil
After trying various security suites I have finally found DSC, the perfect solution for my PC protection. Thank you very much.


FAQs
Frequently Asked Questions

You said Vipre Antivirus is included; where is it?
The Vipre Antivirus software is installed when we are certain that no other Ant-virus software is installed.  When it is installed it appears as a blue or green “insect” on the bottom right toolbar. Hovering over the icon will display “Managed AntiVirus AP:Enabled”  This is the Vipre Antivirus engine running, but managed by our Support Center.

Do you watch what websites I go to?
No, we do not monitor what you do on your computer or what websites you visit. However, while Daily Safety Check does NOT monitor or record what websites are visited, it does look for malicious software that can be inadvertently downloaded from websites.  If Daily Safety Check detects malicious software it will either quarantine or delete it to prevent a compromise.

What type of information does Daily Safety Check collect from my computer?
Daily Safety Check does not collect or look for any personal or confidential information from your computer.  It does not profile or collect any “personal” habits or activities or read email. It does not monitor your network or phones.

Daily Safety Check does collect basic security information from computer event logs, what types of software are installed and their versions. It also collects hardware specs such as OS, processor speed disk space.

I am taking my computer on a trip to Europe, will Daily Safety Check work?
Yes, Daily Safety Check will protect your computer anywhere in the world.  However, while it will continue to actively protect it, if it is not connected to the “Internet”, we will not be able to send hacker alerts and perform  daily safety checks.  When traveling we assume that an owner will occasionally connect to a network to check email. When this occurs the computer will send any “queued” alerts and perform its daily safety checks.

Does your program prevent me from doing anything on my computer, like visiting websites or installing software?
While Daily Safety Check does not prevent people from installing software or visiting websites, it does look for malicious software that can be inadvertently downloaded from websites.  If we detect malicious software we will either quarantine or delete it to prevent a compromise.
We strongly encourage all computer owners to use a basic Internet “Filtering” program that will prevent all accidental website visits to the higher risk websites such as pornography and cracking/hacking.  We can provide this service for a nominal fee.

I already have an antivirus program on my computer; does that mean I can’t use Daily Safety Check?
While Daily Safety Check comes with Vipre Antivirus, it will work with all other major antivirus programs.  In fact, for new purchases we encourage you to leave your current antivirus program installed and install the Daily Safety Check program over it.  As soon you install the Daily Safety Check program we will begin evaluating your computer and set a schedule to correct any discovered security issues. In some cases, depending on the number of programs installed, how heavily it is used and the age of computer, it could take several days to sufficiently correct any significant security issues.

Keeping your current ant-virus program installed during this initial phase will help prevent any security issues from taking place.  

Typically after Daily Safety Check has been installed for one complete day owners are requested to remove their current antivirus program. Once we detect that an antivirus program has been completely removed, we will automatically install Vipre Antivirus with an hour.  A full install will typically require three computer reboots.

We promote the Vipre Antivirus program because it is tightly integrated into our monitoring and alerting system.  While owners can choose to keep other antivirus programs, Daily Safety Checks overall effective is reduced as we can only make sure other antivirus programs are working and being updated on a regular basis. Our notifications are limited to “broken” or “not-updated”

How do I get alerts to go to my phone?
When you purchased Daily Safety Check you provided a primary email address. We default all alerts to that address. If you would like to add an additional email address or send text alerts to a phone simply send an email to support@dailysafetycheck.com  with the phone number or email address.

Your software installation package size  is very small, how can you put all of this in it?
While other security vendors add feature after feature to make their software more appealing, Daily Safety Check is designed to be lightweight and for a specific purpose, to help you protect your computer. We don’t believe a multitude of “features” is essential for this. In fact in our experience, they usually only take space and slow computers down.


To Learn More visit www.dscarmy.com
